column1: 1_003_05_C_Gro_brgyad stong grel chen rnam bshad.xml,1_003_05,,ex3052025-01-1013-29-14,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3052025-01-1013-29-14"" status=""unreviewed"">  <pb n=""1a""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">dpal gro lung ba chen po</rs>s mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4464"">'grel chen gyi rnam bshad</rs> <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr>

<l>yid (y)ong (snon) kun ldan d(p)u(ng 'di)
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7036"">bkra shis <abbr>dpal ldan</abbr> 'od zer</rs> las 'khrungs
<l>chos kyi s(py)an mnga' rnams kyi gzigs dang

1_003_05_C_Gro_brgyad stong grel chen rnam bshad.xml,1_003_05,,ex30520250110201,unreviewed,84a5 - 84a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""84a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex30520250110201"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""7""/>
<lg> <l>skye ba kun du bdag gi blo gros ni
<l>dpag med yon tan tshogs kyi 'byung gnas kyi
<l><lb n=""84a7""/> legs gsungs 'di' cung zad ngal byas pas
<l>'gro kun srid mtsho che las myur sgrol shog
column5: </lg></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_003_05_C_Gro_brgyad stong grel chen rnam bshad.xml,1_003_05,,ex3052023-11-241,unreviewed,84a7 - 84b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""84a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3052023-11-241"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (84a7–84b1""/>don gyi gnas rnams ni phal cher <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon bdag nyid chen po</rs>s<!--probably rNgog Blo ldan shes rab (db:3786)--> sbyar ba
column2: 'di nyid kyi don bsdus ba dang
column3: 'grel ba rung ba'i bshad sbyar gyi rjes su 'brangs te rtogs par bya'o

column1: 'dir ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">kho bo</rs>s skyes bu dam pa de'i gsung gi bdud rtsi'i zer ma la gces spras byas te
column2: <lb n=""84b1""/> tshig gi cha ji tsam rnyed pa de brjed byang du bkod pa yin no

column1: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4464"">'phags pa brgyad stong pa'i 'grel pa</rs>'i don cung zad
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyi brjed byang du bkod pa yin no
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_003_05_C_Gro_brgyad stong grel chen rnam bshad.xml,1_003_05,,ex3052023-11-2489,unreviewed,84b1 - 84b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""84b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3052023-11-2489"" status=""unreviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Post-colophon verses (84b1–84b3)""/>
swa ti ḥ
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""1""/>
<lg> <l>rgyal yum sbus pa dum kun mchog gyur kyang
<l> don rgyas tshig nyung shin tu rtogs bka' ste
<l>  de don 'grel la dbang du gyur ba yi

<l> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">rgyal sras bzang po</rs>s <lb n=""84b2""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3709"">rgyan gyi snang ba</rs> mdzad
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""2""/>
<lg> <l>des kyang mi gang la rjes 'jug gdul bya la
<l>rgya bod 'dran<anchor xml:id=""a7""/> zla bral ba'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">gro lung ba</rs>s
<l><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4464""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3709"">rgyan gyi snang ba</rs>'i rnam bshad </rs> phul byung mdzad
<l>'di la ma rten 'grel chen phyogs mthong med

1_003_05_C_Gro_brgyad stong grel chen rnam bshad.xml,1_003_05,,ex30520250110213,unreviewed,84b2 - 84b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""84b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex30520250110213"" status=""unreviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""3""/>
<lg><l>don 'di mthong nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkha' spyod dbang po nga</rs>s
<l> bka' brgya phrag mang po dang du blangs
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dad ldan rngor bsam bza' mi rnams</rs> dang ni
<l><lb n=""84b3""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7036"">dpal<anchor xml:id=""a8""/> ldan bkra shis mgon </rs>gyis sbyin bdag byas

3_088_07_zha lu rin chen_bsdus chos phreng.xml,3_088_07,,ex88072025-05-2614-58-29,reviewed,10b6 - 10b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex88072025-05-2614-58-29"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">    <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (10b5-6)""/>

bsdus <lb n=""10b6""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""d:5306"">chos nor bu'i phreng ba</rs> ces bya ba 'di ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5959"">dge ba'i <abbr>bshes gnyen</abbr> daM pa <abbr>dpal ldan</abbr> chos 'byor</rs> gyis bskul ba'i ngor <choice><reg>rin chen bsod nams 'phel</reg><orig>°ie °o° °M °e°</orig></choice> gyis ¦ sa pho spre'u'i lo ¦ nag pa'i zla ba'i gnaM gang la ¦ <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5719"">'de re lung gi brag phug</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho
column2: <lb n=""10b7""/> 'dis kyang gzhan la phan <abbr>thogs</abbr> par gyur cig

column1: 1_011_15_sPar phu_rten brel me long.xml,1_011_15,,ex11152024-09-0412-06-12,reviewed,26a7 - 26b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""26a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex11152024-09-0412-06-12"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4544"">rten cing 'brel par 'byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> rab tu byed pa
'khor 'das kyi chos <abbr>thams cad</abbr> blta' ba'i me long</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
lung rigs <lb n=""26a8""/> kyi gzhung 'grel mang du thos shing legs par sbyangs pas tshul <abbr>bzhin</abbr> du rtogs shing
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3854"">rigs par smra ba'i btsun pa blo gros seng ghe</rs>s
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6812"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsod <pb n=""16b""/><lb n=""26b1""/> nams 'bum</rs> gyi don du
nye bar sbyar pas 'di re shig yongs su rdzogs s+ho

column3: chos bcu drug mi dmigs par rtogs pa de nyid rang gi laM rgyud la yon tan yang ldan du skye ba yin gyi lam shes ma yin ces pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">blo ldan</rs> na re de ltar na laM shes mi srid par 'gyur ces pa yang med de de las ldog pa gzhan laM 3 mi dmigs par shes pa yod pas so de nyid la ma shes ma yin <lb n=""12b6""/>nyan rang gi lam yon tan yang ldan du skye ba yin ce na
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4221"">skyi <lb n=""3b3""/> ston grags pa rgyal mtshan</rs> la gnang

column1: 2_046_01_I_R_M_thal phreng mdor bsdus_etext.xml,2_046_01,,ex46012024-12-0916-14-30,unreviewed,9a1 - 9a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex46012024-12-0916-14-30"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Closing verse (9a1–9a2)""/>
<l> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4779"">mdor bsdus thal 'gyur phreng ba</rs> 'di
<l>   <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5985"">blo gsal bsod nams <choice><reg>rgya</reg><orig>(rgya)</orig></choice> mtsho khyed</rs>
<l>spro ba bskyed phreng phul ba lags
<l>dge bas <lb n=""9a2""/> kun mkhyen thob gyur cig

2_046_05_rnam nges grel.xml,2_046_05,,ex46052024-09-1216-47-23,unreviewed,21b9 - 22a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""21b9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex46052024-09-1216-47-23"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo ts+tsha ba chen po</rs> ni rtags kyi 'brel pa'i rtsa ba °° gshis la rten pa dang khas blangs la rten pa °° stobs don sgrub du myur pa dang tha snyad du bsgrub pa    <pb n=""22a""/><lb n=""22a1""/> 2 phyi ma <abbr>grags</abbr> rtags yin la khas blangs la rten pa ni yid ches su bzhed do </seg></TEI>"

<note type=""translation"">This is the book of the Spiritual friend Tshad ma rab bsal</note></seg></TEI>"

column3: <note type=""translation"">Written by the best scribe, dKon mchog nor bu. May it be virtuous!</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-13-51,unreviewed,11.1 - 11.5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-13-51"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lb n=""11.1""/>lan gnyis pa ni 'di <lb n=""11.2""/> la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3834"">rgya</rs>na re <note type=""gloss"">'di dag thams cad ma rungs pa
column3: rigs pa'i rnam dbye med pa'i skyon
column5: de phyir rnam <lb n=""11.3""/> dbye shes par bya
column7: </note> don dam dpyod pa'i rigs shes dang
column8: tha snyad kun rdzob pa <lb n=""11.4""/> 'jal ba'i tshad ma gnyis las snga ma ni dgag bya la brtag bzod dpyad <lb n=""11.5""/> bzod 'gegs la gzhal bya'ang brtag bzod dpyad bzod 'jal ba'o

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-13-46,unreviewed,11.13 - 11.19,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-13-46"" status=""unreviewed""><lb n=""11.13""/>
de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3831"">phya pa </rs><lb n=""11.14""/> na re gzhal bya'i ngos nas khyad 'byed pa ni bden yang
column2: dgag bya'i ngos nas <lb n=""11.15""/> don dam du dpyod pa'i rigs shes dang tha snyad kun rdzob pa'i bye brag 'byed <lb n=""11.16""/> pa ni ma yin te
column3: de lta na don dam pa stong pa nyid spros bral chos can dngos <lb n=""11.17""/> por med de rim dang cig car gyis don byed pas stong pa'i phyir zhes pa'i <lb n=""11.18""/> rtags la rten pa'i rjes dpag 'di dgag bya brtag mi bzod <lb n=""11.19""/> dpyad mi bzod 'gogs pas tha snyad pa'i tshad mar thal lo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-13-59,unreviewed,12.15 - 12.19,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-13-59"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""12.15""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3864"">byang skyabs</rs> ni dgag bya bden pa'i dngos po 'gegs pa'i cha nas don dam <lb n=""12.16""/> dpyod pa'i rigs shes kyang yin la
column2: gzhal cha sgyu ma lta bu 'jam ba'i cha nas <lb n=""12.17""/> tha snyad pa'i tshad ma yin no zhes 'dod par byed na nyes pa snga ma'ang dpyad <lb n=""12.18""/> par bya ba yin la
column3: spyir cha med kyi gcig dang du ma bkag pa na de'i shul <lb n=""12.19""/> du cha bcas gcig lus sam mi lus pa'ang dpyad so yin no zhes gsung so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-14-51,unreviewed,12.19 - 60.1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12.19""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-14-51"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:the_tshom""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""(iv) the tshom""/>
the tshom la gsum las
<milestone n=""mtshan nyid"" unit=""section""/>
mtshan nyid ni blo rtse gnyis kyi rnam pas 'jug pa zhes pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya </rs>bzhed do

<lb n=""59.21""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3805"">zhang tshes</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya pa</rs> ni mtha' gzhan du srid pa'i <pb n=""60""/><lb n=""60.1""/> dogs pa dang bcas pa'o zhes zer ro

X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-14-11,unreviewed,63.5 - 63.10,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-14-11"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:mtshan_nyid"">
<lb n=""63.5""/>'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">jo btsun</rs> na re <lb n=""63.6""/>mtshon bya ba lang zhes bya ba ni dngos med kun brtags yin la
column2: mtshan nyid ni <lb n=""63.7""/> nog dang lkog shal ni dngos po ba yin pas mtshon bya dang mtshan nyid gnyis<lb n=""63.8""/> gcig pa bkag pa'i tha dad yin no zhes zer ba la
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs pa</rs>s mtshon bya ba <lb n=""63.9""/> lang dngos med kun brtags de la mtshan nyid nog dang lkog shal dngos po <lb n=""63.10""/> ba de mi srid do zhes brjod do
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-14-22,unreviewed,89.12 - 89.15,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-14-22"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:mtshan_nyid"">

<milestone unit=""section"" n=""113.12 grangs nyung pa dgag pa""/><lb n=""89.12""/> gnyis pa grangs nyung pa dgag pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4207"">me dig pa</rs> na re mtshan nyid kyi skyon <lb n=""89.13""/> thams cad gsum du 'du ste
column2: mtshan nyid rnal mar 'gro ba la skyon gsum dang<lb n=""89.14""/> bral dgos pa'i phyir dang
column3: skyon gsum gang dang ma bral yang mtshan nyid rnal <lb n=""89.15""/> mar mi 'gro ba'i phyir ro

column1: skyon gsum dang bral ba tsam gyis mtshan nyid rnal mar 'gro ba'i brda' ba ni ma mchis so zhes zer ro

X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-14-34,unreviewed,113.14 - 113.18,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-14-34"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""113.14""/> de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4206"">stag pa</rs> na re 'jug yul bstan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis skyes bu <lb n=""113.15""/> don grub la nus pa gnas pa zhes pa la 'dod la
column2: des na gcig dang du bral <lb n=""113.16""/> gyi rtags la brten pa'i rjes dpag la ma khyab pa med de
column3: 'jug yul stong nyid <lb n=""113.17""/> bstan pa'i rgyu mtshan gyis lan gcig rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum thob pas skyes <lb n=""113.18""/> bu'i don grub pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba la
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-15-42,unreviewed,122.18 - 122.20,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-15-42"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""122.18""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re 'o na la chos can rtag pa'i me yod de du ba yod pa'i phyir ces <lb n=""122.19""/> pa'ang yang dag gi rtags su thal te brten pa rtag mi rtag la 'khrul yang rten <lb n=""122.20""/> me tsam la ma 'khrul bas so zhes zer ba la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs>s 'dod thog du byas so

X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-15-13,unreviewed,155.7 - 155.8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-15-13"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""155.7""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3720"">slob dpon klu sgrub</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo rje</rs> la sogs pa yang lung <lb n=""155.8""/> tshad ma dang nyer 'jal gyi tshad ma ste bzhir bzhed do

X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-15-33,unreviewed,166.14 - 166.16,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-15-33"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lb n=""166.14""/>'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4270"">rgya grags bsod</rs> na re rang rig la gzung ba yod dam med
column2: med na<lb n=""166.15""/> gzung don la ma 'khrul ba mi 'thad la
column3: yod na sems cam pas gzung 'dzin gnyis <lb n=""166.16""/> med ma rtogs par thal lo
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-15-28,unreviewed,169.4 - 169.6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-15-28"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:mngon_sum"">

<lb n=""169.4""/>'di la rnal <lb n=""169.5""/> 'byor gyi mngon sum skye ba'i rten gyi gang zag la sogs pa lngas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs> 'chad<lb n=""169.6""/> mod kyi 'dir mi spro'o

X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX002_2024-11-01-14-39,unreviewed,263.6 - 263.13,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX002_2024-11-01-14-39"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""263.6""/>'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3837"">g.yor rnyan</rs> na re yod la skad cig <lb n=""263.7""/> gi mi rtag pas khyab pa mngon sum gyis dngos su nges pa'i phyir 'phags par<lb n=""263.8""/> thal lo zhe na rtags ma grub la
column2: yod pa la skad cig gi mi rtag pa shugs las <lb n=""263.9""/> nges pa'i phyir 'phags par thal lo zhe na khyab pa ma grub bo zhes zer ba ni <lb n=""263.10""/> 'khrul ba kho na ste byas yod la skad cig gi mi rtag pas khyab pa dngos su nges <lb n=""263.11""/> kyang rung shugs las nges kyang rung ste rtag par 'dzin pa dang gcig pur <lb n=""263.12""/> 'dzin pa'i bdag mngon sum gyis mi khegs pas 'phags par thal ba'i nyes <lb n=""263.13""/> pa gnas so zhes gsung ngo
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-14-57,unreviewed,273.15 - 273.19,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-14-57"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""273.15""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4264"">gnyags</rs> na re ba bsog par <lb n=""273.15""/> nus tshad kyi dngos po bsogs pa gas me dang du ba byung bas me dud rgyu 'bras <lb n=""273.17""/> yin la
column2: gsog par nus tshod kyi dngos po bsogs kyang tsan dan gyi me dang du <lb n=""273.18""/> ba mi 'byung bas de gnyis rgyu 'bras ma yin no zhes zer te snga ma dang don <lb n=""273.19""/> mthun no

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-15-24,unreviewed,335.2 - 335.5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-15-24"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lb n=""335.2""/>thal 'gyur 'di<lb n=""335.3""/> dag <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3810"">gangs pa</rs> bzhin du sgrub byed 'phen pa'i thal 'gyur 'ba' zhig yin nam
column2: <lb n=""335.4""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3810"">pa tshab lo tsa ba</rs> ltar sgrub byed mi 'phen pa'i thal 'gyur zhig yin zhe na gnyis<lb n=""335.5""/> ka ma yin no

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-15-05,unreviewed,342.2 - 342.5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-15-05"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lb n=""342.2""/> gzhan yang<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""4267"">gong bur can</rs> na re thal 'gyur <lb n=""342.3""/> gnyis kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid gang yin zhes 'dri na
column2: 'o na bsgrub pa'i ngag dang <lb n=""342.4""/> sun 'byin pa'i ngag gnyis kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid kyang gang yin zhes phar la <lb n=""342.5""/> dri'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_002_Tshad bsdus.xml,X_002,,exX0022024-11-01-15-17,unreviewed,352.17 - 352.19,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022024-11-01-15-17"" status=""unreviewed"">

<lb n=""352.17""/>dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4268"">sna <lb n=""352.18""/> chung ston pa</rs> na re phyogs chos phyir rgol gyis khas blangs shing khyab pa tshad mas <lb n=""352.19""/> nges pa'i rtags ston byed ces bya ba yin no
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_18_chu mig pa chen poi rnam thar.xml,2_050_19,,ex50182024-09-161,unreviewed,1b2 - 1b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50182024-09-161"" status=""unreviewed"">lung dang mngon par rtogs pa'i shes rab dang ldan zhing
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3975"">kha mo ze'u zhes grags pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen chu mig <lb n=""1b3""/> pa chen po</rs> de

column1: dpal rdza ra'i sa'i char ze'u'i rgyud du 'khrungs
column2: dgung lo bco brgyad la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">dge bshes 'bre shes rab 'bar</rs> la mkhan po zhus nas rab du byon te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">dge bshes khyung <lb n=""1b4""/> rin chen grags</rs> la dbu tshad dang spyod phyogs brlabs shing zhar chos <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4206"">stag</rs> gnyis la gsan skad

column1: de nas mkhan po la pha rol du phyin pa lo drug gnan te mdo 'grel dang bcas pa <lb n=""1b5""/>mtha' dag par mkhyen
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_18_chu mig pa chen poi rnam thar.xml,2_050_19,,ex50182023-09-20-094538,unreviewed,4a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50182023-09-20-094538"" status=""unreviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (4a4-5, p.357)] ""/>
<lb n=""4a4""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3975"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen chu mig pa chen po</rs>'i yon tan gzhal du med pa las
column2: phyogs tsam mtshon pa'i phyir <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">snar thang</rs> du sdebs pa'o

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Post-colophon annotations (4a5, p. 357)]""/>
<abbr>zhus so
column7: </abbr></seg></TEI>"

column2: don la nga rgyal yin no zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4261"">mkhas pa chen po mchims brtson <lb n=""8a5""/>'grus seng ge</rs> gsung ngo
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_02_chos_mngon_W1PD89084-I1KG13413-95-202-any.xml,2_044_02,,ex44022024-11-2014-51-17,unreviewed,108b3 - 108b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""108b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44022024-11-2014-51-17"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone n=""colophon"" unit=""section""/>

de ltar <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> gis <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4763""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3761"">chos mngon rin chen mdzod</rs>
gsal ba'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di bshad de
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6978"">  dam chos <lb n=""108b4""/>snang ldan 'jam dpal grags pa</rs> yis
yang yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> la bskul ba'i slad du'o
gal te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> gis 'dir bshad gang yin la
nongs par gyur pa cung zad <lb n=""108b5""/>mchis na de
gang la blo gros spangs pa'i spyan mnga' ba
mkhas rnams dag gis bzod pa mdzad pa'i rigs
'di brtsams dge ba kun da'i phyed ba                <lb n=""108b6""/>ltar
rnam par dkar ba'i bsod nam <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> gis ni
legs par skrun pa'i dge ba ci mchis pa
mtshungs med rgyal ba'i go 'phang thob phyir bsngo

column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4765"">tshad ma'i spyi skad cung zad bsdus pa</rs> gzhugs pa <abbr>lags so</abbr> dbang hE <note type=""editorial"">Could also read ""hre""</note>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_03_gNyag_tshad maI spyi skad bsdus pa.xml,2_044_03,,ex044032025-05-2118-25-44,unreviewed,1a4 - 1b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex044032025-05-2118-25-44"" status=""unreviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Introductory verse""/>
<lg><pb n=""1b""/><lb n=""1b1""/> <l>'thun snang shes bya'i gnas lugs la
column5: </l> <l>tog <note type=""editorial"">For ""rtog""</note> ge'i rang gzhung bsdus pa'i don
column7: </l> <l>gzhan la phan phyir cung zad bgod <note type=""editorial"">For ""'god"", or ""bkod""</note>

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Body of the text""/>
<lb n=""1b2""/> de la tshad ma'i lugs kyis gzhal bya 'am shes bya'i gnas lugs bstan pa dang
column2: de yul du byed pa'i blo spyir bstan pa dang
column3: sgro 'dogs gcod byed tshad ma'i blo bye brag du bstan pa re shig 3 <lb n=""1b3""/> gyis nges par bya'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_03_gNyag_tshad maI spyi skad bsdus pa.xml,2_044_03,,ex2442025-02-0414-36-25,reviewed,3a8 - 3a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2442025-02-0414-36-25"" status=""reviewed"">de la gcad bya sgro 'dogs kyi blo la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><abbr>deng sang</abbr> dus kyi rtog ge ba rnams</rs> <lb n=""3a9""/> tshad ma ma yin pa'i blo lnga zhes grags ste
column2: tshad ma ma yin pa'i blo lnga ces <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">gzhung</rs> nas gsungs pa'i grangs nges pa'ang <abbr>med</abbr> la
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_03_gNyag_tshad maI spyi skad bsdus pa.xml,2_044_03,,ex44032023-07-2514-44-08,finalized,8b3 - 8b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44032023-07-2514-44-08"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">ati sha</rs>'i zhal nas
column2: <quote source=""db:6040"" n=""Satyadvayāvatāra 13b–d""><lg><l>mngon suM rjes dpag dgos pa <abbr>med</abbr>
column4: </l><l>mu stegs rgol ba bzlog pa'i phyir
column6: </l><l> <lb n=""8b4""/> mkhas pa rnams kyis byas pa yin ¦</l></lg></quote> zhes gsungs so

column1: 2_044_03_gNyag_tshad maI spyi skad bsdus pa.xml,2_044_03,,ex44032023-07-2514-44-09,finalized,8b4 - 8b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44032023-07-2514-44-09"" status=""finalized"">
<milestone n=""Conclusive verses"" unit=""section""/>
<lg><l><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4765"">tshad <choice><reg>ma'i</reg><orig>ma‹'i›</orig></choice> spyi'i skad cung zad bsdus pa</rs> 'di
column3: </l> <l>rigs pa'i tshul la mos pa'i blo yod kyang
column5: </l> <l><lb n=""8b5""/> gzhung la mi 'jug rtsol ba zhan rnaMs la
column7: </l> <l>yig chung bde blag bris pa 'di la gzigs

column1: 2_044_03_gNyag_tshad maI spyi skad bsdus pa.xml,2_044_03,,ex44032023-07-2514-44-10,finalized,8b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44032023-07-2514-44-10"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone n=""Colophon (8b5)"" unit=""section""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5833"">gnyag</rs> gis bkod pa

column1: 2_044_03_gNyag_tshad maI spyi skad bsdus pa.xml,2_044_03,,ex044032025-05-2118-15-36,reviewed,8b6 - 8b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex044032025-05-2118-15-36"" status=""reviewed""><milestone n=""The seven treatises"" unit=""section""/>
<lb n=""8b6""/> *<note type=""editorial"">Reference sign linkin this note to ""sde bdun"" on fol. 8b2</note> rtso bo lus lta bu'i bstan bcos ni
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3772"">rnam 'grel
column4: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5589"">rigs thigs</rs> te rgyas 'bri bsdus pa 3ba'o

column1: yan lag gi bstan bcos ni
column2: rang don <choice><reg>gi</reg><orig>°i</orig></choice> rtan tshigs kyi <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> la log <choice><reg>rtog</reg><orig>°°</orig></choice> bsal <lb n=""8b7""/> ba'i phyir <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5831"">rtan<anchor xml:id=""a17""/> tshigs thigs pa</rs>
column3: rang bzhin 'brel pa la log rtog dgag pa'i phyir <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3775"">'brel pa brtag pa</rs>
column4: gzhan don phyir rgol la ston pas ¦ gzhan gyi blo <choice><reg>tsam</reg><orig>tsa°</orig></choice><note type=""editorial"">Tentative reconstruction</note> ston pa'i phyir <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7068"">rgyud gzhan sgrub pa
column5: </rs> <lb n=""8b8""/> rgol phyir <choice><reg>rgol yang</reg><orig>rgol {°} yang</orig></choice>  dag dang tshar gcad pa'i gnas la log rtogs bsal ba'i phyir dang brtsod pa dag par bya ba'i phyir <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3777"">brtsod pa'i rigs pa</rs> mdzad do

column1: 4_113_02 theg chen rgyud bla.xml,4_113_02,,ex113022025-02-2416-01-14,unreviewed,60a3 - 60a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex113022025-02-2416-01-14"" status=""unreviewed""> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5476"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos kyi rnam par bshad pa de nyid snang ba</rs> zhes <lb n=""60a4""/> bya ba 'di mtshan nyid phyogs kyi lung rigs la rnam par byang zhing khyad par dpal dus kyi 'khor lo laswo pa rdo rje zeg pa la blo gros kyi snang ba rgyas pa'i bshes gnyen chen po slob dpon a mo g+ha sa rgyud bla'i Ti ka 'phags pa thogs med kyi 'grel pa gzhir bzhag cing sa bcad chos rjes bzangs pa'i lugs bzhin du <lb n=""60a5""/> phye ba rgyud bla'i thun mong ma yin pa'i chos skad lung rigs kyi zur thon par bya dgos rnaMs brten pa cig gyis shig ces pa'i gsung yig gis bskul ba la brten nas ¦ chos rje jo nang pa yab sras kyis bka' drin las nges pa'i don la shes nas dad pa thob pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4125"">shAkya'i dge slong lha'i rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis ston pa 'das nas <lb n=""60a6""/> lo nyis stong nyis rgya dang nyer gsuM song ba'i dus lcags pho rda'i khrums stod kyi nyer ba ° la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5732"">dben gnas nam mkha' mdzod</rs> du sbyar ba bstan pa la phan pa rgya chen por gyur cig

4_113_02 theg chen rgyud bla.xml,4_113_02,,ex113022025-02-2416-01-142,unreviewed,60a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex113022025-02-2416-01-142"" status=""unreviewed"">    <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4125"">lha'i rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis sbyin par bya ba'i chos so

2_058_05_thogs_med_bka_bum_thor_bu_W1PD89084-I1KG13427-1-390.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex58052024-12-1912-48-58,unreviewed,N010,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex58052024-12-1912-48-58"" status=""unreviewed"">bkriMs kyi tshigs du bcad pa sdig pa don byed ces bya ba 'di
column2: 'khas pa dpon dag gyis

column1: <lb n=""N010""/>suM bar pa rone gser las gzhengs pa'i rab tu gnas pa'i don du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4066"">btsun pa thogs med</rs> kyis
column2: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5692"">dben gnas dngul chu'i chos rdzong</rs> du sbyar ba'o

column1: sems can thaMd la phan bde ma lus pa 'byung ba'i rung gyur cig
column3: <note type=""gloss""> 'di jo dge ba'i 'gra sar lung bya lus mchod kon</note>
column4: dge'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_055_10 Ral gri_seng ge sgra man ngag.xml,2_055_10,,ex55102024-09-3016-41-55,reviewed,1b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex55102024-09-3016-41-55"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4964"">rje btsun seng nge sgra'i man ngag zab mo</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">bla ma dam pa rim par brgyud pa bcoM ldan ral gri</rs>s bkod pa rdzogs s+h+yo

2_055_10 Ral gri_seng ge sgra man ngag.xml,2_055_10,,ex55102024-09-3016-41-552,reviewed,1b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex55102024-09-3016-41-552"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4065"">btsun pa zi'u<!--read: ze'u--></rs>s phyag dpe' la bris pa'o
column3: <note type=""editorial"">Comparing with the colophon of the instance of the <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4967"">rNam snang  bsgom thabs</rs>, we take ""btsun pa ze'u"" to be the scribe, presumably here also <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4065"">Ze'u grags shes</rs>, and read ""phyag dpe' la"" as ""phyag dpe' las"", presumably indicating the source as being the author's own exemplar.</note> dag go
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex8012023-01-2014-38-27,finalized,1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8012023-01-2014-38-27"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Incipit (1b1)""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma rnaMs</rs> la phyag 'tshal lo

1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex801202023-01-2014-39-35,finalized,1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex801202023-01-2014-39-35"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Body of the text (1b1–13b3)""/>

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">slob dpon chos kyi grags pa</rs>s mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tshad ma rnaM par nges pa</rs> 'di la don bzhï <note type=""gloss""><abbr>gsum</abbr></note> ste
column2: bstan bcos rtsom pa'i rgyu dang
column3: rang gi bstan bcos kyi 'bras bu dgos 'brel <note type=""gloss""><abbr>gnyis</abbr> kyis bstan bcos rtsom pa la 'jug pa</note> dang
column4: bstan bcos kyi rang bzhin dang
column5: bstan bcos kyi don nges pas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3771""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3770"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mdo</rs> mdzad pa</rs>'i <choice><sic>dgos</sic><corr>dgongs</corr> </choice> pa nges pa la spro ba bskyed pa'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex8012023-01-2014-49-18,finalized,2a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8012023-01-2014-49-18"" status=""finalized""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5534"">dul lha</rs> dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5550"">shan ti pa</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs> ltar na</note> dang po la lnga ste
column3: 'gal bas khyab pa dmigs pa'i rtags dgod pa dang
column4: don las don dang 'dra ba skye ba dang ¦ don yang ming <lb n=""2a5""/> 'brel pa <abbr>med</abbr> pa dang ¦ ming 'dzin <note type=""gloss"">ming snang pa tsaM gyi spyi rigs</note> pa la don dang 'brel <note type=""gloss"">par snang</note> pas khyab pa<note type=""gloss"">s rang gi mtshan nyid kyi ming snang yang</note> <abbr>gsum</abbr> gyis ming don <note type=""gloss"">dang</note> ma 'brel bas don las skye bas <note type=""editorial"">A scribal note in dbu can corrects the reading to ""skyes pa la""</note> ming mi snang pas khyab pa dang
column5: shugs la grub pa <choice><orig>yul la °°°</orig><reg>yul la</reg></choice> ltos pa'i sbyor ba dang ¦ dngos su bstan pa yul can la ltos pa'i sbyor ba <abbr>gnyis kyis</abbr> skabs kyi don bsdu ba dang
column6: sgra don bdag cig kyang don las skye ba la ming mi snang pas khyab pa dang
column7: zhar la rnaM rtog srid pa'i yul yid kyi rnaM shes yin pa'o</seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex8012023-01-2014-55-54,finalized,2a7 - 2b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8012023-01-2014-55-54"" status=""finalized""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs>s de yan chad kyis don gyi mthu skyes kyi rjes 'gro'i khyab <choice><orig>pa °°°d</orig><reg>pa bshad</reg></choice> zin nas de'i ldog ston gsung ste de ltar na khyab pa grub pa na sgrub bya grubs du 'gyur bas 'di <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">chos mchog</rs> ltar</note> sgra spyi <choice><orig>mi‹ng›</orig><reg>ming</reg></choice> snang pa dgag pa la lnga ste
<note type=""gloss"">'di rtag pa rang rgyud du byed kyang rgyas thal gyur du byas so</note>'dod pa ma gnod pa'i thal 'gyur bstan pa dang
column2: brjod pa snang pa brda dran pa la ltos pas 'bras bu'i rtsa ba'i thal 'gyur gyi khyab pa sgrub pa dang
column3: 'dod pa la gnod <pb n=""2b""/><lb n=""2b1""/> thal 'gyur gyi khyab pa sgrub pa dang
column4: de'i 'dod pa la gnod pa'i thal ba dang
column5: bzlog pa'i rtags kyis rtsa ba'i sgrub bya sgrub pa'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex8012023-02-2415-18-33,reviewed,5b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex8012023-02-2415-18-33"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">
lung tshad ma dgag pa la <abbr>gsum</abbr><note type=""gloss"">gsum<abbr>bzhi</abbr></note> ste
column2: skyes bu'i lung dgag pa dang
column4: <note type=""gloss"">gsum</note> sgra kun rang gi don la tshad mas dgag <note type=""gloss"">dang
column5: don bsdu</note><note type=""gloss"">gsung</note> pa'o
column7: <!-- TOCHECK meaning of ?--><!--TODO anonymous citation without mention of a named or unnamed person--></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_01_Phya pa_rnam nges bsdus don.xml,1_008_01,,ex8012023-01-3110-23-53,finalized,7a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex8012023-01-3110-23-53"">

<lb n=""7a4""/> <abbr>gnyi</abbr> ga la rigs pa'i gnod pa la <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5549"">shag kya blo</rs> <note type=""gloss"">'i <abbr>rjes su</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs></note> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa ltar na</note> <abbr>gnyis ste</abbr>
column2: spyir bstan pa dang ¦ dpe la sbyar ba <abbr>gnyis kyis</abbr> mngon suM gyis gnod pa dang
column5: </seg></TEI>"

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7126"">shan ti ba'i dbu ma rgyan gyi ti ka</rs> dang

column1: 2_038_03_ bSam gtan bzang po_me tog phreng rgyud kyi TIk+ka legs bshad rgya mtsho.xml,2_038_03,,ex38032023-09-181,unreviewed,102a4 - 102a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex38032023-09-181"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""102a4""/> <rs type=""person"" ana="""">dgra bcom pa chen po sa ga'i lha</rs>s <?oxy_comment_start comment=""Visakhadeva, P7673""?><?oxy_comment_end?><anchor xml:id=""a1""/> mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4735"">'dul ba'i bstan bcos me tog phreng rgyud kyi TI ka bla ma'i legs bshad rgya cher bshad pa legs bshad rgya mtsho</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4123"">bla ma thams cad mkhyen pa dka' bzhi pa shes rab seng ge</rs>'i <anchor xml:id=""a2""/> gsung la [b]rten nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4005"">mang du thos pa bsaM <lb n=""102a5""/> gtan bzang po</rs>s rnam g.yengs spang te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">ston pa </rs>myang ngan las 'das nas <hi rendition=""#Time"">lo sum stong bzhi brgya dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa'i dus</hi> su
column2: <hi rendition=""#Time"">gdong ngan gyi lo sa ga'i dkar phyogs tshes brgyad<anchor xml:id=""a3""/> </hi>la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal snar thang gi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs>r rdzogs par sbyar ba'o

column1: 'di la brten nas sems cad thams cad kyis blang dor gyi gnas rtogs nas
column2: 'jug ldog phyin ci ma log par byas te rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sar bsgrod par gyur cig

column1: 1_013_04_gtsang_byang_sems_bzhi_brgya from transkribus.xml,1_013_04,,ex13042024-10-2411-43-47,reviewed,6b4 - 6b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13042024-10-2411-43-47"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4557""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3721"">byang chub seMs pa'i rnal 'byor spyod pa bzhi' <lb n=""6b5""/> (brgya) pa</rs>'i dka' ba'i gnas bshad pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">dbu ma smra ba'i dge' slong brtson 'grus seng nge</rs>s sbyar ba
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_14 ye shes kyi gzhag sa.19_04_2022.xml,2_050_14,,ex50142023-09-0816-07-29,reviewed,5b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50142023-09-0816-07-29"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><note type=""editorial"">(1st post-colophon annotation)</note><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad pa byon pa</rs> des <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458""> btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> la gnang ste yi ger bris pa'o
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Post-colophon 2nd annotations (nya_5b5, p. 304), in smaller script]""/><note type=""editorial"">(2nd post-colophon annotation)</note>
<rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">daM pas bsngags pa'i gnas mchog snar thang</rs> du bris shing <abbr>zhus so</abbr>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032023-07-2115-18-25,unreviewed,33a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""33a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2032023-07-2115-18-25"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4455""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711"">mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel pa</rs> rnaM 'byed</rs> ces bya ba</seg></TEI>"

1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032023-07-2115-18-26,unreviewed,33b2 - 33b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""33b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2032023-07-2115-18-26"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lg><l><note type=""gloss"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3747"">byaMs pa</rs></note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3747"">myi 'pham mched</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5548""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5548""/>rnam <note type=""gloss"">grol sde</note></rs> gnyis dang

<l>    <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">seng ge <note type=""gloss"">bzang po </note></rs> <note>dang</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">blo ldan <note type=""gloss"">shes rab</note></rs> <note type=""gloss"">dang</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">rin chen <note type=""gloss"">grags</note></rs> <note type=""gloss"">dang</note>  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807""><note type=""gloss"">shes rab</note> 'bar</rs>
<l>gang gi gsung gi 'od zer gyis
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">bdag </rs>gi blo'i mun sel ba'i
<l>bla ma rnams la gus btud nas
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""4""/>
<l>                      don gnyer skyes bus bskul gyur bas
</l>                      <l>gzhan phan bsam pas shes rab kyi
<l>pha rol phyin pa'i tshig don gyi
<l><lb n=""33b3""/> gsal byed cung zad <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">bdag</rs> gis bri

1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032025-01-1610-10-42,unreviewed,35a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""35a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2032025-01-1610-10-42"" status=""unreviewed"">de'i 'og du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3756"">slob dpon thogs med</rs> kyis <rs type=""work"">mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel pa</rs> mdzad pa dang

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3758"">slob dpon dbyig gnyen</rs> gyis <rs type=""work"">mdo' le'u brgyad ma</rs> dang <?oxy_comment_start comment=""***""?><?oxy_comment_end?> bstan bcos sbyar ba'i gzhung gi 'grel ba mdzad pa yod zer te
column2: sus kyang mthong ba tsaM yod pa myi 'dra'o

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex023-2024-10-08-15-13,unreviewed,35b2 - 35b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""35b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex023-2024-10-08-15-13"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">'buM pa</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">ma ha</rs> ni ma yin par <lb n=""35b3""/>mdzad do
</seg></TEI>"

1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex3032024-10-1509-38-46,unreviewed,36b3 - [Ar chos skor 300],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""36b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3032024-10-1509-38-46"" status=""unreviewed"">de la dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">'bum pa</rs> ltar na
column2: rnam bshad mdzad ces brjod do

column1: <mentioned>gang gi zhe na</mentioned>
column2: bstan chos chen po 'di'o

column1: <mentioned>gang la brten nas ce na
column2: </mentioned>

column1: mi pham mgon la gsan nas so
column4: </mentioned>

column1: 'phags pa zhes pa'o
de yon tan gyi khyad par ci dang ldan ce na
column2: de'i mtshan don dang ldan pa yin pas rang dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs pa brjod la
column3: de yang rgyu dang bcas par brjod do

column1: rang gi don ni mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa spangs pas sdig to mi dge ba'i chos las ring du bsrings te spang bas 'phags pa ste spangs pa dang
column2: thogs shing chags pa med pa'i de kho na'i ye shes mnga' bas thogs med de ye shes so

column1: gzhan don ni nyid kyis gzigs pa'i lam bstan pas gzhan sdug bsngal dang de'i rgyu las skyob pas skyob nyid do
column2: ga nas gcig tu 'gro ba'i sems can la dmigs pa'i snying rje'i chags pa goms pa ni ba gzhan don phun sum tshogs pa'i rgyu'o
column4: 'jig rten chos mchog man chad du dmigs pa'am chags pa med pa'i shes rab goms pa ni rang don gyi rgyu'o

column1: mi pham pa ni dgra'am yon tan gyi bde bgo skal gyis so
column3: des na spangs pa dang ye shes te rang don no
column5: mgon po ni thugs rjes gzhan gyi don mdzad pas na gzhan don no
column7: de la gsan pa ni bar du dus byas te dga'
column8: skye gnas gcig <lb n=""[Ar chos skor 300]""/>
column10: bring gsum gyi don rgya che ba dang zab pa gsal bar byed pas bstan bcos chen po'o
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex02032025-04-2514-39-502,unreviewed,47a3 - 47a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""47a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex02032025-04-2514-39-502"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">braM ze</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs>s don 'jug pa'i yang la yin la</note> ni bstan bcos kyi gzhung gi tshig gam yi ge mdzes pa skyed pa'i ched du brtsom pa yin zer ba <note type=""gloss"">de skad du yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">ma ha</rs> na re khyed bstan chos rtsom ma ** rnaMs la ? sdud med de ngad bstan chos rtsom * pa rnaMs la sdus so</note> yod mod kyi
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon</rs> 'dis ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">slob dpon <lb n=""47a4""/> chos mchog</rs> gi rjes su 'brangs nas
column3: dgos 'brel gyi tshig la brten nas rnam gcad la don du mi 'gyur ba'i the tshom bzhi po ldog pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa bsal nas
column4: yongs gcod la don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom bzhi po 'jug pa'i yan lag tu gyur pa bskyed nas nyan pa po bstan bcos la 'jug pa'i yan lag tu yin no zhes 'dod do
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex02032025-04-2512-31-25,reviewed,49b7 - 49b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""49b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex02032025-04-2512-31-25"" status=""reviewed"">gnyis pa pa mtshan nyid ni
column2: yi ge'i cha las shes par byed de
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon</rs> rang gi bshad pa <!--Ar chos skor p. 337--> ltar shes rab ni chos rab tu rnaN par 'byed pa'o <note type=""gloss"">don daM rtos pa'o</note>

column1: <lb n=""49b8""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">'bum pa</rs> ltar na sgyu ma lta bu dang rab tu myi gnas pa gnyis kyi don shes pa'o
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">ma hA</rs> ltar na don daM pa'i bden pa shes pa'o

1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex023-2024-10-08-15-23,unreviewed,51a3 - 51a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""51a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex023-2024-10-08-15-23"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3745"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">jo bo</rs> yang 'chol pa sgoM par bzhed la
column2: de yang khyad par can dang khyad par can ma yin pa <lb n=""51a4""/> gnyis so

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032024-10-1010-32-20,unreviewed,60a5 - 60a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2032024-10-1010-32-20"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">jo bo 'da'</rs> dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">a</rs><note type=""gloss"">phya</note> dang
column3: <note type=""gloss"">dri med pa nas gten dang
column4: </note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6616"">su ka ta sri</rs> ni zag pa ni nyon mongs pa'i tshogs yin la de dang bcas pa'i sgom lam ni 'jig rten chos mchog man chod kho na yin la
column5: mthong lam thob pa <!--Ar chos skor p. 365--> yan chad na nyon <lb n=""60a6""/> mongs pa skye mi srid pas
column6: sa dang po yan chad zag med yin no zer ba ni mi rigs te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">seng ge bzang po</rs>'i 'dod par 'chad na ni de nyid kyis 'dod chags la sogs pa drug sgom spang du bshad pas kyang gnod do

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex023-2024-10-08-15-232,unreviewed,67b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""67b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex023-2024-10-08-15-232"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4294"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">khyung</rs><!--or db:3809--> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">'da'</rs> na re
column2: sa bcu' pa'i dkyil stod la yin te de byang chub seMs dpa'i mngon rtogs yin pas so

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032024-10-1010-26-26,unreviewed,[Ar chos skor 401],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[Ar chos skor 401]""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2032024-10-1010-26-26"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">'da'</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> ni khyad par gyi lam gyi lnga po ni sa bcu ka'i yin te
column2: _sa dang po thob pa ma gtog la sbyin pa dang ldan pa de bogs dbyung ba khyad par can la mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa la sogs pa yin no

column1: de bzhin du bcu pa'i bar du sbyar ro zer ba ni de <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">seng ge bzang po</rs>'i 'dod pa ma yin te
column2: _des don gyi go rim du bshad pas de ltar na go rim 'khrugs par 'gyur pas so
column4: gzhan yang dang po'i khyad par la yod la gnyis pa'i dngos gzhi la med pa yang mi 'thad do
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex02032025-04-2514-36-50,unreviewed,82a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""82a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex02032025-04-2514-36-50"" status=""unreviewed"">  de la <note><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs> dang</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung</rs><!--or db:4294--> na re de byang chub sems dpa' yin pas rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs par gzhag pa'i chos ni med mod kyi
column2: de la nyan thos rgyun du zhugs pa la sogs par btags pa yin no

column1: de'i rgyu mtshan  <lb n=""82a7""/>ni 'jug pa dang ldog pa rtogs pa dang spangs pa cung zad 'dra ba yod pas so

1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex023-2024-10-08-15-59,unreviewed,82a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""82a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex023-2024-10-08-15-59"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4189"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dwags po</rs> na re byang chub sems dpa' rang la rgyun du zhugs pa lasogs pa'i don yod pas dngos kyi sgra yin gyi brtags pa ni ma yin zer ro
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex02032025-04-214-43-55,unreviewed,[Ar chos skor 425],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[Ar chos skor 425]""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex02032025-04-214-43-55"" status=""unreviewed"">  de'i sa mtshams ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">rin chen grags pa</rs>s las dang po pa tshogs lam la gnas pa yan chad la 'dzin to
column3: de ni mdo las byang chub sems dpa' phyir mi ldog pa zhes gsungs pa dang 'gal lo
column5: shin+ta bas nges 'byed yan lag nas bzung te zhes pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas drod yan chad la 'dzin to
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex02032025-04-2514-57-05,unreviewed,103b6 - 103b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""103b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex02032025-04-2514-57-05"" status=""unreviewed"">   <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">ma hA</rs>s de sangs rgyas kyi <lb n=""103b7""/> sa la byas pa ni <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> na re</note> mi legs te
column2: de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' bcu gnyis su 'gyur ba'i phyir dang
column3: sangs rgyas kyi sa de sgrub pa ma yin pa'i phyir ro skad do
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex02032025-04-2515-12-00,unreviewed,107a5 - 107a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex02032025-04-2515-12-00"" status=""unreviewed"">   <milestone unit=""section"" n=""ta2_sgrub pa bzhi so sor bshad pa""/>
gnyis pa so sor bstan pa la bzhi las
<milestone unit=""section"" n="" tha1_go cha'i sgrub ba bshad pa""/>

dang po go cha'i sgrub pa ston pa las mtshams <lb n=""107a5""/> sbyor gyi sgo nas sa mtshams ston pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> ltar na go rim ji lta ba bzhin bya ba yin pas
column2: go cha ni sbyor lam
column3: 'jug pa ni mthong <!--Ar chos skor 491--> lam
column4: tshogs ni sgom lam sa bdun pa man chod
column5: nges par 'byung ba ni sa brgyad pa'i khyad par gyi lam mo zhes bshad nas
column6: brgyad stong par ni gzhan gyi lugs brjod pa pa yin pas 'gal lo zhes so

column1: <lb n=""107a6""/> de ni ma yin te brgyad stong 'grel pa las brgyud pa dang dngos kyi sbyor ba zhes de gnyis su bshad pas 'di pha ki dang sgrig par nus pa'i phyir ro

1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex02032025-04-2513-15-11,unreviewed,131b2 - 131b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""131b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex02032025-04-2513-15-11"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">'bum pa</rs>'i <note type=""gloss"">ji skad du</note>bshad pa ltar na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> gzung ba med pa'i chos nyid kho na la sbyar ro

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'brom</rs> ltar na nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi nges 'byed dang mthong laM bsgom laM la sogs pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> byang <lb n=""131b3""/> chub seMs dpa'i nges 'byed du shes par byed pa yin te
column2: nyan thos kyi mthong ba'i laM gyi rtogs pas kyang byang chub seMs dpa'i rtse mo'i rtogs pa la ma sleb pas de man chad du shes par byed la
column3: rang rgyal gyi mthong laM gyi rtogs pas kyang byang chub seMs dpa'i bzod pa'i rtogs pa la ma sleb pas de man chad du shes par byed pa yin no

column1: des na <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">kun las <lb n=""131b4""/> btus pa</rs> gang zag gi brda bsal ba dang
column2: chos kyi brda bsal ba dang
column3: thams cad du gnyis ka'i brda bsal ba'i mthong lam gsum gsungs pa yang
column4: rim pa bzhin du nyan thos dang rang rgyal dang byang chub sems dpa' gsum gyi mthong lam gsum gsungs pa yin pas gang zag dang chos kyi brda bsal ba gnyis ni byang sems dpa'i nges 'byed du 'dus pa yin skad do

column1: <lb n=""131b5""/>'o na nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi mthong lam rtog pa med pa yin la byang chub sems dpa'i nges 'byed ni rtog pa dang bcas <!--img. 602-->
pa yin pas de der 'du bar mi rigs so byas pa la
column2: _nyan thos rang rgyal gyi mthong lam rang yang rtog pa las ma 'das pa yin zer skad do

column1: de ni <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre na re</rs></note> mi rigs te
column2: nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi mthong lam rtog pa dang bcas pa yin na
column3: _de dag gis gang <lb n=""131b6""/>zag gi bdag med pa dang gzung ba med pa mngon sum du ma mthong ba yin la
column4: des na mthong bas spang bar bya ba'i sgrib pa las ma grol bar 'gyur ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex02032025-04-2513-15-112,unreviewed,131b7 - 132a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""131b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex02032025-04-2513-15-112"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">ma hA</rs> ltar na nyan thos dang rang rgyal gyi rtogs pa thams cad ni byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la skyed par byed pa yin pas de dag gi lam shes pa dang gzhi shes kyang sa de la gzhag par bya ba yin te sa brgyad pa la rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes la dbang <lb n=""131b8""/> thob pa'i gzhi shes pa gzhan lugs su gzugs brnyan gyi tshul du bskyed pa'i phyir ro gsung ste
<note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre na re</rs></note> de ni mi rigs te gzugs brnyan gyi don gang yin
column2: de rang rgyud pa'i rgyud la skye ba bzhin du dmigs pa can du skye ba yin nam
column3: _'on te mi dmigs pa'i rnam pas de dag gi lam yon tan yar ldan du rgyud la skyed pa la bya

column1: dang po ni ma yin te dmigs <lb n=""132a1""/> pa ni sgro 'dogs pa yin pas
column2: _byang chub sems dpa' de spangs pa yang de skyed par ji ltar 'gyur

column1: gnyis pa yang ma yin te
column2: _mi dmigs pa'i rnam pa can de byang chub sems dpa'i sa 'og mar yang rgyud la skyed par mi nus pa ci yod
column3: _de ni gzugs brnyan gyi don gzhi rkyang shes pa la zer ba yin skad do
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex203_2024-09-1111-40-41,,[Ar chos skor 660],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[Ar chos skor 660]""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex203_2024-09-1111-40-41""> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rj[e] btsun khyug</rs> gi lugs<anchor xml:id=""a5""/>
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsa ba</rs> ltar na rim pa bzhin bzlog</seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex203_2024-09-1111-40-412,unreviewed,[Ar chos skor 660],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[Ar chos skor 660]""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex203_2024-09-1111-40-412"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsa ba</rs> ltar na dngos su yul lam gsum bstan pas yul can lam shes shugs la mtshon nas ston pa yin no zer
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex203_2024-09-1111-40-4131,unreviewed,[Ar chos skor 660],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[Ar chos skor 660]""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex203_2024-09-1111-40-4131"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsa ba</rs>s
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3720"">klu sgrub</rs> kyi rjes su 'brangs pa de'i gzhung legs par mi shes pa<anchor xml:id=""a7""/></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex203_2024-09-1111-40-4132,unreviewed,[Ar chos skor 660],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[Ar chos skor 660]""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex203_2024-09-1111-40-4132"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6950"">sp[o]ng zho lo tsha ba</rs> na re yang de ltar yod pa yin ste de skad
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6950"">spong zho lo tsha ba</rs> ni</seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032023-07-2115-18-21,finalized,170a2 - 170a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""170a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2032023-07-2115-18-21"" status=""finalized"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'brom</rs> na re shes pa dang byed pa gnyis <lb n=""170a3""/> ni 'bras bu'i rtags yin la
column2: khyad par ni rang bzhin gyi rtags yin zhing
column3: ngo bo yang mtshan nyid rtags su bzhag pa'i rang bzhin yin no
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032023-07-2115-18-30,finalized,209a5 - 209a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""209a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2032023-07-2115-18-30"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Conclusive verses (209a5–209a8)]""/>dge legs yon tan kun gyi gzhi'
column3: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i tshul
column5: ston pa nyid kyis legs gsungs shing
column7: de'i gsal byed <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">mngon rtogs rgyan</rs>
column9: <rs type=""deity"">mgon po</rs> yis ni sbyar ba mdzad
column11: de dag rnaM par 'byed pa ni
column13: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">bla ma seng ge bzang po</rs>s <lb n=""209a6""/> mdzad
column15: de dag rnaM par <choice><corr>'thad</corr><orig>'thag</orig></choice> pa ni
column17: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma daM pa</rs>'i rjes 'brangs nas
column19: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">shag kya'i dge slong byang ye</rs>s byas
column21: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_03_Ar_mngon rtogs rgyan grel rnam byed_etext.xml,1_002_03,,ex2032023-07-2115-18-314,unreviewed,209a7 - 209a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""209a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2032023-07-2115-18-314"" status=""unreviewed"">de bsdebs las byung dge' ba ni
column3: tshad myed <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">bdag </rs>gis gang thob des
column5: mtha' yas <abbr>seMs can</abbr> ma lus rnaMs
column7: shes rab pha rol phyin pa'i yang
column9: tshul la rtag du 'jug par shog
column11: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">bdag </rs>kyang tshe rabs <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du
column13: <anchor xml:id=""a45""/> tshul de nyid las ldog ma <lb n=""209a8""/> gyur
column15: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_046_02_sangs rgyas bzang po_legs bshad gter mdzod_etext.xml,2_046_02,,ex046022025-05-2811-35-36,reviewed,10b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""10b9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex046022025-05-2811-35-36"" status=""reviewed""> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">rigs <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang phyug chos kyi <abbr>seng ge</abbr></rs>s ¦ ri bong <abbr>can gyi</abbr> don spyi dang ¦ zla <abbr>ba'i</abbr> sgras brjod rung gi <abbr>tshogs</abbr> pa de ¦ ri bong can gyi don spyi zla <abbr>ba'i</abbr> sgras brjod rung gi <abbr>tshogs</abbr> pa 1du <abbr>rtogs</abbr> pa'i <abbr>rjes dpag</abbr> gi snang yul dang ¦ 'jug yul 2 ka yin <abbr>zhes gsung</abbr> ¦  </seg></TEI>"

2_046_02_sangs rgyas bzang po_legs bshad gter mdzod_etext.xml,2_046_02,,ex46022023-09-19-102726,finalized,46a10 - 46a11,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""46a10""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex46022023-09-19-102726"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone n=""Colophon 46a10-11"" unit=""section""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4781"">rigs pa dang mi rigs pa'i de kho na nyid <abbr>rnam par</abbr> 'byed pa <abbr>legs</abbr> par bshad pa'i gter mdzod ¦ blo gsal gyi yid la dga' ba  gter ba</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni ¦ <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs ri</rs>'i <lb n=""46a11""/> khrod kyi <abbr>rigs</abbr> pa smra ba rnaMs kyi gtsug rgyan daM par gyur pa ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5256"">rigs pa smra ba'i btsun pa sangs rgyas bzang po</rs>s ¦ sbrang rtsi 'dzin pa'i dkar <abbr>phyogs</abbr> la ¦ mkhas grub <note type=""gloss"">°°i°i°</note> du ma nye bar rten pa'i dben gnas ¦ <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5667"">broM pa rgyang gi gtsug lag bkhang<!--sic--> <abbr>chen por</abbr></rs> nye bar sbyar ba'o

<note type=""translation"">.... good sayings that distinguish the essence/reality of what is correct and incorrect” was composed in the the great monastery/temple (/assembly hall) of Brom pa rgyang <!--(s)Grom pa rgyang in gTsang?-->, which is a hermitage where many accomplished scholars reside, in the first part of the month of “the bee” (?), by the venerable logician Sangs rgyas bzang po, who is the excellent crown jewel of the logicians of the range of the snowy mountains.</note></seg></TEI>"

2_031_03_ Dar ma od zer _ dul ba mdo rtsai grel pa.xml,2_031_03,,ex31032024-10-2116-16-44,unreviewed,25b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""25b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex31032024-10-2116-16-44"" status=""unreviewed"">de'i don yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rgya</rs> na re dge tshul kyi sdom ces myed la rab du srung ba'i chog sun run gro dgos pas rab tu byung 'dang zhes pas dge tshul kyi bsdom pa 'dus pa'i phyir ro
column2: zer ro

column1: 2_031_03_ Dar ma od zer _ dul ba mdo rtsai grel pa.xml,2_031_03,,ex31032024-10-2116-16-442,unreviewed,19b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""19b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex31032024-10-2116-16-442"" status=""unreviewed""> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rgya</rs> na re ngag dgod kyis can bdogs pa la dug pa log dgos pa yin ba'ang dag dan de byed pa'i phyir des na der mi 'gyur ro

column1: 1_009_01_Phya pa_grub mtha_etext.xml,1_009_01,,ex9012024-10-0913-15-03,unreviewed,33b1 - 33b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex9012024-10-0913-15-03"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><pb n=""33b""/><lb n=""33b1""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4505"">bde bar gshegs pa dang phyi rol pa'i gzhung rnam par 'byed pa</rs> zhes bya ba ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">blo gsal zhing rigs par smra ba brtul shugs legs par gnas pa ¦ rang dang gzhan mtha' dag gi gzhung la <lb n=""33b2""/> ma rmongs pa dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5586"">rtog ge la 'bar ba</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""=Tarkajvālā""?><?oxy_comment_end?> dang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">shes rab sgron ma'i gtig</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""=Prajñāpradīpa-ṭīkā""?><?oxy_comment_end?> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">btsun pa spyan ras gzigs</rs> kyis phye ba dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3732"">slob dpon zhi ba mtsho</rs>s sbyar pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tshad ma de kho na bsdus pa</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""=Tattvasaṃgraha""?><?oxy_comment_end?> dang
column3: <lb n=""33b3""/> <rs type=""work"">de'i 'grel pa</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""=Tattvasaṃgrahapañjikā""?><?oxy_comment_end?> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3735"">slob dpon ka ma la shi la</rs>s sbyar ba dang
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3725"">slob dpon zla ba grags pa</rs>'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3726"">dbu ma la 'jug pa</rs>'i gzhung rnams las bsdus ste

column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6418"">kha che pan chen</rs> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">braM ze chen po</rs> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">sa pan</rs> rnaMs ¦ dang por dbang mngon skad 1 ma 1 skyed, der rjes dbang mngon rgyun 'jug pa de srid du dbang mngon skad 1 re dang yid mngon kad 1 re dus mnyaM du skye zhing, yid mngon skad 1 phyi ma rnaMs dbang mngon skad 1 snga mas de thag rkyen byas nas skye'i kho rang gi rigs 'dra snga ma las mi skye bas <lb n=""2b7""/> yid sngon la rgyun med cing, dbang mngon rnaMs rang gi rigs 'dra snga la ‹swo› las skye bas rgyun dang bcas pa'o . dbang mngon skad 1 2 pa dang yid mngon rdzas 1 la, de dag kyang kha phyir ltas la don rig gi 'gros 2 yin la, nang du myong ba'i ngo bor thad med pas rang gi 'gros 1 yin te 'gros gsuM pa'o ces bzhed.</seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_046_04_Grags pa rgya mtsho_rnam nges syor phreng yid bzhin nor bu_etext.xml,2_046_04,,ex046042025-05-2812-28-38,unreviewed,2b7 - 3a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex046042025-05-2812-28-38"" status=""unreviewed"">    <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs <choice><reg>gter</reg><orig>ter</orig></choice></rs> las
<quote n=""RT IX.8ab""><lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">spel ma dang ni <lb n=""3a1""/> rgyun gyi mtha' ¦</l>
<l>2 ka la yang gnod byed yod</l></lg></quote>
<quote n=""RT IX.9""> <lg><l xml:space=""preserve"">des na dbang po dbang shes kyi
<l xml:space=""preserve"">rgyu yin yid kyi rkyen du 'gyur
<l xml:space=""preserve"">rang rig yin phyir rgyud gzhan min
<l xml:space=""preserve"">des na mngon du 'gros gsuM pa</l>
</lg></quote>
ces so
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_046_04_Grags pa rgya mtsho_rnam nges syor phreng yid bzhin nor bu_etext.xml,2_046_04,,ex046042025-05-2812-21-10,unreviewed,[89a4] - 89a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[89a4]""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex046042025-05-2812-21-10"" status=""unreviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Closing verses""/>
<l><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4785"">tshad ma rnam par nges pa'i sbyor 'phreng yid bzhin nor bu</rs> 'di
<l>bdag dang (<abbr>rtags la ?</abbr>) (skal) 'tshungs don du bsaMs pa'i bsod nams des
<l>smon 'jug <lb n=""89a5""/> <abbr>byang chub</abbr> seMs kyis <seMn> (sems can) kun don du
<l>'gro ba'i ded dpon rdzo<abbr>gs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>sang rgyas</abbr> myur 'grub shog
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4024"">bdag</rs> kyang deng nas skye dang skye ba <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du
<l>rnam dag rgyud pa gang yin de'i gzhung bzung nas
<l>bla ma rnams kyi thugs dgongs <abbr>yongs su</abbr> rdzo<abbr>gs</abbr> pa dang
<l>thub pa'i bstan la bya ba yun rings byed gyur <lb n=""89a6""/> cig
<l>lhag bsam dag pa'i rdzings babs nas
<l><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4785"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">sbyor ba nor bu'i 'phreng ba</rs> 'di'
<l>sgros snying brgya mtsho'i gling nas slangs (>blangs)
<l>de don gnyer rnaMs thugs dgyes mdzod
<l>bsgros snying chen mo na yod pa'i don ji ltar na bzhin rang por (-> dang por) bzhag pa la ; </l>
<l>zur du go bde bzung bla ba ni
column2: <abbr>can ni</abbr>

column1: bla ma'i <lb n=""89a7""/> <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4785"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">sbyor ba yid bzhin nor bu'i 'phreng ba</rs> 'di
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3893"">'jaM dbyangs 'od zer mgon po</rs> nas bzung ste
<l><rs type=""person"" ana="""">bla ma rnaMs</rs> kyi thugs dgongs rdzo<abbr>gs</abbr> pa dang
<l>blo gros mun sel sgros snying 'di nyid kyi
<l>lhag bsaM dag pas zhabs rtog la dmi<abbr>gs</abbr> te
<l>ston pa'i bstan la mi phyed dad thob pas
<l>rgyal ba <mentioned>rgya_mtsho</mentioned>'i thugs <lb n=""89a8""/> rje las 'khrungs shing
<l>shes bya <mentioned>rgya_mtsho</mentioned>'i tsho<abbr>gs</abbr> la dbang 'byor pas
<l>skye dgu <mentioned>rgya mtsho</mentioned>'i 'dren pa mchog gyur pa

<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4024"">legs pa'i <choice><reg>mtshan ldan</reg><orig/>‹mtshan ldan›</choice> bde legs 'byung gnas</rs> kyis
<l>gtan gnas srog shing <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">bod</rs> kyi <abbr>rdo rje</abbr> gdan
<rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5658"">gur thang rtsug lag <lb n=""89a9""/> x khang chen</rs> x 'di sbyar x rdzogs
x maMghala bha rwa tu

snying po len pa'i thabs kyi mchog gyur pa
byang chub sems gnyis spyod tshul lung rigs la
brten nas <lb n=""81a4""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4221"">kyi ston 'jam pa'i dbyangs</rs> kyis bshad
dge ba 'di yis 'gro kun sems bskyed de
byang chub spyod pa'i tshul la legs zhugs pas
tshogs gnyis rgyu chen rgya mtsho'i mthar son nas
