column1: 2_031_01_rgya dmar pa dbu ma de kho na nyid.xml,2_031_01,,ex31012024-07-1212-49-44,unreviewed,1a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex31012024-07-1212-49-44"" status=""unreviewed"">     <note type=""gloss"">gzhan yang ye shes med na rgyu log pas med daM gnyen po spangs nas med gnyi ga yang mi ’thad ye shes kyi (r)gyu ’khrul pa ma yin pa’i phyir dang
column2: gnyen po mi srid pa’i phyir ro
column5: </note>yang na dpyad bzod la gnod pas na ’khrul pas na tha snyad byas so zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon gzhan dag</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">gangs pa</rs></note> ’chad do
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_031_01_rgya dmar pa dbu ma de kho na nyid.xml,2_031_01,,ex3101_2024-05-16_2,reviewed,1a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3101_2024-05-16_2"" status=""reviewed""> de ltar rnam bsams 'bad pas gzhung 'di sbyar
des ni 'jig rten log lta'i rgyun phyogs rnams
yang dag lta ldan dge bcu legs spyad nas
bla med <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya dmar ba</rs></note> byang chub grags pa thob par shog

column1: 1_020_01 Rin chen ye shes_rgyud bla grel mdo dang sbyar ba nges pa don gyi snang ba.xml,1_020_01,,ex020012025-05-2215-49-11,unreviewed,202a3 - 202a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""202a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex020012025-05-2215-49-11"" status=""unreviewed"">   <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (202a3-4)""/>

column2: theg pa chen po la mos pa cung zad thob pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4619"">rin chen ye shes</rs> zhes bya bas <note type=""gloss"">sbyar ba</note> re shig rdzogs so

column8: ji snyed shegs pa thag mngon mkhyen

column13: srid pa'i mtshor </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_086_01 chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam bshad slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa.xml,3_086_01,,ex8601_2023-10-044,unreviewed,121b1 - 121b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""121b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8601_2023-10-044"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n="" [Colophon (121b1-4) (p. 245)]""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5281""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3761"">chos mngon pa'i mdzod</rs> kyi <abbr>rnaM par</abbr> bshad pa slob ma la phan pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di
column2: mdo'i  dang <app><choice>rgyud</choice><orig>rgyu</orig></app> sde mtha' dag la <lb n=""121b2""/> dbang 'byor pas daM pa'i chos 'chad pa dang rtsod pa dang rtsoM pa'i tshul la spobs pa dge' btsan ¦ mi <abbr>'phrogs</abbr> pa'i mkhyen rab dang <abbr>thugs rje</abbr> rmad du byung ba mnga' ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4131""><abbr>ye shes rdo rje</abbr> dpal bzang po</rs> zhes bya ba'i bka' drin las lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid khong du chud pa mang du thos pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4130"">shakya'i dge slong <lb n=""121b3""/> <abbr>blo gros</abbr> grags pa</rs> zhes bgyi bas

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge' ba'i <abbr>bshes gnyen</abbr> mang po</rs>s nan <abbr>chen pos</abbr><!--or ""chen po nas""--> yang dang yang du bskul ba'i ngor du
<hi rendition=""#Time"">shing pho spre'u'i chu stod gyi zla ba'i tshe 1<anchor xml:id=""a3""/></hi> la
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkhas pa'i skye bo</rs> du ma'i bsti gnas dam pa <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5950"">ra ti dga' ldan gyi chos grags  chen po</rs>r<anchor xml:id=""a4""/> nye bar sbyar ba 'di re shig <lb n=""121b4""/> rdzogs s+ho

column1: 'dis 'khor ba snyul? gyi rgya mtsho chen po myur du skeMs par gyur 1
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_086_01 chos mngon pa mdzod kyi rnam bshad slob ma la phan pa zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa.xml,3_086_01,,ex8601_2023-10-041,unreviewed,121b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8601_2023-10-041"" status=""unreviewed""> <lb n=""121b5""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5281"">chos mngon pa mdzod gyi rnaM bshad <abbr>slob ma</abbr> la phan pa</rs> las gnas dgya

4_111_03 rgyud bla ma.xml,4_111_03,,ex111032025-02-2416-26-57,finalized,26a2 - 267a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""26a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex111032025-02-2416-26-57"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpudmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5457"">skal ldan gdul bya'i gling gsal stong <abbr>thig ge</abbr>'i rgya mtsho rang 'brel med du gnas pa gsal bar byed pa'i tshig grag stong <note type=""gloss"">zur</note> 'jug nyi zla'i thig le</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal ldan snar thang bstan pa rin po che'i nam mkha</rs>r bkod pa'o

column1: <lb n=""267a3""/> 'dis skal <choice><reg>pa</reg><orig>‹pa›</orig></choice> can du ma'i don byed par gyur cig
column5: oM oM mag+hala ku ru oM oM
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4518"">g+hu ru sta ba</rs>
column4: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4518"">bla ma la bstod pa</rs>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_03_F_C_NO_M_X or Jad_bstod pa.xml,1_010_03,,ex10032023-07-2412-45-04,reviewed,158a4 - 108a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""158a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10032023-07-2412-45-04"" status=""reviewed""><l>thugs sbyangs stobs kyis smra ba'i seng ger grags
<l>nyi zla bzhin du ma rig nyon mongs sel
<l>bsdu' bzhis bdag sogs 'gon med smin grol mdzad
<l>zung 'jug mtshan don ldan pa khyed la 'dud
<l>chos kyis 'phongs pa'i <abbr>sems can</abbr> la
<l>rgyas 'bring rtogs pas tshim mdzad pa
<l><lb n=""108a5""/> de bzhin bdag gis <abbr>sems can</abbr> rnams
<l>'phrin las rnaMs kyis tshim byed shog
<l>bla ma bde' bar gshegs pa'i gsung zab cing rgya che ba thugs<anchor xml:id=""a1""/> su chud nas gzhan la ston pas 'khor ba'i mun nag du 'khyaMs pa'i long khrid pa
<l>         <anchor xml:id=""a2""/>         dbu' ma chen pos gdul bya mngon mtho' nges legs la 'god pas thar pa dang <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa'i skyed byed

1_010_03_F_C_NO_M_X or Jad_bstod pa.xml,1_010_03,,ex10032023-07-2412-45-052,reviewed,108a5 - 158a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""108a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10032023-07-2412-45-052"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (158a5–158a6)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4518""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3863"">shag kya'i dge' slong gzhon <lb n=""158a6""/> nu byang chub</rs> la bstod pa</rs>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_03_F_C_NO_M_X or Jad_bstod pa.xml,1_010_03,,ex10032024-09-1111-36-00,reviewed,158a7 - 158a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10032024-09-1111-36-00"" status=""reviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Addition (158a7–158a8)""/>
<l>lnga brgya pa rnams kyi <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa rtog ge ba rnams kyi spyi gtsug gi rgyan
<l><rs type=""deity"">bde' bar gshegs pa</rs>'i bka' rab 'byams<anchor xml:id=""a4""/> dri ma med pa'i gsal byed
<l>rmongs pa rnams kyi long khrid pa bla ma rnams kyi gsung gi rtogs pa'i myu gus rgyud brlan pa
<l>mtshan thos pa tsam gyis 'gro ba skal ba dang ldan pa rnams kyi don mdzad spyod pa

<l>dpag du med pa'i don 'byung pa'i gzhi rgyal ba skyed par byed pa'i rgyu'i gtso bo rgyas 'bring gsum rtogs pa'i shes rab thun mong ma<anchor xml:id=""a5""/> yin pa dang ldan pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bla ma</rs>s
<l>dad pas rta la brtson 'grus <lb n=""158a8""/> kyi lcag gis bskyod pa'i chos brgyad spangs pa'i chos kyi sbyin pa gnang ba'i dus su
<l>gus pa dang dad pas gzhi bzung brtson 'grus dang shes rab kyis khyad par can gyi don la phyogs pa'i
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3863"">shag kya'i dge slong gzhon nu byang chub</rs> kyis legs par mnyan pas

<l>tshig dang don gyi rtogs pa phyin ci ma log pa mnyam pa med pa thob pa'i dge ba des skye bo kun yum la mos pa dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag</rs> nyid kyi rtogs pa brtan par 'byung par shog

2_055_11 Ral gri_rnam snang bsgom thabs.xml,2_055_11,,ex55112024-09-3016-41-55,reviewed,1b6 - 1b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex55112024-09-3016-41-55"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4967"">rnam par snang mdzad mngon par byang chub pa'i sku 3 gyi dkyil <lb n=""1b7""/> 'khor</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s bkod pa'o

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">de nyid</rs> kyi phyag dpe' la<!--read: las--> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4065"">ze'u grags shes</rs> bris
column5: </seg></TEI>"

2_050_15_I_R_M_skyo ston_mdo sde rgyan gyi khrid.xml,2_050_15,,ex50152023-09-1108-27-56,reviewed,1a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50152023-09-1108-27-56"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4872""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3746"">theg pa chen po mdo' sde'i rgyan</rs> rin po che dang 'dra ba'i man ngag</rs> 3 ste

column1: 2_050_15_I_R_M_skyo ston_mdo sde rgyan gyi khrid.xml,2_050_15,,ex50152023-09-1108-31-58,unreviewed,3b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50152023-09-1108-31-58"" status=""unreviewed""><lb n=""3b3""/>yongs su grub pa ni phun suM tshogs pa thob pa rin chen sgrol phye ba lta bu <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog</rs> <abbr>zer ro</abbr>

2_050_15_I_R_M_skyo ston_mdo sde rgyan gyi khrid.xml,2_050_15,,ex50152023-09-1108-00-56,reviewed,3b6 - 3b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50152023-09-1108-00-56"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">daM pas bsngags pa snar thang gyi dben gnas</rs> <abbr>su</abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">bla ma</rs>'i phyag <lb n=""3b7""/>dpe <choice><corr>las</corr><sic>la</sic></choice> bris pa'o

column1: 3_072_01.xml,3_072_01,,ex72012025-02-2416-45-50,unreviewed,157a1 - 157a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""157a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex72012025-02-2416-45-50"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5181"">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyan gyi bstan <lb n=""157a2""/> bcos 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i rgya cher bshad pa mdo'i don gsal bar byed pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni yang dag pa'i don la 'jug par byed pa'i tha snyad tshad ma'i tshul rig cing sde snod gsum la blo'i snang ba rgyas shing yum gyi dgnogs pa mdo 'grel dang bcas pa kla yun du sbyangs pas nges pa'i don la blo gzhol ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4005"">bsam bstan bzang po</rs>s
column2: mdo <lb n=""157a3""/> rgyan 'grel
column3: 'grel pa dang bcas pa'i don tshig nyung bar bsdus shing thams cad mkhyen pa gnyis pa bla ma bka' lung shes rab sing ge dang

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">lung riGS smra ba  <!--grub pa seng ge ???-->grub pa seng ge</rs>
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><!--dpal ldan seng ge ???-->dka' bcu 'dzin pa <abbr>dpal ldan</abbr> seng ge</rs>

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><!--byang chub dpal ???-->'dul ba 'dzin pa byang chub dpal</rs> la <abbr>sogs pa</abbr> don du gnyer <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob ma rnams</rs> kyi bskul <abbr>ba'i</abbr> ngor ¦ mkhyen rabs <lb n=""225a4""/> dang <abbr>thugs rje</abbr>'i mnga' bdag lhar bcas 'gro ba kun gyi <abbr>gtsug gi</abbr> <abbr>nor bu</abbr> <abbr>mkhan chen</abbr> <abbr>rin po che'i</abbr> <abbr>byin gyis</abbr> brlabs shing 'dul ba 'buM sde'i mnga' bdag 'dul ba 'dzin pa<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4003""> dmar ston <abbr>dpal ldan</abbr> rin chen <?oxy_comment_start comment=""P10033?""?><?oxy_comment_end?></rs> dang ¦  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4004"">'dul ba 'dzin pa <abbr>nam mkha'</abbr> rgyal mtshan<?oxy_comment_start comment=""P71?""?><?oxy_comment_end?>gyi</rs> sku drin la [b]rten_nas: <rs type=""work"">'dul <lb n=""225a5""/> ba mdo rtsa ba</rs>'i tshig don la <abbr>blo gros kyi</abbr> snang ba <abbr>cung zad</abbr> 'chod pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4002""><abbr>dge slong blo gros rgyal mtshan</abbr></rs> gyis
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><abbr>dpal ldan</abbr> bla ma</rs>s <abbr>byin gyis</abbr> brlabs <abbr>pa'i</abbr> gdan sa ¦ <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5748"">yol rin chen <abbr>gling gi</abbr> gtsug lag khang<anchor xml:id=""a1""/> </rs>du <hi rendition=""#Time"">lnga brgya phrag brgyad pa'i drug bcu re 3 pa: sa mo bya: zhi ba<anchor xml:id=""a2""/>'i lo <lb n=""225a6""/> dbyar zla ra ba<anchor xml:id=""a3""/>'i yar ngo'i tshes 3<anchor xml:id=""a4""/> </hi>la zin bris_su bkod pa'o
column3: <abbr>mkhan chen rin po che nas</abbr> 'dis pha mas gtso byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>sems can</abbr> <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyis <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen <abbr>pa'i</abbr> go 'phang myur du thob par gyur cig

column1: <l><lb n=""1a3""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5870"">Tik chen lung don rnaM gzigs</rs> zhes pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">gtsang chu mig pa <abbr>seng ge</abbr> dpal</rs> gyis mdzad pa <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr>

X_020_chu_mig_phar_phyin_tig.xml,X_020,,exX202024-09-1811-03-223,unreviewed,N008,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX202024-09-1811-03-223"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">    rgya che zab pa'i mdo sde pha cher  dang
byams chos rigs pa'i tshogs dang sde lnga
sdom rnams 2 dang +brdjod dang+ yum mdo'i 'grel ¦
<lb n=""N008""/>logs par 'thong nas <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5870"">lung don rnam gzigs</rs> 'di
mi 'pham 'gon dang klu la dbang bsgyur dang
phyogs las rgyal dang rnams 'grel mdzad pa ste
kun gyi gzhung lugs 'dzin pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db.4018"">chu mig pa</rs>s
<rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">chen po'i pho brang dge pa'i gnas</rs> su sbyar

X_020_chu_mig_phar_phyin_tig.xml,X_020,,exX202024-09-1811-03-22,unreviewed,208a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX202024-09-1811-03-22"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
chen po rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi por blangs ste
mang du thos pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol du phyin pa'i don dang
mdo dang dgongs 'gro ba mdzad pa'i gzhung lugs sangs che ba 'thong pa'i don la yangs pa  <lb n=""208a3""/>las byung pa'i shes rab kyis
legs par bstan la phabs pa'i don zab pa pa dang rgya che ba bston par byed pa 'di
lung dang rigs pa'i don la dbang phyug du rgyur pa

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db.4018"">shakya'i dge slong rtsang chu mig pa sang ge <note type=""gloss"">dpal</note> bzang po</rs> <note type=""gloss"">gyis</note> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug khang</rs> du legs par sbyar pa'o

<l>phyi (> phyis) nas shar phyogs dzA ga ta la yi<anchor xml:id=""a2""/>
<l>paN chen <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6032"">dA na shi la</rs> byon gyur <lb n=""72b1""/> te
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7102"">rigs smra'i dge slong shAkya brtson 'grus</rs> la
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">bram ze shang kar nan ta</rs>'i 'brel (> 'grel) bzhin bshad

2_055_03_F_C_NO_M_Ral gri_rtsod rigs rgyan me tog.xml,2_055_03,,ex55032025-01-3016-32-10,unreviewed,73a2 - 73a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex55032025-01-3016-32-10"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""73a2""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4951""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3777""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">dpal chos kyi grags pa</rs>s mdzad pa'i rtsod pa'i rigs pa</rs> rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba phyi nang gnyis kyi grub mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu la shin tu sbyangs pa'i blo <lb n=""73a3""/> gros can <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">shAkya'i dge slong bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho

column1: 1_029_01 se spyil phu ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad theg chen mdo sde rgyan gyi don mdor bsdus bkrol ba.xml,1_029_01,,ex29012025-03-2811-47-44,finalized,2b8 - 3a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex29012025-03-2811-47-44"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""7338"">ti ka</rs>'i 'dod pa kha <lb n=""2b9""/> cig sun 'byin pa yod te <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:6971"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rom po</rs>'i zhal nas de rnams spangs pa'i brjod bya logs pa myi rnyed mdo' nas kyang chos lnga dag dang rang bzhin gsum
column3: rnam par shes pa brgyad nyid dang
column5: bdag myed gnyis kyi nang du ni
column7: theg chen mtha' dag 'dir 'dus ces gsungs te dngos po lnga dang mtshan nyid gsum don gcig
column8: gang zag gsum dang sbyar ba 'di 'thad pa 'aM

column1: <lb n=""3a1""/> man ngag yin
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_029_01 se spyil phu ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad theg chen mdo sde rgyan gyi don mdor bsdus bkrol ba.xml,1_029_01,,ex29012025-03-2811-47-442,finalized,3a8 - 3a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex29012025-03-2811-47-442"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:6971"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rom po</rs> ni mgu' dka' ba la gsung
column2: <note type=""gloss""> °°° ni lung dang rtogs pa las rtegs pa
column3: de'i yang laM 'bras bu las 'bras bus °°°°°° pha rol du phyin pa'i
column4: de yang mi °°° drug °°° dka' °°° ni °°°°°° dka' bas ste °°° re re °°° bsgrub bar dka' ba'o
column5: gzhan don rgya che ba rang don °°°
column6: </note> de ltar na'ang mgu' bar myi nus so snyam na
column7: rad na'i dpes a rgya nor la spyod pa'i yon tan ston te
column8: dper na rad na <note type=""gloss"">kha dog dbyibs tshad rigs</note> chos bzhi dang ldan pa la lta mi shes pa rnams myi mgu'
column9: lta shes pa rnams <note type=""gloss"">de °°°°°°</note> mgu' ba bzhin du
column10: chos 'di la'ang nyan rang gi rigs can mi

column1: <lb n=""3a9""/> mgu' ste theg chen gyi rigs can mgu ba'o
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_029_01 se spyil phu ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad theg chen mdo sde rgyan gyi don mdor bsdus bkrol ba.xml,1_029_01,,ex29012025-03-2811-47-443,finalized,6a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex29012025-03-2811-47-443"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:6971"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rom po</rs> ni yon tan <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyi pha mthar phyin par byed pas sgrol bar bzhed do

<rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rngog</rs> reg bya'i phyogs cig zer
column2: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:6971"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rom po</rs> phyogs cig myi 'thad reg pa 'am tshor bar 'gro zer

column1: 1_029_01 se spyil phu ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad theg chen mdo sde rgyan gyi don mdor bsdus bkrol ba.xml,1_029_01,,ex29012025-03-2811-47-444,finalized,18a3 - 18a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex29012025-03-2811-47-444"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:6971"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rom po</rs>'i zhal nas
column2: 'jig rten cig na bu ta cig yod pa'i dus na gzhan du bu ta mi 'byung bar 'dod pa'i grub mtha' 'di chos gzhan nas ma gsungs ce

column1: <lb n=""18a4""/> sum tshogs pa mchog gi byang chub bshad nas mi gnas pa rtogs pa la sbyar ba'i byang chub las de kho na nyid nges pa shu log cig ste
column2: bdag gnyis su myed pa de yongs su grub pa'i ngo bor yod la kun brtags pa'i ngo bor mi dmigs pas yongs grub kyi ngo bor dmyigs pa'i mchog yin no
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_029_01 se spyil phu ba chos kyi rgyal mtshan gyis mdzad theg chen mdo sde rgyan gyi don mdor bsdus bkrol ba.xml,1_029_01,,ex29012025-03-2811-47-446,finalized,19b2 - 19b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""19b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex29012025-03-2811-47-446"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:6971"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rom po</rs> thos bsam gyis rnyed pa yin pas thos bsam
<lb n=""19b3""/> la bzhed do

<lb n=""34b6""/> 'dir rnam par dag pa mthar thug par bya ba la mtshon pa tsam yin
column2: da lta'i 'bogs pa de bka' srin che
column3: 'di la lnga las dang po gdam ngag gi yul shu log cig gnyis te
column4: rgyu tshogs lam chung 'bring du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad cing tshogs bsags pa 'bras bu nges 'byed la sbyor bas mos pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5581"">lang gshegs</rs> las yid kyi lus gsum ste

column4: chos kyi ngo bo nyid khong du chud pa dang
column5: ris su lhan cig skyes pa'i 'du byed kyi yid kyi lus so
column7: gnyis pa ni sa brgyad pa snang med du gnas gyur te ting nge <lb n=""15b3""/> 'dzin dang mtshan dang dbang dang mngon shes kyi me tog rgyas pa yid kyi mgyogs pa dang mtshungs pa sgyu ma la sogs pa 'dra ba 'byung bzhi dang 'byung gyur dang 'dra ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du 'gro nus ces so

column2: <rs type=""school"">phyi rol pa dag</rs> sgra tshad mar <lb n=""3b7""/> byed cing <note type=""gloss"">sgra don la 'brel pa 'dod</note> don ngan pa yang sgra bzang pos bstan na mchog yin no zhes de la mngon par zhen pa dgag cing ston pa po tshad mar gyur pa'i skyes bus don tshad mas 'thad na sgra ngan na yang gnod pa med do zhes shes par bya ba'i phyir <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5633"">mdo' 'di'</rs>i skad rnam pa bzhis gsungs pa yin ste
column3: legs par sbyar ba'i skad dang
column4: pra gi ta'i skad dang
column5: a ba braM shi ta'i skad dang
column6: be sha tse'i skad do

column1: de la dang po ni sang kri <lb n=""3b8""/> ta'i skad do
gnyis pa ni 'phral skad do
gsum pa ni skad zur chag pa ste gdol pa'i skad do
bzhi pa ni mi ma yin gyi skad do
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7040"">su na ya shri</rs> ni legs par sbyar ba dang
column2: de ma yin pa <note type=""gloss"">a be</note> gnyis kyis gsungs pa yin no zhes zer ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column2: de ni bden mod kyi 'on kyang rgyas 'bring gsum gyi don <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">seng kar</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">shag kya 'od</rs></note> <lb n=""3b9""/> sdud pa'i ldog pa <choice><reg>na</reg><orig>na{°}</orig></choice> mtshan brtags pa ni ma yin no
column4: </seg></TEI>"

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4097"">dpang lo</rs> na re
column2: 'di dag <abbr>legs</abbr> sbyar gyi skad la <abbr>thams cad</abbr> chos brjod du mod kyang
column3: bod skad du bsgyur ba na
column4: de rnams de'i <abbr>ngo bos</abbr> stong zhes pa <abbr>lta bu</abbr> chen brjod par byung skad <abbr>gsungs so</abbr>

column1: 3_073_02.xml,3_073_02,,ex730222024-11-08-13-08,finalized,29a3 - 29a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""29a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex730222024-11-08-13-08"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006""><abbr>bcom ldan</abbr> rigs ral</rs> na re
column2: de ltar na
column3: <abbr>yon tan</abbr> <abbr>nyi shu</abbr> rtsa brgyad du thal gsungs pa shin tu <abbr>med do</abbr><note type=""editorial"">The context suggests 'med do' but the manuscript has the abbreviation 'mdo' rather than 'medo'</note>
column4: des na phyi ma la bcu ba dang
column5: snga ma la bcu ba ni
column6: rgyun dang rgyun can du sbyar ba yin <lb n=""29a4""/> gyi rgyu 'bras ma <abbr>yin no</abbr>

column1: 3_073_02.xml,3_073_02,,ex730222024-11-08-13-28,finalized,48b7 - 48b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""48b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex730222024-11-08-13-28"" status=""finalized"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5999"">bu ston rin po che</rs>'i <abbr>zhal ta</abbr> nas mdzad <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7368"">rnaM bshad lung gi snye ma</rs> dang
column2: de nyid chan nyid kyis mdzad pa dang gsung sgros dharma'i mtshan can gyis <abbr>phyogs</abbr> <abbr>gcig</abbr> tu bkod <abbr>pa'i</abbr> zin ris <abbr>nas snangs</abbr> rnaMs <abbr>ba'i</abbr> de nyid las khong du chud par bya bas 'dir ma bris <lb n=""48b8""/> shing spyi don gyi gnas rnaMs na rgal zhing rtag pa bya ba mang du snang na yang
column3: blo gsal 'jug pa bde <abbr>ba'i</abbr> don du re zhig 'dir bskus pa'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_073_02.xml,3_073_02,,ex73022023-09-261,finalized,49a5 - 49a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""49a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex73022023-09-261"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (49a5-49a7)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5192""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">shes rab kyi <abbr>pha rol</abbr> tu phyin pa'i man <abbr>ngag gi</abbr> <abbr>bstan bcos</abbr> mngon par <choice><corr>rtogs</corr><sic>stoGS</sic></choice> pa rgyan</rs> gyi <abbr>dka' 'grel</abbr> lung gi dpag bsam rgyas 'gyur gyi tshal</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column2: yongs 'dzin du mas nye bar bskyangs shing
column3: khyad par du rang dang gzhan gyi grub <abbr>pa'i</abbr> mtha' rgya mtsho'i <abbr>pha rol</abbr> du phyin <lb n=""49a6""/> pa <abbr>rigs</abbr> pa dang grol bar smra ba'i yongs ba bsaM gyis mi khyab pa la mnga' rnyes pas
column4: <choice><corr>'chad</corr><sic>'tshad</sic></choice> pa dang rtsod pa dang
column5: rtsoM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> tshul la zla dang bral ba <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs can</rs> gyi bka' <abbr>bzhi</abbr> 'dzin pa <abbr>gcig</abbr> po <abbr>nyid du</abbr> nges pa
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4074"">brtson 'grus dpal</rs> gyi zhabs rdul spyi bos len cing
column7: de nyid las chos 'di'i tshul la <abbr><choice><corr>blo</corr><sic>slo</sic></choice>'i</abbr> snang ba cung zad skyes pa
column8: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5193"">shAkya' <choice><corr>btsun</corr><sic>bcun</sic></choice> pa <lb n=""49a7""/> pa <abbr>dkon mchog</abbr> <abbr>grags</abbr></rs> kyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5733"">ston <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rgyal tshab daM pa rnams kyi <abbr>bzhugs</abbr> gnas dpal <abbr>sa skya</abbr>'i chos gra dang nye ba'i sa</rs>r sbyar ba re shig <abbr>rdzogs so</abbr>

column1: 3_061_04.xml,3_061_04,,ex61042023-09-26-093717,unreviewed,18a2 - 18a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex61042023-09-26-093717"" status=""unreviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Closing verse (18a1-3)""/>
<lg>   <l><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5085"">bshad mnyan la 'jug pa'i sgron ma</rs> 'di
<l> bstan gzhi <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">snar thang <lb n=""18a3""/> dgon pa</rs>r sbyar
<l> de yi dge bas 'gro kun gyi
<l>  mun sel kun mkhyen thob par shog
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (18a3)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5085"">chos bshad la 'jug pa'i yan lag tshig gi sgron mas don gyi mun pa sel ba</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3977"">shAkya'i dge slong nam mkha' grags</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o
column7: dge'o

column1: 4_119_02.xml,4_119_02,,ex119022024-11-2217-48-49,reviewed,137a3 - 137a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""137a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex119022024-11-2217-48-49"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5497"">dam pa'i chos <lb n=""137a4""/> mngon pa mdzod kyi sbyor ba'i TI ka mkhas pa'i yid 'phrog</rs> ces bya ba 'di ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4129"">rin chen bsod nams 'phel</rs> zhes bya bas chu mo glang gi zla ba dang po'i tshes brgyad la rdzogs par grub pa 'dis bstan <lb n=""137a5""/> pa dang sems can la phan pa rgya chen po 'grub par gyur cig

column1: 2_038_04_ Shes rab rgya mtsho_bslab bya'i gnas gtan la 'beb par byed pa'i legs bshad khyad par gsum ldan.xml,2_038_04,,ex38042023-09-18-114223,unreviewed,52b7 - 52a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex38042023-09-18-114223"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">sngon chad shes bya'i gnas la <lb n=""52b7""/> sbyangs pa dang
lhag pa'i lha'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang
bshes [g]nyen dam pas rjes_su bzung ba'i mthus
shes bya phal cher 'bad pa chung dus shes
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4737"">bslab bya'i gnas gtan la 'bebs par byed pa'i legs <lb n=""53a1""/> bshad khyad par gsum ldan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column2: dang por <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4009"">'jam pa'i dbyangs dkon mchog rin chen<anchor xml:id=""a1""/> </rs>gyis <note type=""gloss"">bka' drin gyis</note> legs par bskyangs shing ¦ bar du <rs type=""person"" ana="""">mkhas pa'i dbang po <abbr>gzhon nu</abbr> rgyal mchog</rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa'i gsung gi smin <lb n=""53a2""/> [p]ar byas te ¦ mthar rnam dpyod kyis <abbr>blo gros</abbr> rtsa bshad kyi lung 'grel pa dang bcas <abbr>rnam par</abbr> dpyad pa la [b]rten nas ¦

column1: dgag bsgrub [sgrub] kyi [b]slab pa'i gnas la <abbr>blo gros</abbr> kyi snang ba rgyas pa ¦

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4009"">shes rab rgya mtsho</rs>s  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4312""><rs type=""place"">mnga' ris</rs> pa'i sde snod 'dzin pa <lb n=""52a3""/> chen po dkon mchog bzang po<anchor xml:id=""a2""/></rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pas bskul ba'i ngor ¦<abbr/> <hi rendition=""#Time"">lcags mo <abbr>phag gi</abbr> lo</hi> ¦ <hi rendition=""#Time"">smal po'i zla ba'i bzang po'i tshes</hi> <anchor xml:id=""a3""/>la: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal snar thang gi chos sde</rs>r rdzogs par sbyar ba'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_038_04_ Shes rab rgya mtsho_bslab bya'i gnas gtan la 'beb par byed pa'i legs bshad khyad par gsum ldan.xml,2_038_04,,ex38042023-09-18-114446,unreviewed,52a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""52a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex38042023-09-18-114446"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">'jaMs dbyangs shes rab rgya 'tsho [mtsho]</rs> la <abbr>phyag 'tshal lo</abbr>
column3: <rs type=""deity"">'jaMs pa'i dbyangs</rs> × zhus dag_go. dge leGS</seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_011_02_Pa_tshab_bzhi_brgya_bsdus_don_W1PD89051-I1PD89063-209-218.xml,1_011_02,,ex11022024-10-1014-36-36,unreviewed,1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex11022024-10-1014-36-36"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3725"">slob dpon zla ba grags pa</rs>'i zhal snga nas mdzad pa <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5931"">4 brgya'i 'grel pa</rs> la bsdus pa'i don gsum te
column2: rtsom ba dgod pa dang
column3: gzhung gi don bshad pa dang
column4: de bas byung ba'i <note type=""gloss"">rtog ge'i</note> bsod nams bsngo ba'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_011_02_Pa_tshab_bzhi_brgya_bsdus_don_W1PD89051-I1PD89063-209-218.xml,1_011_02,,ex11022024-10-1014-43-37,reviewed,5b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex11022024-10-1014-43-37"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4522""><choice><reg>bzhi brgya</reg><orig>4 gya</orig></choice> pa'i rgya cher bshad pa'i bsdus pa'i don</rs>
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3868"">lo tsa ba <abbr>chen po</abbr> shAkya'i <abbr>dge slong</abbr> zhang pa tsab nyi ma grags</rs> kyi legs par sbyar pa'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_01_rNgog Bre_yum brgyad stong don bsdus.xml,1_002_01,,ex2012023-07-10082928,finalized,22a1 - 22a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""22a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex2012023-07-10082928"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (22a1–22a2)""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4449""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3692"">bcom ldan 'das yum brgyad stong pa</rs>'i don bsdus pa</rs> <lb n=""22a2""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">slob dpon seng ge bzang po</rs>'i rjes su 'brangs te
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba chen po dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis gzhan la phan par bya ba'i phyir sbyar ba las
column3: dus phyis <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">jo bo 'bum pa</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang zhing <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">mang du thos pa'i dge slong shes rab 'bar</rs> gyis mdo'i don legs par gtan la phab nas yang zhus te sbyar ba
column7: rdzogs s+ho
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_01_rNgog Bre_yum brgyad stong don bsdus.xml,1_002_01,,ex2012023-07-1008-32-58,finalized,22a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex2012023-07-1008-32-58"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Scribe's colophon (22a3)""/>

<lb n=""22a3""/> yul <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5645""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4335"">chos skor bsaM yas</rs> kyi lung phran mchims phu'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6037"">mang du thos pa'i <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6037"">khu lha sdings pa</rs> la</note> dge slong ¦ bshes gnyen lha sdings pa</rs>'i gsung gi bdud rtsi <note type=""gloss"">lhung pos</note><note type=""editorial"">Reading ""lhung pos"" uncertain</note> la ngoms ngoms su 'thungs pa <rs type=""deity"">bde bar gshegs pa</rs>'i bka' rab 'byaMs pa <note type=""gloss"">rtsod pa myed pa rnaMs la</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5828"">blo gros kyi snang pa rab tu rgyas pa khyung po 'dul ba 'dzin pa</rs>'i spyan sngar bdag mchod nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4451""><note type=""gloss"">lho brag rong pa</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4451""/>bla ma 'od</rs> kyis yig mkhan byas nas bris so

1_002_01_rNgog Bre_yum brgyad stong don bsdus.xml,1_002_01,,ex2012023-07-1008-34-15,finalized,22a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex2012023-07-1008-34-15"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Second scribe's colophon (22a4)""/>
<lb n=""22a4""/> 'di bris pa'i bsod naMs kyis
column3: yon mchod byang chub thob par shog
column5: bkra shis par gyur cig

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5827"">mdo smad pa mar pa ston pa</rs>s bris so
column2: legs so

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-12-55,unreviewed,3a1 - 3a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-12-55"" status=""unreviewed"">

gnyis la bla ma brgyud pa'i 'brel pa bsaM pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">buM pa</rs> na re de ltar seng bzang? <lb n=""3a2""/>khyos rgyas 'bring gsum po kun kyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'o 'grel pa gcig rtsom zer na de mkhyed kyis ji ltar du shes zhe na de ni mkhas pa zha'i? gdam ngag la ten nas shes zhes 'brel de lta du byed la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-05,unreviewed,3a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-05"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">rngog</rs> ni seng? bzang khyod kyis kun kyi rgyan du 'gyur ba'i 'grel pa gcig rtsom zhes daM ta bcas nas 'grel pa rtsom pa des rtsa ba mngon rtogs gyi don mngon suM du gyur ba'i sgo nas rtsom mam

3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-19,unreviewed,4b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-19"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3807"">'bre</rs> na re khongs su rtogs zhes zer ba 'di ltar byas na nyan thos 'phags pas tshig yin pa srid dam zer ba la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-22,unreviewed,4b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-22"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3816"">ar</rs> na de ngo bo nyid med pa ltogs pa'i blongs dbu mang gnas pa'i blo yin pa srid daM zer ro

3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-29,unreviewed,6a4 - 6a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-29"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">'byung she</rs> na re 'di khyes brgyud ma yin te *gap* bo de la rgyal med pa yin pas byes bskus mi srid de zer ro <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">slob dpon</rs> na re phyogs 1 nas de ltar yin pa srid kyang rtso ba'i rgyu'i skabs 'dir 'grel pa rtsoms pa'i rgyu cig don gyi rdogs ma lus pa yod zhes zhal kyis bzhes <lb n=""6a5""/>pas na kyes rgyung du spog pa ti ka thaMd las byas byes ba rgyu du byaso gsung ngo

3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-39,unreviewed,6b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-39"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">ku la rta</rs>na re don yin te mchod pa brjod ces bshad par dam bca' ba zhes pa ni shes rab zhes pa lasogs pa'o

3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-13-58,unreviewed,16a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-13-58"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">slob dpon sa</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">kyi ston</rs> gnyis ni nyan thos lhag ched du 'jug shes pa de gcad pa bya ba'i nyer sred pa? kyi shes pa tsam yin pa'i phyir zhes sred bcas dgos po gzungs la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-14-15,unreviewed,16a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-14-15"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">khu</rs> na re mchod par brjod pa'i shugs la bshad par daM ba bstan pa dang
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-14-24,unreviewed,18b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-14-24"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">zhang pad</rs> na re mkhyen gsuM tha dad laM yang tha dad du thal

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-14-33,unreviewed,27b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""27b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-14-33"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">sregs</rs> na re brgyad pa rang nas rtse mo khyad par can yin te dgu rnam kun khyad par can min paso zer ba la slob dpon na re brgyad pa de dus thung ngu zhig ni ma yin pas de legs cha 'bres ldog pa mying bzung na brgyad pa'i rnam kun rgyu yin la rgul yan chad kyi rtse mo 'brus yin la blo rtse nyad pa'i nang la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-14-43,unreviewed,39b3 - 39b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""39b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-14-43"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">khu ston brtson 'grus</rs> na re ner ma nor mtshon pa yin zer pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">rnog</rs> legs pa'i shes rab na re sbyor lam yod pa'i chos dang mtshon pa yon no zer te des? nus pa <lb n=""39b4""/>las gro bas phras? gsung ngo
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">sna chung ston pa</rs> na re 'gros mtshon pa yin te rab ka mtho lta bu yin lo de'i go ba ni 'bras bus sher phyin gyi rtogs pa de sbyor bas skyed pa yin pas de la slo rtse yin gsung ngo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-14-59,unreviewed,40b6 - 40b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-14-59"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">slob dpon zhang</rs> ni lo tsa bas rtags gyi mtshid gyi phyogs nas byas pa yin la 'bres rtags kyi ngo bo'i phyogs nas byas pa <lb n=""40b7""/>yin te lo tsha ba ltar legs la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-16-06,unreviewed,70a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""70a9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-16-06"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3834"">rgya dmar</rs> na re 'bras'i de thos pas mngon sum gyi rigs yin na rigs zhes ba spyi yin pas na spyi gsal ba'i mthar ma thug pa mi srid pas rnal 'byor gyi mngon sum du 'gyur la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-15-08,unreviewed,119b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""119b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-15-08"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">jo bo mad</rs> na re seng bzang gi lcoms te bshad pa ni chos mchog man cad du mkhyen pa gsuM ci rigs par bsgoms nas
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_03_Chos_grags_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,${ask('enter TibSchol Reference Number')},,ex71032024-10-31-15-11,unreviewed,119b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""119b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71032024-10-31-15-11"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">nam ka</rs> na b+hu tasi mkhyen pa gsum gyi ye shes dang rnal 'byor pa rang gi shes pa gnyis tha mi dad pa rloms nas sgoM pa yin pas de'i bsaM pa dang sbyor nas nges 'byed la zag med chu rung bshad pa yin lo
1_001_11_F_C_NC_M_rNgog_rgyud bla ma don bsdus_etext.xml,"1_001_11b

<pb edRef=""inst:4440"" n=""1a""/><lb edRef=""inst:4440"" n=""1a1""/> rnaM bshad snying po brgyan ma tshang ba 1
column2: grub mtha'i rnaM gzhag bris ma 1
column3: 'jaM dbyangs dpa' gtso'i grub thab ma tshang ba 1
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_11_F_C_NC_M_rNgog_rgyud bla ma don bsdus_etext.xml,"1_001_11b

1_001_11c",,ex01112025-05-0716-13-582,reviewed,1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex01112025-05-0716-13-582"" status=""reviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Incipit (1b1)""/>
<pb edRef=""inst:4440"" n=""1b""/><lb edRef=""inst:4440"" n=""1b1""/> <lg><l>'jig rten kun dang myi mthun pa'i
<l>zab mo'i don can <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">bstan chos 'di</rs>
<l>thugs rjes bdag cag la gsungs pa
<l>chos la spyan gyur <rs type=""deity"">de</rs> la 'dud

<note type=""translation"">I bow to him (i.e., Maitreya) whose eyes are directed towards the Dharma and who, out of compassion, taught to us this treatise of profound meaning (i.e., the Ratnagotravibhāga), which goes against [the conventional wisdom of] the entire world.</note></seg></TEI>"
1_001_11_F_C_NC_M_rNgog_rgyud bla ma don bsdus_etext.xml,"1_001_11b

1_001_11c",,ex001112025-05-2008-21-24,reviewed,1b1 - 1b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:4440"" n=""1b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex001112025-05-2008-21-24"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3747"">bcom ldan 'das byams pa</rs>s bde bar gshegs pa'i bka'i dgongs pa phyin ci ma log par gsal <choice><reg>bar</reg><orig>‹ba›r</orig></choice> mdzad pa na
column2: nges pa'i don gi mdo sde rin po che
column3: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo
column4: chos kyi dbyings tshul cig du <lb edRef=""inst:4440"" n=""1b2""/> ston pa
column5: shin tu rnam par dag pa gdon myi za ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs khams thabs cad kyi don rab du ×ston pa
column6: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan chos</rs> 'di mdzad pas
column7: theg pa chen po'i don gi de kho na rnam par bzhag pa yin no

column1: 1_001_11_F_C_NC_M_rNgog_rgyud bla ma don bsdus_etext.xml,"1_001_11b

1_001_11c",,ex1112024-01-23-3,reviewed,40a2 - 40a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:4440"" n=""40a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1112024-01-23-3"" status=""reviewed"">
<milestone n=""2"" unit=""section""/>
<lg><l>dam chos gsung rab nges pa'i don gyi tshul

<l> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg <lb edRef=""inst:6267"" n=""65b1""/> <lb edRef=""inst:6265"" n=""32b2""/> <app><lem wit=""inst:4440 inst:6265"">chen</lem><rdg wit=""inst:4440"">chen</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:6265"">chen</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:6272"">mchog</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:6267"">mchog</rdg></app><anchor xml:id=""a7""/> <lb edRef=""inst:6272"" n=""69b4""/> bla ma'i bstan <app><lem wit=""inst:6272 inst:6267 inst:4440"">bcos</lem><rdg wit=""inst:6272 inst:6267 inst:4440"">bcos</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:6265"">'chos</rdg></app></rs> 'di bshad <app><lem wit=""inst:4440"">pas</lem><rdg wit=""inst:4440"">pas</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:6272"">la</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:6265"">la</rdg><rdg wit=""inst:6267"">las</rdg></app>
<l>bsod nams thob des sangs rgyas thams cad dang
<l><lb edRef=""inst:4440"" n=""40a3""/> mnyam pa'i chos nyid <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag</rs> gis myur thob shog

<note type=""translation"">Through the merits that I have attained by explaining the Mahāyānottaratantra (i.e., Ratnagotravibhāga), which contains the system of definitive meaning of the scriptures of the excellent doctrine, may I swiftly attain the true nature (dharmatā) equal to all Buddhas!</note>
</seg></TEI>"
1_001_11_F_C_NC_M_rNgog_rgyud bla ma don bsdus_etext.xml,"1_001_11b

1_001_11c",,ex1112023-10-18,finalized,40a3 - 40a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:4440"" n=""40a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1112023-10-18"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4441""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos</rs> kyi don bsdus pa</rs>
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">smra ba'i seng ge
column4: ngag gi dbang phyug
column5: 'chad gra'i slob dpon
column6: sgra sgyur gyi lo tsa ba chen po
column7: rngog dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis mdzad pa <lb edRef=""inst:4440"" n=""40a4""/> rdzogs s+h+yo
column13: </seg></TEI>"

1_001_11c",,ex01112025-05-0716-39-23,unreviewed,69b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex01112025-05-0716-39-23"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""> <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Post-colophon note in instance (ID:6272)""/><lb edRef=""inst:6272"" n=""69b5""/>

<note type=""gloss"">rgya gar shar phyogs kha che ba yin</note><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3800"">pan ti ta dkar po</rs><note type=""editorial"">The identification of ""Pan ti ta dkar po"" as Sajjana (ID:3800) is tentative.</note>
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba rngog blo ldan</rs> <note type=""gloss"">snum mtsho dwo ba</note>
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">zhang tshes</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">dmyal ba</rs></note>

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">khrus ston brtson 'grus</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">khugs chung ba</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">""khrus ston"" could be a mistake for ""khu ston"", but the dates of Khu ston brtson 'grus g.yung drung (ID:4235)(1011-1075) would be too early for a successor of Zhang tshes; but as a ""chung ba"" he could be a ""younger Khu ston"".</note>

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkhan po rba grags pa bsod nams</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">la mo ba</rs></note>

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">'or brgyad bsod nams tshul khrims</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">rka ba dgung dkar ba</rs> yin no</note>
column3: <!--dgung dkar is a place in dbus--></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_11_F_C_NC_M_rNgog_rgyud bla ma don bsdus_etext.xml,"1_001_11b

1_001_11c",,ex01112025-05-0816-03-22,reviewed,69b5 - 32b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:6272"" n=""69b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex01112025-05-0816-03-22"" status=""reviewed""> <lg><l><lb edRef=""inst:6265"" n=""32b3""/> bla rgyud kyi bstan 'chos 'di la
column3: </l> <l>brtsams pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">blo ldan rngog</rs> gyis brtsams
column5: </l> <l>bris pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6268"">nyang stod ze'u</rs> gyis bris
column7: </l> <l>yon bdag <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6269"">yol ston dar brtsan</rs> lags

column1: 2_050_03 Skyid ston_Theg chen rgyud bla ma gdams pa.xml,2_050_03,,ex50032023-09-191,unreviewed,[5a3],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50032023-09-191"" status=""unreviewed"">chos 'di'i lo rgyus <rs type=""person"" ana="""">paN di ta chen po byaMs</rs> (<rs type=""person"" ana="""">rgyal ba byaMs pa</rs>'i chos 2 yod pa'i) <rs type=""person"" ana="""">pa'i mgon po</rs>
column2: zhes bya ba <rs type=""place"">ma ga da'i dgon pa</rs> 1 na bzhugs pa la
column3: rmi laM <lb n=""[5a1]""/> (btsun pa 1 gdugs dkar po 1 phub nas lha'i 'khor mang po dang 'dug) du <rs type=""place"">tsan dan gyi mchod rten khri 'phang 4 pa 1 </rs>gi nang du <rs type=""work"">rgyud bla ma</rs> dang
column5: <rs type=""work"">chos nyid kyi gdaM[s] ngag</rs> 2 btsug nas <rs type=""deity"">byaMs pa</rs> dngos kyis ngo sprod byas te
column6: spyir rgyu rkyen 2 'bras bu 3 du dril nas ngo sprod pa dang
column7: <lb n=""[5a2]""/> bye brag tu rgyu chos nyi mi 'gyur bar ngo sprad pa dang
column8: bsaM mi khyab 4 lo ngo sprod mdzod
column10: phyis gnyid sad pa dang chos 'ga' seMs la byung kyang ma rga ba las
column11: 'phags pa dngos kyi thugs rjes
column12: <lb n=""[5a3]""/> bzung kyang nga la chos 'dzin pa'i nus pa med_do snyaM mo
column14: de nas sngar skor ba byed pa'i <rs type=""place"">mchod rten 1</rs> la
column15: 'od snga na med pa de nas byung_ngo
column17: de nas gdaM[s] ngag yod daM snyaM nas phye bas byung_ngo
column19: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_03 Skyid ston_Theg chen rgyud bla ma gdams pa.xml,2_050_03,,ex50032023-05-26011,reviewed,5a6 - 5b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50032023-05-26011"" status=""reviewed""> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3800"">de</rs>s <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4143"">gzu rga ba <abbr>rdo rje</abbr></rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5616"">'i grong khyer dpe med</rs> du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs></note> la bshad

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4143"">de</rs>s <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4141""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5614"">spu rangs</rs> <lb n=""5a7""/> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5615"">tho ling gser khang</rs> gyi dge tshul dri med shes rab</rs><!--btsan kha bo che--> kyis sngar nas 'di mkhyen par mdzod <abbr>cig</abbr> byas nas <abbr>zhus so</abbr>

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4141"">dge tshul de</rs>s <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5612"">la stod lho</rs> pa gcig</rs> la gnang
<rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"">de</rs>s <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5613"">do pa snyan</rs> la gnang

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5613"">de</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">bla ma snar pa</rs> <note type=""gloss"">brgyad par byon pa</note><!--sKyo ston--> la <lb n=""5b""/><lb n=""5b1""/>gnang

de <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:6458"">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458"">ze'u</rs></note> la gnang pa'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_03 Skyid ston_Theg chen rgyud bla ma gdams pa.xml,2_050_03,,ex50032023-05-2608-58-01,finalized,5b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50032023-05-2608-58-01"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (5b1)""/>phyag dpe las bris te <abbr>dge'o</abbr>
column3: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dben gnas snar thang</rs> du zhus shing bris ste zhus dag par <abbr>byas so</abbr>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_071_04_bru_Zha_lu_rin_chen_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,3_071_04,,ex71042024-11-08-15-12,unreviewed,1b3 - 1b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71042024-11-08-15-12"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><abbr>kha cig</abbr></rs> mngo+ons brgyad du bas bye bar de'i don ci ston <lb n=""1b4""/> pa dang phye nas ston pa <abbr>zer ro</abbr>

3_071_04_bru_Zha_lu_rin_chen_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,3_071_04,,ex71042024-11-08-15-20,unreviewed,2a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71042024-11-08-15-20"" status=""unreviewed"">

sheb pha rol <lb n=""2a5""/>phyin pa la zhes par <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">rnog lo ts+tsha ba</rs>s btags pa ba dang dngos kyi shes rab kyi yphol tu phyin pa mtha' dag bzungso zheso

3_071_04_bru_Zha_lu_rin_chen_AA_W1PD153536-I1KG13960-1-548.xml,3_071_04,,ex71042024-11-08-15-202,unreviewed,3a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex71042024-11-08-15-202"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung <abbr>rin chen</abbr> grags</rs> ltar na mkhyen 3 spyi yin la
column2: sbyor 4 dang chosku <abbr>bye brag</abbr> yin pas
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_01 chos mngon pa mdzod kyi sbyor tig.xml,2_044_01,,ex44012024-1114,unreviewed,1b3 - 1b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex44012024-1114""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4028"">blo brtan</rs> nas bzung <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3977"">nam mkha</rs>'i mtshan can dang
blo gros shes bya kun la dpag <lb n=""1b4""/>med rgyas
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">bzang po</rs>'i mtshan can <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4016"">kho'o</rs>'i yongs 'dzin dang
brgyud pa'i bla ma rnams la phyag 'tshal nas
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3761"">chos mngon mdzod</rs> la sbyor Tig cung zad tsam
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> gi 'di dag brtsam par <lb n=""1b5""/>mi nus na'ang
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4007"">mchims ston bla ma</rs>'i bzhed pa ji bzhin dang
gsung las byon cing TI kar ma thebs rnams
legs par bshad kyi blo gros ldan pa dag
rnam dpyod byed cing ngo gdong bshad 'di ltos te
<lb n=""1b6""/>sbyor ba dang
column2: rtsod spong dang

column1: lung 'dren rnaMs mangs na yige mangs pas 'jigs pas ¦
cung zad bsdus te bshad par bya'o

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6975"">pan pyi ta gang pa spel</rs> la bshad

des <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4235"">khu ston brtson 'grus g.yung drung</rs> la bshad
des <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4237"">ra</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4238"">rgya </rs>la bshad
de dag gis <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4291"">brang</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4241"">ko</rs> la bshad de

'di dag kyang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3807"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">'bre</rs> na re thog mar thar pa'i cha mthun gyi dge ba rgyur la skyes nas mtshan nyid shes par bya ste
column2: skyon spong pa dang yon tan la brod pa bskyed de sgom par byed pa yin no zhes zer ba la ni sgrub byed ci yang med cing go ram ji lta ba brjod pa gnod pa ma mthong <lb n=""26a3""/>ste </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex21012025-03-3113-44-56,finalized,26a7 - 26b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""26a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21012025-03-3113-44-56"" status=""finalized"">'dir <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3807"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">'bre</rs> na re rnam pa'i don ni sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i rgyud la
<!--image 44--><pb n=""26b""/><lb n=""26b1""/> skyes pa mkhyen <note type=""gloss"">pa</note> gsum gyi bye brag yin la
column2: de yang <note type=""gloss"">rang</note> gi rgyud la yod pa'i dran pa nye bar gzhag pa dang tha mi dad par goms par byed pa la brjod de
column3: 'bras bu'i theg pa gsum lam du byed pa yin pas pha rol du phyin pa'i theg pa ni gzhan las khyad par du 'phags pa yin no
column5: gal te de lta na so so'i skye bo la yang zag med kyi ye shes yod par 'gyur ro zhe na
column6: 'dod pa yin te <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">rgyud bla ma</rs> las
column7: dar <lb n=""26b2""/> yug chen po'i dpes byis pa so so'i skye bo la yang sangs rgyas kyi yod tan ma tshang pa med par gsungs pa'i phyir la
column8: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6531"">sdud pa'i 'grel pa</rs> las kyang
column9: <quote>dri ma med pa yid la rten pa</quote> zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro
column11: sbyor pa ni gzhi dang lam dang rnam pa skye med du sgom pa mkhyen pa gsum gyi sbyor ba yin no zhes zer ro
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex2101-2024-10-02-16-30,finalized,27a5 - 27a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""27a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2101-2024-10-02-16-30"" status=""finalized""> 'di'i sa mtshams bshad pa na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7348"">kun lan <choice><reg>da</reg><orig>‹da›</orig></choice></rs> zhes pa na re sa brgyad pa la yin no zhes pa dang
<rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3827"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">'brom</rs> na re sa dgu pa nas yin te sa bcu pa la sangs rgyas kyi sar gsungs pa'i <lb n=""27a6""/> phyir ro zhes zer ro
de dag ni mi 'thad pa de gal te de lta yin la de dag gi skad cig gnyis pa la bcu cig kun tu 'od sangs rgyas kyi sar thal ba'i phyir ro

1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex2101-2025-03-311,finalized,27a6 - 27a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""27a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2101-2025-03-311"" status=""finalized"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7349"">mda' byang chub sems dpa'</rs> na re sa bcu pa'i dkyil smad nas yin te
column2: mkhyen pa gsum gyi rtogs pa brtan par byed pai rgyu yin pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: de 'ang mi rigs te snga ma dag la brjod pa'i nyes pa spang <lb n=""27a7""/> par mi nus pa'i phyir ro

1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex2101-2024-10-02-17-19,finalized,51a5 - 51a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""51a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2101-2024-10-02-17-19"" status=""finalized"">

yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4189"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dags</rs> <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4294"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">khyung</rs><note type=""editorial"">Uncertain whether this is Khyung po grags se or Khyung rin chen grags, but the latter is referred to elsewhere as ""jo btsun khyung"" in a gloss.</note> gnyis na re rtog bzhï ni sbang bya'i rtog pa yin la
column2: de dang ldan pas khyad par <lb n=""51a6""/> du byas pa ni re spong byed gnyen pos phyad par du byas pa yin pas
column3: rnam rtog bzhi po spong ldan pa
column4: zhes par rigs pa yin no zhes zer ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex2101-2024-10-02-17-1933,finalized,51a6 - 51b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""51a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2101-2024-10-02-17-1933"" status=""finalized"">'di dgag pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre chen</rs><note>""'bre chen"" is taken to refer to 'Bre shes rab 'bar, rather than gTsang pa 'bre sgur.</note> na re de ni mi rigs te
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">rgyud bla ma</rs> las ji skad du
column3: <quote>so so'i skye bo phyin ci log
column5: bden pa mthong pa bzlog pa ste
column7: phyin ci ma log phyin ci log
column9: de bzhin gshegs pa ji lta bzhin
column11: phyin ci ma <lb n=""51a7""/> log spros pa med
column13: </quote> ces gsungs pa dang
column14: de'i don kyang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3748"">dbus dang mtha' rnam par 'byed pa</rs> las
column15: <quote> rjes su mthun pa phyin ci log
column17: rjes su 'brel bcas bzlog pa dang
column19: phyin ci ma log phyin ci log
column21: rjes su 'brel med bsgom pa'o
column23: </quote> zhes gsungs pas so so' sgya bor bsgom pa ni 'phags pa'i bden pa mthong bar rtogs pa phyin ci ma log par <pb n=""51b""/><lb n=""51b1""/> bsgom pa dang rjes su mthun pa phyin ci log tu gyur pa yin pas phyin ci log gis phyin ci log spang par mi nus pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: 1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex2101-2024-10-02-17-40,finalized,51b1 - 51b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""51b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2101-2024-10-02-17-40"" status=""finalized"">

<rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3816"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">ar</rs> na re spyir mi 'thad kyang skyon 'di mi rigs te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3756"">slob dpon 'phags ba thogs med</rs> kyis sun 'byin pa dang mgo gnon pa'i gnyen po gnyis gsungs pas gnyen po phyin ci log de sun 'byin gyi gnyen po ma yin kyang  <lb n=""51b2""/> 'go gnon gyi gnyen po tsam yin pa'i phyir ro

1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex2101-2024-10-02-2,finalized,78a7 - 78b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""78a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2101-2024-10-02-2"" status=""finalized"">

'di la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:6949"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">jo bo a du <choice><reg>la</reg><orig>‹la›</orig></choice></rs> ces pa na re snang tshod pa'i gzung pa yod pa dang bden pa'i gzung pa med par rtogs pas gzung pa bden pa'i rtogs pa spong ba dang
column2: 'dzin pa bden par med pa ma gtogs pas de'i rtog pa mi <pb n=""78b""/><lb n=""78b1""/> spong pa yin no zhe'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex21012025-03-2811-19-52,finalized,78b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""78b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21012025-03-2811-19-52"" status=""finalized"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">jo bo 'bum pa</rs> na re gzung pa gtan nas med par rtogs pas de'i rtog pa spong la
column2: 'dzin pa bden pa med pa ma rtogs pas de'i rtog pa mi spong pas de gnyis ni nyan thos kyi rtogs pa las khyad par du' phags pa dang sangs rgyas kyi rtogs pa la dman pa yin zhes zer ro

column1: 1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex2101-2024-10-03-13-52,finalized,106a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2101-2024-10-03-13-52"" status=""finalized"">
sbyor ba 'di gnyis<lb n=""106a5""/> kyi khyad par kyang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3745"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">jo bo</rs>'i zhal nas gzung pa dang 'dzin pa bkag pa zhes gsungs te
column2: de yang yul blo gnyis mi dmigs pa la brjod do
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_01_ gZhon nu rin chen_mngon par rtog pa'i rgyan gyi 'grel ba bcud kyi thig le.xml,1_021_01,,ex21012023-09-181,finalized,149a3 - 149a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21012023-09-181"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (149a3)""/>

<lb n=""149a3""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4623""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> gyi 'grel pa</rs> bcud kyi thig le</rs> zhes bya lung dang rigs pa la rtogs pa'i snang pa rgyas par gyur cing
column2: bslab pa gsum gyi rgyan gyis mdzes pa
column3: rgol ba dang phyir rgol ba rnams kyi nang na smra ba'i glang po dam par gyur pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6973"">slob dpon shes rab</rs> zhes bya ba dang
column4: theg pa mchog gi sgor zhugs cing brtul zhugs kyi khur bzung nas dben <lb n=""149a4""/> pa'i gnas su sgrub pa'i snying por mtshan nas brjod par dka' ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3912"">slob dpon tshul khrims skyabs</rs> zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyi rdul la reg pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3911"">mang du thos pa'i dge slong <choice><reg>gzhon</reg><orig>gzhu</orig></choice> nu rin chen</rs> zhes bya bas legs par sbyar ba
column5: rdzogs s+ho
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_0_03_The Blue Annals_Tibetan text.xml,X_0_03,R894SIKE,exXX0032025-06-1616-03-07,reviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exXX0032025-06-1616-03-07"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">bdag nyid chen po de</rs>'i sku tshe'i mthar gtugs pa na
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">slob dpon phywa pa</rs>s 'bad pas gsan nas <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6597""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711"">'grel chung</rs> gi TI ka che ba</rs> zhig mdzad de
column3: de'i rjes su 'brang ba dang bcas pa rnams ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">ar</rs> gyi lugs las tha dad pa yin no
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_0_03_The Blue Annals_Tibetan text.xml,X_0_03,R894SIKE,exXX0032025-04-2315-33-03,reviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exXX0032025-04-2315-33-03"" status=""reviewed"">    de nas dgung lo bcu drug pa la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4352"">bo dong e</rs>r byon

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3904"">chos rje rin chen rtse mo</rs> la mngon pa gong 'og <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">tshad ma rnam nges</rs>
column2: shes rab 'grel chung gsan zhing
column3: 'chad rtsod rtsom gsum la 'gran zla med pa'i grags pa thob
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column6: dge'o

column1: 3_061_06 = 3_076_07_I_R_M_skyo ston_dbus mtha khrid.xml,3_061_06,,ex61062023-09-26-095619,unreviewed,7b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex61062023-09-26-095619"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs> zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458"">btsun pa ze'u chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> la gnang ste <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">daM pas bsngags pa snar thang gyi dben <abbr>gnas</abbr></rs><abbr>su</abbr> bris shis [shing ?] phyag dpe la btugs (=gtugs?) ste dag par <abbr>byas so</abbr>

column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5005"">phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi 'phags pa'i gang <lb n=""7a2""/> zag thams cad mchod pa'i cho ga rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5948""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5949"">stod mnga' ris</rs> kyi 'dul ba 'dzin pa dge slongs mgon ldan 'od</rs> ces bya bas bskul nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">mang du thos pa'i dge <lb n=""7a3""/> slong bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal ldan snar thang gi dgon pa</rs>r bkod pa rdzogs so

column1: 'dis sems can tshad med pa'i don byed cing 'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad mnyes par byed par gyur <lb n=""7a4""/> cig

column1: 1_021_03 rNal 'byor pa Shes rab rdo rje_bden gnyis kyi rnam par bshad pa.xml,1_021_03,,ex21032024-09-0412-46-27,reviewed,55a6 - 55a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""55a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21032024-09-0412-46-27"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bdag</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3913"">shag kya'i dge slong prad nya badz+ra</rs></note><note><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3829"">dge ba'i bshes pu to ba</rs>'i slob ma <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3913"">rnal 'byor pa shes rab rdo rje</rs>s mdzad pa yin no</note> gis <note type=""gloss"">ti ka</note> de bsdebs <note type=""gloss"">ba las byung ba'i</note> dge ba gang <note type=""gloss"">zhig</note> thob <note type=""gloss"">pa</note> des
phyin chad skyes bu <note type=""gloss"">bdag gzhan gyi don dang tshig don gyi rtogs pa</note> don <note type=""gloss"">du</note> gnyer <note type=""gloss"">bar</note> 'dod pa yis

column5: <note type=""gloss"">thabs dang shes rab du su 'jug pa

column1: </note> dbu ma'i lam gyis nges <note type=""gloss"">pa ste gdon mi za bar</note> par <note type=""gloss"">chos kyi</note> sku thob <note type=""gloss"">par</note> shog <note type=""gloss"">1</note>
