column1: 3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml,3_088_05,,ex088052025-05-2616-35-24,unreviewed,1b1 - 1b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex088052025-05-2616-35-24"" status=""unreviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Invocation (1b1)""/>
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma dam pa</rs> rnams la <choice><reg>phyag</reg><orig>(phy)ag</orig></choice> 'tshal lo
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Introductory verses (1b1-1b3)""/>
<lg><l>gang zhig 'o ma'i mtsho' nang pad zla'i dbus gnas rdo rje'i dkyil krung bzhugs
<l>zhal gcig zla ba <lb n=""1b2""/> ltar dkar phun 'tsh[o]gs rgyan ldan mchog sbyin ud dpal bsnams
<l>glang chen me tog dkar mdzes dbus gnas <rs type=""deity"">dus gsum sangs rgyas</rs> kyis bstod cing
<l>'gro ba'i mun sel <rs type=""deity"">gzhon nu blo gros</rs> bsam mi khyab la bstod bya (read: byas?) ste
<l>rtog ge yang <lb n=""1b3""/> dag shes pas (em. -> pa'i) gsungs pa'i tshul dang che ba brjod pa dang
<l>de dang ldan la 'jug tshul <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5301"">ye shes rdo rje rin chen</rs> brtsam par bya
<note type=""translation"">Having honored gZhon nu blo gros, the inconceivable, who eliminates the darkness of the world,
Who is honored by the Buddhas of the three times residing in the middle of beautiful white elefant-flowers
Who is sitting in the position of the cross-legged vajra (vajraparyaṅka ) on a seat in the center of the moon-disk above the lotus in the ocean of milk
Who has one face, white like the moon, adorned by perfect ornaments, holding the lotus (in the left hand,), and making the boon-granting mudra (with the right hand)

I will compose the “Precious vajra (of) wisdom” a way of entering into (i) the way logic,  i.e. correct cognition, is taught and (ii) statement of greatness, and (iii) into that which has it (this greatness).
</note></seg></TEI>"

3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml,3_088_05,,ex088052025-05-2615-53-57,finalized,9a3 - 9a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex088052025-05-2615-53-57"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""2331.4 log shes""/>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""2331.41 mtshan nyid""/>

log shes kyi spyi'i <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> ni don dang mi mthun par 'dzin pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya pa</rs> bzhed pa <note type=""editorial"">The ascription of this view to Phya pa seems mistaken. A similar view is ascribed to  (ID:3864) in work (ID:5507), and it is mentioned anonymously in work (ID:4771)</note> mi 'thad de
column2: dngos po'i don dang mi mthun par 'dzin pa yin na
column3: <lb n=""9a4""/> dngos <abbr>med</abbr> 'jal ba'i tshad ma <note type=""gloss"">log shes su thal bas</note> la khyab ches la
column4: shes bya'i don dang mi mthun par 'dzin pa yin na zla 2 la de <abbr>med</abbr> pas de log shes ma yin par thal lo
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml,3_088_05,,ex088052025-05-2615-53-11,finalized,9a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex088052025-05-2615-53-11"" status=""finalized"">yang rang yul <choice><reg>med pa la yod par</reg><orig>‹med pa la yod par›</orig></choice> sgro 'dogs pa zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">tsang nag pa</rs> 'dod pa <note type=""editorial"">This definition fits mTshur ston's (ID:44315) definition in sGron ma (ID:5292), but not exactly that of gTsang nag pa in bsDus pa (ID:4550). </note> mi 'thad de
column2: de lta na shes bya dang mi mthun par 'dzin pa <note type=""gloss"">log shes kyi mtshan nyid </note> yin pa cis dgag

column1: 3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml,3_088_05,,ex088052025-05-2616-07-01,finalized,9a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex088052025-05-2616-07-01"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""2331.5 the tshom""/>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""2331.51 mtshan nyid""/> the tshom kyi <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> ni <note type=""gloss"">mtha' 1 du ma nges par <choice><orig>zhan</orig><reg>zhen</reg></choice> pa'o
column2: </note> mtha' gzhan du 'dzin pa'i dogs pa dang bcas pa <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">rtsang</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> gsung</note> ste

column1: 3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml,3_088_05,,ex088052025-05-2616-12-23,finalized,12a8 - 12b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex088052025-05-2616-12-23"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""1.i rigs kyi spyi dang bye brag""/>dang po ni
column2: khyab <note type=""gloss"">bya ba</note><note type=""editorial"">phya?</note> che chung ma yin te stong nyid spyi buM pa bye brag du 'gyur la
column3: 'dod na stong nyid mngon sum tshad mas nges par 'gyur ro
column5: khyab <lb n=""12a8""/> byed <note type=""gloss"">yang la la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha 1</rs></note> ni spyi
column6: khyab bya ni bye brag ma yin te
column7: mi rtag pa dang yod pa spyi bye brag du thal bas 'dod na mi rtag pa'i don yang mngon sum tshad mas grub par 'gyur ro
column9: ldog pa 1 rkyang dang 2 'tshogs kyang ma yin te
column10: dbyug pa dang dbyug pa can yang der thal ba 'dod na de 2 bdag 1 par 'gyur ro
column12: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">rtsang nag pa</rs></note> rigs mi mthun las log pa'i ldog pa 1 <pb n=""12b""/><lb n=""12b1""/> rkyang dang
column13: ldog pa 1 rkyang de nyid kyis ldog pa 2 pa zin pa zhes pa

column1: yang spu ris gzung dka' bas
column2: bye brag <choice><reg>de</reg><orig>‹de›</orig></choice> la ltos pa'i zhes gzhir bzhag ste
column3: des na dbyug pa can la de <abbr>med</abbr> de skyes bu dbyug pa can de skyes bu nang mtshan las log pa'i bye brag yin gyi
column4: dbyug pa nang mtshan las ma log pas dbyug pa'i bye brag ma yin no gsung

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4099"">kho bo</rs> <lb n=""12b2""/> ni
column2: nang mtshan du ma phye bar ril por brjod pa 'am bsaMs pa ni spyi la
column3: phye ba ni bye brag du 'thad do bsaM mo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_088_05_F_C_NI_M_Chos kyi bzhad pa_tshad ma de kho na nyid nye bar bsdus pa.xml,3_088_05,,ex088052025-05-2616-04-27,finalized,15a4 - 15a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex088052025-05-2616-04-27"" status=""finalized"">yang 'das ma 'ongs kyi rnam pa snang stobs kyis de rang gi rang mtshan byung pa dang ma byung pa'i sgro 'dogs chod pa yin zer ba <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">gtsang nag</rs></note> mi 'thad de
column2: rnam pa zhes bya ba rang mtshan gyi rnam pa<choice><reg>'i</reg><orig>‹'i›</orig></choice> sgra don nam <abbr>med</abbr> pa'i don gsal ba snang pa yin
column3: dang po ltar na  <lb n=""15a5""/> 'gags pa dang ma skyes pa'i rang mtshan snang par 'gal
column4: 2 pa dang 3 pa ltar na

<lg>  <l> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3770"">mdo</rs> dang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3772"">rnam 'grel</rs> las sogs rigs gzhung du ma dang

column3: </l> <l><lb n=""21a1""/> rtogs ngan dug chu'i dri mas ma sbags don gyi snying po blangs
column5: </l> <l>gzu' bo'i blo yis don dang don min rnam bshad byas

column1: <note type=""translation""> I have obtained the essence of meaning – the reasoning coming from the force of experience and evidence and (from?) the many logical works such as PS and PV - unstained by the poison-water of bad conceptions.
(I) have explained what is the meaning and what is not the meaning with a honest mind
</note>
<lg><l>bsod nams 'di yis 'gro ba ma lus pa
column3: </l>  <l>kun mkhyen rgyal po myur du thob par shog
column5: </l></lg> <note type=""translation"">Owing to these merits, may all beings quickly obtain (the status) of king of omniscients!</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: <note type=""gloss"">2 zhus dag go</note> rdzogs s+ho
column5: **Ti !

column1: <note type=""translation"">

The summary of the essence of the sevenfold collection of epistemology was composed by rDo rje dbang grags, the great learned Lama, the buddhism monk well-learned in the vast (three) baskets, holding the burden of vows, in the monastery of gTe’ ra bkra shis dbu mang, in the year of the fire-female-ox, in the 7th 500-year cycle of the teaching of the Sugata.
The abbridged summary of the Summary of the Essence of Epistemology – the precious vajra (of) wisdom is completed.

It was composed for the sake of those who rejoice in what is somewhat summarized, by the upasaka Chos kyi bzhad pa, after  a few years had passed since thad listend profusely direcly from the Lama, having been requested by Thod pa bSod nams seng ge, the spiritual teacher of g.Yag rde.
</note>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5302""><note type=""gloss"">shes bya ji lta ba dang ji snyed pa rtogs pas</note> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5302"">ye shes ¦ ××× <note type=""gloss"">gzhan rgol ba <abbr>thams cad</abbr> tshar gcod pas</note> rdo rje ¦ ××× <note type=""gloss"">sangs rgyas pa'i grub mtha' dgos pa kun 'byung pas</note> rin po che</rs></rs> ¦
</seg></TEI>"

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">slob dpon cha pa</rs> na re
column2: [ \[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pas stong ste
column3: <lb n=""25b2""/>skad cig du mas stong ba'i phyir
column4: _cig char don byed pas stong ste
column5: _skad cig gis stong ba'i phyir
column6: _de dag gi phyogs chos ni rtag 'dzin nyams su myong ba'i rang rig mngon sum gyis grub ste
column7: _'di ltar rtag pa ni

column1: <lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">[]<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">chos kyi grags [\[]pa [;]pa</rs>s [\]]mi rtag pa
<l xml:space=""preserve"">[]log la rtag pa'i tha snyad mdzad
</lg>
zhes gsungs pa dang yang mthun par skad cig mas stong ba tsam la bzhed cing
column2: _rang rig gis yul can skad cig mas stong bar 'dzin pa'i 'dzin stangs dngos su [\[p.172-3\]<lb n=""25b3""/>\[]bzhal [;]gzhal [\]]ba'i shugs la yul skad cig mas stong bar grub pa na
column3: _de'i dngos kyi log phyogs skad cig mas khyad par du byas pa'i skad cig dang skad cig du mas stong bar yang grub pa yin no

column1: ldog khyab ni skad cig ma mngon sum gyis mi grub pa'i gzhan gyis [\[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pa la skad cig [\[]pa [;]ma [\]]du mas khyab pa sogs yang mngon sum gyis mi 'grub mod
column2: _rjes dpag gis grub ste
column3: _'di ltar [\[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pa ni dus [\[p.172-4\]]<lb n=""25b4""/>gnyis pa dang
column4: _de las gzhan du'ang 'bras bu skyed pa yin zhing
column5: _cig char don byed pa ni
column6: _dus gnyis pa kho nar 'bras bu skyed pa yin no

column1: []de lta na dus 'di dang dus gzhan tsam chos can
column2: _dngos po tha dad yin pas khyab ste
column3: _'gal ba'i chos ldan gyi dngos po yin pas khyab pa'i phyir
column4: _dper na sngon po dang sngo min gyi dngos po bzhin no

column1: khyab pa ni dpe'i steng du mngon sum gyis grub bo
column3: phyogs chos kyang dus snga phyi tsam la 'bras bu dang nye [\[p.172-5\]]ring sogs 'du ba 'gal bas khyab pa mngon sum gyis nges so

column1: []de lta na dus snga phyi tsam la dngos po tha dad kyi khyab pa grub pas dus skad cig gis phye ba na yang
column2: _skad cig dang po dang gnyis pa sogs dngos po tha dad du grub cing
column3: [ \[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pa yang dus du ma dang 'brel bas [\[]rims kyis [;]rim gyis [\]]don byed pa la skad cig ma du mas khyab par grub bo

column1: []cig char gyis don byed pa de la yang
column2: _don byed [\[p.172-6\]]pa'i phyi dus gzhan tsam chos can
column4: _'bras bu skyes pas khyab pa'i phyir
column5: _dper na bum pa skyes pa na 'jim pa 'gags pas khyab pa bzhin no

column1: khyab pa dpe'i steng du mngon sum gyis nges so
phyogs chos kyang mngon sum gyis grub bo
column3: de lta na phyi dus gzhan tsam la rgyu 'gags pas khyab pa grub pa na
column4: _dus la skad cig gis phye ba na yang skad cig cig char rgyu 'gags pas [\[p.172-7\]]<lb n=""25b7""/>khyab pa grub pas cig char don byed pa la skad cig gis khyab pa grub bo zhes gsungs so
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_20072023-06-281,reviewed,1a1 - 1a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_20072023-06-281"" status=""reviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Cover page (1a)""/>
<rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">

tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i Ti ka legs bshad bsdus pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> gtsang nag pa</rs>s mdzad pa <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr>

i <choice><reg>dra sa</reg><orig>(dra sa)</orig></choice> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4551"">SHakya b+hikSHu ku ma ra SHrI</rs> pustaM <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">pra ma Na bi ni <choice><reg>SH+ca</reg><orig>(SH+ca/s+tsa)</orig></choice> ya sya</rs> TI ka</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">A tsarya virya sing ha sya</rs> kA ra:
column3: <note type=""editorial"">Skt: idam? śākyabhikṣu-kumāra-śrī pustaṃ pramāṇaviniścayasya ṭīkā ācārya-vīryasiṃhasya kārāḥ. Kumāraśrī (=Tib. gzhon nu dpal) could possibly be 'Gos lo tsA ba bZhon nu dpal.</note><note type=""translation"">This is the book of the shakya monk Kumarashri (Tib. gZhon nu dpal), a commentary on the Pramāṇaviniścaya, a composition of the master Viryasiṃha (=brTson 'grus seng ge)</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_10152023-06-283,reviewed,1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10152023-06-283"" status=""reviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""A Incipit""/>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Title""/>

<pb n=""1b""/><lb n=""1b1""/><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i ti ka legs par bshad pa bsdus <choice><reg>pa</reg><orig>pa'</orig></choice></rs> zhes bya ba
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Invocation""/>
<rs type=""deity"">bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i dbyangs</rs> la phyag 'tshal lo
column3: <note type=""translation"">Commentary on the Pramāṇaviniścaya – a summary of eloquent elucidations. I bow down to the Illustrious Mañjughoṣa.</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex013012025-05-2117-53-13,reviewed,1b1 - 1b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex013012025-05-2117-53-13"" status=""reviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Introductory verses (1b1-1b5""/>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 1""/>
<lg> <l>gang zhig nyes pa kun bral chos rnams la
column3: </l><l>ye shes spyan <choice><reg>dang</reg><orig>dang {ldan pa'}</orig></choice>  thugs rje'i gsung dbyangs kyis
column5: </l><l>legs 'dod skye bo don la mi slu ba'i
column7: </l><l>'jug yul <rs type=""deity"">ston pa</rs> <lb n=""1b2""/> de la phyag 'tshal lo

column1: <note type=""translation"">I bow down to the one who teaches the object of engagement that is non-erroneous with regard to what is meaningful (for) people who wish well.
Thanks to the eye of wisdom with regard to the phenomena devoid of all faults and the voice of compassion.</note>
<seg type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-4"" status=""reviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 2""/>
<lg><l>gang ma mthong pas srid par 'khyams gyur pa
column3: </l> <l>bdag la shes bya'i gnas la gnas nyid bzhin
column5: </l> <l>lta byed tshad ma'i myig gnyis sbyin mdzad pa'i

column1: <l>rgyal mtshungs <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma rnams</rs> la phyag 'tshal lo
<note type=""translation"">I bow down to the bla mas, who are like Victorious ones,
Who bestowed the two eyes of valid cognition that make one see
The nature of objects of cognition as it is
To me, who was roaming in existence because of not seing.
</note></seg>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 3""/>
<seg type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13012023-07-2008-36-52"" status=""reviewed""> <lg><l>gang zhig dngos stobs blo yis dngos rnams la
column3: </l> <l>log lta'i gzhung rnams rab 'jig dngos nyid dang
column5: </l> <l><lb n=""1b3""/> <rs type=""deity"">ston pa</rs>'i gsung don nges byed rigs pa'i tshul
column7: </l> <l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">rnam nges</rs> mdzad pa</rs> de 'dir rgyal gyur cig
column9: </l></lg><note type=""translation"">May the one who composed the Pramāṇaviniścaya be here victorious!

column1: (The Pramāṇaviniścaya) that destroys the traditions of mistaken views about entities by a mind (that conforms to) the force of reality, which has a method of reasoning that ascertains what is real and the meaning of the words of the teacher.
</note></seg>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 4""/>
<lg> <l>de lta'i gzhung 'di skye bo blo gros phyogs can gyis
tshig don ma bshad tshig dang don 'ga' bshad pa dang
column2: </l> <l>log par bshad dang skabs don gzhung las 'khyams bshad kyis
column4: </l> <l>shes 'dod rnams kyi dus dang sgra blo gron gyur byas
column6: </l></lg><note type=""translation"">(Regarding) this text that is such,

column1: partially intelligent people have not explained the meaning of the words,
Or have explained some of the words and meaning, or have explained them incorrectly, or have explained the context in deviating from the text.
Because of this, the time and words and intelligence of those who wish to know have been consumed.
</note>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 5""/>
<seg type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10202023-06-285"" status=""reviewed""><lg><l>de dag rjes <lb n=""1b4""/> zhugs dpyad la ltos myed par
column3: </l> <l>rnam 'jig sdud dang gzhung don gsal byed pas
column5: </l> <l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">ston de</rs>'i dgongs pa bde blag nges 'gyur ba'i
column7: </l> <l><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">legs bshad bsdus pa'i ti ka</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">bdag </rs>gis bya
column9: </l></lg><note type=""translation""/>I will compose a commentary that is the Summary of eloquent elucidations

column1: Such that the intention of this teacher can be ascertained easily,
Without depending on the analysis of those who follow the former,
By including their destruction and clarifying the meaning of the text.
</seg>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 6""/>
<lg> <l>rnam bshad don gyi ro dang nus pa mi shes par
column3: </l> <l>grags pa'i sgra las che ba'i rlung du mngon rgyug pas
column5: </l> <l>gzhan zer skye bo lung brgya'i rnyog chus ngoms <lb n=""1b5""/> pa bdag
column7: </l> <l>legs bshad bkod ma yan lag brgyad ldan 'di mi 'thung
column9: </l></lg><note type=""translation"">Because they follow, running, a wind that is bigger than renown words

column1: Without knowing the taste and quality (or strength, nus pa) of the meaning of the explanation
Those who quench their thirst with the polluted water of the hundred instructions of people who (all) say something else
Do not drink the spring-water of the eloquent elucidations which has eight attributes (of good water).
</note>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 7""/>
<lg><l>gang dag rjod tshogs snying por mi byed kyi
column3: </l> <l><rs type=""work"">gzhung</rs> gis bstan pa'i don gzhung nges 'dod pa
column5: </l> <l>de dag tshig 'gas don mang rab gsal ba'i
column7: </l> <l>rigs bshad snying po 'di la ngo mtshar lta
column9: </l></lg><note type=""translation"">Those who do not take to heart the collections of discourses,

column1: But hope to ascertain the meaning taught in the texts (and) the texts,
Should marvel at this (commentary) that is the essence of logical explanation,
That clarifies many meanings by means of few words.
</note>
</seg></TEI>"

<note type=""translation"">I bow down to the bla mas, who are like Victorious ones,
Who bestowed the two eyes of valid cognition that make one see
The nature of objects of cognition as it is
To me, who was roaming in existence because of not seing.
</note></seg></TEI>"

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex13012023-07-2008-36-52,reviewed,1b2 - 1b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13012023-07-2008-36-52"" status=""reviewed""> <lg><l>gang zhig dngos stobs blo yis dngos rnams la
column3: </l> <l>log lta'i gzhung rnams rab 'jig dngos nyid dang
column5: </l> <l><lb n=""1b3""/> <rs type=""deity"">ston pa</rs>'i gsung don nges byed rigs pa'i tshul
column7: </l> <l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">rnam nges</rs> mdzad pa</rs> de 'dir rgyal gyur cig
column9: </l></lg><note type=""translation"">May the one who composed the Pramāṇaviniścaya be here victorious!

column1: (The Pramāṇaviniścaya) that destroys the traditions of mistaken views about entities by a mind (that conforms to) the force of reality, which has a method of reasoning that ascertains what is real and the meaning of the words of the teacher.
</note></seg></TEI>"

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_10202023-06-285,reviewed,1b3 - 1b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10202023-06-285"" status=""reviewed""><lg><l>de dag rjes <lb n=""1b4""/> zhugs dpyad la ltos myed par
column3: </l> <l>rnam 'jig sdud dang gzhung don gsal byed pas
column5: </l> <l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">ston de</rs>'i dgongs pa bde blag nges 'gyur ba'i
column7: </l> <l><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">legs bshad bsdus pa'i ti ka</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">bdag </rs>gis bya
column9: </l></lg><note type=""translation""/>I will compose a commentary that is the Summary of eloquent elucidations

column1: Such that the intention of this teacher can be ascertained easily,
Without depending on the analysis of those who follow the former,
By including their destruction and clarifying the meaning of the text.
</seg></TEI>"

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_10252023-06-286,reviewed,2a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10252023-06-286"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rnam par nges <choice><reg>pa</reg><orig>pa'</orig></choice></rs> ni lus lta bu'i bstan bcos bar ma ste
column2: gzhung cung zad bsdus pas tshad ma nyid kyi lus tshang par gtan la 'bebs pa'i phyir ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_10292023-06-287,reviewed,2a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_10292023-06-287"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3774"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">gzhung 'di </rs> ni rtsom pa la 'jug pa klad kyi don dang
column2: brtsam par bya ba skabs kyi don dang
column3: mthar phyin pa 'jug gi don gsum gyis nges par bya ba las
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-288,reviewed,11a1 - 11a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-288"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:mtshan_nyid"">de la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa dag </rs>mtshan nyid kyi skyon mtshon bya la ltos te mi srid pa dang ma khyab khyab ches gsum las myed par sems pa de dag ni khyab mnyam pa'i don ldog gzhan pa dang rang ldog rdzas su ma grub pa skyon du bsgrub pas <lb n=""11a2""/> gnod par lta'o

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex87032023-06-2912-23-02,reviewed,22b7 - 22b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""22b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-06-2912-23-02"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:snang_la_ma_nges_pa"">de la snang la ma nges pa'i mtshan nyid ni

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4206"">kha cig</rs><note type=""editorial"">An annotation in the manuscript of mTshur ston's Tshad ma shes rab sgron ma identifies the proponent as ""rtag pa,"" which we understand to refer to sTag. See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 21, n. 30</note> snang yang nges pa 'dren mi nus pa zhes zer ba ni 'dir blo rnams yul cig la ltos nas <lb n=""22b8""/> tha dad par 'jog pa yin no

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex13012024-10-215-13-39,unreviewed,24a6 - 24a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13012024-10-215-13-39"" status=""unreviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""2.1 mngon sum la log rtogs dgag pa""/>

<lb n=""24a6""/> dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kha cig</rs> tshu rol mthong ba rnams ni yul dang dus dang skye mched ma phye bar gang la zhen pa drangs pa'i don la mi slu bas tshad mar 'gyur ba yin ste
column2: zhen pa ni tshad ma'i byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro
column4: de lta ma yin na 'gro ba na spyad pa'i don thob pa'i mi slu ba nyid mi srid par 'gyur te mthong pa'i dngos po rnams  <lb n=""24a7""/> 'jug par gzo' tsa na 'gag pa'i phyir ro
column6: de lta yin dang me dang chu'i kha dog 'dzin pa ni tsha ba dang gsher ba'i zhen pa 'dren pa nyid kyis reg pa la tshad ma yin no zhes zer ro
column8: <note type=""editorial"">This corresponds to the position of <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rNgog lo tsa ba</rs> </note>

column1: de ni mi rung ste don myong pa'i stobs kyis rtogs pa myed pa'i phyir ro

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-06,reviewed,66b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""66b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-06"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5570"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rab pa pa</rs>'i 'dod pa rjes su brjod pa dang
column2: sgrub bya sgrub byed kyi don nyid ngos gzung pa dang
column3: de rang gi gzhung lugs smra ba rnams la sbyar ba'o

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1223023-06-289,reviewed,109b8 - 110a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""109b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1223023-06-289"" status=""reviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">chen po dag </rs>ni sgrub pa 'brel pa gnyis la rten pas dbye ba'i tshul ci 'dra ba myed pas sam
column2: mi dmigs pa'i sgrub bya med dgag la dbye' ba myed pa sam
column3: dbye bsdu' byas kyang gsum gyi grangs <pb n=""110a""/><lb n=""110a1""/> nges la gnod pa myed te mngon sum bzhir phye bas tshad ma'i grangs nges la mi gnod pa bzhin no zhes zer ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_12292023-06-2810,reviewed,111a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""111a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_12292023-06-2810"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3839"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kho bo cag</rs> rtags mi 'khrul pa'i spyi khyab de nyid la 'brel par brjod pa'i yang phyir ro

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-2822,unreviewed,160b2 - 160b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""160b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-2822"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni thal 'gyur dang bzlog pa'i rang rgyud la rtogs pa cig pa'i tshul drug las
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""1""/>re shig thal ba'i phyogs chos khas blangs dang bzlog pa'i bsgrub bya shes 'dod gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste
column2: <choice><corr>du ba</corr><sic>du ma</sic></choice> 'gog pa'i rgyu <lb n=""160b3""/> mi dmyigs pa'i thal ba dang me bsgrub pa'i 'bras rtags kyi rang rgyud kyi dbang du byas te la la me myed du log pas smra na gnyis ka tshang la me tshad mas grub na gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i phyir ro

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""2""/> thal ba'i bsal pa dang bzlog pa'i rtags gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste
column2: la la du ba mthong na gnyis ka la tshang la ma mthong <lb n=""160b4""/> na gnyis ka ma tshang ba'i phyir ro

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""3""/>
thal ba dang bzlog pa'i khyab pa gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang par gnad gcig ste
column2: thal ba'i khyab pa me myed du <choice><corr>med</corr><sic>me</sic> </choice>kho na la yod par bsgrub na du yod la me myed <choice><corr>med</corr><sic>me myed</sic></choice> pas du yod la mye <choice><corr>yod</corr><sic>myed</sic></choice> pa rang rgyud kyi khyab pa grub cing<anchor xml:id=""a36""/>
column3: rang rgyud kyi khyab pa {<hi rendition=""#i #u"">du yod</hi> (Ms om.)} <mentioned>me yod kho na la yod pa</mentioned> grub na yang <mentioned>me myed la myed pa</mentioned>s 160b5 <mentioned>me myed la du ba myed pa</mentioned> thal ba'i khyab pa grub pas<anchor xml:id=""a37""/> tshang par gcig pa'i phyir dang
column4: <mentioned>la la tsan dan gyi me myed pas du med du thal ba</mentioned>r brjod na thal ba dang bzlog pa gnyis ka'i khyab pa sha pa'i mer zhig pas ma tshang par gcig pa'i phyir ro

column1: de la phyogs chos dang shes 'dod ma tshang pa ni me mthong pa'i tshang bang du bkod na 'byung zhing <lb n=""160b6""/> bsal ba dang gtan tshigs ma tshang pa ni du ba ma mthong pa'i rgya mtshor bkod na 'byung la
khyab pa gnyis ma tshang pa ni me mthong yang tsan dan gyi me myed par rtogs pa'i la la bkod 'byung pas ma tshang pa'i skyon drug ni gzhi gsum la 'byung pa yin no

la la du ba mthong yang me myed du rtog pas me myed la du med du thal ba<lb n=""160b7""/> brjod na tshang pa'i yon tan drug gzhi cig la 'du bas thal ba yon tan drug ldan gyis rang rgyud chos drug ldan 'phel ba nyid do zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa</rs>'i rnam pa gzhag pa'o

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-2823,reviewed,182b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-2823"" status=""reviewed"">de la yang khas blangs <lb n=""182b3""/> dang rang tshig gis bsal pa gnyis kyi khyad par ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa dag</rs> yid ches pa'i gang zag gzhan gyi tshig dang rgol ba rang gi tshig dang 'gal ba la 'jog go

1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-0633,unreviewed,183b5 - 183b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""183b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-0633"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference""><!--These are predecessors of dharmakirti-->snga rabs pa'i lugs</rs> 'chad pa na yid ches pa'i gang zag dang de'i tshig don gyi 'bras bu dang 'bras bu'i rtags kyis bzlog pa sel pa gsum <lb n=""183b6""/> <quote xml:id=""d2e14307"">bdag gam</quote> zhes dang <quote xml:id=""d2e14310"">de'i</quote> zhes dang <quote xml:id=""d2e14313"">rang gi</quote> (P294b43) zhes pa ste
column2: bdag dang gzhan ni rang tshig dang khas blangs kyi gang zag yin pas nus pa yang <quote xml:id=""d2e14316"">gegs sam gnod par byed do</quote> zhes sbyar ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-28245,unreviewed,184b2 - 184b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""184b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-28245"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">lung <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du tshad ma yid ma yin nam ces pa'i lan du lung tshad ma bsam par bshad zin to ces bya ste
column2: bshad pa <abbr>slob dpon</abbr> <lb n=""184b3""/> gyis yin kyang snga rabs pa pa</rs>s<!--These are predecessors of Dharmakirti--> de ltar 'dod par dgongs pa'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1282023-06-2825,unreviewed,185a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""185a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1282023-06-2825"" status=""unreviewed"">gzhi' lung gis grub pa la ltos pa dang
column2: mi ltos pa'i dbye' ba <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">snga rabs pa'</rs>i lugs brjod pa dang khyad par myed pa rang gi lugs gnyis <quote xml:id=""d2e14495"">gzhung lugs</quote> ces dang <quote xml:id=""d2e14498"">'di la yang</quote> (<?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>P296b1<?oxy_comment_end?>) ces pa'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex013012025-05-2118-06-28,unreviewed,209b3 - 210a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""209b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex013012025-05-2118-06-28"" status=""unreviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""D Conclusive verses (209b3-210a3)""/>
<lg><l>rigs pa'i dbang phyug rgol <lb n=""209b4""/> ba ngan 'joms thub pa'i dbang pos lung bstan gang
column3: </l> <l>ston pa'i bstan la mkhas pa'i ming rgyal dag gis ma smad zing
column5: </l> <l>'jug yul kun la rang lugs 'dzin skye bo kun kyi dbang gyur pa'i
column7: </l> <l>bla med de ni gling mchog 'di na <lb n=""209b5""/> chos rje lta bur grags pa yin

column1: <lg> <l>mtha' gnyis myed par gsum du 'khor zhing
column3: </l> <l>mi bzad sdug bsngal rtag ldan ba
column5: </l> <l>thabs myed nyid dang thabs gzhan dag gis shin tu zhi bar mi nus la
column7: </l> <l><lb n=""209b6""/> blo gros snying po gzig nyid de yang gang zhig myed par mi 'byung pa'i
column9: </l> <l>rigs tshul 'di ni thar pa'i lam la mi snang pa seng ge yin

column1: <lg><l>gsum las bskyed de khyad par rnam bcad pas
column3: </l> <l>tshad ma'i ngo bo gangs <lb n=""209b7""/> dang brjod pa la
column5: </l> <l>log rtogs brgyal phrag bsal nas rigs pa'i don
column7: </l>  <l>rnam pa res pa'i thub pa'i rgyal mtshan yin

column1: <lg><l>mdo' don gang la byed don brgyas ldan pa don gyi gang
column3: </l> <l><lb n=""209b8""/> rab sbyar pa skye bo'i sgra blo'i yang dag ldan rnams kyis
column5: </l> <l>rnam par bshad pa che 'bris bsdus pa'i 'od dag gis
column7: </l> <l>rang gi phyogs su zla 'od tsam zhig snang bar kyag
column9: </l></lg> <lg><l>de nas ring nas smon lam <pb n=""210a""/><lb n=""210a1""/> stobs kyis 'di 'ongs ste
column11: </l> <l>gang ri'i skye bo blo gyi myig ldan pa stong dag gis
column13: </l> <l>phyogs cig blo yis gzhung dang don gyis cha shas las
column15: </l> <l>spyad mi rim pa don tshul rgya mtsho' gnyis ma 'gyur

column1: <lg><l><lb n=""210a2""/> du mtha' thos ma rnam spyad blo gros can
column3: </l> <l>dpal ldan dge' slong seng ge'i sgra can gyis
column5: </l> <l>dab gas goms dang gzhan la phan don du
column7: </l> <l>smad kyi rnams bshad de bas so

column1: <lg><l>bsod nams 'di yis 'di la rab brten nas
column2: </l> <l><lb n=""210a3""/> brtson ldan blo gros dman pa'i skye bos kyang
column4: </l> <l>rnam par nges pa nges ste shes bya'i
column6: </l> <l>de nyis myur du rtogs nas grol 'gyur yin

column1: 1_013_01_gTsang nag_rnam nges bsdus.xml,1_013_01,,ex1301_1232023-06-282,finalized,210a3 - 210a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""210a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1301_1232023-06-282"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4550"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i ti ka legs par bshad pa bsdus <lb n=""210a4""/>pa</rs> zhes bya ba
column3: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3839"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rigs par smra ba'i dge slong brtson 'grus seng ge</rs>s sbyar pa'o
column5: rdzogs s+ho
column7: i thi

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-23,unreviewed,5b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-11-23"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha 1</rs> na re ngag 'di bkod pa'i dgos pa gzhung 'dir bkod pa mdzes pa yin ste 'brel brtsal ba'i phyir zer ba la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-12-20,finalized,12a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-20"" status=""finalized"">

dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">slob dpon lo tsha ba chen po</rs>'i zhal snga nas rgyun mtha'i dus 2 par mkhyen 3 gyi ngo bo <abbr>ye shes</abbr> kyi chos sku dang por thob pa ni yum yin la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-292,finalized,12a9 - 12b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12a9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-11-292"" status=""finalized"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre chen po</rs> na re yum sras yin pas rgyu 'bras su mi 'gyur ste rnam par bzhag 'jog gi yum sras yin pa'i phyir ba glang dang nog lkog shal <abbr>bzhin</abbr> no
'di ltar gzhi shes rnaM 'jog rgyu nyan rang 'phags pa rnam
<lb n=""12b1""/> bzhag 'bras bu
column2: lam shes rnam 'jog rgyu byang chub <abbr>sems dpa'</abbr> rnam bzhag 'bras bu
column3: rnam mkhyen rnam 'jog rgyu <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> rnaM bzhag 'bras bu yin ste
column4: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5633"">mdo</rs> las ko'u shi ka nga'i dngos po'i sku 'di mnyes pas ni de <abbr>bzhin</abbr> gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs su mi 'gro yis
column5: rnam pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa nyid mnyes pas ni de <abbr>bzhin</abbr> gshegs pa zhes bya ba'i grangs

column1: <lb n=""12b2""/> su 'gro'o zhes gsungs pa dang
column2: </seg></TEI>"

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mtshyid srol 'byed chen po</rs> na re don dam bden pa mngon suM du rtogs pa dam par gyur pa yin ste
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-42,unreviewed,18a6 - 18a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-11-42"" status=""unreviewed"">
2 pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">che ba'i sde</rs> na re rte ji lta bu'i sting nge 'dzin gyi rtog pa kho na yum yin ste mya ngan las 'das pa'i mdo pas
<lb n=""18a7""/>shes rab gyi pha rol du phyin pa zhes kyang bya
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-12-26,finalized,48a4 - 48a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""48a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-26"" status=""finalized"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo a ti sha</rs>'i zhal nas skar phung nang gi <abbr>nam mkha'</abbr> mthong pa dang <abbr>nam mkha'</abbr> chen po mthong pa la <abbr>nam mkha'i</abbr> ngo bo mthong pa la khyad par med kyang
column2: rgya che chung la mthong pa'i khyad par yod <lb n=""48a5""/> pa <abbr>bzhin</abbr> du sa bcu'i mnyaM bzhag na chos nyid kyi ngo bo mthong pa la khyad par med kyang rgya che chung mthong pa'i khyad par yod pa <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes gsung go
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-29,finalized,52b1 - 52b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""52b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-11-29"" status=""finalized"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> na re snga ma yang legs mod kyi phyi ma ches legs ste <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5633"">phyir mi ldog pa 'khor lo'i mdo</rs> las
column2: <abbr>bcom ldan</abbr> 'das kyis kun dga' bo la khyod song la dge slong dag bos shig gsung nas des de dag bsdus pa

column1: <lb n=""52b2""/>dang
column2: <abbr>bcom ldan</abbr> 'das kyis rgyal byed 'tshal du chu sngo la dang pa sprul nas ji ltar dge slong dag chu ma yin pa la chur 'du shes skyed pa de <abbr>bzhin</abbr> du de dag rgyun zhugs nas rang <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr>  kyi bar dang phung po lnga ma yin pa la phung por 'du shes pa dag ste zhes pa nas
column3: kun dga' po ngas khyod la dad pas rjes su 'brang pa dang chos kyi rjes su 'brang pa dang brgyad pa dang lan 1 phyir 'ong pa dang

column1: <lb n=""52b3""/>phyir mi 'ong pa dang dgra bcom pa dang rang <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> su bstan pa bshad par bya'o

kun dga' bo snyigs ma lngar skyes ba'i <abbr>sems can</abbr> dman pa la mos pa de <abbr>dag gi</abbr> ched du de <abbr>bzhin</abbr> gshegs pa thabs 'dis <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi chos bstan to zhes de dag du 'jog pa'i rgyu mtshan mang du gsungs pa <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes 'chad do

1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-50,unreviewed,53b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""53b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-11-50"" status=""unreviewed"">
dbye na re re zhing chung ngu ? 'bri dang chen po 3 3 yod pa rnaMs so

1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-12-201,finalized,54a6 - 54a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""54a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-201"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha 1</rs> ces pa'i gzhung 'di dag la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba chen po</rs>'i zhal snga nas bzod pa 'bring gi gnas skabs kha 1 du ni rgyu'i sgo nas
column2: chos mchog chung ngu'i gnas skabs kha 1 du ni 'bras bu'i sgo nas
column3: bzod pa chung ngu'i gnas skabs kha 1 du ni ngo bo nyid kyi sgo nas
column4: lhag ma dgu'i gnas skabs kha 1 du ni chos nyid kyi rnaM pa'i sgo nas °°°°°°°°° <lb n=""54a7""/> ma <abbr>bzhin</abbr> du 'og nas 'chad pa'i mthong laM dang nges 'byed cha mthun gyi rnaM pa gzhan gyi °° bden pa dang la° kun tu dmigs so zhes shes par bya'o zhes bzhed do
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-58,unreviewed,56b4 - 56b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""56b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-11-58"" status=""unreviewed"">

dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'brom nam <note type=""gloss""/>'go bla ma</rs><!--tentative identiication as 'Bron ston--> na re don dang mi mthun pa kho na <lb n=""56b5""/> yin te rtog pa 'khrul pa 'ba' zhig yin pa'i phyir zhes gsung pa ni ma yin te
column2: rtog pa chos kyi dbyongs las 'khrul ba'i phyir zhes 'god na ma nges ste
column3: sngo 'dzin tshad mas kun rdzob tu don dang mi mthun par thal te chos kyi dbyings la 'khrul ba'i phyir ro

column1: rtags tshad ma khyab pa khas blangs 'dod na tshad ma yin pa shes so
<lb n=""56b6""/>gnas lugs la 'khrul ba rtags su 'god na ma grub po
column3: gal te grub na 'di dag spong pa la gzung 'dzin gyis stong pa'i chos nyid rtogs m'i dgos par 'gyur te
column4: kun rdzob shes pa'i tshad mas spong pa'i phyir thag pa la sbrul 'dzin no
column6: 'dod na mthong pa dang bsgom pas spang par bya ba'i zhes pas bsal ba'o
column8: gzhan yang kuns skon dang rnaM byang

column1: <lb n=""56b7""/>dag kyang kuns ston dang rnaM byang ma yin par 'gyur te gzung rtog 2 kyis de dag du rtog pa'i phyir ro
column3: rtags rang rig gis grub cing khyab pa ma grub na don dang mi mthun pa shaMs la 'dod na de dag yin pas bsalo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-12-01,unreviewed,57a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""57a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-01"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7338"">spyan chen po</rs> na re sbyor laM mnyam bzhag na rtog pa gang yang med kyi rjes thob na yod la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-12-06,finalized,87b1 - 87b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""87b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-06"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6949"">jo bo a du la</rs> na re <abbr>nyon mongs</abbr> pa la nus pa <abbr>bzhi</abbr> ste
column2: sdug bsngal skyed pa dang
column3: gnyen po yis kyi gegs byed pa dang
column4: srid pa'i lus 'dzin pa dang
column5: rigs mthun phyi ma skyed pa'o

column1: de la dang po 2 byang chub <abbr>sems dpa'</abbr> la mi mkho bas spong la phyi ma 2 mkho bas <lb n=""87b2""/>mi spong ste nyes pa mi skyed pa'i phyir sngags kyis bcom pa'i dug <abbr>bzhin</abbr> no zhes zer ro
de dgag pa la 3 ste
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-293,finalized,88b2 - 88b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""88b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-11-293"" status=""finalized"">dang po ni
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre chen
<lb n=""88b3""/> po</rs>'i zhal nas mdo dang bstan bcos nas laM shes nyid bshad pa yin pas 'dir yang nyan thos kyi laM dang
column2: tshul ji ltar shes par byed pa 2 kyis shes par bya'o

column1: dang po bden pa 4 la rnaM pa mi rtag laswo <abbr>bcu drug</abbr> gang zag gi bdag med par mthong pa dang de goms par byed pa'i laM 2 yin la
column2: de 'dra ba rang rgyal ba dang byang chub <abbr>sems dpa'i</abbr> rgyud la skyes kyang nyan thos kyi laM du <abbr>bzhag go</abbr>

column1: <lb n=""88b4""/>2 pa ni sbyor ba'i dus su byang chub mchog tu <abbr>sems can</abbr> bskyed pa dang
column2: dngos gzhi mi rtag pa 'swo pa bden par mi dmigs pa dang
column3: rjes dge ba'i rtsa ba zla na med pa'i byang chub du bsngo ba'i seMs kyis zin pa'o zhes 'dod do

column1: de ni ma yin te
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-294,finalized,89b8 - 90a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""89b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-11-294"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre chen po</rs> ltar laM shes la sbyar nas kyang bshad de
column2: shes par bya zhes pa khyad par gyi gzhi yin la
column3: de'i khyad par gyi chos la gang dang
column4: gang gis dang
column5: ji ltar shes par bya ba'o

column1: dang po ni nyan thos laM 'di'o
column3: de nyid gang zhe na 'phags pa'i bden pa dang dag gi rnaM pa rtogs pa'o
column5: 2 pa ni laM shes nyid kyis so
column7: <lb n=""89b9""/>3 pa ni rnaM pa mi <choice><reg>dmigs</reg><orig>rig→dmigs</orig></choice> pa'i sgo nas so

column1: 'grel par khyad par gyi gzhi dang
column2: khyad par gyi chos so

column1: dang po ni de ltar yongs su shes par bya'o zhes pa'o
2 pa la gang shes par bya ba dang
column2: ji ltar shes par bya ba dang
column3: skabs gang du shes par bya ba dang
column4: rang <abbr>bzhin</abbr> cir shes par bya ba dang
column5: gang zag gang gis shes par byed pa rnaMs ni de la dang ngo bo nyid dang
column6: laM shis nyid dang ¦ nyan <pb n=""90a""/><lb n=""90a1""/> thos dang
column7: byang chub ces yang rnaMs rim pa <abbr>bzhin</abbr> no

column1: 2 pa nges 'byed cha mthun la bden pa dang zhes pa <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pas 'tshaM sbyar nas
column2: byang chub <abbr>sems dpa'i</abbr> nges pa byed cha mthun bden pa <abbr>bzhi</abbr> ngo bo dang khyad par gyis stong par rtogs pa'i nang du nyan thos kyis nges byed cha mthun 'dus pa la de'i nges 'byed cha mthun zhes brjod do
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-12-062,finalized,91b2 - 91b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""91b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-062"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6949"">jo bo a du la</rs> ltar na gzung pa bden pa med par shes pas saM
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">bla ma

column1: <lb n=""91b3""/> 'bum pa</rs> ltar na de snang tshod du yang med par shes pas gsung don rtog pa spong pa'i phyir dang
column2: snga ma ltar na 'dzin pa bden pa'i rang 4n med par ma shes pas saM
column3: phyi ma ltar na 'dzin pa snang tshod du yang med par ma shes pas 'dzin pa'i rtog pa mi spong pa'i phyir
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-12-202,finalized,98b3 - 93b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""98b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-202"" status=""finalized"">'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5838""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> 'phags pa</rs> ltar na ched du bya ba gzhan gyi don du dngos su rang don dang rang gzhan 2 ka'i don dang gzhan don 'bas zhig sgrub pa las rim pa <abbr>bzhin</abbr> du rang don dang
column2: 2 don <lb n=""98b4""/> dang
column3: gzhan don gyi mos pa 3 du phye bar bshad la
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> lo tsha ba</rs> ni <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3746"">mdo sde rgyan</rs> las
column5: <quote><lg><l>phal cher don med don yod dang
column7: </l> <l>rnaM kun don yod shes bya ste</l></lg></quote> zhes pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas chos mchog man chad dang sa dang po nas bdun pa'i bar dang dag pa sa 3 rang don dang 2 don dang gzhan don gyi mos pa zhes bzhed pa ni
column8: 'di nas bya ba 'di ni bsgom pa'i laM zhes pa <lb n=""93b5""/> dang <abbr>'gal lo</abbr>

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-12-11,unreviewed,116a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""116a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-12-11"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7338"">ma la <note type=""gloss"">bzad pa</note></rs> na re yon tan rdzas 1 nyid bshad tshig gis rgyu sbyor ba las 'byung ldog nas bstan la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012024-11-08-11-295,finalized,128a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""128a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012024-11-08-11-295"" status=""finalized""> 'grel par bcu 2 po 'di dag la
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre chen po</rs> na re rmi laM gyi rtags dang po 4 dang drug pa ste lnga dang 2 ka'i lnga pa dang bdun pa 2 dang
column2: gnyid ma log pa'i phyi ma lnga <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes 'chad do

column1: 1_015_01_ 'Od zer mgon po _ mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par 'byed pa'i 'grel ba.xml,1_015_01,,ex15012023-09-15-113344,finalized,148a9 - 148b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""148a9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex15012023-09-15-113344"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (185a2-4)""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4580"">blo gros kyi mun pa sel bar byed pa chos kyi sgron ma</rs> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">ri bo gangs can kyi rgyud</rs> du byung pa
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> rje °°° khri thog bzang gi rigs las gzhon nu la rab tu byung pa
column3: bslab pa la ces spras su byed bde °°°
column4: <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi bstan pa la ma byed pa'i dad pa can
column6: lung dang rigs pa'i bstan <pb n=""148b""/><lb n=""148b1""/> bcos <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4580""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">mngon rtogs rgyan</rs> gyi 'grel pa</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3893"">slob dpon 'od zer mgon po</rs>s sbyar ba rdzogs so

1_027_01_bSod nams dpal_ sher phyin rnam bshad lam gyi rim pa snang ba.xml,1_027_01,,ex2701_2024-09-1114-33-12,unreviewed,90a4 - 90a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""90a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex2701_2024-09-1114-33-12"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4659"">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711"">mngon par <abbr>rtoGS</abbr> pa'i rgyan 'grel pa</rs> bcas pa'i rnaM bshad laM gyi rim pa snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba 'di <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">thams cad mkhyen pa 2 pa graGS pa rgya mtsho</rs>'i<anchor xml:id=""a2""/> <lb n=""90a5""/> zhabs gdul [=rdul] spyi bos len cing lung riGS kyi chos la <abbr>blo gros</abbr> cung zhig rgyas pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3927"">lum bu ba bsod naMs dpal</rs> gyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5658"">'tshal gung thang gi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs>r <anchor xml:id=""a3""/> sbyar ba ni re shig rdzogs s+ho

4_119_01.xml,4_119_01,,ex119012024-11-2216-48-49,unreviewed,111a1 - 111a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""111a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex119012024-11-2216-48-49"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""> <milestone n=""colophon"" unit=""section""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5495""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3761"">mngon pa mdzod</rs> kyi rnam bshad gsal ba'i sgron me</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ¦ rigs rus yon tan du <lb n=""111a2""/> ma'i dpal gyis mngon par mtho bar gyur cing sde snod 'dzin pa chen po yang dag pa yongs kyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6981"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen dge 'dun mgon</rs> gyis bskul ba'i ngor dang ¦ don du gnyer ba du ma la phan pa'i  <lb n=""111a3""/>   phyir  du ¦ mngon pa'i sde snod la cud 'dris shing ¦ khams gsum chos kyi rgyal po <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4008"">bka' bzhi pa rin chen sangs rgyas mgon</rs> dang ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4080"">lo ts+tsha ba skyabs mchog dpal bzang po</rs>'i gsung gi bdud rtsi <lb n=""111a4""/> myangs pa ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4129"">zha lu pa rin chen bsod nams 'phel</rs> zhes bya bas lcags mo yos kyi lo'i zla ba dang po'i tshes gcig la rdzogs par bris pa'o
'dis bstan pa dang sems can la phan thogs <lb n=""111a5""/> par gyur cig
column5: </seg></TEI>"

1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex19082023-03-0908-24-527,unreviewed,3a4 - 3a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-24-527"" status=""unreviewed"">bsdus don gyis <lb n=""3a4""/><abbr>'bras bu</abbr> bshad yin ¦ nas ni ces pa mtshams sbyor gyi tshig ste bya ba gzhan 'dren par byed pa yin la / de yang phyag gi yul klu sgrub de yis mdzad pa'i dbu ma rtsa ba'i tshig le'ur byas pa'i 'grel pa bya ces sbyor ro
column3: ci 'dra cig byed ce na ¦ khyad par bzhi ldan ste ¦ tshig mtshams 'byor zhing don gsal bas slu ba dang ¦ sdeb sbyor gyi gtsug lag dang mthun zhing khyad par<lb n=""3a5""/> gyi gzhi ngag don khags pa dang ¦ dbu ma'i don ¦ chos rnaMs la bden par rtog pa'i rlung gis ma dkrugs pa dang / tshig gi <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> gnyer ba dang don gyi mtshams sbyor lasogs bshad dgos pa mi 'chad pa ma yin te legs par 'chad pa dang ¦ gzhung mthong pa tsam gyis don go bas bshad mi dgos pa mi 'chad pa dang ¦ rtsa ba mkhan po'i dgongs pa mi 'chad pa ma <lb n=""3a6""/> yin te legs par 'chad pa dang ¦ de las gzhan skabs su ma bab pa 'chad pa ma yin te skabs su bab pa nyid 'chad pa dang / brjod bya'i gtso bo la mi sbyor ba ma yin skabs kyi brjod bya ngos bzung nas ston pas ¦ rab tu gsal ba cig bya'o ces pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> gi'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex19082023-03-0908-24-528,unreviewed,3a6 - 3a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-24-528"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> 'them sbyor sngar bzhin la khyad par gyi chos ni ¦ ci 'dra cig byed ce na gsal ba <lb n=""3a7""/> cig bya'o ces sbyar ste de yang tshig gsal ba slu zhing bsdeb legs ngag gis sbyar ba don gsal ba rtog ges rlang gis ma dkrugs pa'o ces pa ni legs bshad do

1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex19082023-03-0908-48-24,unreviewed,4b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-48-24"" status=""unreviewed"">bstan bya bzhir grangs nges pa'i rgyu mtshan ni ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">'ga' zhig</rs> na re bstan bcos la mdzad pa po'i khyad par lasogs yon tan mang po yod pa'i phyir dgos 'brel bzhir grangs nges pa med do zhe na
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex19082023-03-0908-37-39,unreviewed,5b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0908-37-39"" status=""unreviewed"">de ltar 'gyur ba des gong gi tu ga'i ga dang zhabs kyu mi mngon par ta rkyang par 'gyur la de 'og gi ya sta dang sbrel bas rgya ces par 'gyur te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> gi'o

1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex19082023-03-0909-02-13,unreviewed,25b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19082023-03-0909-02-13"" status=""unreviewed"">gal te 'jig rten grags pa'i tshad ma de nyid dbu ma thal 'gyur ba khyod kyis kyang gtan la dbab dgos te / rang rgyud pa kho bo cag gis kyang tshad ma dang gzhal bya'i tha snyad 'jig rten la grags pa 'di' <lb n=""25b3""/>bstan bcos su brjod pa yin no snyam na ¦</seg></TEI>"

1_019_08 dbu ma rtsa ba’i ’grel pa tshig gsal gyi bshad pa nges don rnam par gzigs pa.xml,1_019_08,,ex1908202302281313,unreviewed,32b3 - 32b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""32b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1908202302281313"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4610""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3724""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">dbu ma rtsa ba</rs>'i 'grel pa tshig gsal ba</rs>'i bshad pa nges don rnaM par gzigs pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di la tshig gi <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> bshad pa dang ¦ gzhung ngag don du 'chad pa dang ¦ khyad par gyi <lb n=""32b4""/> gzhi bsdus te 'them sbyor du bshad pa dang ¦ ngag don gyis mtshams sbyar te gzhung rtags sbyor gyi khongs su bsdus te bshad pa dang
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">rtsa ba mdo</rs> dang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5826"">dgongs 'grel gyi bstan bcos</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:7338"">de 'chad byed kyi Ti ka</rs> rnams dgongs pa cig tu ston pas thub pa'i bstan pa'i yan lag tu 'brel par 'chad pas
column4: 'chad pa po gzhan dang thun mong ma yin pa 'di ni thub pa'i chos kyi 'khor <lb n=""32b5""/> lo rim gsuM bskor nas lnga brgya phrag bdun pas lhag pa na
column5: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4326"">ma ga da rdo rje'i gdan pa</rs>s byang phyogs su dpag tshad brgya bsgrod pa'i gnas su shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byang phyogs su dar par 'gyur ro  zhes lung bstan pa ltar grub pa na lung dang rigs pa'i de kho na nyid khong du chud nas smra ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">shag kya'i dge slong shes rab 'buM</rs> gyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5572"">brag raM gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar <lb n=""32b6""/> ba'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4612"">sdom tshig gsal byed don gsal</rs> 'di
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6859"">blo gsal don grub bkra shis</rs> kyis bskul nas
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">shakya'i dge slong shes <lb n=""8a5""/>rab 'bum</rs> gyis sbyar ba'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_09_Shes rab bum_dul ba sdom tshig bsdus don gsal byed me long.xml,1_019_09,,ex19092024-09-2415-26-29,unreviewed,8a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19092024-09-2415-26-29"" status=""unreviewed""> dge'o
bkrashis par gyur cig
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6042"">sangs brgyas bzang po</rs>'i slab bya go bder bris pa pa
