column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022025-01-0814-32-313,finalized,1b1 - 1b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022025-01-0814-32-313"" status=""finalized"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Introductory verses (1b1-2)""/>
<l>rgyal sras myu gu byang chub sems
<l>gzhan don spyod pas legs bsrungs pa'i
<l>'bras bu rdzogs pa rang gzhan don
<l><lb n=""1b2""/> lhun grub sku la gus pas 'dud
<l><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4625"">mdo sde kun las btus pa'i don</rs>
<l><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4625"">gsal byed nyi ma'i snying po</rs> 'di
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3876""><abbr>ye shes</abbr></rs> dang ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus</rs> kyi
<l>mying ×can gsung bzhin legs bshad brtsam
</seg></TEI>"

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2024-10-02-12-45,reviewed,1b5 - 1b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2024-10-02-12-45"" status=""reviewed""> dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsha ba</rs></note> na re chos <lb n=""1b6""/> nyan pa la spro ba bskyed pa ni
column4: chos <choice><corr>kyi</corr><sic>kya</sic></choice> rang bzhin bzang pa dang
column5: nyan pa po skal ba dang ldan par brjod pa'i sgo nas te
column6: dang po ni 'bras bu mi 'dod pa spong pa dang
column7: 'dod pa sgrub pa'i bdag nyid do

column1: de'i yang dang po ni sdug ×bsngal gyi ngo bo dang
column2: de'i rgyu spong pa gnyis kyis te
column3: dang po ni gang ma thos pas ces pa yin la
column5: <lb n=""1b7""/> de yang chos ma thos na 'di lta bu'i nyes pa 'byung zhes shes dmigs dngos su brjod pas shugs kyis thos na sdug  bsngal spong par bstan ste
column6: des na de ni mnyan phyir nus pas skyed ces pa ni skabs kyi don to

column1: gnyis pa ni gang thos nas kyang ces pa yin no
'dod pa sgrub pa ni bde ba las ni ces pa yin la
column2: chos kyi rang bzhin bzung pa ni shin tu <lb n=""1b8""/> snyed dka'i ces pa yin zhing
column3: nyan pa po skal ba dang ldan bar brjod pa ni dam thob ces pa'o

column1: de ltar gsum gyis nye bar gnas pa'i skye bo dag chos nyan par spos ba bsgrubs nas
column2: nye bar mi gnas pa rjes su bzung pa ni khams gsum ces pa yin no
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2024-10-08-15-12,reviewed,5b1 - 5b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2024-10-08-15-12"" status=""reviewed""> de lta yin dang 'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3809"">jo btsun khyung</rs></note> na re dal ba dang 'byor pa ni tha dad pa ni ma yin te
column2: mi khom pa brgyad las log pa yang de'i rang gi 'byor pa lnga las gzhan ma yin pa'i phyir dang
column3: gnas la dad pa yang bsam pa yin pas lus kyi rten du bsdu bar mi 'thad <lb n=""5b2""/> pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr>

column1: des na 'dir dal 'byor ni 'grel pa byed pas mi khom pa brgyad spangs te khom ldan zhes bshad pa ltar yin la de nyid lung gzhan gyis phun sum 'tshogs pa ×bcur bshad pa yang yod do zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2025-01-08-423,finalized,9a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2025-01-08-423"" status=""finalized""> 'di <abbr>gnyis</abbr> kyi khyad par ni rim pa ltar <abbr>sems can</abbr> gyi don du chos sku thob par 'dod pa dang
column2: gzugs kyi sku thob par 'dod par 'ste <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo chen po</rs>'i gsung dang mthun pa <abbr>yin no</abbr>
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2025-01-08429,finalized,10b5 - 10b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""10b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2025-01-08429"" status=""finalized"">de ni zhes bya ba la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">kha 1</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3805"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">zhang</rs></note> seMs bskyed pa'i rgyal <lb n=""10b6""/> ba'i
blo gros lasogs pa mos pa ma rdzogs par ma grub ste mos pa chen po pa yin zhes rtog pa'i lan du sbyar te mos pa chen po pa de ni dkon mchog sprin gyi mdo las
column2: las 'di lta bu'i yon tan <abbr>drug gi</abbr> chos dang ldan bar gsungs pas ngan song du song pa'i rgyal ba'i blo gros lasogs pa dang <abbr>'gal lo</abbr>
column4: zhes sbyar bas <abbr>'chad do</abbr>
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2025-01-081,reviewed,11b7 - 11b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2025-01-081"" status=""reviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">blo gros chen po dag</rs> <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsha ba</rs> 'di 'gro ba 'dod dang
'gro ba yis
column2: ces pa'i tshul gyis 'gro ba'i bya ba la dmigs pa'i blo rnam pa 2 po 'gro ba'i bya ba nyams su ma myong pa'i dus na yod pa'i dod pa tsam dang
column3: 'gro ba'i bya ba mngon du gyur pa'i dbye ba tha dad pa ltar
column4: byang chub la dmigs pa'i blo 2 kyang smon pa <lb n=""11b8""/> ni yul nyaMs su ma myong pa'i dus kyi 'dod pa tsam yin la
column5: 'jug pa ni dmigs yul byang chub nyaMs su myong pa'i dus na yin pas de mthong laM skyes pa na yin te
column6: des na smon pa ni yang dag pa blangs pa brda' las thob pa yin la
column7: 'jug pa ni chos nyid kyis thob pa <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2024-10-02-13-18,finalized,12a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2024-10-02-13-18"" status=""finalized"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3805"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">zhang</rs></note> byang chub dang <abbr>sems can</abbr> la dmigs pa'i bsam pa ni smon pa yin la bsgrub pa dang 'brel laM ma 'brel yang sla ste
column2: des <abbr>kun nas</abbr> bslang nas rgyu spyod pa nyaMs su len pa'i bsaM pa ni 'jug pa <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2024-10-02-13-42,finalized,12a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2024-10-02-13-42"" status=""finalized"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3745""> slob dpon

kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3745"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">jo bo rje</rs></note> na re 'jug pa dang sdom pa ni <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du du yin ces gsung ste gzhung gi dgongs pa 'ang de nyid yin par <abbr>sems so</abbr>

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2025-01-08444,reviewed,16a8 - 16b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2025-01-08444"" status=""reviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsha ba</rs> ni tshe rabs gzhan du sdoM brtson gyi 'du shes <pb n=""16b""/><lb n=""16b1""/> nyaMs pa na 'gal zla spyad kyang sdoM pa mi gtong ste
column5: <quote source=""db:3764"" n=""63b4""><lg><l>sdoM brtson sdoM brtson nyid du 'du shes na
column7: </l> <l>dngos gzhi min na ltung pa chung dang ldan

column1: zhes gsungs pa <abbr>bzhin no</abbr>
bsrung pa'i sems dpa' med pas sdoM pa'i bya ba yang mi byed de
column3: des na thal bas g.yogs pa'i me zhan du gnas so zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2025-01-08434,finalized,34b6 - 34b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""34b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2025-01-08434"" status=""finalized"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i rjes su 'brang pa kha 1</rs> na re bdag stod gzhan la smod pa 2 dang
column2: <lb n=""34b7""/> chos dang nor mi ster ba 2 dang

column1: bzod pa mi len pa dang gzhan 'tshog pa 2 dang
column2: theg chen spong pa dang chos ltar snang

column1: pa brjod pa 2 te dngos su bshad pa brgyad dang
column2: don gyis go mnyan thos kyi rtsa ba'i

column1: nyes pa na ste bcu 2 <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022024-10-2514-47-21,finalized,54a4 - 54a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022024-10-2514-47-21"" status=""finalized""><lb n=""54a4""/> gzhan yang sa ma thob pa la byas na gzhan la ni
ma <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes bya ba'i gzhan gyi sgra'i don sa thob pa dang pha rol tu phyin pa drug la
mi spyod pa la 'gro bas don ma 'brel par 'gyur ba dang
column2: lab ta 'buM mi zhes bya ba'i skad

column1: la dgag pa'i tshig med pas sa ma thob par byed pa 'khrul pa kho na'o zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha 1</rs> 'chad do
'on kyang 'dir pha rol phyin drug spyod pa zhes bya ba khyad par nye bar <lb n=""54a5""/> bzung pa dang
column2: sngar brjod pa'i gzhung gzhan la brten nas kyang 'di ni sa ma thob

column1: pa'i dbang du byas pa'o zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kho bo</rs>s rtogs te
column2: mig dang mi ldan ba'i rtogs pa la su

column1: zhig yid rtod par byed zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3876"">nyang bran</rs> 'chad do

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022025-01-082,reviewed,60n5 - 60b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60n5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022025-01-082"" status=""reviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs></note> 'di la ha cang ma 'brel te
column2: thos pa la brtson 'grus ma brtsaMs na gang zhig chud za bar 'gyur ba'i thos

column1: pa nyid med pa'i phyir dang
column2: des na lung yang ma 'brel bar 'gyur ba'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr>
column4: des na 'di ni <note type=""gloss"">'ga' zhig gis °° par zad pas</note> de lta <lb n=""60b6""/> thos pa dang ldan pa'i sems sbyang pa'i phyir dgon pa la gnas par bya'o
column6: gzhan du na de'i thos pa chud za bar 'gyur te zhes gong du sbyar na <abbr>legs so</abbr> zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha 1</rs> 'chad do

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022025-01-084,reviewed,60b6 - 60b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022025-01-084"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">gnyal pa zhang tshes</rs></note> ni thos pas mtshon pa'i dge ba gzhan la yang brtson 'grus rtsom ste
column2: gzhan la brtson 'grus ma brtsams na thos pa la brtson 'grus brtsaMs kyang ngan song na thos pas skyob mi nus pas thos ba <lb n=""60b7""/> dam bar 'gyur zhes  'chad do
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022025-01-085,finalized,60b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022025-01-085"" status=""finalized"">

yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7034"">gser gyi go cha</rs></note> na re gzhan du na zhes pa ni bzod pa la gnas pa las gzhan yin la
column2: tshul khrims mi srung pas kyang bzod pa la mi gnas pa mtshon pa yin pas lung ma 'brel par yang mi 'gyur ro zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022025-01-086,reviewed,60b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022025-01-086"" status=""reviewed""> <note><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">zhang</rs> na re</note>'di la yang ma yin te
column2: bzod pa la <lb n=""60b8""/> gnas nas zhes pa ni bshad zin pa'i mtshaMs sbyor yin pas gtso bo'i don ma yin pa'i phyir dang
column3: bzod pa la mi gnas ni thos pa nyid mi 'grub pa'i phyir te
column4: de thos pa'i sngon du

column1: 'gro bar sngar bshad zin pa'i phyir ro

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022025-01-087,reviewed,60b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022025-01-087"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bod</rs></note> na re <note type=""gloss"">gzad pa dbang dor</note> thos pa'i don bsgom pa la brtson 'grus rtsom ste zhes bya ba yin pas ma 'brel par mi 'gyur ro zhes 'chad do

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex212-2024-10-02-15-33,finalized,60b9 - 61a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60b9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex212-2024-10-02-15-33"" status=""finalized""> yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kha 1</rs>
<note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:7033"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">stag lo</rs></note> don dang bcas pa'i <choice><reg>bstan bcos</reg><orig>bstan bcos</orig></choice> lasogs
pa thos pa byas pa la brtson 'grus rtsoM <pb n=""61a""/><lb n=""61a1""/>
column2: ste zhes bya ba'i don yin pas nyes pa <abbr>med do</abbr> zhes zer ba

column1: yang mi 'thad de
column3: don dang bcas pa'i bstan bcos mnyan par bya'o zhes 'og nas 'chad pa dang zlos par 'gyur ba'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr>

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022025-01-0817-00-56,finalized,91a4 - 91a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""91a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022025-01-0817-00-56"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Closing verses (91a4-6)""/>
<lg><l><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3742"">mdo sde kun las btus pa</rs>'i don
<l><rs type=""place"">kha ba can</rs> du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3876"">nyang gi bran</rs>
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3876"">chos kyi spyan</rs> gyis legs bshad pa'i
<l><lb n=""91a5""/> rjes 'brangs khyad par <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3911"">gzhon nu</rs>s bkod

1_021_02_ gZhon nu rin chen_bslab pa kun las btus pa’i Tik+ka.xml,1_021_02,,ex21022023-09-181,finalized,91a6 - 91a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""91a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex21022023-09-181"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (91a6-8)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4625""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3742"">mdos sde kun las btus pa</rs>'i ti ka mdo' nyi ma'i snying po</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: thugs kyi me long yongs <lb n=""91a7""/> su dag pa la byang chub kyi sems rgya chen po × snang zhing dben pa'i gnas la thugs gzhol ba mtshan nas brjod par dka' ba'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6392"">slob dpon dbang phyug rin chen</rs> zhes bya ba'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos blangs nas
column3: mkhas pa'i skye bo chen po lung dang rigs pa la rtogs pa'i snang pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3876"">chos kyi <abbr>ye shes</abbr></rs> zhes bya <lb n=""91a8""/> ba dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> zhes bya ba'i legs par bshad pa la sgro skur gnyis dang bral bar smra ba
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3911"">shag kya'i dge slong gzhon nu rin chen</rs> gyis legs par sbyar ba
column12: bkra shis par gyur gcig
column14: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_086_02 dpal bzang_chos mngon mdzod rnam bshad.xml,3_086_02,,ex8602_202409182,unreviewed,95a7 - 95a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8602_202409182"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon ""/>

<lb n=""95a7""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5283"">rnam bshad</rs> 'di ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">tshig nyung dus gzhung gi don rgyas par rtogs par 'dod pa</rs> <abbr>dag gis</abbr> yang dang yang du bskul nas
column2: ° brtson dam pa mkhas pa'i <abbr>mchog grub</abbr> pa mnyed pa'i skyes bu <abbr>chen po</abbr>
column4: snyan po dra gsung phyogs bcur ‹'ba'›phrog pa
column5: rnam par dag cing lhun gyis grub pa'i <abbr>'phrin las</abbr> kyi bskal pa dang ldan pa rnams kyi <abbr>rnam par</abbr> 'dren pa
column6: mtshangs <!--em: mtshungs--> pa med pa
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">yang dag pa'i dge ba'i <abbr>bshes gnyen</abbr> <abbr>smon lam</abbr></rs> gyi mtshan <lb n=""95a8""/>dam pa'i zhabs rdul spyi bos yang dag par len pa
column8: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6029"">shAkya'i dge slong <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> ston dpal bzang po</rs>s sbyar ba
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_086_02 dpal bzang_chos mngon mdzod rnam bshad.xml,3_086_02,,ex8602_202409183,unreviewed,95a8 - 95a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""95a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8602_202409183"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
sde snod mgnon pa mi'i sde bdun dang
column2: <abbr>bye brag</abbr> bshad mdzod nying khu lta bu yin
column3: mngon mdzod gzhung don bde blag rtogs bya'i phyir
column4: rnam bshad nying khu pa'i 'od 'dra 'di
column5: rang dang gzhan la phan phyir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:6029"">bdag</rs> gis bzhengs
column6: dge gshegs daM chos 'di dang mi 'bral zhing
column7: 'gro ba °°<lb n=""95a9""/>° mthug <abbr>rnam mkhyen</abbr> pa la 'god par shog

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">mkhan chen pa</rs>'i phyag dpe 'di
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5284"">dbyang dpal</rs> gyi legs par bris pa 'di dge zhing <abbr>bkra shis</abbr> par 'gyur gcig
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_22 shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i man ngag.xml,2_050_22,,ex50222023-09-131,unreviewed,6b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50222023-09-131"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4888"">sher phyin gyi man ngag gi spyi khrigs laM gsal ba'i me tog</rs> ces bya ba zab pa'i don <lb n=""6b4""/> bstan pa rdzogs s+ho
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">gnyan</rs><!--<note type=""editorial"">Maybe <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4035"">gNyan shes rab dpal</rs>, a teacher of <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3977"">mChims</rs></note>--> gyi dpe la{s} <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">slob dpon chen po snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs>s <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">smon laM tshul khriMs</rs></note> bris pa de la<!--read: las--><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458"">btsun pa <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458"">ze'u</rs></note> chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis bris shing zhus te dag par byas pa'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_22 shes rab kyi pha rol phyin pa'i man ngag.xml,2_050_22,,ex50222023-09-202,unreviewed,6b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50222023-09-202"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">snar thang gyi dben gnas</rs> su <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">bla ma</rs>'i phyag dpe la<!--read: las--> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458"">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> gyi<!--read: gyis--> bris pa'o

1_019_06_F_C_NO_M_Anonymous_bden chung bum_etext_C.xml,1_019_06,,ex19062023-07-2412-53-31,unreviewed,6a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19062023-07-2412-53-31"" status=""unreviewed"">myed kyang gzhan don rgyun mi 'chad cing lhun <lb n=""6a8""/> gyis grub par 'byung yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">dge bshes ston pa</rs> gsungs pa bzhin yin

1_019_06_F_C_NO_M_Anonymous_bden chung bum_etext_C.xml,1_019_06,,ex19062023-07-2412-53-56,unreviewed,6a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19062023-07-2412-53-56"" status=""unreviewed""/></TEI>"

1_019_06_F_C_NO_M_Anonymous_bden chung bum_etext_C.xml,1_019_06,,ex19062023-07-2412-53-22,unreviewed,6b8 - 7a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19062023-07-2412-53-22"" status=""unreviewed"">tha snyad dang de'i gzhi dag gis mtshon pa'i chos nyid rang bzhin skye ba myed pa de la don dam pa zhe bya
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3829"">pu to ba</rs>'i zhal nas bden pa gnyis sprags klungs bzhin du spangs pa yin pa la
column3: rang cag nyin srib la 'byar ba bzhin du song nas <pb n=""7A""/><?oxy_comment_start comment=""bdun""?><?oxy_comment_end?> <lb n=""7a1""/> $$
column5: kun rdzob du las 'bras lasogs pa yod yas tsa na rdzas su 'dzin
column6: don dam pa stong byas tsa na kun rdzob kyi las 'bras la yang skur pa 'debs
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">slob dpon</rs> pas kun rdzob bya ba phu byas pas yal nas 'gro ba tsam zhig tu gsung te
column8: rang cag la ye gting tshugs pa <lb n=""7a2""/> bzhin du 'dug na gsung pa'o
column10: <quote xml:id=""d2e839"">[dam pa'i don ni gcig nyid de
column12: gzhan dag rnam pa gnyis su 'dod
column13: cir yang ma grub chos nyid de
column15: gnyis dang gsum sog ga la 'gyur
column19: ]<anchor xml:id=""a18""/></quote></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_06_F_C_NO_M_Anonymous_bden chung bum_etext_C.xml,1_019_06,,ex19062023-07-2412-53-41,unreviewed,7a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19062023-07-2412-53-41"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3829"">dge bshes ston pa</rs> dang </seg></TEI>"

1_019_06_F_C_NO_M_Anonymous_bden chung bum_etext_C.xml,1_019_06,,ex19062023-07-2412-58,unreviewed,14a4 - 14a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19062023-07-2412-58"" status=""unreviewed"">bden pa gnyis thabs dang thabs las byung ba nyid du lung gzhan gyis kyang sgrub pa ni
column2: kun rdzob ces pa ste
column3: 'di ni 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshogs dag la bya ste
column4: kun rdzob yang dag pa <lb n=""14a4""/> zhes bya ces <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">dge bshes ston pa</rs> gsung ba lags par gda'
column6: de'i skas myed par don dam rtogs pa mthar phyin pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi steng du mi phyin ces pa las
column7: lam gyi rtogs pa nyid du skye ba shes rab kyis don dam pa'i bden pa bsgoms pa las skye ste
column8: <lb n=""14a5""/> de nyid la tha snyad brjod pa'i bdag nyid dang thabs thams cad dgos pa sngar bstan pa bzhin du yin la
column9: skye myed sgom pa la bde' 'gro'i rten thob dgos la de la yang thabs kyi cha dag dgos te

column1: 1_019_06_F_C_NO_M_Anonymous_bden chung bum_etext_C.xml,1_019_06,,ex19062023-07-2412-59,unreviewed,16a5 - 16a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19062023-07-2412-59"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (16a5–16a7)""/>
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag</rs> gis brjed byang 'di bris pas
mtha' yas sems can ma lus kun
lta bas rmongs par ma gyur cing
<lb n=""16a6""/> spyod pa shin tu dag 'gyur te
gol ba'i lam du mi 'gyur zhing
'og myin gnas su 'gro bar shog

column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag</rs> kyang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma</rs>'i bka' drin gyis

column1: sa rab dga' ba thob bar du
stong dang snying rje brtan pa dang
<lb n=""16a7""/> bdag dang gzhan du brje bar shog
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4605"">bden chung gi 'bum</rs>
column2: rdzogs s+ho
column6: rdzogs s+ho

column1: 2_031_02_brTson grus pa _dul ba od ldan gyi TIk+ka.xml,2_031_02,,ex31022024-10-2116-00-36,unreviewed,1b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex31022024-10-2116-00-36"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3765"">mang du thos pa'i slob dpon chen po <lb n=""1b2""/> shag kya 'od</rs> kyis mdzad pa'i
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3766"">'dul ba 'od ldan</rs> la don gsum ste
column4: rtsom pa dang 'brel pa dang
column5: rtse ba'i don dang
column6: 'jug bsngo' ba lasogs pa'i don to

column1: 2_031_02_brTson grus pa _dul ba od ldan gyi TIk+ka.xml,2_031_02,,ex31022024-10-2115-39-58,unreviewed,7b2 - 7b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex31022024-10-2115-39-58"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:"">rgya</rs></note> na re 'debs spyod gnyis ni dge' tshul la bstan bya yin te ma ltos pa'i bsam pas zhugs pas phyogs dang mthun pa'i phyir nags mes gtong pa bzhin <lb n=""7b3""/> no snyam na
de la yang 'di ltar brtag par bya ste mo ltos pa'i bsams pas zhugs pa'i zhes yod de go la ma ltos pa'i bsam pas zer na de nyid kyis gsad sems yod par yang grub pas phyogs mthun du mi 'thad la
column2: nags mes gtong zhes pa'i dper yang ma grub po
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_23_smon_lam_tshul_khrims_jo_bo_man_ngag_W1PD89084-I1KG13419-423-426-any.xml,2_050_23,,ex050232025-05-2016-20-32,reviewed,1a1 - 1a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex050232025-05-2016-20-32"" status=""reviewed""><lb n=""1a1""/>༅
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">mkhas pa chen po dpal mar me mdzad <abbr>ye shes</abbr></rs> kyis sde snod kyi chos <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyi don bsdus ste bsgoM pa ni dbu ma'i man ngag 'di yin te
column5: thog mar 'khor das <lb n=""1a2""/> kyi chos kun rdzob du bden pas stong pa'i rten 'brel rgyu 'bras mi slu ba sgyu ma lta bu dang
column6: don spros bral naM mkha'i dkyil ltar stong pa nyid du thos bsaM gyis thag chod par byas la
column7: bsgoM ba'i

column1: <lb n=""1a3""/> dus su sbyor dngos rjes 3 gyis <abbr>nyams su</abbr> blang ste
column2: </seg></TEI>"

2_053_06 ral gri bden bzhi rgyan me tog BUDA ocr.xml,2_053_06,,ex53062024-10-2516-15-36,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex53062024-10-2516-15-36"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">   <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4932"">bden pa bzhi rnam nga ra bshad pa rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">mang du thos pa shAkya'i dge slong bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5680"">gtsang me tog mdangs can gyi dgon pa</rs>r sbyar ba rdzogs so
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_067_02_BCA_W1PD153536-I1KG13956.xml,3_067_02,,ex67022024-09-1610-30-07,unreviewed,122a5 - 73a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex67022024-09-1610-30-07"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">'di ni <lb edRef=""inst:4711"" n=""122a5""/>bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i blo gros kyis sde snod du ma'i don thugs su chud cing yon tan du ma'i dpal 'byor gyis 'gro ba mang po'i 'dren pa chen por gyur mang po'i 'dren pa chen por gyur pa yongs kyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge ba'i <lb edRef=""inst:5152"" n=""73a5""/>bshes gnyen mkhan po nam <lb edRef=""inst:4711"" n=""122a6""/>mkha' ches</rs> dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mkhan po zhang chos rgyal rin chen</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mkhan po byams pa'i dpal</rs> lasogs pa slob ma dge ba'i bshes gnyen mang pos gsol ba btab pa'i ngor
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4068"">shAkya'i dge slong skad gnyis <lb edRef=""inst:4711"" n=""122a7""/>smra ba blo gros dpal bzang po</rs>s gtso bo che par <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mkhas pa chen po shes rab 'byung gnas <lb edRef=""inst:5152"" n=""73a6""/>blo gros</rs> gyi 'grel pa dang bstun gsal bar bgyis pa'i yi ge pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5802"">dge slong ston pa brtson 'grus seng ge</rs>'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml,2_044_04,,ex44042023-02-2308-02-07,reviewed,9a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44042023-02-2308-02-07"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

de'ang <abbr>rgyu tshogs</abbr> pa las <abbr>bras bu</abbr> 'byung <abbr>rung gi</abbr> rtags <abbr>yin par</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5554"">lha</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5549"">shAg</rs> 'chad pas dgag <abbr>rtags</abbr> pa ba <abbr>yin par</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkhas pa kha <abbr>cig</abbr></rs> gsungs mod ¦</seg></TEI>"

2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml,2_044_04,,ex44042023-02-2308-08-03,reviewed,15b2 - 15b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44042023-02-2308-08-03"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

dang po grub mtha' dang sbyar ba ni ¦<quote source=""db:5564""><!--this is not a literal citation--><rs type=""school"">bye brag tu smra ba</rs> ni ¦ <abbr>gzugs sogs</abbr> thug phrad du snang pa'i don dngos <abbr>bzhugs</abbr>¦ phyi don mthong pa tshad ma ¦ phyi don <abbr>rtogs</abbr> pa <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> smra bas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras <lb n=""15b3""/> rdzas tha dad dus <abbr>mnyam par</abbr> 'dod ¦

<rs type=""school"">mdo sde pa</rs>s ¦ don lkog na mo <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ don dang 'dra bar skyes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> shes pa tshad ma ¦ don <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>btags</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> smra bas <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras rdzas tha dad dus <choice><sic>mnyaM par</sic><corr>tha dad par</corr> </choice> 'dod do

<rs type=""school"">rnaM bden pa</rs>s ¦ bzung ba'i rnaM pa <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ 'dzin pa'i rnaM pa tshad ma ¦ rang rig <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> <lb n=""15b4""/> 'dod pas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad 'bras bde sdug myong ba ltar dus dang <abbr>ngo bo</abbr> <abbr>gcig</abbr> du 'dod do

<rs type=""school"">rnaM brdzun pa</rs>s bzung <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rnaM pa sgro <abbr>btags</abbr> <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> ¦ 'dzin pa'i rnaM pa tshad ma ¦ rang rig <abbr>btags</abbr> pa ba <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> 'dod pas ¦ <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> dang tshad <abbr>'bras skra </abbr>shad snang pa ltar <abbr>gcig</abbr> pa bkag <abbr>pa'i</abbr> tha dad du <abbr>'dod do</abbr></quote> ces <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> <abbr>las gsungs so</abbr> ¦</seg></TEI>"

2_044_04_Dznyanashri_bsdus.xml,2_044_04,,ex44042023-02-0311-17-56,reviewed,15b9 - 16a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44042023-02-0311-17-56"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4767"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">

<rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3770"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tshad ma mdo</rs> <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:5553"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">sde bdun</rs> 'grel pa <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">'grel bshad</rs> bcas <pb n=""16a""/><lb n=""16a1""/>pa'i snying po rigs pa'i de kho na nyid bsdus pa gsal byed nyi ma'i 'od </rs> ces bya ba ni ¦

don du gnyer ba'i slob ma 'gas bskul ba'i ngor ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4017"">shAkya'i dge slong dz+nya Na shri</rs>s ¦ drag po'i lo sa ga zla ba'i dkar phyogs la ¦ <rs type=""place"" ref=""db:6173"">dpal ldan gsang phu'i chos gra</rs>r sbyar ba mchog tu dge <abbr>legs</abbr> su gyur <abbr>cig</abbr>

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-0309-22-52,reviewed,1a1 - 1a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-0309-22-52"" status=""reviewed""><pb n=""1a""/><lb n=""1a1""/> phyi <lb n=""1a2""/>la <lb n=""1a3""/>142<lb n=""1a4""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4476"">yuM bar ma nyi khri'i rnaM bshad</rs></seg></TEI>"

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-0309-24-52,reviewed,1b5 - 1b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-0309-24-52"" status=""reviewed"">'jig rten na nyi ma ltar kun du gsal ba'i shes rab rmad du byung ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba chen po</rs>'i gsung sgros las
column2: dam pa'i bshes gnyen chos la mnga' ba rnams gyis lung dang rigs pa'i tshul ji ltar phye ba'i bshad sbyar mang po la brten nas
column3: de dag gi lam gyi ra ba las ma 'das par
column4: blo dman pa 'ga' tsam rjes su gzung bas 'gro ba drang ba'i sa <lb n=""1b6""/> bon gdab pa dang
column5: <rs type=""deity"">thub pa</rs>'i bstan pa rin po ce spel ba la gces spras gyi dad pas rang gi brjed byang tsam du rnam par bshad pa dgod par bya'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-43-46,unreviewed,1b7 - 1b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-43-46"" status=""unreviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">bzang po</rs> nyid kyi</note> mchod brjod du <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">mngon rtogs</rs> nyid kyi de bkod pa ni <quote source=""db:3706"" n=""D3786, 1b2"">nyan thos</quote> zhes bya ba lasogs pa ste
column2: <note type=""gloss"">rnam dpyad rigs pa las bshad thabs lnga gsungs pa las</note> ngag 'di'i dgos pa'i don brgyad <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">shang ka ra nan ta</rs>s <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5832""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5831"">gtan tshigs thigs pa</rs>'i tI ka</rs>nas bshad yod <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">nga</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5616"">kha che</rs> nas 'ongs pa'i skyes chos yin te gsung ba</note>dang
column3: spyi don<note type=""gloss"">nyan rang phyogs gcig tu byas pa'i</note> 'phags pa'i gang zag gsum gyi dgos pa sgrub cing de gsum nyid <note type=""gloss"">'khor dang bcas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid</note> skyed pa'i yon tan gnyis kyis bstod pa dang
column4: de la phyag bya ba ste
column5: gnyis dang
column6: <note type=""gloss"">gang zag gang gis gdams ngag gi 'bras bu gang bsgrub pa zhes bshad nas</note>de dag so so'i tshig rnam par <choice><reg>phye bas</reg><orig>°e bas</orig></choice> <lb n=""1b8""/> rgyal bar bshad pa ni gzhan du blta'o

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-1,unreviewed,1b8 - 1b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-1""><note type=""gloss"">gang zag gsum po de dag gang las byung zhe na yon tan gnyis bshad do
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa</rs>'i zhal nas go mi chen po gsung skad nas mkhyen pa gsum gi dbye ba la sogs pa <choice><reg>rnaMs</reg><orig>°s</orig></choice> 'dir 'chad phyis 'og du skabs su bab gsung nas lus phung 'chad zhes</note>nyan pa po skal ldan spyan drang ba ni <quote>rgyal sras gang dag</quote> nas te
column4: ‹rgyal sras gang dag khyad par gyi gzhi'o
column6: skye bo nas khyad par te gzhan don phyir yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'dod pa'o
column8: dgra dang skal bas ma pham ma rgyal ba sangs rgyas kyi gdung mtshan ldan gdung 'tshob pas sras brjod pa bzhin 'tshob pa'i sras las nyan thos kyi dbang gis skye ba'i skye ba po yin pas skye bo ma lus ma smid pa smin pa mi 'dun pa 'dun pa ma grol ba grol bar gsum las tha ma bzung ba bsgral phyir ro
column10: byang chub ni byang chub chen po'o
column11: ›  'gro ba mtha' dag drang ba'i ched du byang chub dam pa don du gnyer <note type=""gloss"">ba dor na sems bskyed</note> pa'i blo ldan rnams <note type=""gloss"">gang yin pa zhes bsnyegs o

column1: slob dpon la ma ltos par mthong lam du</note>dang
column2: rang nyid byang chub gyi sgo mngon par rtogs nas <note type=""gloss"">rang rgyal 'phags par 'gyur ba gang dag sangs rgyas pas dman nyan thos pas mchog pas de dag dang mnyam med</note>slar <note type=""gloss"">'o na gtan du ba'i zhe na mthar thug gtan du ba med pas</note>yang thun mong ma yin pa'i lam de nyid mthar 'phyin par (byed) pa 'am
column3: rang gi byang chub thob nas slar yang lam dam par 'jug par byed pa rang rgyal rnams <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas 'di gsungs la 'jug mod kyi dnogs la gsungs nas gang yin ces</note> dang
column4: <note type=""gloss"">thub pas gsungs pa'i rjes su 'jug gi rang gi shes rab kyi</note>mi slob pa dang slob pa'i lam <lb n=""1b9""/> kyis 'bras bu nyon mong pa dang phug sdug bsngal gnon cing 'dor bas 'gro gnyan thos rnams te
column5: lam gsum (la) gnas pa rigs can gsum po yum nyan pa lasogs pa'i skal ldan de dag <abbr>thams cad</abbr> (chos) gyi sbyin pa la rtse gcig pa'i spro bas 'du bar spyan drang ba'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-47-09,unreviewed,3a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-47-09"" status=""unreviewed"">'das ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas skad kyi byings shed yin nam paN+Di ta kun la rjes su ma byung gsung ste spyir bkas bcas la bya ba min yang 'di bsnyil lam bkas bcad las 'jig _rten _pa'i _legs _ldan _du brjod pa las khyad par du byed pa'o

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-48-00,unreviewed,3a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-48-00"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas dgra bcom pa'i bshad pa tshar phyin pa'o zhes gsung zhes bden zla dang bdud dgra bcom pa yang sbyar pas so

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-35,unreviewed,3b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-35"">'o na kun dga' bo rgyun du zhugs par bshad pa dang 'gal lo snyam na
column2: _de dmigs kyis spyir btang zhes pa'i tshul gyis bsal ba ni gang zag gcig nas te bsgo bya sgo byed rtag pa can ni med pas shes pa'i rgyun tsam bag chags rnams kyis gang bas ci rigs pa'i 'gro ba _<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs> ba'i zhal nas phu su rna gang ba
column3: gang ga ti 'gro ba la len pa ste gang zhing 'gro ba lan zhes 'ong ba'o zhes len _pa'o
column5: gcig ni grangs snga mar chud pa las so
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-18-52,unreviewed,4b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-18-52"">[- 20 -]   img. 51    las zad pas 'pho ba'i tshul ni sems can gang dag nas te ngan song nas bton nas mi dang lha brdzus skyes lus rdzogs pa thob cing 'dren pa dang 'phrad de dang bas 'dud cing mchod par sbyor ba'o
column3: dal ba'i yang gnod pa bsal ba ni de nas de'i tshe stong gsum nas de ngal sos pa'i bar ni rnam smin gyi sgrib pa bsal ba'o
column5: bcus dang nas ni las kyi sgrib pa bsal ba ste
column6: _las kyi mtha' ma dag pa gsum dang
column7: _'tshol ba ma dag pa spangs pa'o
column9: bde legs bsgrub pa ni sems can thams cad kyang nas te bsam pa dam pa dang sbyor ba dam pa dang bde ba dam pa gsum dang ldan pa'o
column11: bsngags pa grub pa ni de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i nas te
column12: _ched du brjod pa ni dgyes pas rang dbang med pa lta bur bskyed nas khegs pa'o zhes bstod pa'i tshig ste zhing 'di dman pa yin yang 'dren pa dag gi mthus 'di lta bu'i chos thob pa gzigs pas so
column14: chos de nyid gang zhe na dul ba la sogs pa ste rim pa bzhin du dbang po phal mgo'o med bsdams pa dang ting nge 'dzin gyis nyon mongs skyes pa dran zhi ba dang gso gcer sogs med sbyong yan lag brgyad la sogs pa dang dge slong gi mi dge ba bcu spangs sdom pa la sogs pa dang byams pa pham 'dra la sogs pa sgom pa lnga'o
column16: rdzu _'phrul gyi cho 'phrul las _skus dbang sgyur dregs pa can gyi dregs pa gzhom pa'i ched du ba la zil gyis gnon pa ni de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das nas te
column17: _shes bya la mnga' brnyes pas 'di 'chad spyod pas ston gdul bya nus sgra gcan la sogs pas _so
column19: nyi ma bsgribs _pa _med _pa _dang*_zla _ba _zhal _gnyis ni mdzes _pa'i dpe'o
column21: don _ni _stong _gsum _gyi _nas _te
column22: _'jig rten gyi khams zhes spyir bstan pa'o
column24: de bshad pa ri rab dang nas te lha'i gnas ni spyir ro
column26: dbang po ni brgya byin sum cu rtsa sum pa dang bcas pa'o
column32: tshangs _pa _so skye dang _gnas gtsang la ni 'phags pa'i gnas gzugs khams pa'o
column42: de bzhis zil gyis mnan pas rim pa bzhin mdzes pa la sogs pa bzhi'o dang sbyar
column43: _de'ang  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi slob dpon</rs> gyis bshad pa gang zil gyis mnan na tshangs pa dang lha dang bdud dam mu stegs dang mi rnams zil gyis mnan _par _sbyar ro

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-19-32,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 26,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 26""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-19-32"">mngon rtogs kyi don nyid la <rs type=""work"">'grel pa</rs>r lus rnam bzhag 'chad pa na skabs dang 'brel ba'i dri ba ni shes rab kyi (D3787, 15b7) nas te
column2: mdo'i don spyir ji ltar blta bar bya ba dris pa'o

column1: 'di'i lan du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">rje btsun</rs> gyi lus rnam bzhag nyid 'god pa ni <quote xml:id=""d2e551"">bshad pa</quote> zhes 'brel ba brtsams nas <quote xml:id=""d2e554"">shes rab pha rol phyin pa ni </quote>zhes bya ba nas <quote xml:id=""d2e557"">yang dag brjod ces bya ba yin no</quote>'i bar ro

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-20-27,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-20-27"">spyi'i dbye ba ni de dag kyang nas te skyes bu zung bzhi ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rje btsun</rs> kyis bka' snga ma'i tha snyad la brten nas bstan pa 'di la 'jug pa'i rgyur nyan thos zhugs gnas bdun dang rang rgyal ba'i ming du btags par zad pas mtshan nyid ni gzhan kho na'o
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-36,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-36"">tshig bla dag ni a ti wa ta zhes bya ba lhag pa'i tshig ste sgrig ma la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA ba chen po</rs>'i zhal nas sgro ltar glo bur du btags pa'o

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-342,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-342"">de ltar na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i gcig la nas la la ni ngo bo nyid kyis
column2: la la ni yul gyis
column3: la la ni gang zag gis de gnyis 'phangs pa'i sgo nas te
column4: dngos su brjod pa dang don gyis bstan pa dang rgyud nas rtogs pa'i don gsum dang gnyis dang re re ci rigs par bstan par blta'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-21-32,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-21-32"">khyad par bzhi ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">rje btsun</rs> gyi rtsa ba'i sgras zin pa ste yul gyi dmigs gzhi dang chos rnam gnyis dang 'bras bu la nus pa rgyu dang nye bar yongs rton pa'i khyad par bzhi'o

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-345,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-345"">
'gyur rnying pa la gnas pa ma mchis
column2: _thug pa ma mchis
column4: _gsum gsum las med pa la  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i zhal nas de ci ltar 'khrul lam 'di dag dang mi 'dra ba'i dgag sgrub bzhi dang bral bas mtshon pa ste
column5: na T+The te a na Ne te na bi T+Te te zhes bzhi mdo la shin tu gsal lo
column7: 'thad pas gnas pa'i don bsdu ba ni de ltar na ming de zhes so

column46: chung ngu'i chen po ni byang chub chen po'i sla la myur pa'i rgyu thun mong ma yin pa las ston pa ltar gus pas sgrub pa lhur bya bas so

column50: bde ba ni tshegs chung dus _so

column134: _don grub pa cig gi rtsa ba ni dge legs bsags pa yin pas so
column136: de gnyis pa la rjes su gnang ba gsungs pa ni de skad ces nas so

column1: yang ma mthong ba'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi zhes te 'di ltar ni gzhan  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs> gsungs shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di nas te 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i phun sum tshogs pa thams cad 'grub pas so

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-43,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-43"">yang ma mthong ba'i dbang du byas nas bshad pa 'di ltar shes rab kyi zhes te
'di ltar ni gzhan <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs> 'di la nas yang zhes bya ba'i don du blta'o

1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-47-39,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-47-39"">yang na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas gnyis su med pa ni mtshan nyid tha dad med pa'o
gnyis su byar med pa ni tshad ma tha dad kyi bcad du med pa'o
column3: de dag nyid kyi rnam grangs gzhan ni tha mi dad cing ma chad pa'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-88,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-88"">rten 'brel dang rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i bar gyi ni de bzhin du ma rig pa nas te 'di [- 221-]  shes pa gtso bo'o
column3: byang chub sems dpa' ni rab 'byor gzhan yang shes rab kyi nas de pha rol tu phyin pa drug nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bar du rim gyis pa tha dad pa'i rnam dag gis lam dang 'bras bu ma lus pa shes pas de la rmongs pa bsal ba'o
column5: shin tu ba ni shin tu rnam par dag pa nas te
column6: _ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi lo tsA</rs>s 'di ltar bsgyur yang a te na ta bi shud d+ha zhes _bya ba la
column7: _a te ni mtha'o
column11: bi shud d+ha ni rnam par dag pa'o zhes bshad pas
column12: _de la mtha' ni zhes gsungs te mtha' gnyis las 'das pa'i rnam par dag pa'o
column14: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-49-39,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-49-39"">'dis ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">slob dpon lo tsA ba chen po</rs>'i zhal snga nas kyis rnam pa brgya bdun cu rtsa gsum 'di gsum du 'dus par gsungs pa'ang legs par gnas pa ste gzhi dang lam gyi rnam pa ni bcu drug pa nyid yin la
column2: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i yang tshul 'dis 'di dag tu bsdu bar 'thad pa shin tu gsal bas so
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-41-39,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-41-39"">sdug par lta ba 'di dang ba'i gnyen po yin 'thad
column2: _chags pa'i gnyen po ji ltar yin snyam na
column3: _bdag nyid so sor zhes gsungs te
column4: _sdug pa la chags na'ang de bas ches sdug pa ches cher sdug pa gong nas gong [- 239 -]     du goms pas phan tshun ltos pa dang snga ma'i sdug pa la'ang phyis mi sdug pa rjes su 'brel bas de dag mnyam par rtogs pa las nyon mongs pa de dag gi dbang du mi 'gyur bar spyod pa'o
column6: mthong ba'i chos la bde bar gnas pa ni dmigs pa phra ba la 'jug pas thar pa dang mthun pa dang
column7: _ma zhi ba'i gtso bo 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa gnyis kyis rang gi bde bar gnas 'thob pas lnga po 'di lam gcig tu bzhag pa'o
column9: 'jig rten las 'das pa ni 'gog pa 'di kho nas 'thob pa gtso bo'i don las brjod pa ste
column10: _rgyal po 'gro zhes brjod pa bzhin no
column12: spong ba'i lam ni bden pa bzhi'i chos shes kyi bzod pa bzhi po ste mthong spang spong ba'i nus pa ni dngos su 'di bzhi la gnas par 'jog pas so
column14: kun 'byung ba ni kun nas nyon mongs pa'i rgyu 'bras so
column16: 'gog pa'i ni rnam par byang ba'i ste 'di dang 'dis 'gog pas so
column18: sangs rgyas kyi lam ni pha rol tu phyin pa bcus sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rnam pa thams cad tshang ba sgrub par mdo sde rgyan la sogs pa du ma nas gsungs pa ltar grub pas so
column20: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ni rnam pa'i dbye ba sum cu rtsa drug dang
column21: _thams cad kyi de kho na de bzhin nyid dang
column22: _rten gnas yongs su gyur pa sangs rgyas kyi sa dang
column23: _ched du bya ba'am mtshon bya sangs _rgyas _nyid _de _bzhi'o
column25: rnam _pa _med _pa'i _lha dang bdud la sogs pa dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten pa de zil gyis gnon pa'i nus pa thob pa stobs de dag gis tshur zil gyis mi non pas mi 'jigs pa chos ston pa'i thabs mkhyen pas so so yang dag par rig pa'o
column27: kun dang thun mong ma yin pa brnyes pas ma 'dres pa chos nyid ni gnas dang gnas ma yin pa la sogs pa nyid kyang nam mkha' lta bur gzigs pas so
column29: ye shes zhum pa med pa ni dam bcas pa'i gsung la 'jig rten thams cad kyis chos dang mthun par brtsad du med pa'i nus pa brnyes pas so
column31: rnam grangs la sogs pa ni mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid bshad bya dang sgra dang tshad ma 'chad byed do
column33: de la ma chags pa ni phyin ci log med pas so
column35: ma thogs pa ni nyi tshe ba'am ma khyab pa med pas so

column1: nyan thos dang rang rgyal ba'i chos las 'das pa ni de dang thun mong ma yin pa de'i spyod yul ma yin pa'i chos thob pas so

<seg type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032024-10-0909-33-40"" status=""unreviewed"">   la spyod pas bsdus pa drug las dgra bcom pa'i lus kyi 'khrul ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni bag chags ma byung ba zhes kyang gsungs pa ste
column2: _bag chags sa bon la brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa spangs kyang sngar des bzhag pa'i rnam 'gyur ngan pa lus pa gnyis las phyi ma ste <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas dper na shing la me shor ba na me nyid bsad kyang sol dum du song ba mi ldog pa lta bu'o
column4: </seg>

column1: de lta bu'i tshul ni 'gro bar bya ba ma yin [- 240 -] pa'i sar 'gro ba'o
column3: ngag gi ca co yang de bzhin du blta'o
column5: sems la byas pa dang smras nas ring du lon pa brjed pa dang
column6: _srid zhi la blang dor gyi yul tha dad du 'dzin pa dang
column7: _mnyam bzhag las ldang ba na gzhan du g.yeng ba dang
column8: _skal ldan gyi don bya ba'i dus las yol ba'i btang snyoms su lus pa'ang mi mnga'o
column10: thob pas bsdus pa drug ni dbang po lnga'i gnas 'dun pa dang bcas pa'i ngo bo nyid brtson 'grus la sogs pa bzhi 'bras bu rnam grol dang bcas pa las ma thob pa'i nyams pa cung zad kyang mi mnga' bas so
column12: 'phrin las kyi bsdus pa gsum ni sku gsung thugs la ye shes kyis ma bzung ba lung ma bstan gyi 'phrin las gtan mi mnga' ba'o
column14: ye shes kyis bsdus pa gsum ni dus gsum gyi shes bya mtha' dag ngang gis ma lus par mkhyen pas te
column15: _bstsal ba tsam ni mngon du phyogs pa'am bzhed pa tsam yin gyi 'bad rtsol la ni gtan mi ltos so
column17: mtshan nyid kyi don ni de kho nar thams cad stong pa nyid do
column19: gzhan gyi rkyen las ma byung ba ni so so rang rig pas gnas gyur mthar thug mngon du mdzad pa yon tan rab mchog dam pa thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa'o
column21: de ltar mkhyen pa gsum po'i rnam pa de rnams kyi so so'i mtshan nyid rnam par dbye ba dang don bsdus pa dag ni  <rs type=""work"">'grel</rs> par shin tu gsal bas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">kho bo</rs>s ma bris te yi ge'i don cung zad tsam phye bar zad do

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032024-10-0909-33-40,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032024-10-0909-33-40"" status=""unreviewed"">   la spyod pas bsdus pa drug las dgra bcom pa'i lus kyi 'khrul ba la sogs pa 'di dag ni bag chags ma byung ba zhes kyang gsungs pa ste
column2: _bag chags sa bon la brjod pa dang nyon mongs pa spangs kyang sngar des bzhag pa'i rnam 'gyur ngan pa lus pa gnyis las phyi ma ste <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas dper na shing la me shor ba na me nyid bsad kyang sol dum du song ba mi ldog pa lta bu'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-05-39,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-05-39"">so so'i mtshan nyid nyi shu las yul _gyis phye ba lnga'i dang po zur za 'di rnams <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA chen po</rs>s dang po rtogs dka' ba gyur ba las mdo dang <rs type=""work"">'grel</rs> par bltas shing go mi chen po la dris pas gsungs pa shin tu legs pa ste gzhan ni gzhung las kyang don gyi thugs la dri ba'i rna chung gsungs zhes blta ba'i spyod yul la mi gnas pa'i sbyor ba'i don ni ko shi ka 'di la nas te
column2: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod pa ni rnam pa ma lus pa spros pa bdag gnyis dang yod med la sogs pa'i zhi bar sgom pa'i sbyor ba'o

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-99,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-99"">de gsum nyid sbyor ba chung 'bring gsum du bzhag pa la gnyis las zab pa la sogs par spyod pa [-243-] nyid kyang dgag pa ni shA ri'i bus nas so
column3: de dag gi yul spyad byar mi grub pas de bsgrub pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te
column4: _de'i rnam pa ni zab pa la sogs pa'o
column6: de gsum la bshad pa'i rnam grangs gzhan ni yang zab mo mngon par byang chub pa dang nas te 'od gsum thob par byed pa'am 'di gsum legs par rtogs pa'i sbyor ba'o
column8: rten gyis phye ba brgyad las tshegs chen po'i bstan pa ni shA ri'i bus nas te yul de gsum la dang por gnas ma yin par 'jigs pa dang
column9: _bar du de'i rgyun ma ldog par gnas pa dang
column10: _tha mar yang rgyu tshang bar shes pas shin tu 'jigs pas sbyor ba las nyams par 'gyur ba'o
column12: 'on kyang de dag bsal nas _phyis 'bad na thob tu rung ba tsam las dka' ba'i sbyor bar bsnyad par zad do
column14: de ldog pas bsgrub pa ni bcom ldan 'das phyir mi ldog pa'i nas te snod gyur la bstan na don yod par mtshon pa'o
column16: rjes 'gros kyang bsgrub pa ni de nas lha rnams kyi nas dris pa dang lan gyis te
column17: _phyir rgol ba ni skyon brjod pas so
column19: spong bar yang ni mi mos pa tsam bar yang ni mi mos pa tsam du ma zad pas so
column21: nyes dmigs bsdus pa ni ko shi ka theg pa la nas te
column22: _log par ltung ba'i las ni chos spong ba las lci ba ngan song ba'i las gzhan med pas so
column24: snod gyur gyi rten nyid kyi dbang du byas nas lung bstan pa'i rgyu 'thob pa'i la rten nyid bstan pa ni brgya byin gyis nas te phyir mi ldog pa ma thob kyang shas cher sbyang ba byas pas lung bstan pa la nye bas na sangs rgyas gsum dang phrad pa tshun chad du nges par lung bstan pa 'thob pa'o
column26: de nyid bshad pa ni de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis nas _so
column28: drug pa'ang bsnyen bkur byas pa tshogs kyi rtog pa'o
column30: de'i sbyor ba dpes bsgrub pa ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus zhes gnang ba zhus nas dpe nyid dang
column31: dngos min pa'ang rten dngos su sgom pa lta smos su med pa'o
column39: sbyor ba nyid ni bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di bdag nyid la nas te snga ma tsam du sbyang ba ma byas kyang phyir mi ldog pa tsam srid pa las so
column41: rang nyid byung ba ni rgyu'i stobs kyis sbyor ba dang ldan par ro
column43: nges par 'byung ba'i la gsum las sbyor ba'i dpe ni bcom ldan 'das 'di _lta ste dper na skyes bu la la nas te sa mtshams ni lam mam yur ba'am zhing rnying la sogs pa'o
column45: don ni bcom ldan 'das de bzhin du nas te
column46: _bskyed pa ni sbyor ba brtan pa'o
column48: sbyor ba'i byed pa ni byang chub sems dpa' chen po [- 244 -]      img. 275   from bdr:I1KG5853     des nas te sa gzhan la sogs pa'i bar chad med pa'i zlo'o
column52: de nyid la rjes su mthun pa gnang ba ni de skad ces nas so
column54: bar chad med pa'i la'ang gsum las dpe ni shA ri'i bus nas te ldog pa dang dngos kyi dpe ring ba dang nye ba'i rtags mthong ba gnyis so
column56: sdong po dang ri'i mtshan ma ni shing dang _ro'i nyil nyil la sogs pa'o
column58: de dag med pa ni bye ma rlabs kyis 'das pas na dang _gram gseg gi khong _khong _yangs _pa'o
column60: don ni bcom ldan _'das _de bzhin du nas te _rig _pa ni thos pas so
column62: bsam pa ni bsam pa dang sgom pa gnyis kas so
column64: 'thad pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i don khas len pa la rigs pa med par dogs pa de ci'i zhes bsdu nas te
column65: _rgyu tshogs pa las 'bras bu'i rung ba dpog pa rang bzhin gyi rtags so
column67: mtshan ma'i dngos po ni rtags kyi de nyid la bzhed pa'o
column69: byang chub dang nye ba la'ang gsum las dpe ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste nyams bde ba ni dus bzang po'i longs spyod la _spro bas so
column71: don ni bcom ldan 'das nas te
column72: _sgrub _pa _byar yod pa ni _rgyu nus _pa _rtas pa thob pa'o
column74: sbyor ba che ba ni de na lha'i bu nas te lha la sogs pas rjes su 'dzin pa'o
column76: rab tu dga' ba la sogs pa gsum ni chen po dang 'bring dang chung ngu'o
column78: gzhi'i dngos po ni rigs sad byed kyi dge ba mthu rtas pa'o
column80: myur du mngon par byang chub pa'i la gnyis las dpe ni bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste nas te sdug bsngal drag pa la sogs pa'i rgyu ni sngon tshul bzhin nas so
column82: bsten pa la sogs pa ni thog ma dang bar dang tha mar ro
column84: don ni bcom ldan 'das nas te 'thad pa ni de la _yid la 'thad yid ches pa'o
column86: lung bstan par 'gyur ba ni 'bras bu la nye bas so
column88: gzhan don dang ldan pa'i la bzhi las skabs dgod pa ni de nas tshe dang ldan pa rab 'byor gyis nas te yongs su bzung ba ni sbyor ba thob pa las bsngags pas so
column90: gzhan don spyir ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nas te phan pa ni ma 'ongs pa'i don sgrub pas so
column92: bde ba ni da ltar gyi'o
column94: snying brtse ba ni de gnyis ka'i bsam pa'i khyad par ro
column96: de gsum nyid ci rigs par gsal bar byed pa ni lha dang nas te bsam pa'o
column98: des drangs pa'i sbyor ba ni bsdu ba go bzang gsung zhes lam du 'dzud pa'o
column100: thun mong bar bsgrub pa ni bdag kyang sbyin pa'i nas so
column101: _khyad par can bsgrub pa ni bdag kyang phyir mi ldog pa'i nas te sgrub pa dang rnam 'bras bu phul du _phyin pa la sbyor bas so
column103: gnyis ka'i don ni _rang don thabs dang chos gzhan don thabs las byung bar ro
column105: sgrub pa pa legs par gtad pa ni sbyor ba 'di la btsud pas so
column107: yum sgom pa rdzogs pa'i thabs kyis phye ba bzhi las
column108: _skabs sngon ngo mtshar ro'i bar du mdzad de spyir [- 245 -]      img. 276   from bdr:I1KG5853    dang zhus pa lags kyi bar ni de skad ces nas so
column110: thabs kyi rnam pa ji ltar ngo mtshar ba ni rgyu phul du byung bas so
column112: shin tu ngo mtshar ba ni 'bras bu phul du byung bas so
column114: don ni rang don thabs dang gzhan don thabs las byung bar ro
column116: yang na 'jig _rten _pa _dang nyan thos las phul _du byung bas so
column118: lan la 'phel 'grib med pa'i ni bcom ldan 'das kyis nas te de kho nar nam yang nyes pa dang yon tan 'phel 'grib med par rtogs pa'i mtshan nyid dang ldan pas so
column120: chos dang chos ma yin pa la sogs pa mi mthong ba'i don ni rab 'byor gzhan yang nas te
column121: _dkar nag dang dus gsum dang chos gsum dang srid zhi gnyis khams gsum dang lam dang 'bras bu mtha' dag med par ro
column123: 'thad pa ni de ci'i nas te brtan pa dang g.yo ba dang byed pa'i mtshan nyid thams cad dang bral bas so
column125: bsam gyis mi khyab par ma zhen pa ni _gsum _ste
column126: _rtog ge las 'das _pas bsam _gyis mi khyab _pa nyid bstan pa dang
column128: der bsam gyis mi khyab par zhen pa med pa nyid do
column130: rnam par mi rtog pa'i la bzhi las rten gyi khyad par rjes su brjod pa ni rab 'byor gyis zhes zhus pa dang lan gyis so
column132: de'i sgrub byed du sbyor ba nyid ni rab 'byor gyis _nas _te
column139: yang na stong pa dang mtshan ma med pa dang smon pa med pas rim bzhin no
column141: mi rtog pa ni spyir ro
column143: rnam par mi rtog pa ni khyad par du'o
column145: 'thad pa ni de ci'i phyir nas te brtag par bya ba yul mtshan nyid rang yang ma grub pas so
column147: don bsdu ba ni rab 'byor de ltar nas te rten dang sbyor ba _gsol ba nas nyid bsdu ba gnyis so
column149: 'bras bu las dbye ba gnyis las yon tan thob par byed pa bstan pa ni rab 'byor nas so
column151: bsgrub pa ni rgyun du nas te rang dang gzhan gyi don rnyed dka' la mthu che ba thams cad kyi gter du gyur pas so
column153: sgrib pa dag par byed pa'ang bstan pa ni rab 'byor gyis nas so
column155: bsgrub pa ni phyin ci log tu nyon mongs thams cad dag par byed pas dgos pa'o
column159: sbyar _ba _la _'jug par brtsam pa'i dus kyis phye ba ni sa mtshams la sbyor ba ste ci tsam gyis bsgrub par dam bcas pa las mi gyur _par bsgrub par bya ba'i khyad par can no
column161: 'di la gsum las 'thad pa ni rab 'byor gyis nas te ma bsgrib pa na bar chad 'byung bas so
column163: dus de nyid ni de bas na nas te brtson 'grus drag pos 'jug par bya ba'o
column165: de nyid gsal bar byed pa ni de ci'i phyir zhes dri ba bkod nas te
column166: _lo'i bar gyi dus rim par smos pa na ci tsam gyis sbyor ba gang mthar dbyung bar nus pa'i dus ci rigs pa mtshon byed do
column168: lo [- 246 -]      img. 277   from bdr:I1KG5853     las lhag pa ma smos pa ni phyi rol pa go mi'i zhal las kha cig dus thams cad ni lo tsAm du zad de de nyid yang bskyar zhing byung bar _zad _pas na
column171: go mi gsung ba la bzung ba lan cig 'dod _pa _bsten _byas _pa
column177: zhes smra ba'i lugs dang yang sbyar bar dgongs pas na de ltar byas na mchod sbyin shing shun zhes gzhung lugs de byed pa gtso bo dag gi ming smos nas so

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2516-45-77,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2516-45-77"">lo tsAm du thogs pa myur du bri ba la sogs par ji ltar rung zhes dogs pa de ci'i zhes bsu nas rab 'byor rin po che zhes smos pa ni bar chad mang zhing bya ba rgya che ba de tsam gyis grub na'ang myur bar grub pa'o

column201: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA chen po</rs>'i zhal nas 'di ni mi bzang ste de lta na rnam pa 'ga' dang 'ga' la _sa dman po'i gnas skabs dang por slob pa'i sbyor ba dag kyang mkhyen pa gsum gyi phyogs su 'gyur zhing
column202: _rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pas thams cad kyi yul rtogs pas de'ang sbyor ba'i phyogs su 'gyur bas so

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-11-57,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-11-57""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA</rs>'i zhal nas 'di nyid gzhan la ma ltos par rnam par 'jog nus pa'i khyad par du gsal te

column3: _yul ni rnam pa gsum po rgyu
column5: sbyor ba bzhi'i bdag nyid dang
column7: zhes _rje _btsun _gyis _gsungs _pa _ji lta ba'o

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-2517-12-24,unreviewed,Gro chos skor 40,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""Gro chos skor 40""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-2517-12-24"">'jigs pa'i gnas su ma mthong ba la mi skrag par sad nas rmi lam ltar chos bstan pa'i sems skye ba ni rab 'byor grong [- 310 -]  thams cad bcom pa'am nas te 'jigs shing mi bzad pa dang dngang ba gsum ni 'jigs pa chung 'bring gsum mo
