column5: brjed byang 'di byas bsod naMs gang bsags des
column7: 'gro kun rgyal yum laM gyis myur 'dren shog

column1: 1_005_03_C_Gro_nyi khri lnga stong.xml,1_005_03,,ex5032023-05-0309-26-52,reviewed,134b5 - 134b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""134b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5032023-05-0309-26-52"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4476"">rgyal ba'i yum bar ma le'u brgyad pa nyi khri lnga stong ba mdo' 'grel rnam par bshad pa</rs>
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bla ma rje brtsun</rs> gyi gsung la dka' ba mang pos nan tan byas nas <lb n=""134b6""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">shakya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas </rs>kyis rjed byang du bkod pa rdzogs s+ho
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml,2_045_02,,ex45022024-09-1110-23-42,unreviewed,3a5 - 3a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45022024-09-1110-23-42"" status=""unreviewed"">yul de la rang las nges kyi tshad ma'i mtshan nyid : yul de la tshad ma yin par rang stobs kyi nges shes de ma thag tu 'dren pa'i tshad ma.mtshan gzhi ni : <quote source=""RT 8"" n="""">don rig 2 dang rang rig dang ; rjes su dpag pa rang las nges</quote> (RT VIII 64ab) zhes pa dang <quote source=""RT 8"" n="""">don byed pa dang goms pa can
column2: rjes su dpag pas nges par byed
column3: </quote> (RT VIII 65ab) zhes <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs <lb n=""3a6""/>gter</rs> las bshad pa dang
column4: rnal 'byor mngon sum yang yin no
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml,2_045_02,,ex45022024-09-1110-23-422,unreviewed,3a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45022024-09-1110-23-422"" status=""unreviewed"">yul de la gzhan las nges kyi tshad ma'i mtshan nyid : yul de la tshad ma yin cing yul de la tshad ma yin par rang stobs kyi nges shes de ma thag tu 'dren pa ma yin pa :
mtshan gzhi ni : <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> las : <quote source=""RT 8"" n="""">dang po ba dang yid ma gtad
column3: 'khrul rgyu can rnams gzhan la nges
column4: </quote> (RT VIII.64cd) zhes so
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_02_Sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan_mtshan nyid bsdus pa_etext.xml,2_045_02,,ex45022023-09-19,unreviewed,9a5 - 9a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45022023-09-19"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (9a5--9a6)]""/>

las dang po pa la nye bar mkho ba <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4773"">tshad ma'i mtshan nyid bsdus pa rigs pa'i sgo 'byed pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5911"">mdar btsun pa rin chen bzang po</rs>s yang dang yang du bskul ba'i ngor dang ¦ gzhan yang shes ldan 'ga' res bskul <abbr>ba'i phyir </abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5910"">shakya'i <lb n=""9a6""/>btsun pa sangs rgyas rgyal mtshan</rs> gis go bde <abbr>ba'i phyir</abbr> du lung dang <abbr>rigs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> sgo nas dgag gzhag dang skyon gyi gcod tshul phra mo rnaMs re shig bzhag nas ding sang gi <abbr>rtog ge</abbr> pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyi brda cha‹d› dang mthun par <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5697"">dben gnas brag dkar</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho

4_112_02_W4PD3076-I4PD3099-1-464.xml,4_112_02,,ex112022024-10-0415-38-52,unreviewed,51a6 - 51a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""51a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex112022024-10-0415-38-52"" status=""unreviewed"">rgyun chad rab du mi gnas pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7352"">slob dpon 'gog pa seng ge</rs> 'i 'dod pa ste
column2: nyams myogs gi shes pa 'di yod pa'i dus de srig du rnam rtog yin pas rnam rtog yod pa

column1: <lb n=""51a7""/>srid 'khor ba yin la
column2: sans rgyas pa'i gnas skabs na sems dang sems las byung pa'i yid nyams su myod pa'i rig pa 'di rgyun chad do

column1: 3_075_02.xml,3_075_02,,ex75022023-09-281,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex75022023-09-281"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5200"">don<anchor xml:id=""a1""/> pha rol tu phyin pa'i nyaM len snying po rab gsal</rs> <abbr>bzhugs s+ho</abbr>
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_075_02.xml,3_075_02,,ex75022023-09-282,unreviewed,41b4 - N007,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""41b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex75022023-09-282"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (41b4-8)]""/>
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5200"">don pha rol tu phyin pa'i nyaMs len snying po rab gsal</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dpal ldan bla ma daM pa</rs>'i gsung la snon 'khrid ma byas par
nyaMs su len bde bar bya ba'i phyir
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4311""><abbr>rdo rje</abbr> 'dzin pa naM 'kha rin chen</rs> kyis bka'i bskul ba'i ngor
<rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5707"">'khyog dgon pa</rs>r <hi rendition=""#Time"">chu pho spre'u'i lo bden bzhi'i chos 'khod skor ba'i dus chen kyi nyin</hi>
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4077"">sod nams dpal bzang</rs> gis sbyar ba'i

<abbr>yi ge</abbr> pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5201"">btan bsal</rs> <lb n=""N007""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5201"">bdag</rs> gi dgyis
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_08 rten 'brel lag len du dril ba .xml,2_050_08,,ex50082023-09-131,reviewed,21b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""21b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50082023-09-131"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Post-colophon annotations (21b8)""/>

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs> des <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458"">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> la <abbr>gnang ngo</abbr>

<rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">daM pa bsngags pa'i snar thang gi dben gnas</rs> <abbr>su</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458"">ze'u</rs>s phyag dpe las bris shing zhus <abbr>dag go</abbr>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 4_113_01_dpal_AS_comm_W4PD3076-v23_img11-134.xml,4_113_01,,ex11312024-11-01-10-55,unreviewed,14a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""14a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex11312024-11-01-10-55"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">kha 1</rs> na re
column2: de mithade gnod 'joms las nyos dang rang sargyas rnaMs kyi phu+ong lhag pa med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa ni

column1: 4_113_01_dpal_AS_comm_W4PD3076-v23_img11-134.xml,4_113_01,,ex113012024-10-1516-17-17,unreviewed,62a8 - 62a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""62a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex113012024-10-1516-17-17"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">mkhas btsun bzang 3 gyi yon tan rnaMs la thogs pa med pa'i mkhyen pa dang ldan pa

mkhas btsun shes rab bzang po de dag gi bka' drin las stod 3i tshul la blo gros kyi snang ba mched pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5963"">shakya'i dge sbyong dpal gyi ming 'chang ba</rs>s chu mo lug gi lo'i sa kha chen po'i zla ba la
column2: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5733"">dpal sa skya'i gtsug la <lb n=""62a9""/>khang</rs> du bris pa 'dis kyang bstan pa dang seMs can la phan rgya chen byed par gyur 1
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40012024-12-2012-56-15,finalized,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40012024-12-2012-56-15"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Cover page (1a)""/>

<pb n=""1a""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4750""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3755"">mngon pa kun las btus pa</rs>'i ti ka</rs> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3863"">mkhas pa chen po gzhon byang</rs> gis mdzad pa ¦ <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4750"">shes bya <abbr>thams cad</abbr> gsal bar byed pa'i sgron me</rs> bzhugs s+ho

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40012024-10-25-12-39,finalized,2b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40012024-10-25-12-39"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4243"">
b+han</rs> na re rang sangs rgyas ni sangs rgyas myi bzhugs pa'i zhing khaMs su skye ba'i phyir bcoM
ldan 'das kyi 'khor du chos nyan du mi 'ong bas de'i don du bstan ba'i chos <abbr>med</abbr> pa'i yin
pas nyan thos gyi sde snod las gud pa <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40012024-10-25-14-01,finalized,6a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40012024-10-25-14-01"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs> na de gang zhig dpyad na rigs pas mi 'thad pa ni kun rdzob kyi bden pa yin la
dpyad na rigs pas 'thad pa ni don daM pa'i bden pa <abbr>yin no</abbr>

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40012024-10-25-13-07,finalized,6b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40012024-10-25-13-07"" status=""finalized"">
mi sel ba ni rigs pa'i shes pa la chos can gzugs <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa snang bar 'dod pa ste
column2: gal te rigs shes

column1: la chos can mi snang na rigs shes kyis chos can snang ba 'di la sgro 'dogs mi chod par
'gyur te
column2: <abbr>myig gi</abbr> rnaM shes la sgra myi snang bas sgra la sgro 'dogs mi chod pa <abbr>bzhin no</abbr>

column1: zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">jo btsun</rs> rjes 'brangs dod do

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40012024-10-25-12-31,finalized,10a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""10a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40012024-10-25-12-31"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> na re 3
lhag pa'i yo byad du byin gyis <abbr>brlabs so</abbr> zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40022024-10-25-13-29,finalized,11a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40022024-10-25-13-29"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">lha rje dags po</rs> na re ri de la gnas pa'i dge' slong rnaMs su 'phrul gyis naM mkha' la 'gro ba <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa byed
pas bya rgod dang chos mthun pa'i phyir bya rgod phung po'i ri <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40022024-10-25-13-10,finalized,11a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40022024-10-25-13-10"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po <abbr>grags se</abbr></rs> na re dge' slong rnaMs kyi chos gos sur smrig dmar por yod pa la bya rgod rnaMs kyi
bsaM pa la sha yin snyaM nas 'phungs pas na bya rgod phung po'i ri bo zhes zer ste spar tshod du <abbr>zad do</abbr>
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex400122024-10-25-12-52,finalized,21a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""21a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex400122024-10-25-12-52"" status=""finalized"">
'di ni seMs tsaM rnaM brdzun dang bye brag du smra ba ltar brjod bya dngos <abbr>med</abbr> yin kyang
rnaM bden ltar na gzung cha don spyi dang
column2: dgos pa don spyir snang ba de shes rig gi

column1: rdzas dngos po 1 du 'dod pas snga ma ltar khas blang dgos so zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3864"">byang chub skyabs</rs> <abbr>gsung ngo</abbr>
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex400122024-10-25-12-56,finalized,21a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""21a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex400122024-10-25-12-56"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4264"">gnyags</rs> na re brjod bya dngos su bstan la 2 shugs kyis bstan pa yin zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40012024-10-25-14-10,finalized,25b9 - 26a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""25b9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40012024-10-25-14-10"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4242"">rog</rs> na re sgra'i gnas brgyad ces zer min mi legs ste
<lb n=""26a1""/> sgra'i gnas rkan dang lce <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa yin <abbr>pas so</abbr>

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40012024-10-25-14-18,finalized,26a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""26a9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40012024-10-25-14-18"" status=""finalized"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3921"">tho</rs> na re gzugs <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa mtshan nyid gyi skabs su 'chad la phung po zhes pa ni don gyi skabs su 'chad pas 'dir bshad mi dgos so zhes <abbr>zer ro</abbr>

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40022024-10-25-13-56,finalized,47a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""47a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40022024-10-25-13-56"" status=""finalized"">
'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4291"">rngur mig pa</rs> na re 'dod pa'i khaM pa'i 'du shes
kyis 'dod pa'i khaMs pa la dmigs pa na chung ngu'i 'du shes zhes bya zhing
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40022024-10-25-13-50,finalized,58a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""58a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40022024-10-25-13-50"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3811"">mu tra</rs> na re ngo tsha shes pa'i dmigs pa ni bdag dang chos so
column3: khred ba °°° yod kyi dmigs pa ni gzhan lo ka ba'o zhes zer ba ni bdag dang chos dang gzhan lo ka ba ni de dag gi

column1: bdag rkyen yin gyi dmigs rkyen ma yin pas mi <abbr>'thad do</abbr>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40022024-10-25-13-43,finalized,59a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""59a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40022024-10-25-13-43"" status=""finalized"">
la tshig ni b+hyi rgya zhes pa'i sgra las drangs nas sel ba dang 'phel bar spyod pa na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4261"">brtson 'grus</rs> zhes bya
ba ste 'og du <abbr>'chad do</abbr>

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40022024-10-25-14-26,finalized,205b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""205b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40022024-10-25-14-26"" status=""finalized"">
yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3944"">zangs kar lo tsa ba</rs> na re gzung ba rtogs pa ni gzung mar bzhin <abbr>med</abbr> par rtogs pa'o

2_040_01_Jad gzhon nu byang chub_AS grel_etext_b.xml,2_040_01,,ex40022024-10-25-13-34,finalized,247a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""247a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex40022024-10-25-13-34"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6968"">mar pa lo tsa ba</rs> na re 'dod pa'o zhes zer te
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_19 sangs rgyas sgom pa'i rnam thar_08_03_2022.xml,2_050_19,,ex50192023-09-201,unreviewed,[7a1],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50192023-09-201"" status=""unreviewed""><lb n=""[7a1]""/> ༄༅
column3: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">che snar thang</rs> du byon nas
column4: dge 'dun yon mchod 'khor dang bcas pa <hi rendition=""#Time"">dgung lo bcu</hi>'i bar du skyangs te
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_19 sangs rgyas sgom pa'i rnam thar_08_03_2022.xml,2_050_19,,ex50192023-09-2012,unreviewed,[8a7] - 8b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[8a7]""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50192023-09-2012"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (8a7-8b1 p.374)]""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3985"">bla ma yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen</rs> bden gnyis seng ge'i nga ros mtha' gnyis su 'dzin pa'i ri dags skrag <lb n=""8b1""/> par mdzad cing
column2: skye dgu ma lus pa'i mgon skyabs dam par gyur pa'i yon tan ri rab ltar brjid pa las nyung 'bru tsam zhig <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">snar thang</rs> du sdebs pa'o
column4: <anchor xml:id=""a1""/></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502_10502023_05_022,reviewed,1a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502_10502023_05_022"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gro lung pa</rs>'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">bstan rim chen mo'i don bsdu</rs>'am <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">lam rim</rs> bzhugs so
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1011-29-41,reviewed,3b6 - 3b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1011-29-41""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s chos bzhi dang ldan pa la brten dgos par gsungs te
column3: mkhas pas lta ba khyad du mi gsod pa
column4: <lb n=""3b7""/> btsun pas tshul khrims khyad du mi gsod pa
column6: tshe 'di don du mi gnyer ba
column7: byang chub don gnyer ba'o

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502_2024-08-3013-38-05,reviewed,3b7 - 3b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502_2024-08-3013-38-05"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">rje btsun sgam po pa</rs>'i <lb n=""3b8""/> zhal nas
column3: chos gsum dang ldan par gsungs te
column5: <quote>shes rab chen pos gzhan gyis lam sna 'khrid pa
column6: snying rje chen pos 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzod pa
column8: tshe 'di la ltos pa ma mchis pa'o

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502_2024-08-3013-39-04,reviewed,3b8 - 4a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502_2024-08-3013-39-04"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5639"">bla ma rin po che</rs> yis
column3: <quote>gsol ba 'debs pa'i bla ma'i mtshan nyid ni <pb n=""4a""/><lb n=""4a1""/>gang gi drin gyis bde chen nyid
column5: skad cig nyid la 'char ba gang
column7: bla ma rin chen lta bu'i sku
column9: rdo rje can zhabs pad la 'dud
column11: </quote><!--Source=dbang gi bya ba mdor bsdus--></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-19072023-05-24,reviewed,4b8 - 5a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-19072023-05-24"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i zhal nas
column2: <quote> <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> <pb n=""5a""/><lb n=""5a1""/> dngos bzhugs tsam na bla ma dkon mchog bzhi pa yin
column3: sangs rgyas 'das nas 'khor dag yod tsam na bla ma de sangs rgyas dang mnyam pa yin
column4: da lta sangs rgyas las lhag pa yin gsung ste
column5: de la rgyu mtshan gsum sangs rgyas thams cad <lb n=""5a2""/>kyi 'phrin las bsdus pa yin pas na bla ma de sangs rgyas las lhag
column6: snyigs ma lnga'i dus su skyob pas bla ma sangs rgyas las lhag
column7: byang chub kyi lam dngos su ston pas bla ma sangs rgyas las lhag go
column9: tshogs chen po yis <lb n=""5a3""/>lung ston dpal la phyag 'tshal lo
column11: sems can nyam thag gnas nas 'don la
column13: dngos su ston cing dri ma bral la bsod nams ye shes tshogs kyi dpal la phyag 'tshal lo
column15: </quote> zhes <abbr>gsungs so</abbr>
column17: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-2023-05-342,reviewed,5a5 - 5a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-2023-05-342"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4182"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge bshes stod lung pa</rs>'i zhal nas
column2: nga la ston pa'i 'du shes skyed cig byas na
column3: khyed kyis rgas su khyod la ston pa'i 'du shes bskyed na dang khyod dga' ste
column5: bskyed la bzhag gi sems pa srid de ma skyed na yang ma skyes <lb n=""5a6""/>su la gnod lta ba yin gsung skad de de mad pa yin gsung
column7: de bas na bla ma la sangs rgyas dngos kyi 'du shes gsha' ma gcig skyes na gnas skabs dang mthar <abbr>thug gis</abbr> yon tan gong ma kun 'byung ba'o
column9: de la sgrub pa'i bsnyen bkur ni
column10: nyon mongs pa <lb n=""5a7""/> dang nyes spyod spongs pa dang
column11: dge ba la brtson pa gnyis yin te
column13: de ltar ma byas na bla ma'i bka' bcag pa yin gsung ngo
column15: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-19072023-05-39,reviewed,5a7 - 5a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-19072023-05-39"" status=""reviewed"">de ltar yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3747"">mgon po byams pa</rs>'i zhal nas
<quote><lg>
<l>bkur sti rnyed pa dag dang rim gro dang
<l> sgrub pa'i sgo nas bshes gnyen bsten par bya
</lg></quote>
<lb n=""5a8""/>zhes gsungs so

1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022024-08-3013-21-41,reviewed,5b2 - 5b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022024-08-3013-21-41"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5639"">dpal nA ro pa</rs>s <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5641"">tI lo pa</rs>'i phyag phyir lo bcu gnyis 'brangs nas
column2: dka' ba bcu gnyis <lb n=""5b3""/>spyad pas dngos grub thob pa bzhin du
column4: mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub rnams ma bsgrubs kyang thob bo
column6: <abbr>grangs su</abbr> ma chad pa ni
column7: <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> kyi <abbr>yon tan</abbr> mtha' med pa bla ma la brten te 'byung bas bgreng bar mi lang ba'o

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022024-08-3008,reviewed,6a2 - 6a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022024-08-3008"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5639"">nA ro pa</rs>s <quote>ri rab gser gyi ngos <lb n=""6a3""/>la bya gnas pa
column3: rang gi rang bzhin dor nas gser du snang zhes so
column5: </quote></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-11252023-05-22,reviewed,9b5 - 9b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-11252023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">rje sgam po pa</rs>'i zhal nas kyang
column2: <quote> 'chi ba sgom pa ni dang por gal che ste
column3: chos la 'jug pa'i <lb n=""9b6""/>  rgyu yin
column5: bar du gal che ste brtson 'grus kyi lcag yin
column6: tha mar gal che ste chos kyi sku gsal 'debs yin

column1: </quote> ces <abbr>gsungs so</abbr>

1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1912-16-00,reviewed,23a5 - 23a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""23a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-16-00"" status=""reviewed"">khyad par la 'dod lugs mang yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i <lb n=""23a6""/>bzhed kyis smon pa ni 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba yin la 'jug pa ni rgyu la dam 'cha' ba'o
column3: de'i go ba ni / smon pa 'bras bu la dam 'cha' ba ni
column4: 'bras bu gzhan don du <lb n=""23a7""/>byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir rgyu bya chub sems dpa'i bslab pa la bslab par bya'o zhes dam 'cha' ba'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1912-20-07,reviewed,23a7 - 23b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""23a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-20-07"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">kho bo</rs>s ni gzhung bltas na 'di ltar go ste
column2: gzhan don du byang chub thob <lb n=""23a8""/> par 'dod pa ni smon pa yin la
column3: gzhan don du byang chub thob par 'dod pa 'i don du bslab pa la slom par 'dod pa 'jug pa yin
column4: de yang bslab pa la slob par 'dod pa rkyang pa ni ma yin te
column5: byang chub ni ched du bya ba'i dmigs pa yin la
column6: bslab pa ni dngos kyi dmigs pa yin pas
column7: <pb n=""23b""/><lb n=""23b1""/> gnyis ka thob pa dang slob par 'dod pa'o
column9: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3743"">slob dpon zhi ba lha</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i bzhed pa yang de ltar yin par go
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1912-29-59,reviewed,24b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-29-59"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""> rten gyi gang zag <lb n=""24b7""/> ni chos drug dang ldan te
column2: theg pa chen po'i chos la dad cing mos pa dang
column4: rigs dang ldan pa dang
column5: bla ma la gus pa dang
column6: smon pa brten pa dang
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i lugs kyi so so thar pa rigs bdun gang rung gcig dang ldan pa'o

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-12422023-05-22,reviewed,25a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""25a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-12422023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s de'i steng du snying rje dang bsnan pas chos bzhi ldan 'dod de
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3744"">lam sgron</rs> las

column1: <quote>  <lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">sdom pa'i cho ga la mkhas dang
column2: bdag nyid gang zhig sdom la gnas
column3: sdom pa 'bogs bzod snying rjer ldan
column4: bla ma bzang por shes par bya

column1: </lg></quote>
zhes gsungs so

1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1913-00-24,reviewed,29b6 - 29b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""29b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1913-00-24"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re
column2: snum khur dang
column3: dbyugs pa'i rigs pas so so thar pa'i thun mong ba bzhi yang
column4: de bzhi don gyi go bar 'gyur te
column5: rnyed dang bkur sti la chags pas
column6: bdag la bstod cing <lb n=""29b7""/> gzhan la smod pa dang
column7: ser snas bdag gi nor gzhan la ma byin pa dang
column8: khros pas gzhan la tshogs pa dang
column9: rmongs pas chos ltar bcos par smra na yang ltung ba 'gyur na
column10: rim pa bzhin du chags pas mi tshangs par spyod pa dang
column11: gzhan gyi nor brkus <lb n=""29b8""/>pa dang
column12: gzhan gyi srog gcod pa dang
column13: brdzun du smra ba rnams lta smos su yang med do
column15: zhes gsungs pa de ni rigs so <choice><corr>gsungs so</corr><sic>gsungs ngo</sic></choice>
column17: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1913-04-36,reviewed,31a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""31a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1913-04-36"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> kun rdzob shes pa'i shes rab dang
column2: don dam shes pa'i shes rab bo
column4: tha mi dad pa shes pa'i shes rab la yang 'dod do
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-2023-05-34,reviewed,31b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""31b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-2023-05-34"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s ni
<quote>   <lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve"">lnga po thabs yin la
column2: shes rab dang gnyis su 'dod do
column4: de yang shes rab pha rol phyin spangs pa'i
column6: sbyin pa'i pha rol phyin la sogs
column8: dge ba'i chos rnams thams cad dag
column10: rgyal ba rnams kyi thabs su bshad

column1: </lg></quote>
zhes gsungs so

1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1913-24-02,reviewed,33a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""33a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1913-24-02"" status=""reviewed"">   <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i
column2: sems can don byed kyi tshul khrims kyi dngos gzhi yin zhes zer ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-19072023-05-36,reviewed,35b3 - 35b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""35b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-19072023-05-36"" status=""reviewed"">  de yang thabs shes rab zung du 'grel dgos pa ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s
column3: thabs dang bral ba'i shes rab dang
column4: shes rab dang <lb n=""35b4""/>bral thabs dag kyang
column5: gang phyir 'ching pa zhes gsungs pa
column6: de bas gnyis ka spang mi bya
column7: zhes pa ste

column1: 1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex5022023-07-1912-45-04,reviewed,35b5 - 35b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""35b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex5022023-07-1912-45-04"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:7338""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5640"">grub chen sa ra ha</rs>s mdzad pa'i do ha</rs> las
<quote>
<lg> <l xml:space=""preserve"">snying rje dang bral stong pa nyid zhugs gang
column3: </l> <l>des ni lam mchog rnyed pa ma yin no
column5: </l> <l>'on te snying rje 'ba' zhig bsgoms na yang
column7: </l><lb n=""35b6""/> <l>'khor ba 'di las thar pa thob mi 'gyur
column9: </l> <l>gang yang gnyis po sbyor bar nus pa des
column11: </l> <l>'khor bar mi gnas mya ngan 'das mi gnas

column1: </quote>
zhes pa'o

1_005_02_C_Gro bstan rim don bsdus.xml,1_005_02,,ex502-11552023-05-22,reviewed,40a3 - 40a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex502-11552023-05-22"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4474"">thub pa'i bstan la rims kyis 'jug pa'i tshul</rs>
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma</rs>'i gsungs dang lung la bstan nas bris

column1: 1_007_05_Phya pa_rgyud bla ma don gsal_31.05.2022.xml,1_007_05,,ex705-1129-2023-06-271,finalized,1a1 - 1a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex705-1129-2023-06-271"" status=""finalized"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Cover page (1a)""/>
<pb n=""1a""/><lb n=""1a1""/> phyi <lb n=""1a2""/> <choice><reg>tsha</reg><orig>(tsha)?</orig></choice> <lb n=""1a3""/> 60 <lb n=""1a4""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4492""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i <abbr>bstan bcos</abbr></rs> kyi tshig dang don gyi cha rgya cher bsnyad pa phra ba'i don gsal ba</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: <note type=""translation"">Clarifier of subtle meaning – Extensive commentary on the words and meanings of the Mahāyānottaratantraśāstra</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_007_05_Phya pa_rgyud bla ma don gsal_31.05.2022.xml,1_007_05,,ex07052025-05-1316-41-09,reviewed,1b1 - 1b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex07052025-05-1316-41-09"" status=""reviewed""> <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Incipit (1b1)""/>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Invocation (1b1)""/>

column3: <rs type=""deity"">bcom ldan 'das ma pham pa</rs> la phyag tshal lo
column5: <note type=""translation"">I bow down to the Fortunate one, the Invincible one (i.e., Maitreya).</note>

column1: <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Introductory verses (1b1–1b3)""/>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 1""/>
<lg><l>gang gis rang gi rang bzhin dri med 'khor ba'i khong gnas pa
<l>zab yangs skyob pa'i gsung dang zag med zhi ba'i lam brten pas
<l>legs rtogs sgrib myed blo mnga' rgya che 'od zer stong 'bar ba
<l>zhi ba'i 'khor lo dam pas tshogs rnams rmin mdzad <lb n=""1b2""/> de la gus pas 'dud

<note type=""translation"">I respectfully bow down to the one (i.e. Maitreya) who abides in the saṃsāra with his stainless own-nature, who, depending both on the extensive and profond teachings of the protector (i.e. the Buddha) and on the uncontaminated path, who hence has the unobstructed wisdom of realization, who shines forth with thousands of extensive rays, and who brings to maturation groups (of beings) by means of the excellent wheel of pacification.</note>
<seg type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex7052023-07-1814-08-32"" status=""reviewed""> <milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 2""/>
<lg> <l>brtse chen blo gros ldan ba lta ngan sgra gcan las grol zhing
<l>chos kyi snang pa mchog gis blo ngan rab rib rnams bsal te
<l>sa stengs 'di na nyi bzhin grags pa lham me snang gyur pa
column3: </l><l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">zla myed <choice><corr>rigs par smra ba</corr><sic>rigs pas smra ba</sic></choice> chos gyi bla ma</rs> dpal <choice><reg>la</reg><orig>‹la›</orig></choice> 'dud

column1: <note type=""translation"">I bow down to the auspicious (Zhang tshe spong) Chos kyi bla ma, the matchless logician who, having great compassion and intelligence, is freed from the eclipse maker (Rāhu) of wrong views, and who eliminates eye-diseases (timira) of the bad-minded people by means of excellent light of teaching, and briliantly shining forth on the earth with a sun-like glory.</note></seg>
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 3""/>
<lg>     <l>ma pham rgyal sras dam pa'i zhal gyi bum pa bzang po nas
<l>mngon 'byung theg <lb n=""1b3""/> mchog nges <choice><corr>don</corr><sic>dan</sic></choice> dam chos bdud rtsi dri myed pa
<l>blo ngan <choice><corr>rlom</corr><sic>rlob</sic></choice> pa'i yid can ngan skyugs dri mas ma lcags shing
<l>'gro ba'i mi shes nad gsol 'jig rten 'di na rigs gnas rgyal

<note type=""translation"">May this stainless nectar — he excellent teaching of definitive meaning of the excellent vehicle, which has arisen from the auspicious vessel of the excellent Son of the victorious one, the Invicible (Ajita, Maitreya) — not be saturated with stains of the vomit of evil of the bad-minded ones, who have a conceited mind, and may it cure the disease of ignorance of the beings,
And may it prevail in this world (as) the foundation that is spiritual disposition (gotra).</note>
</seg></TEI>"

1_007_05_Phya pa_rgyud bla ma don gsal_31.05.2022.xml,1_007_05,,ex7052023-07-1814-08-32,reviewed,1b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex7052023-07-1814-08-32"" status=""reviewed""> <milestone unit=""section"" n=""v. 2""/>
<lg> <l>brtse chen blo gros ldan ba lta ngan sgra gcan las grol zhing
<l>chos kyi snang pa mchog gis blo ngan rab rib rnams bsal te
<l>sa stengs 'di na nyi bzhin grags pa lham me snang gyur pa
column3: </l><l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">zla myed <choice><corr>rigs par smra ba</corr><sic>rigs pas smra ba</sic></choice> chos gyi bla ma</rs> dpal <choice><reg>la</reg><orig>‹la›</orig></choice> 'dud

column1: <note type=""translation"">I bow down to the auspicious (Zhang tshe spong) Chos kyi bla ma, the matchless logician who, having great compassion and intelligence, is freed from the eclipse maker (Rāhu) of wrong views, and who eliminates eye-diseases (timira) of the bad-minded people by means of excellent light of teaching, and briliantly shining forth on the earth with a sun-like glory.</note></seg></TEI>"

1_007_05_Phya pa_rgyud bla ma don gsal_31.05.2022.xml,1_007_05,,ex007052025-05-2010-09-14,reviewed,1b3 - 1b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex007052025-05-2010-09-14"" status=""reviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Body of the text (1b3– ?[missing folio 92])""/>

de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3747"">bcom ldan 'das ma pham pa</rs>s <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3746""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">rgyan rnaMs pa 2</rs></rs> dang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3748""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5634"">rnam 'byed rnam pa gnyis</rs></rs> kyis skyob pa'i thabs la rten te rims kyis bkri ba'i laM las gdul <lb n=""1b4""/> bya rnaMs legs par rab tu btul ste skal ba dang ldan bar gyur ba na dus phyis 'os su gyur pa'i gdul bya la mchog gi don <rs type=""school"">theg pa chen po</rs>'i gsang pa dngos kyi don la blo gros gzhan gyis gnod pa med cing zhugs nas spang par bya ba ma yin pa  phyir mi ldog pa'i chos <choice><reg>kyi</reg><orig>‹kyi›</orig></choice> 'khor lo'i don rnam par <choice><reg>'byed pa</reg><orig>'byed pa{}</orig></choice> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa <choice><reg>chen</reg><orig>‹chen›</orig></choice> po rgyud bla ma</rs>'i stan bcos 'di <lb n=""1b5""/> <choice><corr/><sic>'di</sic></choice> sbyar bar mdzad do
'di la don bzhi ste
column2: spyi'i don lus rnaM par gzhag pa dang
column4: de sgrub par byed pa'i rigs dang
column5: bstan chos  yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_007_05_Phya pa_rgyud bla ma don gsal_31.05.2022.xml,1_007_05,,ex7052023-07-1814-32-32,unreviewed,56a3 - 56a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex7052023-07-1814-32-32"" status=""unreviewed"">sgrib pa dgu po 'di gcig pa bkag pa'i tha <lb n=""56a3""/> dad pa'am
column2: ngo bo tha dad pa'am
column3: ngo bo gcig la ldog pa tha dad pa yin zhe na
column4: gcig pa bkag pa'i tha dad pa ma yin te
column5: <abbr>thams cad</abbr> dngos po yin pa'i phyir ro
column6: dngos po tha dad pa'i nges pa'ang myed de bag la nyal la sogs pa 'ga' zhig dngos po gcig par 'gyur ba'i go skabs yod pas so
column7: dngos po 1 pa'i yang nges pa myed de rgyud bzhir phye ba'i rgyud tha dad pa rnaMs ngo bo tha dad par yang 'gyur ba'i <lb n=""56a4""/> phri ro
column8: des na dngos po gcig gam tha dad kyang bla ste mtshan nyid tha dad pa dgu yod pas sgrib pa dgu'o

column1: 1_007_05_Phya pa_rgyud bla ma don gsal_31.05.2022.xml,1_007_05,,ex07052025-05-1316-51-52,reviewed,91b8 - 93a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""91b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex07052025-05-1316-51-52"" status=""reviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Conclusive verses (?–93b7)""/>
<pb n=""92a""/><pb n=""92b""/><!--Folio 92ab missing-->
<lg><l><pb n=""93a""/><lb n=""93a1""/> dul ba'i tshig rnaMs dad ldan skye bo'i <choice><corr>rnar</corr><sic>snar</sic></choice> snyan cing
<l>skye bo ngan gang mthong na snying la zug rnu skyed byed ngag
<l>legs par bshad pa'ang gzhan la phan par su zhig seMs
<note type=""translation"">The words of those disciplined [in....] are sweet to the ear of faithful people.
Who would think that it is beneficial for others to explain correctly words that generate pain in the heart when seen by bad people.</note>
<seg type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex705-1104-2023-06-272"" status=""reviewed"">
<lg><l>yun ring brtson pas dkar po'i sa bon mthur ldan zhing
column3: </l> <l>skye dang skye <choice><reg>bar</reg><orig>ba‹r›</orig></choice> rab sbyang blo gros gsal gyur pa
column5: </l> <l><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3805"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">blo ldan khyu mchog chos rje chos kyi bla ma</rs>'i <lb n=""93a2""/> gsung
column7: </l> <l>theg mchog don gsal byed pa dran phyir mngon bar bstus

column1: <note type=""translation"">I have summarized, in order to remember the teaching of the Lord of Dharma Chos kyi bla ma, the wise excellent bull, that clarifies the meaning of the excellent vehicle,
Whose mind became clear through clarification in repeated births
And who has the power of the wholesome seed thanks to his long-term efforts.</note></seg>
<seg type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex705-1104-2023-06-29"" status=""reviewed""><lg><l>bsod naMs 'di yis skye bo dam pa de dang de
column3: </l> <l>bdud kyi tshogs bcom rkang gnyis gtso' bor gyur pa dang
column5: </l> <l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">bdag</rs> kyang de dag rjes su byang chub mchog thob nas
column7: </l> <l>'gro rnams zhi ba'i lam la rab du 'god gyur cig
column9: </l></lg><note type=""translation"">Trough these merits, may each and every excellent man become the best of the biped (i.e., a Buddha) who conquers the armies of demons, and

column1: May I, too, obtain the excellent awakening after them, and
May then beings be established in the path of pacification.</note></seg>
<lg> <l>gang dang gang dag mngon sangs rgyas pa'i <lb n=""93a3""/> zhing mchog der
<l>blo dman rtogs pas dbul zhing <choice><corr>rnyed</corr><sic>snyed</sic></choice> la gdu ba dang
<l>chos dang gang zag mchog la sdang par zhugs pa'i
<l>skye bo ngan ba'i tshogs kyis phyogs kun dben gyur cig
<note type=""translation"">In each and every excellent field of complete awakening
May all directions be empty of the flocks of bad men
Who engage hatefuly towards the doctrine and the exellent persons,
Who are of inferior mind, poor in understanding and attached to obtaining (things).</note>
<seg type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex705-1104-2023-06-273"" status=""finalized"">
<lg>    <l>gzhan <choice><reg/><orig>{°}</orig></choice>ma pham chos rgyal dri myed pa sa <choice><reg>stengs</reg><orig>steng‹s›</orig></choice> 'dir
column3: </l> <l>byang chub shing dbang drung du mngon sangs rgyas pa na <choice><reg>
column5: </reg><orig>‹¦›</orig></choice></l><l><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3831"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">chos kyi seng ge</rs> blo gsal grags pa'i nyi 'od kyis
column7: </l> <l><lb n=""93a4""/> theg pa mchog la rmongs pa'i rab rib sel gyur cig

column1: <note type=""translation"">When the Unconquered by others (i.e. Maitreya as a future buddha), the King of Doctrine, the Stainless one, will have correctly awaken under the bodhi-tree king (in Bodhgayā), on the earth,
May the eye-disease (timira) of ignorance with regard to the excellent vehicle be dispelled by the glorious sun-rays of the clear-minded one, the Lion of the doctrine (Chos kyi seng ge).</note></seg>
</seg></TEI>"

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4492""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos</rs> kyi tshig dang don gyi cha rgya cher bsnyad pa phra ba'i don gsal ba</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3805"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">shag kya'i dge slong chos kyi bla ma</rs>'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos nod pa <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3831"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s nye bar sbyar pa rdzogs s+hO
column8: <note type=""translation"">The “Clarifier of subtle meaning,” an extensive commentary on the words and meanings of the Mahāyānottaratantraśāstra compiled by the monk Chos kyi seng ge, who touched with his head the dust of feet of the Śākya monk Chos kyi bla ma, is completed.</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 4_105_02_I_R_M_bang chub lam gyi sgron ma las dkon mchog gsum la skyabs 'gro.xml,4_105_02,,ex105022023-10-06-102531,unreviewed,29a2-29a5 - 29a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex105022023-10-06-102531"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""29a2-29a5""/>bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa la 'jug pa'i sgo [29a3] thog ma ; gang dang ldan pas nang pa sangs rgyas par 'jog pa’i khyad chos bla na med ; ci bsam pa’i don rnams myur du 'grub par byed pa’i thabs kyi <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5409""> mchog dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas de'i bslabs bya la rnams la</rs> <lb n=""29a4""/> <rs type=""work"">slob pa'i tshul</rs> phyin ci ma log par dam pa rnams kyi gsung la brten ste legs par bshad pa 'di ni mang du thos pa'i dge slong song ba pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4113"">dkon mchog gsum gyi 'bang</rs> zhes bya bas : <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5722"">dpal byams chen</rs> gyi gnas su legs <lb n=""29a5""/> par sbyar ro
'dis bstan pa dang sems can la phan pa rgya che po 'byung bar gyur cig
column4: dge'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_01_Chu_PVin commentary.xml,3_087_01,,ex87012023-10-04-131522,reviewed,151b7 - 152a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87012023-10-04-131522"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""151b7""/> bdag nyid chen po'i gzhung don ji bzhin 'chad pas gzhan gyi the tshom gcod
column3: rang rgyud thal 'gyur gtan tshigs rnam par dag pas nus pa shin du che
column5: tshig don legs par 'phrod cing snga phyi 'brel pas 'jug ngogs shin du bde'
column7: de ltar chos gsum tshang ba legs par bshad pa bstan pa'i 'od zer yin
column9: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3747"">mi 'pham mgon</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3720"">klu las (em: la) dbang bsgyur</rs> dang
column11: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3771"">phyogs <lb n=""151b8""/> las rgyal</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773""><rs type=""work"">rnam 'grel</rs> mdzad pa</rs> ste
column13: kun kyi legs bshad 'dzin pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">chu mig pa</rs>s
column15: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">chen po'i pho brang dge ba'i gnas</rs> su sbyar
column17: legs bshad bstan pa'i 'od zer kun du 'phros pas 'gro ba thams cad kyang
column19: nyon mongs pa dang shes bya'i sgrib pa'i mun pa stug po rab bcom ste
column21: ji ltar ji snyed shes bya'i don kun <pb n=""152a""/><lb n=""152a1""/> blo yi mig gis legs mthong nas
column23: spangs dang rtogs pa'i rang bzhin byang chub chen po'i go 'phang thob par shog
column25: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs can</rs> 'dir 'ongs gzhung [*] lugs 'di 'chad 'di yi don
column27: legs par bshad dang ma bshad log <lb n=""152a2""/> par bshad pa'i don
column29: thams cad len 'chad 'dor la 'gal zlos med phyir 'di
column31: blo ldan legs bshad don gnyer kun gyis blang bar rigs
column33: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">dpal ldan grags pa</rs>'i gzhung don blta bar 'dod pa gzhan gyi blo
column35: sprin tshogs stug pos bsgribs pa'i mkha' la nyi ma blta ba bzhin
column36: <lb n=""152a3""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">bdag</rs> gi blo gros dri ma med pa nam mkh'yangs pa'i dbus

column1: 3_087_01_Chu_PVin commentary.xml,3_087_01,,ex87012023-03-0911-03-47,reviewed,152a3 - 152a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""152a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87012023-03-0911-03-47"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4023"">rgya shes rab dbang phyug</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4022"">'jang shag kya dpal</rs> <lb n=""152a4""/> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4020"">rkyel grags pa seng ge</rs> las sogs pa chen po rnams kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos blangs te mang du thos pa rgya mtsho'i pha rol du phyin pa'i don dang
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">slob dpon chos mchog </rs>gis mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5594"">ti ka 'thad ldan</rs> dang

column4: bsams <lb n=""152a5""/> pa las byung ba'i shes rab kyis legs par gtan la phab pa'i don ston par byed pa
column5: blo la zin pa tsam gyis mkhas pa'i mchog du 'gyur zhing mkhas pa rtag tu mi nyams par byed pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5290"">ti ka chen po</rs> 'di
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4018"">shag kya'i dge slong gtsang chu mig pa seng ge dpal</rs> gyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">gsang phu ne'u thog gi gtsug lag <lb n=""152a6""/> khang</rs> du brtsams te <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5595""><choice><orig>ya°</orig><reg>yar</reg></choice> lungs</rs> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5596"">khra 'brug gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du yi ger bkod pa'o
column13: dge'o
column15: <note type=""gloss""><abbr>zhus so</abbr></note>
column17: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_051_03_ral gri_bslab pa gsum gyi rgyun gyi me tog buda ocr.xml,2_051_03,,ex51032024-10-2515-46-27,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex51032024-10-2515-46-27"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4897"">bde bar gshegs pa'i shAkya'i bstan pa'i bslab pa gsum rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i sa tshe_mtha' rgya mtsho lta bu la shin tu sbyangs pa'i blo gros can theg pa chen po'i dkon mchog gsum la shes nas dad pa thob pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">shAkya'i dge
slong bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5680"">gtsang me tog mdangs can gyi dgon pa</rs>r sbyar ba rdzogs so

1_003_03_Gro_rngog lo rnam thar.xml,1_003_03,,ex3032023-07-1009-21-34,reviewed,1a,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1a""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex3032023-07-1009-21-34""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4459""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog</rs></note><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786""> lo tsha ba chen po</rs>'i rnam thar <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr></rs>

1_003_03_Gro_rngog lo rnam thar.xml,1_003_03,,ex3032023-07-1009-26-08,reviewed,24b3 - 24b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""24b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex3032023-07-1009-26-08"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4459""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bla ma rje btsun <lb n=""24b4""/> dam pa <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4332"">gsang phu</rs> lo tsha<anchor xml:id=""a51""/> ba chen po</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog blo ldan shes rab</rs></note> la bstod pa'i tshig le'ur<anchor xml:id=""a52""/> byas pa'i rnam par bshad pa</rs>
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">shAkya'i<anchor xml:id=""a53""/> dge slong <note type=""gloss"">gro lung pa chen po</note> blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyis sbyar ba <lb n=""24b5""/> rdzogs s+ho
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_003_03_Gro_rngog lo rnam thar.xml,1_003_03,,ex3032023-07-1009-32-56,reviewed,24b6 - 25a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" xml:id=""ex3032023-07-1009-32-56"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">bdag nyid chen po thugs legs par sbyangs pa'i me long yongs su dag <lb n=""24b6""/> par<anchor xml:id=""a55""/> legs par sbyar ba'i skad kyis rnam par sbyar ba'i gtsug lag gi tshogs mtha' yas pa kun du snang bas <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs ri 'i khrod</rs> na gnas <lb n=""24b7""/> pa'i blo'i mig<anchor xml:id=""a56""/> yongs su dag pa'i skye bo rnams la kun du<anchor xml:id=""a57""/> ston par mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4459""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">skad 2 smra ba chen po blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyi rnam par thar pa</rs>
column2: <anchor xml:id=""a58""/> de nyid <lb n=""24b8""/> kyi sras kyi thu bo sdom brtson  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">sde snod 'dzin pa chen po <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">gro lung pa</rs></note>blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> shes<anchor xml:id=""a59""/> bya bas rnam par spel ba yod do zhes<anchor xml:id=""a60""/> lung rin po che'i tshogs <lb n=""25a1""/>kyis rnam par phyug pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4136""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> dge ba'i bshes gnyen<note type=""gloss""> chag </note>nyi ma</rs>'i gsung las <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5838"">dge slong 'phags pa</rs>s gsal bar thos nas
column3: <anchor xml:id=""a61""/> gtam gyi skyes rmad <lb n=""25a2""/> du byung ba de<anchor xml:id=""a62""/> lta bu rna ba'i snod du nye bar lhung na ci ma rung snyam du bsams nas
column4: <anchor xml:id=""a63""/> ring du 'gro ba'i pho nya dag la nye bar 'gugs pa'i spying yig rnam <lb n=""25a3""/> par springs pa'i don
column5: <anchor xml:id=""a64""/> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4387"">dpal rte'u ra'i gtsug lag khang</rs> na gnas pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams</rs> kyis bsgrubs pa 'di <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5838"">bdag</rs> gi sug tu <lb n=""25a4""/> thengs<anchor xml:id=""a65""/> nas
column6: <anchor xml:id=""a66""/> lcags pho<anchor xml:id=""a67""/> rta'i<anchor xml:id=""a68""/> lo zla ba gcig pa la shin du<anchor xml:id=""a69""/> dag par byas pa'o
