column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-51-15,unreviewed,1a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-51-15"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<pb n=""1a""/><lb n=""1a1""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5517""> tshad ma rnam nges kyi 'grel bshad</rs><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5518""> bo dong 'jam dbyangs</rs> kyis mdzad pa bzhugs

X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-49-04,unreviewed,4b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-49-04"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">bram ze chen po</rs>'i rjes su 'brang ba [\[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> na re
column2: don bden pa rtogs pa chos gsum tshang ba yin la
column3: de yang don ni shes bya'i gnas lugs yin la
column4: bden pa ni ji ltar yin pa'am yod ltar gnas pa'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-34-10,unreviewed,5a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-34-10"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
[]gsum pa yid dpyod ni rtags la ma brten par sngar ma rtogs pa'i lkog gyur dngos su rtogs pa yin no ce na
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column3: blo 'dod rgyal ba yin pas gnas skabs don dang mthun yang log pa'i shes pa'i rang bzhin nyid yin te
column4: don med kyang 'byung ba'i phyir te
column5: dper na du ba dang dus mnyam du skyes pa'i rlangs pa ni me dang lhan cig yod kyang me'i 'bras bu ma yin te
column6: me dang ldog pa ma grub pa'i phyir de dang mtshungs so zhes zer ro

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-21-55,unreviewed,5a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-21-55"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<lb n=""5a5""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3892""> chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta'i [\]]</rs>zhal nas
column2: yid dpyod tshad mar thal te
column3: don bden pa gsar du nges pa'i phyir ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-35-00,unreviewed,5a6 - 5a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-35-00"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gi bzhed pas the tshom ni dngos po dang dngos po med pa gnyis kar 'dzin pa yin pas log pa'i shes pa yin la
column2: rgyu mtshan med pa dang log pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang bden pa'i rgyu mtshan gtan la ma phebs pa can yang the tshom gyi rang bzhin yin pas log pa'i shes pa yin no zhes grag go

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: de mi rigs te
column3: the tshom gyis gnyis ka'i rang bzhin yongs su ma bcad pa'i phyir dang
column4: log pa'i shes pa ni don de ma yin du yongs su <lb n=""5a7""/>gcod byed yin pa'i phyir ro zhe'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-23-13,unreviewed,5a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-23-13"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta'i [\]]/</rs>zhal nas
column2: the tshom de dang log pa'i shes pa gcig pa mi srid de
column3: the tshom ni [\[]bsgrub [;]sgrub [\]]byed gnod byed gang gi yang mthar ma thug pa yin la
column4: log pa'i shes pa la ni gnod byed nges pa min pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-35-21,unreviewed,6b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-35-21"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: rnam pa gnyis zhes brjod pa ni
column3: gnyis su grangs nges par gzung ba'i don du ste
column4: de lta ma yin na
column5: re shig 'dir 'di tsam zhig brjod par zad kyi
column6: dbye ba gzhan yang srid do zhes dogs pa skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsung ba ni mi bden te
column7: 'o zhes yongs su rdzogs pa'i tshig gis mtha' gzhan du srid pa'i dgos pa bkag pa'i phyir ro

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-23-13,unreviewed,7a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-23-13"">gzhan yang gzhal bya yul dus kyi mthar thug pa rang gi mtshan nyid de ma yin rnam par bcad pa spyi'i mtshan nyid gnyis kho <lb n=""7a4""/>na rtogs pa'i rnam pa dang ldan pa'i phyir ro
column3: []zhes <rs type=""work"">[\[]ti ka [;]ṭikka</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">[\]]mkhan po [\[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> [\[]gsung [;]gsungs [\]]pa'ang legs so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-35-45,unreviewed,9a8 - 9a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-35-45"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: tha snyad pa'i rtags kyi bsgrub bya 'di ni tshad ma'i gzhal bya yin pas dngos po'i chos gcig yin la
column3: de'ang tshad mas grub zin pa de nyid ma yin gyi rang bzhin sems dpa'i blos dpyad na don de la sngar bkod pa'i brda'i rgyu mtshan gyis chos mi 'dra ba bkag pa mi slu ba'i yul gyi bsgrub bya'o
column5: rjes dpag gi zhen stangs dang sbyar na tha snyad du brda'i rgyu mtshan gyi chos su grub pa'i ma <lb n=""9a9""/>yin dgag go zhes gsung ngo
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-36-26,unreviewed,12b4 - 12b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-36-26"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3735""> ka ma la shi la</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""> chos mchog</rs> ltar na
column3: mngon sum dang rtog bral ma 'khrul ba gnyis grub bde gcig gam mi gcig grang
column4: gcig na sgrub pa dang rjes su brjod pa'i don mi 'thad la
column5: mi gcig na mtshan nyid dang mtshon byar mi <lb n=""12b5""/>'thad do zhes thun mong du rtsod pa'i skyon med de
column6: mtshan mtshon don chos dag pa ma yin la
column7: blo ngor grub ma grub gnyis mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-24-19,unreviewed,13a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""13a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-24-19"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje pa</rs>'i zhal nas
column2: de lta na 'drer rung 'dzin pa zhes brjod na'ang dngos su 'dres pa 'dzin pa la ma khyab pas des na sgra dang don gnyis shes pa gcig gis 'dzin pa ni 'dres rung 'dzin pa'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-24-48,unreviewed,13b9b,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""13b9b""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-24-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje paN Di ta</rs>'i zhal nas kyang
column2: mngon sum tshad ma'i mtshan nyid rtog bral ma 'khrul ba nyid yin gyi gzhan mi dgos so zhes gsung ba'i don ni
column3: mtshon bya mngon sum dang tshad ma gnyis yod pa bzhin du der 'jog pa'i mtshan nyid kyang rigs gnyis te
column4: ma 'khrul ba dang tshogs pa'i rtog bral gyis mngon sum du 'jog la
column5: rtog bral dang tshogs pa'i ma 'khrul bas tshad mar 'jog pa la dgongs so
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-38-34,unreviewed,14b2b - 14b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""14b2b""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-38-34"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> na re
column2: khyab pa med de
column3: gal te yod na rjes dpag la gzhal bya'i rnam pa mi snang bar thal
column4: gzhal bya las dngos su ma skyes pa'i phyir gsung ba'i skyon med de
column5: gal te snang na rjes dpag snang bas 'jug pa'i tshad mar <lb n=""14b3""/>thal ba dang
column6: rjes dpag snang yul la ma 'khrul ba'i tshad mar yang 'gyur ro

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-39-18,unreviewed,14b7 - 14b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""14b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-39-18"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
'di la'ang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> gzugs 'dzin gyi yul de la sgra yod pa'ang ma yin
column2: sgra de'i bdag nyid kyang ma yin yang des gzugs 'dzin ma bskyed du chug na'ang sgra tha dad ldan par yod pa gang gis 'gog
column3: de ma bkag par gzugs 'dzin sgra las ma skyes par mi 'grub po zer na
column4: skyon med de
column5: spyir de la sgra yod pa <lb n=""14b8""/>tsam 'gog pa ma yin gyi gzugs 'dzin gyi yul de la sgra tha dad ldan pa ltar rung ma rang ldog sgra yin pa 'gog pa yin la
column6: de ltar na ma dmigs pa khegs so

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-51-11,unreviewed,15b4 - 15b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-51-11"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re
column2: gzhan <lb n=""15b5""/>yang don ni nyer sbyor la sogs thal 'gyur gyi dbang shes rtog bral du bsgrub par thal ste
column3: rtsa ba'i sbyor ba thal sbyor yin pa'i phyir ro zhes gsungs pa'i skyon med de dngos su thal ba brjod kyang
column4: dbang shes sgra don 'dre rung 'dzin pa 'gog pa la brda' dran sngon du ma song ba'i phyir zhes bya ba'i rgyu'am khyab byed mi dmigs pa'i don 'phen byed yin pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-52-49,unreviewed,16b1 - 16b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-52-49""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig</rs> de ni ma nges te
column2: a (rya?) gar bar <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">bod</rs> du 'ongs ma thag la chos bzhi so sor 'dzin pa med kyang don <lb n=""16b2""/>sbyor gyi rtog pa yod pa yin te
column3: bya ba gzhan btang nas gzhan len pa'i phyir zer na

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3887"">gnyal pa yab sras</rs><!--probably gNyal zhig db 3887-->  na re
column2: chos bzhi so sor 'dzin nus kyi stong ba rtags su 'god pas skyon med zer yang

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re
column2: ar gsar <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">bod</rs> du 'ongs ma thag la ji srid chos bzhi so sor 'dzin par med pa de srid du de sdom nas 'dzin pa'i don sbyor gyi rtog pa'ang med par thal
column3: ji srid chos bzhi sdom nas 'dzin pa'i don sbyor gyi rtog pa yod pa de srid du chos bzhi so sor 'dzin <lb n=""16b3""/> pa yang yod ces gsung ba ni 'thad par mthong ngo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-55-16,unreviewed,18b6 - 18b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-55-16"">tshad mas ma mthong ba'i don lkog shal 'dus pa nye ba nyid kyis nang gi 'du byed brda' dran pa'i bag chags yin la
column2: de sad <lb n=""18b6""/> par byas pa des dran par 'gyur ba'i phyir zhe na

column1: de'i lan la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> na re
column3: ba lang gi sgra chos can
column4: ma mthong ba'i don nye ba las dran par 'gyur ba ma yin te ma mthong [\[]pa'i [;]ba'i [\]]don dang brda'i 'brel med par thal
column5: rang bzhin 'brel pa'ang med pa'i phyir ro gsung ba ltar na
column6: ba lang gtan nas ma mthong zhing ba men gyi steng du srog chags 'di 'dra ba'i ba lang zhes pa'i dud 'gro yod do ces brda' goms pa la brten nas phyis ba men mthong ba <lb n=""18b7""/>na ba lang gi sgra dran pa mi srid par thal lo

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-25-19,unreviewed,22b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""22b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-25-19"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje paṇ ṭi ta</rs> ni mngon sum 'gros gsum pa yin te
column2: don gang zhig [\[23a2\]]'dzin pa na kha phyir bltas la dbang shes dang yid shes dus mnyam pa gnyis dang
column3: nang du de dag myong ba'i rang rig dang gsum mo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-39-43,unreviewed,22b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""22b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-39-43"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tstsha ba</rs> ltar na
column2: tshad ma snga ma dbang shes chos can
column3: gzhan la nges kyi tshad ma kho nar thal
column4: rang yul la tshad ma'i bya ba rdzogs pa tshad ma gzhan la ltos pa'i phyir
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-56-24,unreviewed,30a3 - 30a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""30a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-56-24"">mdor na gzhal bya mngon gyur lkog gyur yin pa'i phyir sngon po dang skad cig ma bzhin no ce na
de dgag pa la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column3: dpyad bya mngon gyur ma yin par thal ba dang
column4: dpyod byed shes pa'i khyad par tshad mas ma grub par thal ba gnyis las
column5: []dang po la
column6: thal ba chos gsum las
column7: dang po ni
column8: longs spyod byed kyi shes pa chos can
column9: longs spyad bya thams cad mngon gyur ma yin par thal
column10: longs spyod byed kyi shes pa mngon sum tshad mas <lb n=""30a4""/> ma grub pa'i phyir ro

column1: gnyis pa gtan tshigs ni khas blangs khyab pa ma grub ste
column2: spyod byed shes pa mi gsal zhing rtag pa'i phyir mngon sum tshad mas ma grub kyang
column3: spyad bya gsal zhing mi rtag pa'i phyir mngon gyur yin no zhe na
column4: shes rig yul la longs spyod pa mi srid par thal ces pa yang gi sgras bstan no
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-26-03,unreviewed,32b,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""32b""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-26-03"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892""> chos rje [\[]paṇ ḍi ta'i [;]paṇḍi ta</rs>'i [\]]zhal nas
column2: rnal 'byor mngon sum gang yin pa tshad ma yin te
column3: mngon sum yin pa'i phyir ro
column5: hes gsung ba ltar rtogs par bya'o
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-26-48,unreviewed,32b7 - 32b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-26-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
[]gnyis pa ma 'ongs pa bsgrub pa ni
column2: chos nyid yang dag pa'i don la rtse gcig tu gnas te bsgom pa chos can
column3: chos nyid yang dag pa'i don ji lta ba bzhin du gsal bar snang ba gcig byung ste
column4: chos nyid yang <lb n=""32b7""/>dag pa'i don la goms par byed pa'i rten brtan zhing
column5: goms pa ngang gis khyad par du 'gyur ba bsgom pa'i phyir
column6: dper na chags yul goms pa bzhin
column7: de'i chos can ni rang rig gis grub la
column8: bsgrub bya'i chos ni 'byung rung mi bsgom pa la yang yod cing 'byung nges bsgom pa la yang med pas [\[]gags [;]gegs [\]]med cing bsgom pa'i yan lag dang ma bral na 'byung nges yin te
column9: rgyu tshogs pa grangs tshang gis [\[]gags [;]gegs [\]]med na 'bras bu 'byung nges dpag nus pa <lb n=""32b8""/>bzhin no
column11: zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s gsung ngo
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-15-09,unreviewed,33b2 - 33b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""33b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-15-09"">gsum pa bsgrub byed kyi tshad ma ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">yab sras</rs> rtog bral dang ma 'khrul ba <lb n=""33b3""/> so sor 'chad mod
column3: 'on kyang 'dir yang dag pa'i don mthong ste goms pa mthar thug pa la brten nas yang dag pa'i don gsal bar snang bar grub pa na rtog bral dang ma 'khrul ba grub sde gcig pas
column4: 'dir dngos su rtog bral du bsgrub pa ni gzhung gi dgongs pa yin par mngon no
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-56-59,unreviewed,35a - 35a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""35a""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-56-59"">gnyis pa mngon sum ltar snang la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">yab sras</rs> rnams na re
column4: yang dag gnyis su bstan
column5: yang dag gnyis yod pa'i phyir ltar snang gnyis su <lb n=""35a7""/> bstan
column6: ltar snang gnyis yod pa'i phyir 'khrul pa ltar snang gi rigs logs su dbye ba dang gsum zhes gsung ngo

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-58-08,unreviewed,36b,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""36b""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-58-08"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column2: gzhal bya ni phyi rol gyi don bden pa yin la
column3: tshad ma ni 'dra ba chos gsum ste
column4: ngo bo myong rtogs kyi bdag nyid rnam pa'i khyad par myong bya'i rnam pa shar ba nus pa'i khyad par myong bya la <lb n=""36b""/> nges pa'i shes pa 'dren nus so
column6: []'bras bu ni gzhal bya phyi rol gyi don rtogs pa'o

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2609-59-40,unreviewed,40b1 - 40b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2609-59-40"">'di'i lan la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kho bo cag</rs>  theg pa chen po pa yang tha snyad tshad 'bras kyi tshul 'di khyod mdo sde pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'dod pa yin no zhes gsung ba ni
column4: mi bden te
column5: rigs pas de kho na'i don yongs su tshol ba'i skabs su rigs pa dor nas grub mtha'i rjes su 'brang ba ni
column6: bya ba phal pa la chags pa zhes bya ba smad pa'i gnas su <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob dpon</rs> gyis kyang gsungs shing
column7: gzhung na'ang
column8: gzung dang 'dzin pa rig <lb n=""40b2""/> pa rnams
column9: ces theg pa chen po pas tha snyad tshad 'bras kyi rnam bzhag 'khrul pa'i shes pa la ji ltar snang bzhin du rnam par bzhag gi
column10: grub mtha'i rjes su zhugs nas bzhag pa ni ma yin no
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-00-38,unreviewed,42b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-00-38"">gsum pa don snang gzhal byar bstan pa ni
column2: 'o na don rig <lb n=""42b6""/> tshad ma'i gzhal bya gang yin ce na

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column2: shes pa de mdo sde pa ltar du phyi rol gyi don de dang 'dra'am
column3: rnam rig pa ltar don snang gi bag chags dang 'dra yang rung zer ba ltar na
column4: don snang gi bag chags gzhal bya mngon gyur du thal
column5: don rig mngon sum gyi gzhal bya yin pa'i phyir
column6: des na rnam bzhag de ni rigs pa'i ra ba las [\[]rgal [;]'gal [\]]ba yin no

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-01-36,unreviewed,43b2 - 43b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""43b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-01-36"">'di ni bzung ba tsam bden pa bkag nas 'dzin pa'ang bden par grub pa 'gog pa'i gzhung yin pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column2: shu lo ka gcig po 'dis dbu ma'i lta ba bsgrubs pa yin no zhes gsungs pa ni
column3: dbu ma'i lta ba la sbyar du <lb n=""43b3""/> mi rung [\[]pa [;]ba [\]]ma yin mod
column4: sems tsam rnam med pa'i gzung 'dzin dang rnam pa bden pa 'gog pa'i skabs yin par shin tu gsal te
column5: brtsod [\[-]pa [\]]spang na yang
column6: sems tsam rnam med pa'i grub mtha' la rtsod pa spangs kyi
column7: dbu ma pa la brtsod pa spang bar mi snang ba'i phyir ro

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-15-55,unreviewed,43b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""43b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-15-55"">dbu ma la mos na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">'phags pa yab sras</rs> <choice><corr>kyis</corr><sic>kyi</sic></choice> gzhung la nges par byed pas der lta bar bya'o

X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-02-13,unreviewed,44b2 - 44b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""44b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-02-13"">gnyis pa ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">yab sras rnams</rs> na re
column3: rtags kyi mtshan gzhi lhan cig dmigs nges ni tshad mas grub
column4: don dam par rang bzhin tha dad yod med dngos 'gal du nges
column5: don dam par rang bzhin tha dad la
column6: snga phyi ba dang dus mnyam pa gnyis las
column7: snga phyi ba la
column8: lhan cig tsam khegs pa na lhan cig dmigs nges khegs la
column10: lhan cig dmigs nges 'gog pa la 'brel pa med pa rtags su 'god la
column11: [ \[]gha [;]'ga' [\]]zhig ni dngos su 'brel pa med pa'i phyir zhes 'god to
column13: </seg></TEI>"

gnyis pa ni
column2: dgag rtags gang yin <lb n=""5""/>6a8\]]pa thams cad ltar rung mi dmigs par sdud de
column3: dpe la ltar rung du grub pa gcig 'gog pa'i phyir
column4: dgag rtags thams cad dpe gcig gi steng du gtan la dbab tu rung ba'i phyir ro zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">sa skya pa </rs>gsung ngo

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX0062023-05-2610-16-57,unreviewed,93a3 - 93a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""93a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""exX0062023-05-2610-16-57"">gnyis pa rang gi thal ba'i ngag la mtshungs pa spang ba la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs>  gzhan gyis khas blangs pa gtan tshigs su mi 'gyur na
column3: <rs type=""person"">phyogs kyi glang po yab sras</rs> kyis gzhan [\[]gyi [;]gyis [\]]khas blangs pa'i rtags kyis chos gzhan mi 'dod pa thal bar 'phen pa mi 'thad par 'gyur ro zhe na
column4: skyon med de
column5: de ni khyab bya'i chos gzhan gyi rtog pas kun nas brtags nas khas blangs <lb n=""93a4""/>pas khyab byed kyi chos mi 'dod pa thal bar sgrub pa ste 'phen pa yin te
column6: khyab bya ni khyab byed med na mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro zhes ston pa
column7: dper na phyogs gcig la mtshon na
column8: bye brag pas ba glang gi spyi rdzas gcig yul dus rang bzhin tha dad kyi gsal ba ba lang du ma la dus cig char du 'brel bar don la yod ces dam bcas so

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-215-29-09,unreviewed,93b5 - 93b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""93b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-215-29-09"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

column3: ba lang gi spyi du mar thal
column4: zhes bkod nas ci'i phyir zhe <lb n=""93b6""/>na
column5: gang yul dus rang bzhin du ma la 'brel pa de du ma yin te
column6: dper na sor mo du ma la 'brel pa'i sen mo bzhin no

column1: X_006_bo dong sho re ba Pvin comm.xml,X_006,,exX062023-02-2315-43-12,unreviewed,153a1 - 153a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""153a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""exX062023-02-2315-43-12"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa shes rab 'bum</rs>  gyis sbyar ba las
column2: de nyid brjod bya'i don zab cing rgya che ba rnams ji lta ba bzhin du ston pas de las khyad par du byar med kyang rjod byed kyi tshig brling zhing 'ga' zhig ngag don du mdzad de
column3: gzhung la ma sbyar ba dang phal cher rgya 'grel ltar sbyar ba mang bas las dang po ba rnams [\[]kyis [;]kyi [\]]blos <lb n=""153a2b""/>lang dka' bar gyur pa dang
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">bdag nyid chen po</rs> de nyid kyang 'di la snon 'brid cung zad 'dra dang
column5: zhu dag cig dgos par 'dug ste
column6: zhes yang yang gsung ba rjes su dran pa dang
column7: gzhan yang sde snod 'dzin pa mang zhig gis bskul ba'i ngor 'jug pa bde zhing brjod bya'i don rnams ma tshang ba med par ston la
column8: [ \[]brjod [;]rjod [\]]byed kyi tshig zin pa tsam gyis yongs su rdzogs pa'i sde snod 'dzin <lb n=""153a3""/>pa ltar 'gyur ba 'di ni
column9: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">bdag nyid chen po dbu ma pa yab sras</rs> kyi bka' drin la brten nas lung rigs man ngag gi gnad rnams phyin ci ma log par khong du chud cing
column11: rtsod pa dang
column12: rtsom pa'i tshul la blo gros kyi snang ba yongs su rgyas pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5518"">bo dong ba 'jam pa'i dbyangs sho re pa</rs>s
column13: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4369""> dpal ldan brag ram gyi gtsug lag khang chen po</rs><!--assumed to be the same as brag ram  mgon khang-->r <lb n=""153a4""/>nye bar sbyar ba 'di re shig rdzogs sho
column15: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_028_03_ Shag rings _ dbu ma rtsa ba'i Tika rnam dpyad snying po.xml,1_028_03,,ex28032024-09-1115-20-56,unreviewed,60b2 - 60b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""60b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex28032024-09-1115-20-56"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4667""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">dbu ma rtsa ba</rs>'i ti ka rnam dpyad snying po</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: yul byang phyogs kyi rgyud du byung ba
column3: bdag dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol du son pa
column4: rtog ge ngan pa'i rgol ba tshar gcod par byed pa
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3931"">dbu ma <lb n=""60b3""/>smra ba'i dge slong shag rings</rs> kyis <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5660"">thang po che'i gtsug lag khang<anchor xml:id=""a1""/></rs> du sbyar ba
column6: rdzogs s+ho
column14: </seg></TEI>"

column1: X_028 Ral gri_bstan pa rgyan me tog.xml,X_028,,exX282024-10-1811-51-06,reviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX282024-10-1811-51-06"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""> <l>'di na mkhas pa'i rnam gzhag ma mthong bar

<l>mkhas pa'i gzhung brgya'i ming yang thos re skan

column1: X_0_02_Phag mo gru rnam thar W23436.xml,,JZLBKK78,exX0022025-02-2512-22-21,unreviewed,2a7 - 2b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022025-02-2512-22-21"" status=""unreviewed"">

column5: snyen rdzogs mdzad nas mtshan nyid bshad chos slabs
column7: mkhas mchog yongs su grogs la phyag 'tshal bstod

column1: X_0_02_Phag mo gru rnam thar W23436.xml,,JZLBKK78,exX0022025-03-0611-45-23,unreviewed,8b6 - 9a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022025-03-0611-45-23"" status=""unreviewed"">de yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3856"">'gro ba'i bla ma phag mo gru pa</rs> nyid kyis ¦ nyid <lb n=""8b7""/> la dbus kyi sa cha na yar gdan phebs ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">stod lungs rgya</rs>'i grwa sa bya bar byon
column2: tshogs der phebs mi thog ja 'bul ba dang bcas pa mdzad do

column1: de'i gnangs la zhugs la yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir
column2: snyen rdzogs mdzad par dgongs te <!--p. 403--><pb n=""9a""/><lb n=""9a1""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3915"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen bya yul ba</rs> la mkhan po zhus
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">stod lungs rgya</rs> yis slob dpon mdzad ¦</seg></TEI>"

column1: X_0_02_Phag mo gru rnam thar W23436.xml,,JZLBKK78,exX0022025.03.0514.55.37,unreviewed,9a2 - 9a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022025.03.0514.55.37"" status=""unreviewed"">de nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">dge bshes rgya'i </rs> grwa sa der bzhugs
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">dge bshes bya</rs><!--""bya"" is here likely a mistake for ""rgya"" (phonological equiv.)--> rang gi drung du chos kyi dngos gzhi zhus ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3837"">dge bshes g.yor po ba </rs> la zhar chos kyi slob dpon mdzad nas <lb n=""9a3""/> tshad ma dang mngon pa lhag par slabs ¦

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3915"">dge bshes bya yul ba </rs> la 'dul ba slabs ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3844"">dge bshes myang rin po che </rs> la byaMs chos la sogs pa kun slabs ¦ </seg></TEI>"

X_0_02_Phag mo gru rnam thar W23436.xml,,JZLBKK78,exX0022025.03.0514.55.372,unreviewed,9a4 - 9a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""exX0022025.03.0514.55.372"" status=""unreviewed"">

dus de'i dus na ¦ dgung lo nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa yin ¦ de lta bu'i mtshan nyid kyi chos rnaMs la <lb n=""9a4""/> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6650"">dbus</rs> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5915"">rtsang</rs> du grwa skor mang po mdzad pas ¦ skyes bu de dag gi sus dang zin pa med cing
column2: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6650"">dbus</rs> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5915"">rtsang</rs> 2 su mkhas pa'i grags pa chen po yang byung ngo

column1: tshad ma'i chos kun <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">dge bshes bya pa </rs> rang gtso che bar gsan no
de nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7185"">bla ma dmar </rs><lb n=""9a5""/> gyi drung du gsang sngags kyi chos rtso? gsan no
dbus kyi phyogs der mdo sngags kyi chos la yang shin du mkhas par grags so
de ltar mtshan nyid slob pa'i dus su yang ¦ mi rtag pa rgyud la 'khrungs zhing
column2: 'khor ba'i chos la skyo <lb n=""9a6""/> shas che bar 'jig rten chos brgyad kun grol [READING SGROL] du shig shig 'gro ba byung zhing ¦ nges 'byung tshed pa yang thugs rgyud la 'khrungs pa byung ngo
column3: thugs rgyud la 'khrungs dang ¦ res 1 mtshan nyid kyi chos la 'chad nyan mdzad de skyes <lb n=""9a7""/> bu mkhas pa'i grags pa yang thob ¦ mtshan nyid kyi chos rnams la yig 'jogs Ti ka yang mang du mdzad do
column4: mkhas mchog yong su grags la phyag 'tshal bstod
column5: ces pa'i don to
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex112_2023_05_08,reviewed,3b8 - 4a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" ana=""corpusmd:the_tshom"" xml:id=""ex112_2023_05_08"" status=""reviewed"">des na don du myi 'gyur ba'i the tsoM 'jug pa'i <choice><corr>yan</corr><sic>yang</sic></choice> lag sngar yod pas don du 'gyur ba'i the tsoM nyid myi dgos pa dang
column2: don du myi 'gyur ba'i the tsoM ldog pa'i yan lag gzhan sngar gnas pa yang bzlog par myi nus pas dgos 'brel kyi ngag don myed do zhe na

column1: de ni bden te <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag cag</rs> dgos 'brel kyi ngag 'jug pa'i yan lag du khas <abbr>len to</abbr>
column3: <pb n=""4a""/><lb n=""4a1""/> 'on kyang 'dir ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""> slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gi bzhed pa tsaM bkod pa yin la de'i 'dod pas kyang don du 'gyur ba'i the tsoM don la shas cher rtog pa la 'dod do
column5: de yang myi 'thad pa ni dngos po'i nyes pa yin bas 'di ci byar yod
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex112_2023_05_082,reviewed,4a6 - 4a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex112_2023_05_082"" status=""reviewed"">de las <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3773"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos kyi <choice><corr>grags</corr><sic>drags</sic></choice> pa</rs>s 'bras <choice><corr>bus</corr><sic>bu</sic></choice>  nye bar mtshon pa'i mtshan nyid gsungs pa de gtan la <lb n=""4a7""/> dbab par 'dod pa'i yang dag pa'i shes pa'i tshig gi don 'chad pa ni <quote source=""db:3779"" n=""37b4"">myi slu bar byed pa'i shes pa ni yang dag pa'i shes pa yin no</quote> zhes bya <choice><reg>ba'o</reg><orig>ba.do→ba'o</orig></choice>

1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex112_2023_05_083,reviewed,4b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex112_2023_05_083"" ana=""corpusmd:yid_dpyod"" status=""reviewed""> yid dpyod rnaM pa bzhi po rgyu mtshan myed pa dang
column2: log pa'i rgyu mtshan can dang
column3: yang dag pa'i rgyu mtshan gtan la ma <lb n=""4b8""/> phebs pa dang
column4: phebs kyang brjed pa ni the tsoM du 'du la the tsom yang gnyi gar gyur ba myed pa'i yul 'jog pas log pa'i shes par du'o zhes <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> sems so
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-07-1715-14-27,reviewed,5a1 - 5a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-07-1715-14-27"" ana=""corpusmd:blo_rigs"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag</rs> gis ni 'di ltar rig go
column3: shes pa ni rnam pa bzhi ste
column4: yang dag par rtogs pa dang
column5: ma rtogs pa dang
column6: log par rtogs pa dang
column7: the tsoM mo
column9: de la dang po ni tha snyad pa'i yang dag par rtogs pa kho na yin bas tshad ma'o
column11: gnyis pa ni tha snyad pa'i rtogs pa'i byed pa dang bral ba yin bas snang <choice><corr>la</corr><sic>pa</sic></choice> ma nges pa dang bcad pa'i yul can no
column13: gsuM pa ni myed pa'i don rtogs par <lb n=""5a2""/> byed pa la log pa'i shes pa mtha' dag go
column15: bzhi ba ni gang yang rnaM par myi gcod pas gang yang yongs su myi gcod pa'i phyir don <choice><corr>'jug</corr><sic>'jig</sic></choice>  pa'i nus pa myed pa'o
column17: yid dpyod mtha' dag ni log pa'i shes par 'du ste
column18: don myed par 'byung pas don myed pa'i rang bzhin dang ma bral ba'i phyir ro
column20: dper na du ba dang dus mnyaM du yod pa'i dngos po rnaMs ni me myed kyang 'byung pas mye'i 'bras bu ma yin ba'i rang bzhin dang ma bral <lb n=""5a3""/> ba bzhin no

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-241713,reviewed,5a3 - 5a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-241713"" ana=""corpusmd:tshad_ma"" status=""reviewed"">
mtshan nyid la log par rtogs pa spang pa ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5557"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon shes rab 'byung gnas sbas pa</rs> dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5549"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon shag kya blo</rs> phyi rol kyi nor bu'i 'od la nang gi nor bur sgro 'dogs pa tshad mar 'dod pa dang
column4: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5534"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon dul ba'i lha</rs> ni phyed kyi dus su nyin bar bu 'ongs par mthong pa'i rmyi laM kyang shes pa tshad mar 'dod pa dang
column5: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5570"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3771"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon phyogs kyi glang po</rs>'i slob ma kha cig</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:5570"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">mu stegs kha cig</rs> <choice><corr>dung</corr><sic>dang</sic></choice> <lb n=""5a4""/> dkar po la ser por 'khrul pa yang dkar po'i mdog dang dbyibs la tshad mar 'dod pa rnaMs spangs pa'o

column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-07-1715-34-59,reviewed,6b8 - 7a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-07-1715-34-59"" status=""reviewed"">'di ltar <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> mngon suM rang rig pa'i rang bzhin don daM par yod la

column1: <orig>{ma grub pa'i khyad par}</orig></choice>mtshon bya phyin ci log du <abbr>thal lo</abbr> zhes gsungs so

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-07-1715-43-33,reviewed,8a2 - 8a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-07-1715-43-33"" status=""reviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5629"">slob dpon rab du zhi ba bzang po</rs> 'di skad ces
column2: mying dang mying can kyi 'brel pa ci zhig bsgrub par zad kyi
column3: mtshon bya grub pa la mtshan nyid bsgrubs pa'am
column4: mtshan <lb n=""8a3""/> nyid grub pas mtshon bya bsgrub pa ni ma yin te
column5: rtog bral ma 'khrul ba nyid la mgnon suM zhes 'dogs pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba'i don la <choice><corr>bsdu</corr><sic>ba su ba</sic></choice> ni
column6: <quote source=""db:3779"" n=""40b1-2""> rtog pa dang bral zhing ma 'khrul ba nyid <choice><corr>ma grub pa</corr><sic>bsgrub pa</sic></choice> yin quote</quote> zhes bya ba'o

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.31,reviewed,8a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.31"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""3773"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">slob dpon</rs> kyis 'khrul ba ni log par snang pa yin no zhes bshad pas de bral ba gzung yul la ma 'khrul ba grub po
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.32,reviewed,9b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.32"" status=""reviewed"">de bden <lb n=""9b5""/> te des na <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5594"">chos mchog chen po</rs>r <quote source=""db:5594"" n=""ad PVin 1 40,3"">grur zhugs pa'i 'khrugs pa lasogs pa</quote> zhes rgyu gsuM bshad do
column3: 'dir ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> gis legs par ma brtags par nges so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.33,reviewed,10a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.33"" status=""reviewed"">glan ka spang pa ni don gzhan myi 'dzin na bcad pa'i yul can du thal ba dang
column2: 'dzin na dbang po'i shes pa la myi ltos na
column4: ltos kyang don gzhan 'dzin bas 'on long myed par thal ba brjod pa las
column5: yul gzhan yin bas nyes pa dang po spangs so
column7: de'i rgyun <lb n=""10a5""/> 'dzin bas don gzhan myi 'dzin ba'i phyir 'on long myed pa'i nyes pa myed la
column8: de'i nyer len la ltos pas gtan tshigs myi ltos pa yang ma yin no
column10: zhes <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> dgongs so
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_12_F_C_NC_rNgog_rigs thigs grel don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_12,,ex1122023-05-24.17.383,reviewed,15a2 - 15a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1122023-05-24.17.383"" ana=""corpusmd:mi_dmigs_pa"" status=""reviewed"">de yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3780"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> ltar na dmyigs pa'i mtshan nyid du gyur ba ni bltar rung pa'o
column3: de ni myi dmyigs pa'i khyad par yin no
column5: myi dmyigs pa <lb n=""15a3""/>zhes bya ba ngo bo dang khyad par bltar rung pa 'gal ba ma <abbr>yin te</abbr>
column6: khyad par sgro btags pa'i phyir ro
column8: sgro gdags par bya ba ni rgyu mtshan yin la de yang sa phyogs kyi chos yod na buM pa snang par brtag par bya ba'o
column12: de'i rang bzhin yang buM par snang pa'i shes pa'i rgyu nus pa <choice><corr>thogs</corr><sic>thog</sic></choice> myed tshang pa'o
column14: sgro gdags pa'i rgyu mtshan de'i shes par byed pa yang shes pa cig la <choice><corr>'dre</corr><sic>'dra</sic></choice>  ba'i don gzhan snang pa'o zhes so

column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_028_02_ dBang phyug rin chen _ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa'i sgrung 'grel.xml,1_028_02,,ex28022024-09-2015-39-31,unreviewed,[503:6] - [503:7],"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex28022024-09-2015-39-31"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">thub pa'i gsung dang de'i dgongs <lb n=""[503:6]""/> 'grel rnams

<rs type=""person"" ana="""">bdag</rs> blo byis pa'i dbang gyur 'gal 'khrul rnams

sgrung 'grel<anchor xml:id=""a6""/> ngo mtshar <abbr>rin chen</abbr> phreng ba 'di
skye rgu'i blo yi dbul ba brtan<anchor xml:id=""a7""/> bcoM nas

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">chos kyi rje dpal ldan bla ma dam pa</rs> la bstod pa gsol 'debs dang bcas pa 1 gyis zhes bskul ba'i rjes su <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5066"">slob dpon dpal ldan ye shes</rs> kyis kyang bskul ba'i ngor
chos kyi rje dpal ldan la ma dam pa de nyid kyi bka' 'bangs su gyur pa
column2: ma Ni ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4066"">thogs med</rs> kyis

column7: shub+haM

column3: zer ba la mkhyen 3 gang mkhyen 3 tsaM mi skye <abbr>med</abbr> <choice><reg>mngon sum</reg><orig>mngon ‹3›</orig></choice> gyis rtogs pa'i mkhyen 3 yin
column4: dang po mi rigs te <abbr>thams cad</abbr> <choice><reg>mkhyen</reg><orig>‹mkhyen›</orig></choice> pa nyid 3 gyi sgo nas ces bstod <abbr>phyag gi</abbr> sgor gsungs pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

yang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3816"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><abbr>dge bshes</abbr> ar</rs> na re bstod <abbr>phyag gi</abbr> yul nyungs skyon <abbr>med</abbr> de mkhyen 3 mtshon byed kyi chos suM bcus sbyor ba <abbr>chos sku</abbr> bsdus pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr> zer ba yang ma yin te
column2: chos suM bcu la bstod phyag byas pa <abbr>med</abbr> pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr>

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex703-2024-10-04-16-11,reviewed,11a'9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11a'9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex703-2024-10-04-16-11"" status=""reviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3807"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><abbr>dge bshes</abbr> 'bre</rs> na re 'dir smos yuM sras na rnaM par bzhag 'ga yin la <abbr>bye brag</abbr> du gzhi shes pa <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa dang nyan rang 'phags pa
column2: laM shes <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa dang byang 'phags
column3: rnaM mkhyen <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> pa dang rdzogs pa'i <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> 2 rim pa bzhin rnaM par bjog pa'i rgyu dang des bzhag pa'i sras <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes zer ba mi rigs te
column4: </seg></TEI>"

3 pa rtsod spang ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> pa</rs> na re mkhyen 3 dang 'phags 4 bdag mi 1 cing dus mi mnyam par thal rgyu 'bras yin pa'i phyir
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032024-10-17-14-01,unreviewed,22b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032024-10-17-14-01"" status=""unreviewed"">yang yab sras <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">gnyal pa</rs><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">gzad pa</rs></note> rnaMs na re theg suM gyi laM lnga mtshan 4 yuM du mtshon <lb n=""22b6""/>chos thaMd rang 4n Na par rtogs pa mtshod yino te
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032024-10-17-14-33,finalized,25a4 - 25a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""25a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032024-10-17-14-33"" status=""finalized"">

column3: zhes zer ba dang rnaM pa skye <abbr>med</abbr> du rtogs <abbr>tsam mo</abbr>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032025-04-2417-56-04,finalized,52a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""52a9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032025-04-2417-56-04"" status=""finalized"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">'bre </rs> <abbr>sogs</abbr> na re dran pa bcad shes yin te sngar tshogs laM du rigs shes kyis rtogs zin <note type=""gloss"">pa</note> la 'jug pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr> zhes gsung pa ni ma yin te
column2: 'di ltar rtogs zin la 'jug pa'i cha yod de mnyaM bzhag ma yin la
column3: mnyaM bzhag la tshogs lam bcad shes ma yin pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032025-04-2417-56-042,unreviewed,52b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""52b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032025-04-2417-56-042"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre </rs>na re rtog pa 'di dag sgra don [ -2 3 1 -  ]pa snang ba'i rtog pa mnyam gzhag la brten pa spong bas khyad par du 'phags pa'o zhes zer ba ni ma yin te
column2: mnyam bzhag la chos nyid kyi rnam pa gsal ba'i phyir ro khyab pa yod de
column3: rnam rtog rjes su 'brel ba la
column5: don gsal snang ba yod ma yin
column7: zhes gsungs pa'i phyir dang
column8: ting 'dzin rnam par mi rtog pa
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032024-10-18-13-49,unreviewed,62a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032024-10-18-13-49"" status=""unreviewed"">

dang po la 3 <lb n=""62a7""/>las gzhan lugs dgag pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">gnyal zhig</rs></note> na re
column2: sgrub pa tsaM gyi mtshid ni gzhan don du rnamkhyen chen po 3 thob par bya ba'i phyir chos thaMd mi dmigs pa'i tshul gyis slob par byed pa yin la
column3: byeg du chos sku thob pa'i don sbyor ba kunas slong byed kyi bsaM pa'i go gyon pa 'jug pa seMs bskyed pa <note type=""gloss"">go</note> ni sgrub
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032025-04-2417-58-14,finalized,89a6 - 89a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""89a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032025-04-2417-58-14"" status=""finalized"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre shes rab 'bar</rs></note> na re sa dgu <choice><reg>pa'i</reg><orig>'i</orig></choice> rjes thob sgoM laM zag bcas yin <lb n=""89a7""/> te zag pa 'byung du rung ba'i phyir te zag pa'i rkyen 2 snang yod pa'i phyir ro
column3: sa dgu pa'i mnyaM bzhag bsgoM laM zag <abbr>med</abbr> yin te zag pa 'byung du mi rung ba'i phyir te zag pa'i rkyen 2 snang <abbr>med</abbr> pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr>
column5: zer ba'ang mi 'thad de
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032024-10-18-15-50,finalized,124a1 - 124a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""124a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032024-10-18-15-50"" status=""finalized"">

yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3840"">kha 1</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3840"">dan bag</rs></note> na re dbang swos 'gog <lb n=""124a2""/> pa yin te phung po'i mthong spang ces mdo las bshad pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr> zhes zer ba ni ma yin te lhag <abbr>med</abbr> thob par thal ba'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr>

3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032023-10-251,finalized,156a8 - 156b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""156a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032023-10-251"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (156a8-156b2)""/><note type=""editorial"">The manuscript reproduction is not very legible and most consonants are not legible. This excerpts mostly follows the reading of the BUDA etext for parts that are unclear.</note>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">shes rab kyi pha rol <lb n=""156a9""/> tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa</rs>'i rgyan zhes bya ba'i 'grel pa</rs>

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> dpon seng ge bzang po</rs>s mdzad pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3737"">rgya gar kyi mkhan po bidya ka ra pra bha</rs> dang
zhu chen kyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4222"">lo tsA ba ban de dpal brtsegs</rs> kyis bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa las
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3803"">slad kyi paNDita dpal go mi 'chi med</rs> la sogs pa dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo ts+tsha ba dge slong blo ldan shes rab</rs> kyis legs par gtan la phab pa ¦

column1: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5171"">'grel pa don gsal ba zhes <lb n=""156b1""/> bya ba tshig dang don legs par bshad pa <abbr>shes rab pha rol tu phyin pa</abbr><!--abbreviated ""shen pa""--> mchog gi rgyan </rs>ces bya ba
column2: lu<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4296"">lung dang rigs par smra ba ¦ shag kya'i dge slong <choice><reg>brtson 'grus rdo rje</reg><orig>°o(n grus) °(d)oe° °°</orig></choice></rs>s nye bar sbyar ba × rdzogs s+h+yo
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032023-10-253,finalized,156b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""156b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032023-10-253"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Post-colophon annotations (156b3-4)""/><note type=""editorial"">In smaller script than the body of the text.</note>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5171"">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa × shes <choice><reg>rab</reg><orig>r°°</orig></choice> mchog gi rgyan</rs> ces bya ba × <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7353"">shakya'i dge slong d+ha rma <choice><reg>b+ha</reg><orig>°°°</orig></choice> tra</rs>'i sbyin par bya ba'i chos s+ho

3_070_03_C_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,3_070_03,,ex70032023-10-255,finalized,156b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""156b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70032023-10-255"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><!--Repeats the colophon, in a different dbu med script-->  <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5171"">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i bshad pa
column2: shes rab <note type=""editorial"">Possibly a gloss</note> mchog gi rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7353"">shakya'i dge slong d+ha</rs> <note type=""editorial"">The reproduction of the folio does not allow to see whether something follows.</note>

column1: </seg></TEI>"

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">dags po</rs><note type=""editorial"">We provisionally take ""dags po"" to refer to Dwags po lha rje, i.e., sGam po pa. Another candidate would be Dwags po dbang rgyal (ID:3792)</note> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs><note type=""editorial"">We provisionally take ""khyung po"" to refer to Khyung po grags se. Another candidate would be Khyung po Chos kyi brtson 'grus (ID:5887)</note> ni <quote xml:id=""d2e1608"">gha te gha te</quote> zhes pa ni rnam par thar pa'i sgo stong pa nyid yin la
column2: <quote xml:id=""d2e1611"">pa ra gha te</quote> zhes pa ni mtshan ma <abbr>med</abbr> pa yin la
column3: <quote xml:id=""d2e1617"">pa ra sang gha te</quote> zhes pa ni rmon pa myed pa yin no zer ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_002_02_C_NI_Ar_sher phyin rgya grel_etext.xml,1_002_02,,ex20220240828_12,reviewed,6a4 - 6a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex20220240828_12"" status=""reviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'brom</rs> ltar na <quote xml:id=""d2e1624"">tad yA tha</quote> zhes pa ni 'di lta ste bya ba yin la
column2: <quote xml:id=""d2e1627"">gha te gha te</quote> bya ba ni song 1 song 1 bya ba yin pas tshogs laM sbyor laM du song 1 bya ba yin la
column4: <quote xml:id=""d2e1630"">pa ra gha te </quote>zhes bya ba ni <lb n=""6a5""/> pha rol du song 1 bya ba yin pas mthong laM du song 1 bya ba yin la
column5: <quote xml:id=""d2e1636"">pa ra sang gha te</quote> zhes bya ba ni yang dag par song 1 bya ba yin pas
column6: sgoM laM du song 1 bya ba yin la
column7: <quote xml:id=""d2e1640"">bho te swo ha </quote>zhes bya ba ni byang chub zhi bar song 1 bya ba yin pas mi slob pa'i laM du song 1 bya ba yin zer te legs so

column1: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_054_01_Ral gri_rNam nges tika_sakyalibrary-com.xml,2_054_01,,ex54012024-09-1216-56-432,finalized,158a5 - 158a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" edRef=""inst:4941"" n=""158a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex54012024-09-1216-56-432"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4942""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">tshad ma rnam par nges pa</rs>'i 'grel bshad rgyan gyi me tog</rs> ces bya ba <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7347"">shar phyogs dzA ga ta la</rs>'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6032"">paN Di ta chen po dA na shi la</rs>'i man ngag brgyud pa la brten te dben par gnas shing sangs rgyas kyi bstan <lb edRef=""inst:4941"" n=""158a6""/> pa 'byed pa la brtson pa zab pa dang rgya che ba gang yin pa de la mos pa thob pa shakya'i bstan pa la mang du thos pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">btsun pa rigs pa'i ral gri</rs>s sbyar ba 'di legs par rdzogs s+ho
column5: </seg></TEI>"

dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">brtson 'grus seng ge</rs> na re rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la grub kyang phyogs 1 la ma grub pa ni sgra la <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""46b4""/> rtsol byung khyab byed du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'am
column2: sgra la rtsol byung rten rtsam du yod pas mi rtag pa khyab byed du yod par bsgrub pa lta bu'o

3_087_02",,ex45012023-03-0211-59-11,unreviewed,46b7 - 46b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex45012023-03-0211-59-11"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
tshogs pa rtags su bkod pa'i tshe ya rgyal 1 chos can la brten yang ya gyal 1 chos can la mi rten na phyogs chos ma grub pas khyab pa yin ste
column2: ya gyal khegs pas tshogs pa khegs pa'i phyir
column3: tshogs pa chos can du bzhag pa'i tshe
column4: rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la ma grub kyang rtags chos can gyi phyogs 1 la grub na <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""46b7""/> phyogs chos grub pas grub pa yin te
column5: <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>rigs kyi bye brag<?oxy_comment_end?> snang pa dang stong pa'i tshogs don chos can bsgrub pa'i tha snyad du byar rung ste
column6: bsgrub chos ma dor ba yin pa'i phyir zhes rtags su bkod pa'i tshe
column7: bsgrub chos ma dor ba de stong nyid la ma grub kyang snang pa la grub pas snang stong tshogs pa la brten pa'i phyogs chos grub pa bzhin no
column9: <lb edRef=""inst:4770"" n=""46b8""/> spyi rtags su bkod pa'i tshe bye brag cig chos can la ma grub kyang bye brag 1 chos can la grub na phyogs chos grub pas khyab pa yin ste
column10: rigs kyi bye brag grub pas spyi 'grub pa'i phyir
column11: spyi chos can du bzhag pa'i tshe chos can gyi bye brag 1 la rtags grub kyang chos can gyi bye brag 1 'ang rtags ma grub na phyogs chos ma grub pas khyab pa yin no
column13: zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">chos 46b9 kyi seng ge </rs>smra'o
column15: </seg></TEI>"
