1_001_10_F_C_NO_M_rNgog_dbus mtha don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_10,,ex1101106-02-2023-12-23,unreviewed,1b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1101106-02-2023-12-23"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3756"">slob dpon thogs med</rs> yin la de dag kyang mchod par 'os <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>yon tan</abbr> dang <abbr>ldan par</abbr> go bas rtsa ba dang bshad pa la yid ches par <abbr>'gyur ro</abbr>

1_001_10_F_C_NO_M_rNgog_dbus mtha don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_10,,ex1101106.2.2023.1,unreviewed,3a7 - 3a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1101106.2.2023.1"" status=""unreviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6262"">slob dpon blo gros brtan pa</rs>s kyang bshad pa ni mtha' gnyis sel ba'i dbang <lb n=""3a8""/>du byas nas bshad pa dang
column2: lam gnyis sgrub pa'i dbang du byas pa'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_10_F_C_NO_M_rNgog_dbus mtha don bsdus_etext.xml,1_001_10,,ex1102023-02-06-15-50-11,finalized,13a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""13a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1102023-02-06-15-50-11"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (13a7)""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4439""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5585"">dbus dang mtha' <abbr>rnam par</abbr> 'byed <abbr>pa</abbr></rs><abbr>'i</abbr> don bsdus pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge slong blo ldan</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o

2_041_01_bzad_rin_mo_AS_W1PD89084.xml,2_041_01,,ex41012024-09-1014-28-24,finalized,3b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex41012024-09-1014-28-24"" status=""finalized"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> na re rtso pa'i skabs mngon du byas nas gzhung mdzes par 'gyur ba tsaM ngag 'di'i <abbr>'bras bu</abbr> yin la
column2: de yang rang <abbr>bzhin</abbr> kyi mdezs pa ngag 'di'i <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> mi 'dod kyi bcos mas ba shes pa ngag gis <abbr>'bras bur</abbr> 'dod pas gzhung 'buM pa <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa rang <abbr>bzhin</abbr> gyi mdzes pa yod kyang dgos 'brel gyi ngag <abbr>med</abbr> pas bcos mas mdzes pa <abbr>med</abbr> do zhes zer pa yang ma yin te

column1: 2_041_01_bzad_rin_mo_AS_W1PD89084.xml,2_041_01,,ex41012025-05-0612-52-43,finalized,5b3 - 5b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex41012025-05-0612-52-43"" status=""finalized""><milestone n=""gzhan lugs dgag pa"" unit=""section""/>dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> na re brjod bya bden pa yod par bstan pas bden rtogs kyi dgos pa <abbr>med</abbr> pa'i log rtogs khyegs la
column2: <abbr>de dgos</abbr> pa bstan pas sgrub mi nus pa'i

column1: <lb n=""5b4""/> log rtogs khyegs so zhes zer ba ni ma yin te
column2: brjod bya bden pa yod par bstan pas de nyid <abbr>med</abbr> pa'i log rtogs khegs kyang de rtogs dgos pa <abbr>med</abbr> pa'i log rtogs mi khegs te
column3: brjod bya bden pa yod pa la de rtogs pas ma khyab pa'i phyir shing yod par bstan pas sha pa <abbr>med</abbr> pa'i log rtogs mi khegs pa'i <abbr>bzhin no</abbr>

column1: yang dgos pa bstan pas de nyid <abbr>med</abbr> pa'i log rtogs khegs kyang sgrub mi nus pa'i
<lb n=""5b5""/> log rtogs mi khyegs te
column2: dgos pa yod pa la sgrub nus pas ma khyab pa'i phyir 'jog po'i nor bu <abbr> bzhin no</abbr>
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_041_01_bzad_rin_mo_AS_W1PD89084.xml,2_041_01,,ex41012025-05-0612-57-09,finalized,18b3 - 18b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex41012025-05-0612-57-09"" status=""finalized"">dang po ni gal te rig tshogs pas ldog pa'i ched du phung po lnga bstan nas
column2: chags sdang <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa'i don du phung po lnga mi ston pa la rgyu mtshan ci yod zhe na
column4: 'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4291"">brang ti</rs> na re nyong pa <abbr>thms cad</abbr> kyi rgyu 'jig

column1: <lb n=""18b4""/> tshogs la lta ba yin la des de nyes che bas de bzlog pa'i don du phung po lnga bstan zhes zer ba ni ma yin te
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_041_01_bzad_rin_mo_AS_W1PD89084.xml,2_041_01,,ex41012025-05-0612-55-06,finalized,18b7 - 18b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex41012025-05-0612-55-06"" status=""finalized"">yang gal te bdag lta'i gnyen por de bas
<lb n=""18b7""/> ngo skal du che ba'i gang zag la bdag <abbr>med</abbr> par bsgoM pa zhes pa gzhan yod pa'i phyir ro zhe na
column2: 'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4242"">rog</rs> na re de ni <abbr>nyon mongs</abbr> rnam sbyong °°° sa bon °°° spong pa'i gnyen po yin la
column3: 'di ni spyod pa rnam sbyong de mngon 'gyur spong pa'i gnyen por bstan pa yin <abbr>pas so</abbr> zhes pa zhal 'tsham yang <note type=""gloss"">de lta bu °°° dbye °°°°°° zhugs pa'i phyir dang
column4: 'di °°°°°° brjod pas bdag °°° med par °°°°°° bstan °°°°°°
column6: yang gal te °°°°°° log rtogs mi skye pa'i phyir de bstan pa don med do °°°
column7: 'di la 'phags pa rnaMs log rtogs skye pa phyis pa rnaMs skye po zhes zhal °°°°°° <!--TOCHECK gloss needs proofreading--></note> sa bdun pa man chad du de skye par bshad de

column1: <lb n=""18b8""/> mtshan la rgyu dang phung po dang
column3: khaMs dang skye mched dag dang ni
column5: khaMs 3 pa la gnas dang chags zhes gsung pa'i phyir ro
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_041_01_bzad_rin_mo_AS_W1PD89084.xml,2_041_01,,ex41012024-09-1014-31-26,finalized,180b2 - 180b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""180b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex41012024-09-1014-31-26"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4011"">mang du thos pa shag kya'i sras
column3: lung rigs 'dzin pa gsad pa ring mo</rs> gyis
column5: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5662"">gnyes thang brag sna</rs> zhes bya bar
column7: gzhan gyi don du brtson pas byar

column1: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4752""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3755"">chos mngon po kun las btus pa</rs>'i rnams par bshad pa gsal ba blo'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba <lb n=""180b3""/><note type=""editorial"">There's possibly a lost portion of the line.</note> chos dang gang zag po
column5: <note type=""gloss"">dag go
column6: </note> bkra shis par gyur gcig
column7: he he

column1: 2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-01-3114-45-40,reviewed,2b6 - 2b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-45-40"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><abbr>thun mong</abbr> dang de <abbr>min par</abbr> snang yang <abbr>gcig</abbr> du zhen pas <abbr>gcig</abbr> yin zhe na ¦

<abbr>thun mong</abbr> min bar snang <abbr>ba'i</abbr> se gol gyi sgra <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang 'dzin rtog <abbr>pa'i</abbr> snang yul dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦<lb n=""2b7""/> <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ don daM par don byed nus <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ tshad ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> gang rung min <abbr>ba'i</abbr> rtog tshad kyi <abbr>gzhal bya</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>rang mtshan</abbr> <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr> </rs>dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsA ba</rs>'o ¦</seg></TEI>"

2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-02-0310-54-47,reviewed,2b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-02-0310-54-47"" status=""reviewed""><!--unclear whether ""sgros"" is Indian or Tibetan -->

lkog gyur <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang 'dzin <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> gyis bzung don du byas nas <abbr>rtogs</abbr> par mi 'thad <choice><orig>{°}par</orig><reg>par</reg></choice> thal ¦ rang 'dzin <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> la rang 'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod <abbr>pa'i</abbr> nus pas stong ba <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5565"">sgros</rs> dang <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">chos mchog</rs> go</abbr>
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-01-3114-46-20,reviewed,2b7 - 2b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-46-20"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

tshad ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> gang rung min <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <lb n=""2b8""/> rtog tshad kyis rtogs par mi 'thad  <choice><orig>{°}par</orig><reg>par</reg></choice> thal ¦ rang 'dzin gyi blo la rang 'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod <abbr>pa'i</abbr> nus pas stong <abbr>pa'i</abbr> spyi mtshan <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">lo tsA ba</rs>'o
</seg></TEI>"

2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-01-3114-27-10,reviewed,4b1 - 4b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-27-10"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

rang gzung don gyi dngos 'bras min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <lb n=""4b2""/>de'i nus pa nye ba la mi ltos <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""4018"">chu <abbr>mig</abbr></rs><abbr> go</abbr> ¦</seg></TEI>"

2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-02-0110-17-09,reviewed,4b3 - 4b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-02-0110-17-09"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><!--TODO unclear whether sgros is Indian or Tibetan-->

tshe snga phyi la <abbr>dmigs</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> mngon <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ khyod tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>rtogs</abbr> byed <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ khyod <abbr>med</abbr> dgag <abbr>yin pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ ma khyab na ¦<lb n=""4b4""/><abbr>med</abbr> dgag yin na tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>med</abbr> dgag yin tshe snga phyi <abbr>med</abbr> pa <abbr>rtogs</abbr> <abbr>byed du</abbr> 'gal <abbr>ba'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">chos mchog </rs> gi</abbr> don du mngon ces <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5565"">sgros</rs> so</abbr></seg></TEI>"

2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-01-3114-30-48,reviewed,6a5 - 6a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-30-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas pa'i <abbr>gzugs</abbr> zhes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>bag chags</abbr> sad pa <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod par mi <abbr>rigs</abbr> te ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> bag <abbr>chags</abbr> sad pa des <choice><orig>khyod {°} byas</orig><reg>khyod byas</reg></choice> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr> na ¦ brda la byang <lb n=""6a6""/> <abbr>pa'i</abbr> skyes bu <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> zhes <abbr>pa'i</abbr> ming las <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi don mi 'dzin <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa de <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyis byas <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> bag chags sad pa des ma byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba las byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba de <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod par mi <abbr>rigs</abbr> te ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba des khyod byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr> na ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> <lb n=""6a7""/> mthong ba las byung <abbr>ba'i</abbr> <abbr>gzugs</abbr> kyi ming dran <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog pa min <abbr>par thal</abbr> ¦ rang rgyu <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong ba des khyod ma byas <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr>
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5566"">yongs 'dzin</rs> gsung ¦</seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-03-17-8-49,reviewed,7a9 - 7b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7a9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-17-8-49"" status=""reviewed""><abbr>gal te</abbr> <abbr>med</abbr> pa dang <choice><sic>khyad</sic><corr>khyod</corr></choice> yod kha dog <abbr>med</abbr> na khyod reg bya <abbr>med</abbr> de <abbr>med</abbr> na kha dog 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> rtog <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ kha dog 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> du gyur <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'dir rtog bskyed pas de'i gzung <abbr>don no</abbr> zhe na ¦

da lta'i buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang mngon gyi rgyud rgyur song <abbr>ba'i</abbr> yul dang blo °°° <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ da lta'i buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> 'dzin <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang mngon gyi gzung don du thal ¦ de brgyud nas bskyed <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <pb n=""7b""/><lb n=""7b1""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr></rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5565"">sgros</rs> so

2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-01-3114-47-20,reviewed,7b1 - 7b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-47-20"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">yang na nyin par buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong mtshan mo buM pa la reg tshe 'di buM dmar po'i snyaM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'di rtog <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦ rang gi gzung don nye ba la <choice><orig>ltos ××pa</orig><reg>ltos pa</reg></choice> ma yin par thal ¦ rang <abbr>gi gzung</abbr> don nye ba <abbr>med</abbr> par khyod yod <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>ma grub</abbr>  te ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de gzung don no zhe na ¦

buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi gzung don du <abbr>med par thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod la rang <lb n=""7b2""/>'dra'i rnaM pa <abbr>dngos su</abbr> gtod byed min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi dngos kyi spyod yul min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦
dbang po'i <abbr>sogs</abbr> phyi ma <abbr>gnyis</abbr> dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog khyod kyi gzung don yin te ¦ des khyod rgyud nas bskyed pa'i phyir zhe na ¦
'das pa yang <abbr>sogs</abbr> sngar dang <abbr>gcig</abbr> ¦
column2: nyin par buM <abbr>gzugs</abbr> mthong mtshan mo buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> reg bya la reg tshe 'di buM pa dmar po'o snyaM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> 'di rtog <abbr>chos can</abbr> ¦<lb n=""7b3""/>buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog <abbr>pa'i</abbr> dbang po'i <abbr>mngon sum</abbr> <abbr>min par thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi gzung don du <abbr>med</abbr> <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <abbr>der thal</abbr> ¦ buM <abbr>pa'i</abbr> kha dog de khyod kyi <choice><orig>{°°°}dngos</orig><reg>dngos</reg></choice> kyi spyod yul min <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5551"">dz+nya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr> </rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3786"">lo tswa ba</rs>'o

column1: 2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-03-1315-16-58,unreviewed,76b8 - 76b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""76b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-1315-16-58"" status=""unreviewed""><!--meaning unclear; seems to be a reference to ""becoming a translator and a Buddha"" and not to a specific translator--><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3770"">kun btus </rs>su
column2: _mnyan bya'i sgra smos pa chos can
column4: _sgra spyi rdzas gzhan gnyan bya min par dam bcas pa'i don la nyan shes dbang po'i mngon sum <lb n=""76b9""/>gyis mi gnod par bstan pa'i phyir
column5: _lo [\[]tsa [;]tsA [\]]ba dang bcom par thal lo
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-03-1416-24-46,reviewed,77a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""77a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-1416-24-46"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5554"">lha</rs><abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">chos mchog </rs> gi</abbr> dgongs pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">snga rabs pa</rs>s <choice><sic>blangs</sic><corr>khas blangs</corr></choice> pa dang <abbr>mi mthun</abbr> yang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:7338""><!--could be a ref to Dharmottara's commentary-->'grel pa</rs> nyid la zhib tu spyad<!--for dpyad--> pas <abbr>nges so</abbr>

2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-03-1416-27-18,reviewed,88b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""88b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-1416-27-18"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564""><abbr>rigs</abbr> gter</rs> du ¦
<quote source=""db:5564"" n=""Chap. X, Lhasa p. 295""><!--TODO correct reference--><lg>
<l xml:space=""preserve""><abbr>phan tshun</abbr> spangs pa <choice><sic>dngas</sic><corr>dngos</corr></choice>la ni
<l xml:space=""preserve""><abbr>rtags</abbr> dang <abbr>rtags</abbr> can grub pa <abbr>med</abbr>
</lg></quote>
ces te ngag las so

2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-03-1410-33-58,reviewed,89b1 - 89b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""89b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-03-1410-33-58"" status=""reviewed"">'di ni mtshon pa ste ¦ khyab par byed pa dang 'gal bas khyab <abbr>pa'i</abbr> sbyor ba yang <abbr>yod de</abbr> ¦ 'di na ba mo'i reg <lb n=""89b2""/>pa yang <abbr>med</abbr> de ¦ lcags gong 'bar ba mthong <abbr>pa'i phyir</abbr> <abbr>ces so</abbr> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780""><abbr>chos mchog</abbr></rs> ji <abbr>bzhin</abbr> te ¦ <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4017"">kho bo</rs>s</abbr> <abbr>rtogs so</abbr>

2_044_05_Dznyanashri_rnam nges tika.xml,2_044_05,,ex44052023-01-3114-38-58,reviewed,102b10,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex44052023-01-3114-38-58"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">  <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (102b10)""/><note type=""editorial"">Added as a tenth line, in a hand similar to that who wrote the main text, and in the same character size.</note>
<lb n=""102b10""/><abbr>nges su</abbr> °e °i °°i ḥ ×××

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4769""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3774"">tshad <abbr>rnam par</abbr> nges pa</rs>'i <choice><orig>TIk+k(k)a×blo</orig><reg>TIk+ka blo</reg></choice> gsal gyi mgul </rs>zhes bya ba snyig dus gyi 'gro ba 'dren pa'i dpal du gyur pa ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4017"">dza na shri</rs>s <rs type=""place"" ref=""db:4332"">gsang phu ne'u thog</rs> du sbyar ba dge<choice><sic>lags</sic><corr>legs</corr></choice> 'phel ¦</seg></TEI>"

1_029_04 bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi lus mdzes par byed pa.xml,1_029_04,,ex29042023-10-111,unreviewed,1a1 - 1a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex29042023-10-111"" status=""unreviewed""><lb n=""1a1""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4676""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> gyi lus mdzes par byed pa
column2: legs bshed rin po che'i tshoms </rs>bzhugs lags so
column4: e ma ho
column6: <lb n=""1a2""/> theg pa chen po'i sa dang lam gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhing × mgo bde bar bshed pa lags s+ho

column1: 1_029_04 bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi lus mdzes par byed pa.xml,1_029_04,,ex29042023-09-112,unreviewed,47b7 - 48b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex29042023-09-112"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (47b7-48b1) or (kha_265b7-266b1) (pp. 330-332)""/>

<lb n=""47b7""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4676""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> gyi lus mdzes par byed pa'i rgyan legs par bshad pa rin po che'i tshoms </rs>bsgrigs pa <lb n=""48a1""/> 'di ni
column2: lung gi sbyor ba mang po dang
column4: dgag sgrub kyi rtsod lan mang po bris na sde snod la ma sbyangs pa'i gang zag gi ngo bar <lb n=""48a2""/> dka' bas
column5: theg pa chen po'i sa lam gyi rim pa shin tu gsal zhing rtogs sla ba
column6: tshig gis ma sgrib pa
column7: gsar bu thos pa chung bas bltas kyang blo la 'char bde ba cig <lb n=""48a3""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan gyi rtsa ba</rs> dang sbyar nas gzhung gi go ba longs pa la'ang phan par 'gyur zhing
column8: 'jug pa bde bar bris shig zhes
column10: me tog bzang po dang bcas <lb n=""48a4""/> te
column11: dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'tsho ba'i rig byed la mkhas pa'i go 'phang thob pa
column12: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7338""><!--who is kun dga' rgyal mtshan-->kun dga' rgyal mtshan</rs> gyis snga mo nas yang yang bskul ba las
column13: btang snyoms la re shig <lb n=""48a5""/> 'gyangs par gyur na'ang
column14: <hi rendition=""#Time"">shing pho rta'i lo</hi>  ljon shing dang  sa gzhi rnaMs lo 'dab dang
column15: <hi rendition=""#Time"">rtswa ljang gi myu gu skyed pa'i dus</hi> su  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5781"">bsod snyoms pa rin chen rgyal mtshan dpal <lb n=""48a6""/> bzang po</rs>s yi ger bkod pa 'dis kyang  thub pa'i bstan pa dang
column16: sems can la phan bde 'byung par gyur cig
column17: <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3706"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">mngon rtogs rgyan gyi rtsa ba</rs> <abbr>thams cad</abbr> la sbyar ba'i bshad pa byas na'ang <lb n=""48a7""/> ha cang rgyas pas go dka' ba'i char gyur dgos nas  lus rnam bzhag dang sbyar ba yin cing
column18: 'di tsam zhig legs par go na  <rs type=""work"">'grel pa TI ka</rs> dang bcas pa bltas pas <lb n=""48b1""/> shes par 'gyur ba lags so
column22: × maNG ga laM sid d+hi × shu b+haM

column5: </seg></TEI>"

column7: blo <choice><orig>myi{°}g</orig><reg>myig</reg></choice> ldan pa rnaMs la gsal bar <choice><sic>mdzod</sic><corr>mdzad</corr></choice>

column3: 'gro ba'i <lb n=""24b11""/> <choice><sic>bugs</sic><corr>dbugs</corr></choice> 'byin byaMs chen gshags pa na
column5: mnyes byas chos sgor mngon du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag</rs> bzhugs nas
column7: chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba'i mun sel shog
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen chen po gro lung pa blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyi mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">lam rim</rs> 'am <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">bstan rim chen po</rs> bzhugs so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml,"1_004_02

1_005_01",,ex4022024-09-1315-30-44,unreviewed,118a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex4022024-09-1315-30-44"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa rin po che la 'jug pa'i rin chen phreng ba zhes bya ba'i rnam par [118a2] bshad pa</rs>
column3: byang phyogs kyi rgyud kha ba can gyi ljongs su byung ba
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bla ma rje btsun dam pa rnams</rs> kyi zhabs kyi pad+ma'i ze 'bru spyi bos len pa<anchor xml:id=""a69""/>
column7: lung dang rigs pa'i gtsug lag dam pa rnams la yongs su sbyangs pa'i ngal ba mi dman zhing mi zhan la mi nyung byas pa
column9: <lb n=""118a3""/> rigs pa dang grol ba'i spobs pa dge ba can
column11: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> zhes bya ba thub pa'i brtul zhugs la legs par gnas pas rang gi dran pa goms pa spel ba'i brjed byang tsam du nye bar sbyar ba rdzogs
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml,"1_004_02

1_005_01",,ex4022024-09-1315-23-40,unreviewed,118a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""118a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex4022024-09-1315-23-40"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">rje klong rdol rin po che</rs> nas phran <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4132""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">klong rdol</rs> drung yig</rs> la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">rje gro lung pa</rs>'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4468"">bstan rim chen po</rs> 'di'i par zhig byung na brko rogs gyis gsungs kyang
column3: phran rang nyid sngon bsags kyis sbyin 'bras phra bas gser dngul sogs kyi mthun rkyen [118a6] 'dzoms dka' bas tshe 'dir 'grub pa'i re ba dang bral zhing
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml,"1_004_02

1_005_01",,ex4022023-10-11102522,unreviewed,118a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""118a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex4022023-10-11102522"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">mi dag pa dang lhag chad phra mo byung ba rnams
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">rje klong rdol bla ma</rs>'i nye gnas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4132"">drung yig dam chos yar 'phel</rs> gyi rang gi blo gros kyi mig gi dog gnas gang shes thams cad gsar du bcos nas dag par bgyis pa dang
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_004_02_1_005_01_F_NO_Gro_bstan rim chen mo_etext.xml,"1_004_02

1_005_01",,ex4022024-09-1315-25-43,unreviewed,118a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""118a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex4022024-09-1315-25-43"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4132""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4134"">rje klong rdol bla ma</rs>'i drung yig</rs> 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad nas ngal ba chen pos lus ngag yid gsum gyi sgo nas
column3: bstan bcos 'di nyid la sogs pa'i rnam dkar dge ba'i phung po che chung ji snyed cig byas pa thams cad ma gyur nam [120b3] mkha'i mtha' dang mnyam pa'i sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la
column5: byams pa dang snying rje'i rtsa ba can gyis byang chub kyi sems rin po che myur du rgyud la skye ba'i rgyur 'gro bar gyur cig
column7: dge ba de dag kyang sems can thams cad kyi <abbr>dug gsum</abbr> 'phel ba'i rgyu dang [120b4] sdig pa bsags pa'i rgyu la mi 'gro bar shogs shig

column1: 1_007_04_D_Phya pa_rgyud bla ma bsdus don.xml,1_007_04,,ex70426-04-202313.33,finalized,1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70426-04-202313.33"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma</rs> la don bzhi ste
<lg><l>[1] spyi'i don lus rnam par gzhag pa dang
column2: </l> <l>[2] 'bras bu dkon mchog gi don dang
column3: </l> <l>[3] de sgrub par byed pa'i rigs kyi don dang
column4: </l> <l>[4] bstan bcos yongs su rdzogs pa'i bya ba'o
column6: </l></lg></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_007_04_D_Phya pa_rgyud bla ma bsdus don.xml,1_007_04,,ex70426-04-202313.40,finalized,6b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex70426-04-202313.40"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4490""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma</rs>'i bsdus pa'i don</rs> <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3831"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s nye bar sbyar ba'o
column5: rdzogs s+h+yo
column13: <note type=""translation"">Topical oultine of the Mahāyānottaratantra (Ratnagotravibhāga), composed by the monk Chos kyi seng ge. It is completed.</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_11_Shes rab 'bum_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa.xml,1_019_11,,ex19112024-09-1013-25-17,reviewed,15b2 - 15b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19112024-09-1013-25-17"" status=""reviewed""> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4616"">dpal ldan dus 'khor <lb n=""15b3""/>bde stong gnyis med kyi
column3: bsgrub thabs mdor bsdus rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa</rs>
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">shakya'i dge slong chos grub dpal</rs> dang ni
column6: grogs <lb n=""15b4""/> mchog dga' yis <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">bdag</rs> la legs bskul phyir
column8: snyigs ma'i dus na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rgyal ba gnyis pa</rs>'i tshul
column10: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3905"">kun spangs chos rje</rs>'i gsung bzhin <lb n=""15b5""/> rang bzo'i
column12: dri ma med pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">shes rab</rs> ming can gyis
column14: legs par bris la nyes nongs bzod par gsol

column1: 1_019_11_Shes rab 'bum_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa.xml,1_019_11,,ex19112023-09-15-125911,reviewed,15b7 - 16a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19112023-09-15-125911"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<lb n=""15b7""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4616"">dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column2: dpal rdo rje <pb n=""16a""/><lb n=""16a1""/>'dzin pa gnyis pa dpal ldan <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3905"">bla ma dam pa kun spangs pa chen po</rs> <note type=""gloss"">thugs rje rtson khrus</note>'i zhabs kyi rdul dri ma med pa spyi bos len pa
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">shakya'i dge slong shes <lb n=""16a2""/>rab 'bum bdag</rs> gis bla ma dam pa nyid kyi phyag len bzhin
column4: bla ma dam pa'i gsung dang gdams pa la brten nas <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5654"">dpal <note type=""gloss"">byo°°</note>nags rgyal gyi dben gnas dkar leb</rs> du sbyar <lb n=""16a3""/>ba 'di yongs su rdzogs s+ho

column1: 1_019_11_Shes rab 'bum_dpal dus kyi 'khor lo'i sgrub thabs rnal 'byor bcu gnyis pa.xml,1_019_11,,ex19112023-09-15-125912,reviewed,16a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex19112023-09-15-125912"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5626"">shakya'i btsun pa nyi ma rgyal mtshan</rs> gyi dpe'o
column2: dag go

column1: 1_022_04 Theg pa chen po mdo sde rgyan gyi dka gnad bshad pa.xml,1_022_04,,ex22042024-10-1809-29-13,reviewed,97a5 - 97a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""97a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex22042024-10-1809-29-13"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (97a5)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4635""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3746"">theg pa chen po'i mdo' sde'i rgyan</rs> gyi dka' ba'i <lb n=""97a6""/> gnas bshad ba</rs>
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3916"">shag kya'i dge' slong bsod nams rgyal mtshan<anchor xml:id=""a2""/></rs><note type=""editorial"">According to the KDSB dkar chag this is lHa ston Zhig po bSod nams rgyal mtshan (ID:6352), the 20th abbot of gSang phu (he is the 13th abbot of gSang phu gling sTod according to Onoda 1989: 211). The BDRC however connects this text with Bla ma Dam pa bSod nams rgyal mtshan P1226 (1327-1344) (ID:3916).</note> gyis sbyar ba
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_047_01_gTsang drug rdo rje_gsal byed sgron ma_20210607.xml,2_047_01,,ex47012025-04-2915-51-18,finalized,1a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex47012025-04-2915-51-18"" status=""finalized""><pb n=""1a""/><lb n=""1a1""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4791"">tshad ma'i spyi don bsdus pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4025"">gtsang drug pa <abbr>rdo rje</abbr> <abbr>'od zer</abbr></rs> gyis mdzad pa'o

2_047_01_gTsang drug rdo rje_gsal byed sgron ma_20210607.xml,2_047_01,,ex47012025-04-2915-35-58,finalized,7a2 - 7a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex47012025-04-2915-35-58"" status=""finalized"">dang po ni <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs></note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">kha 1</rs> na re rtog pa'i <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> don spyi 'dzin pa <abbr>yin no</abbr> zhes zer ba la de mi 'thad ste
column2: de ltar na dbang <lb n=""7a3""/> shes lnga nyaMs su myong pa'i rang rig gis myong bya dbang po lnga po de rang gi <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> 'dzin par yongs chod la grub pas spyi 'dzin pa rnam gcad la khegs pa'i phyir
column3: rtog pa'i don mngon sum gyis khegs par thal
column4: 'dod na dbang shes rtog bral du sgrub pa'i rtags <abbr>thams chad</abbr> tha snyad sgrub sha rtag du <abbr>'gyur ro</abbr>
column5: des na rtog pa'i tha snyad du mtshon pa'i <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> ni brjod bya brjod byed 'drer rung 'dzin pa <abbr>yin no</abbr>
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_047_01_gTsang drug rdo rje_gsal byed sgron ma_20210607.xml,2_047_01,,ex47012025-04-215-39-40,finalized,8b3 - 8b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex47012025-04-215-39-40"" status=""finalized""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3840"">dan</rs></note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3840"">kha 1</rs> na re the tshom la gzhan sel med gzhan sel yod na nges par thal rtog pa'ang nges par 'jog pa gzhan sel gyis 'jog pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr> zhes zer ba de mi rigs te
column2: rtog pa'i gzhan sel <lb n=""8b4""/> zhes pa de zhen pa'i sa bon bsal ba 1 dgos saM mngon gyur bsal bas kyang chog
column3: dang po ltar na yid spyod la 'ang gzhan sel <abbr>med</abbr> par thal zhen pa'i sa bon sel mi nus pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr>
column4: 2 pa ltar na sgra rtag gaM mi rtag gam zhes ma nges par zhen tsam na nges par zhen pa mngon gyur yod daM <abbr>med</abbr>
column5: dang po ltar na rtog 2 dus 1 car 'jug par thal
column6: 2 pa ltar <lb n=""8b5""/> na gzhan sel med pa <abbr>nyams so</abbr> des na the tsom la 'ang gzhan sel yod pa <abbr>yin no</abbr>

column1: 2_047_01_gTsang drug rdo rje_gsal byed sgron ma_20210607.xml,2_047_01,,ex47012025-04-2915-41-42,finalized,10a6 - 10a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""10a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex47012025-04-2915-41-42"" status=""finalized""> <milestone unit=""section"" n=""112.223.1 mtshan nyid""/>

dang po <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">gzhan dag</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs></note> na re myong ba dang rtags la ma brten <lb n=""10a7""/> par don mtha' 1 tu nges pa zhes zer te
column2: 'di rigs pa ma yin de ltar na sgra rtag par zhen pa'i rang log shes kyi rang ldog 'di 'ang yid spyod du 'gyur
column3: 'dod na yul bden pa dang ldan par <abbr>thal lo</abbr>
column4: des na yid spyod kyi tha snyad du mtshon pa'i <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> ni myong ba dang rtags la ma rten par sngar ma rtogs pa'i don bden pa nges pa'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_047_01_gTsang drug rdo rje_gsal byed sgron ma_20210607.xml,2_047_01,,ex47012025-04-2915-45-39,finalized,12a1 - 12a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex47012025-04-2915-45-39"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""kha cig (gangs/khyung)""/>
yang <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs</rs>
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung</rs></note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3809""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">kha 1</rs></rs> na re <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> kyi <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> mtshon bya mtshon pa'i rgyu mtshan <abbr>yin no</abbr> zer ba la
column3: de ltar na gtan tshigs kyi

column1: <lb n=""12a2""/> <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> kyang bsgrub bya sgrub pa'i rgyu mtshan yin no byas pa la de'i tha snyad daM don ldog yin
column2: dang po ltar na gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad dang rnam grangs par 'gyur 2 pa ltar na phyogs chos khyab pa las ma 'das zhe na
column3: 'dir yang mtshon bya mtshon pa'i rgyu mtshan gyi tha snyad dam don ldog la byed
column4: dang po ltar na <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> kyi tha snyad dang rnam grangs par 'gyur 2 pa ltar <lb n=""12a3""/> na don ldog chos 3 tshang ba las mang <abbr>das so</abbr>
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column6: rang rig rig par bya ba'i phyir ro
column8: de la phyogs chos ni nyams su myong bas nges so
column10: khyab pa yang rig par bya ba 'gal ba la ni rig par byed pa yang 'gal bas khyab ste
column11: des na khyab par byed pa 'gal ba yin no
column13: 'di ltar sngon po rang gi rang bzhin rig pa nyid kyis rig na de rang gi rang bzhin kho na'o
column15: byed pa gzhan gyis rig na ni rig pa yang gzhan kho na'o
column17: des na rig par bya pa tha dad pa la rig par byed pa tha dad pas khyab pas khyad par nges so zhe'o
column19: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_083_01",,ex83012024-11-2110-40-15,unreviewed,310a4 - 310b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""310a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex83012024-11-2110-40-15"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5277""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3761"">chos mngon pa'i mdzod</rs> kyi 'grel pa mngon pa'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba ¦
rgyal ba'i bstan pa lnga brgya phrag bdun pa'i mthar nye ba na
shes bya rnam par <lb n=""310a5""/>'byed pa'i blo gros mtshungs pa med pas thub pa'i bstan pa'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin cing
thugs rje dang 'phrin las kyi dpal 'byor bzang pos skye dgu rnams smin cing grol bar mdzad pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">bla ma dam pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che</rs> dang
shes bya'i nam mkha' la mkhyen pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu rgyas shing snyan grags kyi 'od zer gyis phyogs ma lus pa khyab par gyur pas sdom brtson mkhas pa rnams kyi gtsug gi nor bur gyur cing

gangs can gyi rgyud kyi gnas brtan chen <lb n=""310a8""/> po <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3977"">mchims thams cad mkhyen pa</rs><note type=""editorial"">The identification of ""mchims thams cad mkhyen pa"" as ""mchims nam mkha' grags"" is tentative</note> la sogs pa'i zhabs kyi rdul rnyog pa med pa'i spyi bos len pa ¦
mang du thos pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4090"">shA kya'i dge slong 'jam pa'i dbyangs</rs> kyis
column2: <pb n=""310b""/><lb n=""310b1""/> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5733"">dpal sa skya'i chos grwa chen po</rs>r dbu(?) brtsams na(nas?)

column1: 1_001_07_rNgog_shes rab snying bshad don bsdus.xml,1_001_07,,ex1072023-02-1410-46-47,finalized,1a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1072023-02-1410-46-47"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:dgos_brel"">
dgos 'brel du <choice><reg>bkod</reg><orig>b(k)od</orig></choice> pa'i dgos pa ni
column2: nges pa'i sgo nas 'jug pa dang
column3: don du 'gyur ba'i the tshom gis 'jug pa dang
column4: gzhan gi log par rtogs pa spang ba gsum bzhag nas
column5: gzhung mdzes par bya ba yin no
column7: zhes skabs gzhan <choice><orig>‹du›</orig><reg>du</reg></choice> gtan la phab pa bzhin du shes par bya'o

column1: 1_001_07_rNgog_shes rab snying bshad don bsdus.xml,1_001_07,,ex1072023-02-1410-26-37,finalized,2a6 - 2a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1072023-02-1410-26-37"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized""><!-- ""slob dpon gzhan"" might be Indian or Tibetan-->
'on kyang <quote source=""db:3694"">'di skad bdag gis thos pa</quote> zhes bya bas gtsor brjod pa'i don ni phyin ci ma log pa <lb n=""2a7""/> dang dngos nyid du yin ba dang
column2: rtogs pa ma yin <choice><orig> ‹par›</orig><reg>par</reg></choice> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob dpon gzhan</rs> gis bshad pa bzhin blta ste
column3: 'dir ni cung zad nor par bshad pa yin no
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_001_07_rNgog_shes rab snying bshad don bsdus.xml,1_001_07,,ex1072023-02-2412-02-43,reviewed,2b1 - 2b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex1072023-02-2412-02-43"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><!--kha cig could be Indian or Tibetan-->

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha <choice><orig>ci‹g›</orig><reg>cig</reg> </choice> </rs> las las kyi bdud dang lngar gsungs ba der ni nyon mongs pa dang las gnyi gas phung po <choice><reg>lhag</reg><orig>lha‹g›</orig></choice> ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i <choice><reg>bar</reg><orig>‹ba›r</orig></choice> du gcod pa'i <lb n=""2b2""/> phyir ro

column1: 2_036_02 sBal ti jo sras_grel pa od ldan gyi tshig don gsal byed.xml,2_036_02,,ex36022025-03-3112-23-082,finalized,65a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""65a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex36022025-03-3112-23-082"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"" status=""finalized""> <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (65a3-4)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4720""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3766"">'grel pa 'od dang ldan ba</rs>'i tshig dang don ma lus pa blo'i me long la gsal bar byed pa
column3: </rs> <choice><reg/><orig>dam</orig></choice><note type=""editorial"">""dam"" was probably written by mistake, and not deleted</note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">nye ba 'khor lta bu'i bla ma rnams</rs> kyi zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos nod pa
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3967"">shag kya'i dge slong brtson 'grus dbang phyug</rs> gis bkod pa'o
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_020_02 dGe 'dun 'od zer_theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i rnam bshad don dam rnam nges bsdus pa'i snying po.xml,1_020_02,,ex20022023-09-15-130857,unreviewed,57b4 - 57b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""57b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex20022023-09-15-130857"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (57b4-7)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4621""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma</rs>'i rnam bshad don dam rnam nges bsdus pa'i snying po'i snying po</rs> zhes bya ba
<lg> <l><lb n=""57b5""/> lo<anchor xml:id=""a2""/> ni <choice><reg>mche</reg><orig>mcha</orig></choice><anchor xml:id=""a3""/> ldan (ba ma da na?) zla ba rgya mtsho dang
column3: </l> <l>tshes ni dkar phyogs rdzogs pa dang po la
column4: </l>  <!--5th day of the waxing moon-->

column1: <l>gnas ni <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5740"">rnam dag zhing</rs> gi ming can du
<l>ming ni dge slong smra ba'i khyu mchog<anchor xml:id=""a4""/> ste
de yang 'di ltar ¦
<lg> <l>legs par sbyangs pa'i blo gros can
<l>lung rigs snyan dngags kyi dbang phyug</l> <l><lb n=""57b6""/> mdo rgyud smra la yang dga' ba
<l> 'dzaM gling mdzes par byed pa'i brgyan
column2: </l><l><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs can</rs> gyi ston sgom u dum wa ra'i me tog zhes kyang bya ste

column1: nges par ni ×
<lg>
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3910"">dge</rs> legs ster byed bshes legs bsten
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3910"">'dun</rs> tshul phul byung thub tshul sgrub
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3910"">'od </rs>stong yangs 'phro <lb n=""57b7""/> mchog stong mchod
<l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3910"">zer</rs> ngas [=nges] bden byed<anchor xml:id=""a5""/> nges nges sdebs
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_020_02 dGe 'dun 'od zer_theg pa chen po rgyud bla ma'i rnam bshad don dam rnam nges bsdus pa'i snying po.xml,1_020_02,,ex20022024-09-15-130857,unreviewed,57b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""57b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex20022024-09-15-130857"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">1 char<anchor xml:id=""a6""/> bcu phrag 4 la bris te ngo mtshar che
column2: chos 'di dar nas bstan pa'i rin chen rgyas byed shog
column5: 'di'i zhabs la gzhan mi bri bar zhu

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-22-49,unreviewed,1.2 - 1.3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1.2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-22-49"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3720"">slob dpon klu grub</rs> kyi dongs pa 'grel pa la mi mthun pa du ma yod pa yin te
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5539"">slob dpon legs ldan 'byed</rs> lasogs pas slob dpon gyi thugs dngos pa rgyud du bkrel la
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3725"">slob dpon zla ba grags pa</rs> lasogs pas thal du bkrel <lb n=""1.3""/>lo
column6: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3720"">slob dpon klu grub</rs> kyis 'thal 'gyur du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3725"">zla ba grags pa</rs> la bkral la
column7: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3725"">zla grags</rs> kyi thugs dgongs <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:6340"">dge bshes lo tsa ba</rs>s <!--Nag tsho according to Apple--> bkrel bas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3720""><!--Nagarjuna according to Apple-->slob dpon</rs> gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis la don rnams pa drug ste

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1215-05-46,unreviewed,2.10,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2.10""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1215-05-46"" status=""unreviewed"">des don bsdus nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s kyang
column2: <quote source=""db:5916"" n=""v. 7ab""><lg><l>ma mthong bar nyid de mthong par
column4: </l> <l>shin rta zab pa'i mdo las gsungs</l></lg></quote><note type=""editorial"">sDe dge: ma mthong ba nyid de mthong bar
column6: shin tu zab pa'i mdo las gsungs

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-29-45,unreviewed,4.2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4.2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-29-45"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge bshes</rs> kyi zhal nas tshigs su bcad pa 'dis don dam pa'i ngo bo bstan pa yin gsung
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-29-47,unreviewed,4.2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4.2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-29-47"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas bden pa gnyis ga'i ngo bo ston pa gsung
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1214-29-53,unreviewed,4.9 - 4.10,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4.9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-29-53"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas dbang po gsal ba ste rab rib lasogs pas dbang po nyams par ma byas shing yul ji lta ba bzhin du 'dzin pa dang
column2: de yang 'jig rten rnams kyis bden par byed pa de yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid <lb n=""4.10""/>du shes par bya ste
column4: de skad du yang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">'jug pa</rs> las
column5: <quote source=""db:"" n=""6.25"">gnod pa myed pa'i dbang po drug rnams kyis

column1: bzung pa gang zhig 'jig rten gyis rtogs ste
'jig rten nyid las bden </quote>
zhes bshad pas de'i steng du 'jig rten bas bden par byed pa de yang dag kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin no gsung

3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-06-26,unreviewed,8.8 - 8.9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8.8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-06-26"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge bshes</rs> kyi chos can mthun snang myed pa'i rigs pa gdu gdu ba ni chos can bya ba shes par 'dod pas khyad par du byas pa yin ba la rgol ba dngos por smra ba lasogs pa chos can snang ba rten 'brel 'di sgyu ma lta bu dang rang bzhin myed par shes par 'dod pa yod kyang
column2: dbu ma bas snang ba rten 'brel 'di brdzun pa sgyu ma lta bu dang <lb n=""8.9""/> rang bzhin myed par rtogs zin pas shes 'dod myed pas chos can mthun snang myed do
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-10-26,unreviewed,9.1 - 9.2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9.1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-10-26"" status=""unreviewed"">de skad byas pa las <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">rang rgyud pa</rs> na re chos can snang ba rten 'brel 'di tshad mas grub kyang don dam du thal ba'i nyes pa myed ste
column2: tha snyad pa'i tshad mas grub kyang chos can kyang snang ba rten 'brel 'di cig dang du <lb n=""9.2""/> bral lasogs pa rigs pa'i shes pa'i yul du ma grub pa'i phyir ro zer na

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-15-57,unreviewed,9.7 - 9.8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9.7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-15-57"" status=""unreviewed"">'o na thal 'gyur gnyis po 'di la thun mong spyi'i mtshan nyid yod dam myed
column2: khyad par so so'i mtshan nyid gang yin zer na

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog</rs> gi zhal nas thun mong spyi'i mtshan <lb n=""9.8""/> nyid myed pa yin gsung
column2: <abbr><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">slang ba</rs>'i</abbr> zhal nas thun mong spyi'i mtshan nyid ni
column3: tshul ci rigs su khas blangs pa yin gsung
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-15-59,unreviewed,9.8 - 9.9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9.8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-15-59"" status=""unreviewed"">khyad par so so'i mtshan nyid la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi bshad pa po rnams</rs> kyi zhal nas khyab pa dngos po la gnas shing phyogs chos khas blangs su 'dug pa de yin no zer ba la
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog</rs> gi zhal nas sgrub pa'i thal 'gyur bya ba bzlog pa rang rgyud dang 'brel ba yin <lb n=""9.9""/> pa la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi bshad pa po rnams</rs> kyi de bzlog pa dang ma 'brel bas <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>bsgrub pa'i thabs 'gyur<?oxy_comment_end?> gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos po la gnas pa phyogs chos khas blangs su 'dug pa skabs su bab pa'i dam bca la tshad ma'i bsal ba byung ba la bzhed do
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-18-59,unreviewed,9.9 - 10.1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9.9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-18-59"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">slang pa ba</rs>'i zhal nas <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>sgrub pa'i thal 'gyur <?oxy_comment_end?>gyi mtshan nyid ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi bshad pa mkhan po rnams</rs> kyi des chog pa yin te
column2: bsgrub pa'i thal <lb n=""9.10""/><?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?> gyur <?oxy_comment_end?>du 'dug pa tsam gyis bzlog pa rang rgyud 'phen pa'i nges pa myed ste
column3: bzlog pa dang 'brel bya ba de bzlog pa 'phen pa'i nus pa yod byas pa yin myi
column4: gyi nus pa yod pa tsam gyis bzlog pa 'phen pa'i * myed pa ste
column5: dper na sa bon skya bo la my gu skyed ming nus pa yod kyang nus pa yod pa tsam gyis ci'i kyang mas kyang my gu skyed pa'i nges pa myed pa bzhin no gsung

column1: gnyis pa sun 'byin pa'i thal <pb n=""10""/><lb n=""10.1""/> 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni khyab pa dngos la gnas rung mi gnas rung phyogs khas blangs su 'dug pa yin no zer ro

3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-20-59,unreviewed,10.1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""10.1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-20-59"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3868"">pa tshab</rs> kyi zhal nas bsgrub pa'i thabs thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid ni gtan tshigs kyi tshul gsum rgol bas zhe bas 'dod pa yin la
column2: sun 'byin pa'i thal 'gyur gyi mtshan nyid thal 'gyur de'i gtan tshigs khas blangs sam khas blangs kyi mthar thug pa yin no gsung
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-39-51,unreviewed,11.6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11.6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-39-51"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge bshes</rs> kyi zhal nas yul can shes pa la yang dag log pa ni yod pa kun rdzob myed gsung ba la
column2: de'i rgyu mshan ni 'di yin no bya ba ni mi gsung skad do
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-39-52,unreviewed,11.6 - 11.7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11.6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-39-52"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas shes bya yul la yod na yul can shes pa la yang kun rdzob yod pa <lb n=""11.7""/> yin te rgyu mtshan la khyad par myed pa'i phyir dang
column2: gzhan yang
column3: <quote source=""db:"" n=""6.28a"">gti mug rang bzhin sgrib phyir kun rdzob ste</quote> zhes pa lasogs pa shes pa'i steng du kun rdzob kyi sgra'i don bshad pa byas nas
column4: yul can shes pa'i steng na yang dag dang log pa yod la kun rdzob myed zer ba ni 'thad pa ma yin no gsung
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1214-45-12,unreviewed,N001 - 12.2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N001""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-45-12"" status=""unreviewed""> de ltar 'jig rten pa'i kun rdzob dang kun rdzob tsam po'i sgo nas phye ba de yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge bshes pa</rs>'i rang dga' ma yin te <rs type=""work"">'jug pa</rs> las
<quote source=""db:"" n=""6.28"">gti mug rang bzhin srib phyir kun rdzob ste
column2: <lb n=""12.2""/> des gang bcos ma bden pa (for bar) snang de ni
column3: kun rdzob bden zhes thub pas de gsung te

column1: bcos mar gyur pa'i dngos ni kun rdzob tsam du'o</quote> zhes bshad do

3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-40-52,unreviewed,12.2 - 12.3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12.2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-40-52"" status=""unreviewed"">yang na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob dpon</rs> gyi zhal nas nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pas 'khrul pa byas pa'i yul dang yul can thams cad yang dag pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin la
column2: nyon mongs pa can gyi ma rig pa las gzhan nyon mongs pa can ma <lb n=""12.3""/> yin pa'i ma rig pa de rab rib dang dmyigs ser lasogs pas 'khrul pa byas pa'i yul dang yul can thams cad ni
column3: log pa'i kun rdzob kyi mtshan nyid yin te zhes spyi thod du bstan kyang chog gsung ngo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1214-43-55,unreviewed,12.7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12.7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-43-55"" status=""unreviewed"">de ltar yin bas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i zhal nas kyang
column2: <quote source=""db:"" n=""SDA 4cd""><!--Satyadvayāvatāra, v. 4cd (Ejima 1983, p. 362): / cir yang ma grub chos nyid de / / gnyis dang gsum sog ga la ’gyur / / 4 / /.-->ci yang ma grub chos nyid la
column3: gnyis dang gsum rtsogs ga la yod</quote> zhes bshad pa yin no
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1214-43-52,unreviewed,12.8 - 12.9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12.8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1214-43-52"" status=""unreviewed"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge bshes lo tsa ba</rs><!--possibly the ""dge bshes pa"" referred to by rgya dmar ba rather than Nag tsho ID:6340-->'i zhal nas mtshan gzhi dang mtshan <lb n=""12.9""/> nyid dngos po la yod pa bzhin du mtshon bya ba lang bya ba de yang bda'i rgyu mtshan mi 'dra ba myed pa dgag pa bya ba de rngos po la yod pa bzhed la
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1211-43-52,unreviewed,12.9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12.9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1211-43-52"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3780"">slob dpon chos mchog</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">slang pha ba</rs>s <note type=""editorial"">""Slang pha ba"" identiied as ""Khyung rin chen grags"" by Apple</note> mtshan gzhi dang mtshan nyid rngos po la yod kyi mtshon bya ni rngos po la myed ste brtags par bzhed pa yin no

3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-26-07,unreviewed,N007 - 13.8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N007""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-26-07"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re khyed thal 'gyur ba la yongs cos sgrub pa'i dam bca myed pas de sgrub par byed pas gtan tshigs lasogs pa tshad mas grub pa mi dgos pa bden khongs su gzhug gi
column2: rnam dpyad dgag pa'i dam bca yod dam myed
column3: yod na de sgrub par byed pa'i gtan tshgis brjod dgos la
column4: de ni de 'gal ba rjod pa'i thal 'gyur lasogs <lb n=""13.8""/> pa brjod pa dgos pa ci yod zhe na zer ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1215-00-57,unreviewed,16.7 - 16.8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16.7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1215-00-57"" status=""unreviewed"">yang na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>s gsungs pa bzhin du ye shes phyed chad bya ba yin te shes bya cir yang ma grub pa la ye shes kyis ci <lb n=""16.8""/> yang mi rtog pa ji lta ba mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni yod la
column2: ji snyed pa mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba dang bcas pa ni myed pa yin no bya ba gsung

column1: 3_064_01_Khu_Slob dpon gyi lugs kyis bden pa gnyis.xml,3_064_01,,ex64012023-05-1212-29-57,unreviewed,16.10,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16.10""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64012023-05-1212-29-57"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">bden pa gnyis kyi rnam par bzhag pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">slob dpon</rs> gyi gsung tshod bris pa
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_075_05_Blo gros rgya mtsho_sher phyin sgron me.xml,3_075_05,,ex211-2024-10-03-16-15,unreviewed,4b1 - 4b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex211-2024-10-03-16-15"" status=""unreviewed"">

<abbr>shes rab</abbr> sgron ma dang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">3 <abbr>dge bshes</abbr> rngog</rs> gis rga'i dpe la rnyed <lb n=""4b2""/> bcu 2 po tshang ba sol nag thang gi 'buM la yod pa dang <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4593"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""> le brgyad ma</rs> laswo rnaMs la yod <abbr>pas so</abbr>

3_075_05_Blo gros rgya mtsho_sher phyin sgron me.xml,3_075_05,,ex211-2024-10-03-16-23,unreviewed,N004 - N005,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N004""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex211-2024-10-03-16-23"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5207""> shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa stong phrag brgya pa yi chad 'jug nyer mkhon sgron me</rs> zhes bya ba
<lb n=""N005""/>rdzogs so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 4_094_03_lce sgom rdzong pa shes rab rdo rje_Po to baI rnam thar.xml,4_094_03,,ex94032023-09-09-12.28,reviewed,199a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""199a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex94032023-09-09-12.28"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5354"">kyi ston dpal ldan rdor rje</rs>'i phyag dper

2_035_03_ bDud rtsi grags_dul ba rnam bshad yid sbyin nor bu.xml,2_035_03,,ex35032024-10-2316-31-44,unreviewed,N008 - 123b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N008""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex35032024-10-2316-31-44"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n="" [Colophon (123b8-10) (p. 428:8-10)]""/>
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4714"">so sor thar pa'i rnam bshad yid sbyin nor bu'i them skas</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: bla ma'i gsung dang 'grel pa la brten_nas thub pa_'i gsung dpang por byas pas 'jug ldog la mi 'khrul ba
column3: <hi rendition=""#Time"">sa [po] pho sbrul lo<anchor xml:id=""a1""/></hi> la
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3880"">shag kya'i dge slong bdud rtsi grags</rs> gyis sbyar <lb n=""123b9""/> ba
column6: rdzogs s+ho
column14: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_058_02_I_R_M_thogs med_sems tsam lugs kyi smon 'jug sems bskyed kyi cho ga.xml,2_058_02,,ex58022023-09-251,unreviewed,14a4 - 14a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""14a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex58022023-09-251"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5040"">smon 'jug gi seMs bskyed kyi cho ga</rs>
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">jo bo chen po rje'i cho ga'i gzhung</rs> la ji ltar 'byung ba rnams
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bla ma rnams</rs> kyi phyag len dang sbyar nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4066"">btsun pa thogs med</rs> kyis
column4: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5692"">dngul chu'i chos rdzong</rs> <lb n=""14a5""/> du bkod pa'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_058_02_I_R_M_thogs med_sems tsam lugs kyi smon 'jug sems bskyed kyi cho ga.xml,2_058_02,,ex58022024-12-1912-24-49,unreviewed,14a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""14a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex58022024-12-1912-24-49"" status=""unreviewed"">seMs sdom pa'i brgyud pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bla ma rnams</rs> la phyag 'tshal ba 'di <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4066"">btsun pa thogs med</rs> kyis sbyar ba'o
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-43-41,reviewed,1b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-43-41"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">

column3: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5292"">tshad ma shes rab sgron ma</rs> zhes bya ba
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-2810-35-31,reviewed,5b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-2810-35-31"" status=""reviewed"">de dag ni gzhan bsal nas nges pa'i blo gzhan sel zhes bya ba yin la
column2: de bzhin du don gzhan bsal nas gnas pa don <lb n=""5b1""/> gyi gzhan sel dang
column3: gzhan bsal nas brjod pa sgra'i gzhan sel zhes bya ba yang gnas so zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5590"">bdag gi bla ma blo gros kyi spyan dang ldan pa dag</rs> gsung ngo
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-06-2912-18-04,reviewed,5b3 - 5b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-06-2912-18-04"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4206"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4206"">rtag pa</rs></note> <lb n=""5b4""/><note type=""editorial"">We take ""rtag pa"" to be an alternative way of referring to ""sTag/rTag""</note> na re snang pa'i don la nges shes 'dren mi nus pa yin no zhes zer ro

3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-014-22-28,reviewed,5b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-014-22-28"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:snang_la_ma_nges_pa"">

yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">kha cig</rs></rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs></note> sgro 'dogs dang mi 'gal ba'i snang pa yin no zhes zer ba</seg></TEI>"

3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1613-14-21,reviewed,7b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""7b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-14-21"" status=""reviewed"">sbyor ba gsuM pa'i tshe thug par 'dod pa yin te
column2: 'di ltar tshul gsuM chos can gtan tshigs kyi tha snyad byar rung ste tshul gsuM tshang pa'i phyir ro zhes bkod na gzhi' rtags tha dad med pa'i phyir sgra mi rtag ste sgra yin pa'i phyir zhes bkod pa lta bu'i ma grub pa yin no zhes zer ba <note type=""editorial"">The author of this view is identified as Phya pa (id:3831) by Glo bo mkhan chen. See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 32, n. 49.</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-07-2417-03-49,reviewed,8a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-07-2417-03-49"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid ni de ma yin las tha dad du 'byed pa'i rgyu mtshan nam mtshon bya rnam 'jog gi rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba yin no zhes zer ro
column3: <note type=""editorial"">This view is also mentioned in RTRG VIII 186,14 (mtshan nyid kyi mtshan nyid mtshon bya rnam 'jog gi rgyu mtshan yin na…). RTGKh 163,8, RTŚ19 Dza 70b1 (=586) and RTŚ10 Tha 128a5 (=255) identify it as rNgog Lo tsa ba chen po (ID: 3786)'s view.       </note> </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-09-36,unreviewed,11a6 - 11a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-09-36"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<mentioned>gal te mtshon bya sgra blos khyad par du byas na byed chos kyi sgra blo 'phel bas des khyad par du byas pa'i mtshon bya 'ang du mar gyur pa'i phyir mtshan nyid cig gis mtshon bya du ma mtshon par 'gyur ro zhe na
column2: </mentioned>

column1: sgra blo 'phel bas sgra blos zhen rung tsam 'phel bar 'gyur yang
column2: mtshon bya du mar mi 'gyur te <abbr>thams cad</abbr> don ldog de la sgra blos zhen rung nyid las ma 'das pa'i phyir ro
column4: des na zhen yul gyi don ldog cig las med <lb n=""11a7""/> na de la sgra blo mi 'dra ba brgya phrag du mas zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya cig du 'gyur la
column5: zhen yul gyi don ldog du ma yod na de <abbr>thams cad</abbr> la sgra blos gcig nyid kyis zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya du mar 'gyur ba yin te ngag lasogs pa don dgu la go zhes bya ba'i sgra blo cig gis zhen par byas kyang mtshon bya dgur 'gyur ba bzhin no
column7: <note type=""gloss"">mtshan gzhi'i <choice><orig>{°}nyid</orig><reg>nyid</reg></choice> la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs pa</rs> na re dngos po gnas skabs dang skyon yon brtsi ba 2 yod <choice><reg>ces pa 'ang</reg><orig>(ces pa'ang)?</orig></choice> de mi 'thad de spyi'i mtshan nyid dri ba la bye brag gi dbye ba skabs su ma bab pa'i phyir ro
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-47-21,unreviewed,17a7 - 17b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""17a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-47-21"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi bdag nyid chen po dag</rs> sgrub dang dgag pa'i mtshan nyid rim pa bzhin dgag bya rnam par bcad nas shul du chos gzhan 'phen pa dang mi 'phen pa yin te
column2: dper na bden pas stong pa dang <lb n=""17b1""/> bden pas stong pa'i snang pa lta bu'am bum pa stong pa dang bum pa med pa'i sa phyogs lta bu'o zhes gsung go
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-14-17,reviewed,23a2 - 23a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""23a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-14-17"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">
<note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs pa</rs> na re</note> gal te tshad ma ni ¦ <quote source=""PV 1.200ab"">yod med nges pa'i 'bras can min
column3: phyir na tshad ma nyid ma yin ¦</quote> <note type=""editorial""> PV I.200ab sadasanniścayaphalāneti syād vā 'pramāṇatā. Also cited in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 26b6. ma yin: PV <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> mi 'gyur </note> zhes 'byung pa'i tshul gyis yod pa dang med par nges pa'i 'bras bu can yin na 'dis ni de lta <lb n=""23a3""/> bu'i nges pa mi skyed pas tshad ma ma yin no zhe na
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0313-55-44,reviewed,26b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""26b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0313-55-44"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"">
dbang po gzugs can la brten pa nyid ji ltar grub ce na

'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4270"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4270"">rgya grags sod</rs></note> na re de ni bum snang gi shes pa chos can rkyen gsuM las gzhan pa'i rkyen gzhan bzhi pa cig la ltos pa yin te rkyen gsuM tshang yang res 'ga' bar dmigs pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba 'bras bu ldog pa'i rtags la rten pa'i rjes dpag gis sgrub po zhes zer ro

3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1611-09-25,unreviewed,28b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1611-09-25"" status=""unreviewed"">'o na bcad pa'i yul can yod dam med ce na
'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi dgan po dag</rs> na re <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa'i ye shes la bcad pa'i yul can med de
column2: don gyi skad cig re re blo'i skad cig re res rtogs pas don dang blo rnying pa phrad pa med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"
