column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-12-1214-24-38,reviewed,28b5 - 28b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-12-1214-24-38"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">rtsang</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">Cf. <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 61b8-62a2 'di snyam du skad cig snga phyi'i rdzas de lta na yang de dag la ye shes kyis 'gro ba rtogs pa 'am sngon po nyid rtogs pa zhes bya ba yod dam myed
column2: myed na spyi ma rtogs pa'i bye brag rtogs par 'gal la
column3: yod na yang de nyid la ye shes phyi ma bcad pa'i shes pa ji ltar ma yin
column4: gzhan yang rtog pa myed mod sngon ji ltar mkhyen pa'i chos rnams da ltar ma mkhyen na thams cad mkhyen par mi 'gyur la
column5: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsnyel ba mi mnga' ba dang dran pa nyams pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin
column6: des na 'jig rten mkhyen pa ni thams cad du rdzas la tshad ma nyid la ldog pa la bcad pa'i yul can nyid kho na ste
column7: </note>  <lb n=""28b6""/> na re rdzas la ltos nas bcad shes ma yin kyang rigs la ltos nas sngar rtogs zin la 'jug pa'i phyir bcad pa'i yul can ji ltar ma yin
column8: gzhan yang rtog pa med mod sngon ji ltar mkhyen pa'i chos rnams da ltar ma mkhyen na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa ma yin par 'gyur la
column9: sangs rgyas kyi chos bsnyel pa mi mnga' ba zhes bya ba'i don yang ci zhig yin
column10: des na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa ni <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du rdzas la tshad ma dang rigs la bcad pa'i yul can yin no zhes zer ro
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-08-0414-24-382,reviewed,28b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-08-0414-24-382"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed""><lb n=""28b7""/>

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusm:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3864"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusm:named_reference"" ref=""db:3864"">byang</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">Possibly Byang=Byang chub skyabs</note> na re rdzas la ltos nas kyang bcad pa'i yul can du 'gyur te
column2: rdzas sngar ma rtogs pa mi srid pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: </seg></TEI>"

3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-24-38,unreviewed,28b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-24-38"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
yang sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyis dus gsum ma mkhyen pa mi 'thad la
column2: mkhyen na yang 'das ma 'ongs gnyis snang nas mkhyen nam mi snang par mkhyen
column3: snga ma ltar mi 'thad de 'gags pa dang ma skyes pa snang par mi rung pa'i phyir ro
column5: phyi ma ltar yang mi 'thad de sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum spyan du mi rung pa'i phyir ro zhe na

column1: <lb n=""28b8""/> 'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs></note> 'das ma 'ongs gnyis ye shes da ltar ba la mi snang yang da ltar ba'i dngos po snang pa'i shugs la de'i rgyu' dpal dang 'bras bu ma 'ongs pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa yin no zhes zer ro

3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-26-50,unreviewed,28b8 - 28b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-26-50"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">rtsang</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">Glo bo mkhan chen also ascribes this position to ""slob dpon gTsang nag pa."" See Hugon (ed.) 2004: 131, n. 219</note> 'das ma 'ongs kyi rnam pa snang pa'i stobs kyis de dag gi rang mtshan ma byung pa dang mi 'byung pa'i sgro 'dogs chod pa yin no zhes gsung mod kyi rnam pa de ci rang mtshan gyi rnam pa 'am
column2: sgra don nam med pa'i don gsal bar snang pa yin zhes brtags na 'thad pa ma yin no
column4: 'on kyang dus gsum mkhyen pa <lb n=""28b9""/> lasogs pa'i ji snyed mkhyen pa'i ye shes ni gdul bya gzhan gyi blo ngor snang pa tsam du zad kyi sangs rgyas nyid kyi rgyud kyis bsdus pa yod pa ma yin pas dpyad par bya ba ma yin no
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1610-18-48,unreviewed,30b9 - 31a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""30b9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1610-18-48"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> na re <quote source=""db:4445"" n=""216,4-7""><!--TODO ref to the typeset edition-->rtags kyi spyi'i mtshan nyid tshul gsum dang mtshon bya gtan tshigs kyi 'brel pa nges par byed pa la</quote> zer ba yin gyi<!--The first part of the citation, up to ""zer"" corresponds to <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 216,4-7 de la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid tshul gsum dang
column2: de'i mtshon bya'i 'brel pa nges par byed pa ni gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid la
column3: .--> <note type=""gloss""><choice><orig>° gnyegs </orig><reg><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4267"">gnyags ye shes 'bar</rs> </reg> </choice> ltar<!-- identification upon assumption that ""gnyegs"" stands for ""gnyags ye shes 'bar"" (id:4267)--></note> tshul dang po'i mtshan mtshon gyi 'brel pa gtan la 'bebs pa ni ma yin te rtags kyi sgra tshul dang po <lb n=""31a1""/> kho na la nye ba'i rgyu <choice><orig>‹mtshan›</orig><reg>mtshan</reg></choice> med pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung </rs>na re</note>'di ni mi rigs te
column2: de ltar na khyab pa'i mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa yang gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs par 'gyur la 'dod na rtags kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i skabs su rjes su dpag bya'i sgra rtsod gzhi' kho na la 'jug par ji ltar 'gyur te de'i tshe chos la'ang 'jug pa'i phyir ro
column4: des na 'dir gtan tshigs ni tshul dang po la bya ste tshul dang po'i mtshan nyid <lb n=""31a2""/> dang mtshon bya'i 'brel pa gtan la 'bebs pa la gtan tshigs kyi mtshan nyid gtan la 'bebs pa'i skabs zhes brjod par bya'o
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-2810-42-14,unreviewed,32a6 - 32a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""32a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-2810-42-14"" status=""unreviewed"">rgol ba ni <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:4266"">su rya</rs> <note type=""editorial"">A similar objection is cited in the <rs type=""work"">Tshad ma rigs gter</rs>. Glo bo mkhan chen dentifies the opponent as ""paṇḍita Surya thong po."" See <rs type=""work"">Hugon (ed.) 2004</rs>: 151, n. 269.</note> rtsod gzhi' chos can la rjes su dpag bya'i ming gis btags nas bstan pas mi phan te
column2: 'di ltar rjes su dpag bya'i ming de rtsod gzhi' chos can kho na la 'jug na rtags rjes su dpag bya la yod pa tshul dang po zhes brjod pas mthun pa dpe'i chos can dang mi mthun dpe'i chos can gnyis la rtags yod pa la mi go bar 'gyur ba zhig na
column3: rjes su dpag bya ni <lb n=""32a7""/> rtsod gzhi' dang bsgrub bya'i chos dang tshogs don gsuM ka la 'jug pas chos rjes su dpag bya la rtags yod pa dang tshogs don rjes su dpag bya la rtags yod pa yang tshul dang po yin nam snyam pa'i log rtogs skye zhing
column4: de skyes na ma 'khrul pa'i mig gi gzung byas sgra mi rtag par sgrub pa lta bu'i rjes 'gro can la yang rtags chos rjes su dpag bya la yod pa'i tshul dang po dang rjes su 'gro ldog gnyi' ka tshang pas yang dag pa'i rtan tshigs yin nam snyam pa'i log rtogs snga ma ci lta ba bzhin du <lb n=""32a8""/> skye bar 'gyur ro zhe na
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1612-55-52,unreviewed,32a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""32a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1612-55-52"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">bdag nyid chen po kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> btags pas mi phan pa'i rtsod pa spang pa dang
column2: gdags mi dgos pa'i rtsod pa spang pa dang
column3: de'i lan mtshungs pa'i rtsod pa spang pa gsuM gyis lan 'debs par mdzad de
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1612-55-525,unreviewed,33a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1612-55-525"" status=""unreviewed"">
tshul dang po'i tshig gis mthun pa dpe'i chos can la yod par rnon pa la yang yod tsam du rnon na don med cing
column2: mthun dpe' kho na la yod par rnon na rjes 'gro'i tshig gis mthun <lb n=""33a2""/> phyogs tsam gyi rigs kyi spyi la yod par bstan pa dang 'gal bar 'gyur bas mtshungs so zhe na

column1: mi mtshungs ste <rs type=""person"" ana="""">kho bo cag</rs> ni tshul dang po'i tshig gis mthun dpe' kho na la yod par rnon par go dgos yod ces zer ba yin la de dang rjes 'gro' tshig gis mthun phyogs tsam gyi rigs kyi spyi la yod par bstan pa la 'gal ba ci zhig yod de
column2: blo rno ba spyir mi tsam la yod cing bye brag lha sbyin kho na la yod pa mi 'gal ba bzhin no zhes zer ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1613-00-02,unreviewed,34a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""34a9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-00-02"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> the tsom dang ldan pa yin no zhes zer ba <!--Cf. rNam bshad 217 des na the tshom dang ldan pa'i don ni chos can yin no //--> yang ma yin te
column2: the tsom dngos dang ldan pas ma khyab cing 'jug rung tsam ni de ltar grub zin pa la yang yod pas ha cang khyab ches pa'i phyir ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1613-03-19,unreviewed,34b7 - 34b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""34b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-03-19"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">gzhan dag</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note>  mthun yul phyogs mtshan nyid pa'i rnam pa tsam la byas nas de dang bsgrub bya'i chos yod du mthun mi mthun la brjod pa'ang mi rigs te
column2: rigs pas mi 'thad pa dang
column3: gzhung gi dgongs pa <lb n=""34b8""/> ma yin pa'i phyir ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1613-05-07,unreviewed,36a2 - 36a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""36a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-05-07"" status=""unreviewed"">'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> na re <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo</rs></note> du <lb n=""36a3""/> bas la la{} me sgrub pa'i tshe gtan tshigs du ba ni mi mthun phyogs yin te me steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zer ro
column3: <!--Also cited in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 89b6 kha cig me bsgrub pa'i rtags du ba ni mi mthun phyogs yin te me steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro

column1: de ni mi rigs te
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0313-59-01,unreviewed,36a5 - 36a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""36a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0313-59-01"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4264"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4264"">gnyags <abbr>ye shes</abbr> 'bar</rs></note> bsgrub bya'i chos me nyid kyang mi mthun phyogs yin te me gzhan gnyis pa zhig steng du mi ldan pa'i phyir ro
column3: 'on kyang de la rtags zhugs pas ldog pa ma grub par mi 'gyur te
column4: <lb n=""36a6""/> me ma yin gyi gzhi' la du ba yod pa'i phyir zhes rtags khyad par can bkod pas de la mi 'jug pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ba ni </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-48-37,unreviewed,42b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""42b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-48-37"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">che ba'i che ba dag</rs> rtags kyi tha snyad gnas pa'i rten du mtshan nyid tshul gsuM blos nges par byas pa mi dgos ste
column2: <hi rendition=""#petittitrechapitre"">rnam gcod med pa dang
column3: don gyi chos su mi 'thad pa dang
column4: ha cang thal ba'i phyir ro</hi>
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-50-04,unreviewed,43a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""43a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-50-04"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed""><!--presumably Tibetan opponent-->
yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">blo gros rnam par dkar ba dag</rs> na re rtags kyi mtshan nyid du tshul gsuM blos nges par byas pa zhig dgos pa yin te
column2: <hi rendition=""#petittitrechapitre"">nges rung la ni bsgrub bya'i mtshan nyid dang mtshungs pa dang
column3: tshul gsuM dngos po la ma grub pa dang ma mtshungs pa dang
column4: ha cang thal ba</hi>'i skyon gsum yod pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-17-13,unreviewed,45a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-17-13"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">
tshogs pa'i spyi dang
column2: dpe' <lb n=""45a9""/> la yod pa'i khyad par rtags kyi mtshan gzhi' 'dod pa ni med mod kyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">kha cig <!--This view in presented in RT X 291,2, and attributed to ""sTod lung rgya dmar ba la sogs pa dag"" in RTGKh 223,17.--></rs> la'i du ba lasogs pa rtsod gzhis khyad par du byas pa rtags kyi mtshan gzhir 'dod do
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0314-18-48,unreviewed,51b2 - 51b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""51b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0314-18-48"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs></note> na re nam mkhar snang tsam chos can rtag ste ma byas pa'i phyir ro zhes bya ba lta bu ste
column2: rtags de chos can <lb n=""51b5""/> du bkod tshod kyi nam mkhar snang tsam dang mi 'gal bas phyogs chos grub cing bsgrub bya rtag pa'i dngos po rten pa'i gzhi' dngos por gyur pa'i nam mkhar don gyis 'phangs pa de 'gog pas chos can 'gog pa'i 'gal ba yin no zhes smra'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1610-25-32,,52b2 - 52b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""52b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1610-25-32"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog</rs></note> na re rgyu 'bras nges par byed pa'i tshad ma ni <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du ma dmigs pa dang dmigs pa'i mngon suM lnga kho nas yin te
column2: 'di ltar dang <lb n=""52b3""/> po rgyu 'bras gnyis ka ma dmigs pa dang
column3: de nas rgyu dmigs pa dang
column4: de nas 'bras bu dmigs pa dang
column5: de nas rgyu log pas rgyu ma dmigs pa dang
column6: de nas 'bras bu log pas 'bras bu ma dmigs pa'i mngon sum mo zhes zer ro
column8: <!--This view is already mentioned in <mentioned>bsDus pa</mentioned> 142a8-142b1 (kha cig gzhung las gsungs pa'i mi dmigs pa dang dmyigs pa'i mngon sum lngas de'i mtshan nyid rjes 'gro dang ldog pa nges pa yin no zhes zer ro
column10: ). It is also the view supported in <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 333,3-4 (mngon sum dang myi dmyigs pa rnam pa lngas rgyu 'bras kyi mtshan nyid nges pas de kho na tshad ma yin no

column1: de ni mi 'thad de
column2: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung</rs></note> gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma lngas nges pa yin nam 'on te rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma lngas nges pa yin
column3: dang po ltar na rnga'i sgra dang nyi ma'i 'od zer yang rgyu <lb n=""52b4""/> 'bras su thal te gnas skabs kyi rjes su 'gro ldog lan brgyar mthong pa'i phyir ro
column5: gnyis pa ltar na tshad ma lnga yis ci zhig bya ste rang bzhin gyi rjes su 'gro ldog mthong pa'i tshad ma gsuM gyis rjes 'gro dngos su nges pas ldog pa shugs la 'phen pa'i phyir ro
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1613-09-57,unreviewed,55a1 - 55a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""55a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1613-09-57"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig</rs> na re lhan cig mi gnas pa <lb n=""55a2""/> 'i 'gal ba'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po gnyis la gnas pa'i chos gnod bya gnod byed ces pa'am
column2: rdzas kyi rgyun gcad bya dang gcod byed ces bya ba yin no zhes zer ro
column4: <!--The first part of this definition is also cited in RTRG VII 168,21. It is attributed to Lo <hi rendition=""#sanskritpasitalique"">tså </hi>ba chen po in RTGKh 153,10. Cf. <mentioned>rNam bshad</mentioned> 277,7-8 de la 'di'i mtshan nyid ni dngos po gnyis la brten pa'i chos gnod bya gnod byed kyi rang bzhin no

column1: de ni ma yin te </seg></TEI>"

3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1610-30-05,unreviewed,62b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""62b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1610-30-05"" status=""unreviewed""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3809""><abbr>kha cig</abbr> </rs>na re <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung</rs></note> thal ba [la sgrub byed] 'phen pa'i thal ba dang sun 'byin pa'i thal ba gnyis su yod pas
column2: de gnyis la khyab pa'i mtshon bya thun mong ba cig med pas mtshan nyid kyang thun mong pa <abbr>med</abbr> ces pa rigs pa ma yin te
column3: de ltar na spyi'i mtshan nyid thams cad mi rung par 'gyuro
column5: </note> </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-1611-01-15,,62b7 - 62b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""62b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-1611-01-15""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re rtags <lb n=""62b8""/> kyi ngo bo rgol ba'i zhe bas mi 'dod cing tshul gsuM gzhan gyis ci rigs par khas blangs pas dam bca' mi 'dod pa bsgrub pa'i ngag yin no zhes zer ro

3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-47-58,unreviewed,64a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""64a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-47-58"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">sngon gyi blo gros{} chen po dag</rs> thal ba'i chos gsuM dang bzlog pa'i chos gsuM <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du gnad cig par 'chad de
column2: 'di ltar thal ba'i gtan tshigs khas blangs dang bzlog pa'i bsgrub bya shes 'dod gnyis tshang pa dang ma tshang pa dang tshang par gnad gcig<hi rendition=""#FootnoteCharacters""><anchor xml:id=""a457""/></hi> ste
column3: pha rol po la la me med par khas len na gnyi' ka tshang la
column4: mi len na gnyis ka ma tshang pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-50-52,unreviewed,64a9 - 64b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""64a9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-50-52"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed""><!--presumably ref. to Tibetan-->
yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">shing rta chen po'i srol dag</rs> ni 'dod tog gyis lan 'debs par byed te
column2: thal ba de dag gi 'dod pa la tshad mas bsal pa yod pas bzlog pa'i thal ba'i gtan tshigs grub par thal ba ni 'dod pa yin te
column3: <lb n=""64b1""/> mi rtag pa dang tshogs pa khegs pa nyid mi rtag pas stong pa'i phyogs chos yin pa'i phyir ro
column5: de bzhin du dgag bya yod pa dang tshogs pa khegs pa nyid yod pas stong pa'i bsgrub bya yin pas gzhi' sha za'i bum pa rtag pas stong pas stong zhes pa'i dgag pa'i rtags 'phen pa yin no zhes gsung ngo
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-03-0311-55-26,reviewed,67a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-03-0311-55-26"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

column3: <lg><l>yid kyi mun pa ma lus sel byed pa
column5: </l> <l>rigs tshul dri med <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5292"">shes rab sgron ma</rs> 'di
column7: </l>                       <l><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">dpal ldan grags pa</rs>'i gzhung dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5590"">bla ma</rs>'i<anchor xml:id=""a469""/><!--assumed to be the same person whose views are referred to in the text on 5b1-->
column9: </l> <l>gsung la brten nas gzhan phan yid kyis sbyar
column11: </l> <l>'di las byung pa'i dge tshogs mthu' ldan des
column13: </l> <l>skye bo <abbr>thams cad</abbr> rigs lam 'dir zhugs te
column15: </l> <l>lta ngan g.yang sa'i ri bo rab bsnyil nas
column17: </l> <l>yang dag lta ba'i rgyal mtshan 'dzin par shog
column21: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_087_03_mtshur ston_shes rab sgron ma.xml,3_087_03,,ex87032023-07-0312-01-05,reviewed,67a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" xml:id=""ex87032023-07-0312-01-05"" type=""excerpt"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lb n=""67a8""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5292"">tshad ma shes rab sgron ma</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: lung dang rigs pa'i don phyin ci ma log par khong du chud cing
column5: cig zhus
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1310-18-08-2023,unreviewed,3b,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1310-18-08-2023"" status=""unreviewed""> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tsha </rs> na re
column2: _<?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>des na<?oxy_comment_end?> zla ba'i dgongs pa kun rdzob kyi bden pa dang kun rdzob tsam gnyis las bden pa yang dag kun rdzob yin la tsam po de 'jig rten pa byis pa la yod pa dang 'phags pa'i snang bcas yin gsung ste
column3: _gzhung gong 'og las gnyis ka gsal bar 'dug pas
column4: </note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex13102024-09-26-09-43,unreviewed,3b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex13102024-09-26-09-43"">
<note type=""gloss"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">bla ma rnam gnyis </rs>kyi man ngag las kun rdzob la gsum
column2: grub mtha' dang sgo bstun pa'i yang log dang
column3: 'jig rten pa dang sgo bstun pa'i yang log dang
column4: rnal 'byor pa'i sgo blo dang bstun pa'i yang log gsum las
column5: grub mtha' thams cad la yang bden gnyis dang kun rdzob la yang log re khas len pa las <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">ye shes snying po</rs>'i de <rs type=""school"">dbu ma pa</rs>'i grub mtha' dang bstun pas yin la
column6: <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>tsan kra<?oxy_comment_end?>'i de 'jig rten pa'i blo dang bstun pa'i yang log yin zhing
column7: rnal 'byor pa'i ni chos mchog man chad bden zhen dang bcas pa'i snang ba de log pa yin la sa thob man chad kyi bden zhen med snang de yang dag yin zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""corpusmd:named_reference"">a ti sha</rs>'i gsung yin no

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex13112024-09-26-10-12,unreviewed,4a1 - 4a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""unreviewed"" xml:id=""ex13112024-09-26-10-12"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">kha cig <note type=""gloss"">lo tsha</note> dag </rs>kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i mtshan nyid ni
column2: <note type=""gloss"">shes bya'am
column4: brjod bya tsam yin la
column5: don dam pa'i bden pa'i mtshan nyid ni</note> spros pa thaMd dang bral ba ste
column6: <lb n=""4a2""/> shes bya brjod bya gzhal bya thams cad las 'das pa yin no

column1: zhes smra'o

1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1311-2024-09-26-16-212,unreviewed,4a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1311-2024-09-26-16-212"" status=""unreviewed"">  [⁽1763⁾]'dir dgos kyang mi dgos byed na'ang kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i skabs yin la de kho na nyid du 'di zhes gdab skabs su la bab la
column2: _kun rdzob kyang snang ba dang rang bzhin med pa tshogs pa nyid yin pas so sor 'phral ba'ang mi rigs pas 'di ni skabs don la nyams par mngon pas
column3: _mtha' gcig tu ma yin dgag yin byas pas chog_'di la [⁽1763⁾]<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">byang ye</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference""> kha cig dag </rs>rang bzhin med pa'i snang ba zhes ma yin dgag tu bya ba'am yang na ci yang ma yin pa'i snang ba zhes med dgag tu bya'o zhes gsungs pa ni myi 'grig par mthong ste
column4: _phan tshun 'gal ba gang rung cig 'thad na cig shos mi 'thad pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1311-2024-09-26-16-213,unreviewed,4a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1311-2024-09-26-16-213"" status=""unreviewed"">[⁽1763⁾]'dir <rs type=""school"">rang rgyud kyi gzhung </rs>las gsal rgyu ni med gang zag dang chos kyi bdag thams cad bkag pa'i stong nyid rigs shes kyi yul na yod pa yin te
column2: _de ltar ma yin na shes bya dang gzhal bya med pas rigs shes shes pa dang tshad ma ma yin par 'gyur zhing dgag bya bden dngos grub par yang 'gyur ro <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs> zhes smra'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1311-2024-09-26-16-21,unreviewed,8a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1311-2024-09-26-16-21"" status=""unreviewed"">
kha cig <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3839"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">rtsang nag</rs></note>rtag pa'i dngos po ni kun rdzob du yang dgag bya yin te
column2: rtag pa [⁽1763⁾]la skye 'gag mi rung bas 'gyur med rgyu 'bras su mi rung bas shes bya'i gnas rten 'brel dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang
column3: _skyon rnying pa spang du med cing yon tan gsar pa bskyed du med pas 'bras bu <lb n=""8a8""/> bde legs dang 'gal ba'i phyir dang
column4: phan tshun 'gal bas de lta bu'i dngos po mi srid pa'i phyir ro
column6: mi rtag pa'i dngos po ni de las bzlog pas na tha snyad du yod la de nyid bden pa'i dngos po bkag pa'i ngo bo yod pas stong nyid [⁽1763⁾]las thams cad 'byung bas kyang tha snyad du yod pa yin no
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1310-2024-09-26-16-25,unreviewed,8a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1310-2024-09-26-16-25"" status=""unreviewed"">

column2: de'i phyir de gnyis ni de kho na nyid du dgag bya yin no zhes gsungs pa ni 'dir <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tsha </rs><rs type=""school"">rang rgyud pa</rs>'i grub mtha' dang bstun na shin tu legs te <rs type=""school"">dbu chen </rs>ltar na </note> legs par mi sems te

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1310-2024-09-26-10-17,unreviewed,18a7 - 18a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1310-2024-09-26-10-17"" status=""unreviewed"">

2 pa la <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tsa</rs>'i rjes sa 'brangs nas</note> chos can bsgrub bya gtan tshigs kyi don 3+res <lb n=""18a7""/>par bya ba la
column2: dang po ni chos can du snang ba thams cad tshogs pa'i spyi 'god na <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref="""" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">tsha</rs> na re na byis par sa bcu'i dbang phyug gis kyang</note> mi 'grub cing bye brag 'ga' zhig 'god na gzhan la bden par yod pa'i sgro 'dogs mi chod pas <note type=""gloss>"">nyi tshe bar 'gyur gyi</note> khyab pa'i stong nyid mi 'grub bo zhes rtog na
column3: ma yin te snang ba tsam gyi rigs kyi spyi <note type=""gloss"">ces sgro btags nas yin gyi bden par mi 'dod</note> 'god pas de <note type=""gloss"">ldog pa gnyis tshogs grub pa na chig rkyang ma grub par 'gal bas</note> yul dus rnam pa'i bye brag gi steng du ma dpyad pa'i mngon sum gyis grub la
column4: snang ba tsam gyi spyi la bden par <lb n=""18a8""/>yod pa'i sgro 'dogs dngos su khegs pas bye brag thams cad la yang bden par yod pa'i sgro 'dogs shugs la khegs pas nyi tshe ba'i stong par 'gyur ba yang ma yin no

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1311-2024-10-2113-06-56,unreviewed,18a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1311-2024-10-2113-06-56"" status=""unreviewed"">  yang skabs <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs she</rs> zer te 'dir skabs su bab gsungs la 'ga' zhig du ni pha rol gang la log_rtog zhugs pa'i gzhi chos can du 'god la
column2: _de pha rol gyi khas blangs kyis grub cing*
column3: _de [⁽1763⁾]kho nyid gzhan la log par mi rtog na tsam gyis pha rol gyi ngor khyab pa'i stong pa yang grub pa yin no
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex13112024-10-2113-14-43,unreviewed,18a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13112024-10-2113-14-43"" status=""unreviewed"">[⁽1763⁾]<rs type=""person"" ana="""">tsha na re</rs> spyir de ma thag rkyen du 'gyur ba la shes pa gzhan gyis chod na skyon du 'gyur gyi dus gzhan gyis chod pas mi skyon de 'gog pa la zhugs pa bzhin no
column3: des na mnyam par 'jog kha ma'i shes pa nyid la skye'o
column5: <rs type=""school"">phar phyin pa</rs> kun la yang mnyam bzhag snang ba yod med gnyis la med pa'i lugs kyang 'di dang mthun pa 'dra zhes gsungs
column6: _<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre </rs>ni khong <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>thal ba<?oxy_comment_end?> yang min te mnyam bzhag na shesapa dngos po la yod cing mnyam bzhag gi blo ngo na med pas spros par mi 'gyur gsung ste babs che che 'dra
column7: _so sa bon las skye'i mngon gyur med pas zer

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3809"">khyung na re</rs> mnyam bzhag don dam yin zhing <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>thal bas<?oxy_comment_end?> mnyam bzhag na sems rgyun chad dgos la
column2: _rjes shes ni kun rdzob tu rang gi rigs snga ma las skye ste bum pa'i bden gnyis bzhin zer te <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>go rgyu tsam mi 'dug<?oxy_comment_end?>_rang gi rtog pa la mnyam bzhag na mi rtogs pa'i ye shes rgyun ma bcad par bde
column3: _de rnal 'byor mngon sum yin min ni chos nyid la ltos nas mngon sum dang shes pa gnyis char btags pa ba ste
column4: _gzung ba dang shes bya nyid med pas so
column6: shes pa nyid pa ste mi rtog par gnas so
column9: mnyam bzhag gis ye shes kyi tshogs bsags pa bshad zin to
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex13112024-10-2113-08-51,unreviewed,18a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex13112024-10-2113-08-51"" status=""unreviewed""> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog lo</rs></note> gal te yul brdzun pa dang blo 'khrul par shes pas de ltar mi 'gyur ro zhes kyang brjod par mi nus te
column2: [ ⁽1763⁾]de ma yin la der 'dzin gyi zhen yul la 'khrul pa med kyang snang yul la 'khrul pa'i log shes yod pas ma rig pa'i rab rib ma spangs par 'gyur [⁽1763⁾]zhing de lta na sangs rgyas nyid min par <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>thal ba<?oxy_comment_end?>'i phyir ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_013_11_rMa bya_de nyid snang ba Rigs tshogs drug rgyan prose.xml,1_013_11,,ex1310-13112023-09-15-112027,unreviewed,18a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1310-13112023-09-15-112027"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">bde bar gshegs pa'i <?oxy_comment_start comment=""[bold face in source document]""?>bka' rab 'byams <?oxy_comment_end?>kyi don gsal bar byed pa <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3720"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub</rs> kyi <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:4569"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""> dbu ma rigs pa'i tshogs kyi rgyan de kho na nyid snang ba</rs> zhes bya ba snyigs ma'i dus na bde bar gshegs pa lnga brgya bdun pa la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs ri'i khrod la kha ba can gyi ljongs</rs> su 'khrungs pa
column2: brtul zhugs kyi khur 'dzin cing bka' dang bstan bcos kyi gzhung rab 'byams la rtogs pa'i snang ba thob pa'i mkhas pa'i skye bo dam pa du ma bsten pa yis bstan pa'i khur 'dzin cing zab mo'i don la rigs pa'i dbang phyug tu gyur pa lta ba ngan pa'i rgol ba ma lus par 'joms par mdzad pa
column3: <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3842"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">shAkya'i dge slong byang chub brtson 'grus </rs> kyis sbyar ba rdzogs s+ho
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-10-0914-17-461,unreviewed,2a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10012024-10-0914-17-461"" status=""unreviewed"">la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen</rs> ni
column2: <hi rendition=""#TibetanView"">yul gang la dgos pa gang gi don du
column3: tshul ji ltar phyag 'tshal ba ste
column4: chos gsuM gyis khyad par du byas nas phyag 'tshal ba ston pa ste
column5: tshig gcig dang
column6: phye dang gsuM dang
column7: phyed kyis rim pa bzhin ston pa yin no</hi> zhes bzhed do

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-03,finalized,2a1 - 2a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-03"">
yan lag gi rten la shes rab ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">jo bo 'buM <lb n=""2a2""/> pa</rs> ni <rs type=""school"">dbu ma sgyu ma lta bu</rs> dang
column2: <rs type=""school"">rab du mi gnas pa</rs> gnyis kyi don shes pa ste

column1: dang po ni snang la bden pa'i chos kyis stong ba yin la
column2: gnyis pa ni snang ba tsaM du yang mi gnas pa yin no
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-04,finalized,2a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-04"">des na shes rab ni don ma shes pa × don dam pa'i <rs type=""school"">rab du mi gnas pa</rs> dang
column2: <rs type=""school"">sgyu ma lta bu</rs> ni 'o zhes 'chad pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs>'i dgongs pa ma yin no
column4: <note type=""gloss"">°°°°°° dbu ma nyid °°°°°°</note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-55,finalized,2b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-55""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> ltar na khyod bshad par dam bcas nas bstan chos 'chad na
column2: bstan chos kyi brjod bya mngon par rtogs pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> nyams su myong nas saM
column3: 'on te bla ma daM pa'i <choice><sic>bdaM</sic><corr>gdams</corr></choice>ngag la brten nas 'chad
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012025-04-2516-15-59,finalized,2b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10012025-04-2516-15-59"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> ltar na tshig rkang pa gnyis po des rang don dang gzhan don gyi yon tan ston la
column2: dang po ni snga ma dang 'dra'o

column1: gnyis pa la gzhan don gyi rgyu bsam pa dang
column2: ngo bo sbyor ba'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012025-04-2516-15-593,finalized,9b4 - 9b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10012025-04-2516-15-593"" status=""finalized"">       'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> ni mkhyen pa gsuM dus gsuM dang 'brel pa
column2: rang dang gzhan <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyi thun mong ba
column3: 'phags pa'i gang zag <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyi rgyud la skye ba
column4: shes bya rgya mtsho lta bu spyi yin la
column5: sbyor ba bzhi dang chos sku × ni sbyor ba nyaMs su len pa po bdag nyid dang 'brel pa'i rgyu dang 'bras bu'i bye brag min pas
column6: de'i skra'i rtse mo chu'i tshod tsaM

column1: <lb n=""9b5""/> yin pas de rgya mtsho lta bu der ji ste mi 'du
column2: des na mkhyen pa gsuM la bstod pas brgyad ka la bstod par 'grub po
column3: de'i phyir grangs nyung ba'i skyon med do zhes zer ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012025-04-2516-15-594,finalized,10b6 - 10b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""10b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10012025-04-2516-15-594"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs>s <abbr>ye shes</abbr> kyi bdag nyid mkhyen pa gsuM chos sku las
<lb n=""10b7""/> gzugs kyi sku'i sangs rgyas skyes pas yuM sras su gsungs pa ni mi rigs ste
column2: sa dang po nyid du yon tan gyi che ba dang mtshan dang zhing dag pa dang
column3: sprul pa brgya' 'gyed pa'i sku gsuM po cig ma thob nas
column4: sa gnyis pa la yon tan dag pa dang mtshan dang zhing dag pa lhag pa dang
column5: sprul pa stong 'gyed pa <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pas de nyid sbyong ba yin no
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012025-04-2516-15-595,finalized,11b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""11b9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex10012025-04-2516-15-595"" status=""finalized""> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> ni tshul ni rang bzhin yin pas
column2: rang bzhin tha dad pa gsuM pa can zhes 'chad de 'og du bshad par bya'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-292,finalized,40b5 - 40b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-292""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">mda'</rs> na re sa bcu pa'i dkyil stod la yod pa yin te
column2: de byang ghub seMs dpa'i mngon rtogs yin pas so
column4: des na sa bcu pa'i stod la rnaM kun
column5: dkyil la rtse mo
column7: smad la mthar gyis pa
column8: tha ma la skad cig ma zer ro

column1: de dag gis 'di snyaM du spyir rtse mo brtan par byed pa mthar gyis pa yin no zhes bshad pas
column2: de sa bcu rgyun gyi tha ma la byas na mthar gyis pa'i

column1: <lb n=""40b6""/>bstan byar mi 'thad de
column2: de la rim pa med pa dang
column3: de'i gong na laM gzhan med pa'i phyir ro zhes bsaMs pa yin no
column5: de rnaMs ni mi rigs ste
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-293,finalized,49a6 - 49a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""49a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-293"">°°°°°° zhes pa la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">mda'</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> na re
column4: sa dang po thob ma thag la sbyin pa dang ldan pa
column5: de bogs sbung pa khyad par can la mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa yin <lb n=""49a7""/> no
column7: de bzhin du sa bcu pa'i bar du sbyar ro zhes zer ro
column9: de ni seng ge bzang po'i 'dod pa ma yin te
column10: des don gyi go rims su bshad pas de lta na go rims 'khrugs par 'gyur bas so
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-10-0915-20-12,finalized,69a2 - 69a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""69a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-10-0915-20-12"">gnyis pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs> na re dmigs pa dang rnaM pa mi brda'<!--TOCHECK brda'? unclear--> pa 'di dag kyang rjes thob kyis bsdus pa yin par 'thad de
column2: mnyaM par bzhag pa'i tshe ni <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du chos kyi dbyings kyi rnaM

column1: <lb n=""69a3""/> pa can nyid do
column3: 'on kyang rjes kyis mtshon nas 'di ltar bshad par zad do zhes zer ro
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">lha rje</rs> na re chos kyi °°° dbyings kyi che ba dang
column6: thabs la mkhas pa'i che ba gnyis kyi dbang du byas nas yin te
column7: dang po'i dbang du byas nas nges 'byed <abbr>thams cad</abbr> kyang dmigs pa mi rtag pa <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa la rnaM pa °°° mngon par zhen pa <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa bkag pa'i chos nyid kyis dmigs par byed pas yin pas dmigs rnaM la khyad med do

column1: <lb n=""69a4""/> gnyis pa'i dbang du byas nas <abbr>sems can</abbr> mos pa sna tshogs pa rnaMs kyi mos pa dang bstun nas de 'dul ba'i thabs la mkhas pas dmigs rnaM du mar gsungs pa yin no zhes zer ro
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-10-0915-20-122,finalized,74b4 - 74b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""74b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-10-0915-20-122""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:db:3827"">'broM</rs> ltar na bye brag smra ba <lb n=""74b5""/> rang ltar na ma chags pa'i dge ba cig su la yang rigs gsuM du 'jog pa bzhin du
column2: nged chos nyid rigs su 'dod pa la yang mtshungs so zhes pa dang
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4189"">lha rje</rs> ltar na gnyis su med pa'i shes pa cig su la dmigs pa'i sgo nas rigs gsuM du seMs tsaM pa khyad rang 'dod pa bzhin du
column4: nged chos nyid rigs su 'dod pa la mtshungs so zhes grub <note type=""editorial"">Reading uncertain</note> chos kyi lan yin <lb n=""74b6""/> skad do
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-294,finalized,76a7 - 76a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""76a7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-294"">gnyis pa so sor bshad pa la gnyis las
dang po sa 'tshaMs ni de ltar zhes bya ba <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa ste
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> na re go rims si la pa <note type=""editorial"">Reading ""si la pa"" uncertain.</note> bzhin zhes pa'i don ni go cha ni sbyor laM
column4: °°° ni sgoM laM sa bdun pa man chad
column5: nges par °°° pa ni khyad par gyi laM sa brgyad pa <lb n=""76a8""/> yan chad do zhes sbyar nas
column6: brgyad stong bar ni gzhan <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3756"">thogs med</rs> kyi</note> lugs bshad pa yin pas mi 'gal lo zhes zer ro

column1: de ni ma yin te
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-295,finalized,84b9 - 85a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""84b9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-295"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> na re
column2: rnaM thar sgoM gsuM shes ba ni gnyen po cig yin la
column5: °°° shes <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa spong ba ni gnyen po gsuM yin la de gsuM gyis spang bya cig spong zhing
column6: lhag ma rnaMs gnyen po re res spang bya re re spong zhes zer ro

column1: de ltar ni ma yin gyi
column2: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3792"">dags po</rs><note type=""editorial"">""dags po"" could also be Dwags po lha rje (ID:4189), but the latter is mentioned in the same text as ""lha rje"".</note> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">'buM pa</rs> na re</note> gnyen po re res <pb n=""85a""/><lb n=""85a1""/> spang bya re re rim pa bzin spong ba yin pas °°°i°o°i° ni phung po lnga la ngo bor gyur pa'aM byin gyis rlob pa po'i bdag med pa yin pas
column3: de shes pas bdag du 'dzin pa spong ste
column4: de gnyis rnaM pa 'gal pa yin pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-297,finalized,114a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""114a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-297"">  gnyis pa ni de la zhes bya ba <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa ste
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">mda'</rs> na re mkhyen pa gong ma gnyis kyi rnaM pa yang rnaM pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> mkhyen pa'i rnaM bar bsdus nas sgoM pa yin pas de'i rnaM pa sgoM pa rgyas par ston no zhes zer ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-10-0915-45-21,finalized,119a4 - 119a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""119a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-10-0915-45-21""> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">jo bo</rs> ni de gnyis gzung ba dang 'dzin pa bkag pa yin zhes gsung ste
column2: rnal 'byor ba'i blos dmigs par bya ba ni gzung ba lta bu yin la
column3: <lb n=""119a5""/> rnal 'byor bas goMs par byed pa ni 'dzin pa lta bu yin pas
column4: dang po ltos pa gcod par byed pa'i rigs pas shes bya dang shes pa <abbr> thams cad</abbr> ma grub par gtan la phab nas
column5: de ltar goMs par byed pa'i dus su shes bya ma grub par sgoM pa ni gnas pa bkag pa yin la
column6: shes pa ma grub par sgoM pa ni rnal 'byor bkag pa yin no

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-296,finalized,120b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""120b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-296"">des na 'di kun rnaM par 'khor zhes lugs las 'byung pa lta bu'o
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs>s sbyor ba 'di <abbr>thams cad</abbr> sa brgyad par bshad pa dang
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs>s ldog pa tsaM gyis tha dad par bshad pa ni gzhung dang mi mthun pas mi legs so
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-29,finalized,130a4 - 130a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""130a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-29""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> na re <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">seng ge bzang po</rs>s nges 'byed zag med chung ngur bshad pa'i rjes su <lb n=""130a5""/> 'brangs nas
column2: de'i rigs thar pa'i cha 'thun yang zag med du yar sman nas 'chad do
column4: de ni mi rigs te
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-14,finalized,130a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""130a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-14""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'broM</rs> na re thar pa'i cha 'thun zag bcas yin pas de'i rjes su 'brangs nas nges 'byed kyang zag bcas su bshad pa yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3712"">seng ge bzang po</rs>'i 'dod pa ma yin te skyon 'og du ston no

1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-2466,finalized,131b9 - 132a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""131b9""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-2466"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6944"">jo bo a pya</rs> na re seng bzang la lugs gnyis yod pa las
column2: dang po ltar na las dang po pa'i sa nas sa dgu pa'i par du mkhyen pa gsuM bsgoMs nas
column3: sa bcu pa la sbyor ba bzhi sgoM pa yin te
column4: de ni rgyun <pb n=""132a""/><lb n=""132a1""/> ring por 'jug pas so
column6: zlos pa'i skyon <choice><sic>sping</sic><corr>spang</corr></choice> 'di ni bshad pa sde dang bstun pa yin pas
column7: rnaM pa <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du khyad par gyi laM zhes pa ni sa bcu pa la bya'o
column9: de ni seng bzang gis rloMs nas bshad pa yin no
column11: gnyis pa ltar na mkhyen pa gsuM thos bsaM gyis yul du byas te rnaM kun mngon rdzogs las dang po pa'i sa rang nas sgoM pa <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa'i rim pa sngar bstan pa de nyid yin no zhes zer ro
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-24,finalized,132a1 - 132a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""132a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-24"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4303"">mda'</rs> na re
column2: yang seng bzang la <lb n=""132a2""/> lugs gnyis pas
column3: dang po ltar na chos mchog man chad du mkhyen pa gsuM bsgoMs nas sa dang po nas dbu ba'i bar du rnaM kun sgoM la sa bcu pa la rtse mo sgoM de'i smad la mthar gyis pa <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa sgoM pa yin no
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-01,finalized,132a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""132a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-01"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'broM</rs> ni sangs rgyas kyi mkhyen pa gsuM gyi <abbr>ye shes</abbr> dang rnal 'byor ba bdag nyid kyi shes pa tha mi dad par rloMs nas sgoM pa yin pas de'i bsaM pa dang sbyar nas nges 'byed la zag med chung rung bshad do

1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-07-31-15-54,finalized,153b6 - 153b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""153b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-07-31-15-54"">'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3944"">zangs kar</rs> na re pha rol du <choice><sic>phyen</sic><corr>phyin</corr></choice> pa drug dang
column2: rjes su dran pa drug ni so so ba <lb n=""153b7""/> dngos po med pa'i ngo bo ni bsdus pa'o zhes zer ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_010_01_C_Khu_mngon rtogs rgyan grel bshad_complete.xml,1_010_01,,ex10012024-01-2916-35-26,finalized,161a4 - 161a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""161a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex10012024-01-2916-35-26"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (161a4–161a5)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4514""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3706"">shes rab gyi pha rol du phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan chos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> ces <lb n=""161a5""/> bya ba'i 'grel pa</rs>'i tshig dang don gsal bar bshad pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3823"">shag kya'i dge slong shes rab brtson 'grus</rs> kyis <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen dam pa rnams</rs> kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brangs nas sbyar ba'o
column7: dge bar gyur cig
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_003_04_C_Gro_sdud tshigs rnam bshad.xml,1_003_04,,ex3042025-01-1012-48-50,unreviewed,1b4 - 2a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3042025-01-1012-48-50"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3693"">yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa</rs>'i don rnams gtsor rgyal ba'i yul gsum gyi mdo <lb n=""2a1""/> nyid las mdor bsdus te bshad par bya'o

1_003_04_C_Gro_sdud tshigs rnam bshad.xml,1_003_04,,ex3042025-01-102,unreviewed,118b1 - 118b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""118b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3042025-01-102"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><lg><l>de las bsod nams thob des blo gros mchog ldan pa'i
<l>bshes gnyen dam <lb n=""118b2""/> pa'i mgon gyis rgyun du rjes bzung ste
<l>'gro ba kun kyi ma rig 'thibs po dpyis 'byin pa'i
<l>chos kyi nyi chen dge legs 'byung gnas myur thob shog

1_003_04_C_Gro_sdud tshigs rnam bshad.xml,1_003_04,,ex3042023-11-241,unreviewed,118b2 - 118b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""118b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex3042023-11-241"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Colophon (118b2–118b3)]""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4462"">'phags pa yon tan rin po che sdud pa tshigs su bcad pa <lb n=""118b3""/> rnam par bshad pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3806"">shAkya'i dge slong blo gros 'byung gnas</rs> kyi brjed byang tsam du brjod pa rdzogs so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2412-28-34,unreviewed,2.4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2.4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2412-28-34"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon</rs> gyi bla ma</rs>'i zhal snga nas kyang
column2: _sems nyid gcig pu kun gyi sa bon te
column4: gang la srid dang mya ngan 'das 'phro ba
column6: 'dod pa'i 'bras bu ster bar byed pa yi
column8: yid bzhin nor 'dra'i sems la phyag 'tshal lo
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012025-05-1417-38-38,unreviewed,2.4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2.4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012025-05-1417-38-38"" status=""unreviewed"">'di dag la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">rigs pa'i dbang phyug phya pa</rs>'i zhal nas
column2: _'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sa bon yin pa'i phyir zhes pa ni thar pa cha mthun gyi dge ba'i bag chags 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i chos skye ba'i rgyu yin pas so
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2412-29-35,unreviewed,2.4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2.4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2412-29-35"" status=""unreviewed"">        de la 'khor lo chen po bzhi ni
column2: _<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon</rs> gyi <rs type=""work"">springs yig</rs> las
column3: _mthun par gyur pa'i yul du gnas pa dang
column5: skyes bu dam pa la ni brten pa dang
column7: bdag gis legs smon sngon yang bsod nams bgyis
column9: 'khor lo chen po bzhi ni khyod la mnga'
column11: zhes gsungs pa'o
column13: <!--Nagarjuna Suhrlekha--></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2412-32-11,unreviewed,2.4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2.4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2412-32-11"" status=""unreviewed"">bzhi pa ni
column2: _mtshan yang dag par brjod pa las
column4: sangs rgyas sku lnga'i bdag nyid can
column6: zhes gsungs pas de la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon 'jam dpal grags pa</rs><!--Mañjuśrīkīrti --> ni ngo bo nyid la sogs pa sngar gyi bzhi po dang bya ba thams cad thugs su chud cing sems can gyi don mdzad pa'i bya ba grub pa'i ye shes la ye shes kyi sku zhes bya ste lngar bzhed do

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2412-33-39,unreviewed,2.4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2.4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2412-33-39"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon kun dga' snying po la sogs pa 'ga' zhig</rs><!--Anandagarbha--> ni dang po bcu byang chub sems dpa'i yin la tha ma gnyis sangs rgyas nyid kyi yin par bzhed do

1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2412-33-38,unreviewed,2.4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2.4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2412-33-38"" status=""unreviewed"">  <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon shAkya bshes gnyen</rs><!--Shakyamitra--> ni dka' ba spyod pa'i tshe rnam par smin pa'i sku de nyid du bzhag nas sprul pa'i skus 'og min du song ste der sangs rgyas nas slar yang sngar gyi sku la bzhugs te
column2: _byang chub kyi snying por gshegs pa la sogs pa mdzad pas dang po bdun byang chub sems dpa'i yin la phyi ma lnga sangs rgyas kyi yin par 'dod de
column3: _theg pa chen po ba phal cher gyis thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yin par bzhed do
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_017_01_Blo rgos mtshungs med_rgyud bla ma'i bstan bcos nges don gsal bar byed rin po che'i sgron me.xml,1_017_01,,ex17012023-07-2411-54-06,reviewed,681.3 - 681.6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""681.3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex17012023-07-2411-54-06"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""> <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (681.3-681.6)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4588""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3749"">theg <lb n=""681.4""/> pa <abbr>chen po</abbr> rgyud <abbr>bla ma'i</abbr> bstan bcos</rs> kyi nges pa'i don gsal byed pa <abbr>rin po che'i</abbr> sgron me</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""place"" ref=""db:6650"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">yul dbus</rs> kyi <lb n=""681.5""/> <note type=""editorial"">Modern addition by Khenpo Appey in instance (ID:7377): g.yo ru gra'i cha stod grong zhes par sku 'khrungs</note> char byung pa × <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3896"">rigs par smra ba <abbr>blo gros</abbr> mtshungs med</rs> kyis × skyes bu mkhas pa'i <abbr>tshogs</abbr> kyis brten pa'i bsti <lb n=""681.6""/> gnas <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6173"">dpal gsang phu ne'u thog gi chos gra <abbr>chen po</abbr></rs>r sbyar ba'o
</seg></TEI>"

column2: <abbr>bkra shis</abbr> par sho
