2_055_01a_Ral gri_brel brtag rab byed mchan bu.xml,2_055_01a,,ex25501a2023-01-2316-16-43,reviewed,4a4 - 4b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex25501a2023-01-2316-16-43"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""> <milestone unit=""section"" n=""SP's Colophon (4a4–4b1)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3775"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">'brel pa brtag pa'i rab tu byed pa</rs> ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3773"">slob dpon mkhas pa chen po chos kyi <abbr>grags</abbr> pa</rs>s mdzad pa rdzogs s+ho

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3730""><rs type=""place"" ref=""db:5558"">rgya gar</rs> gyi mkhan <pb n=""4b""/><lb n=""4b1""/> po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha</rs> dang ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5561"">lo tsa ba ban+de nam mkha</rs>s bsgyur

<note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5563""><rs type=""place"" ref=""db:5558"">rgya gar</rs> gyi mkhan po dpal rab 'byor zhi ba</rs>'i zhal bzhus dang ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5562"">zhu chen gyi lo tsa ba dge slong ting 'dzin bzang po</rs>s zhu chen bgyis te gtan la phab zer
column2: </note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 4_114_02.xml,4_114_02,,ex114022024-11-2212-13-20,reviewed,1a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex114022024-11-2212-13-20"" status=""reviewed""> chos 31 <!--on top of the folio-->
<lb n=""1a1""/>dam pa'i chos la zhus dag bya ba'i tshul <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4097"">dpang lo</rs>'i gsung las byung ba <abbr>bzhugs so</abbr>
<note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6856"">rgyal sras <abbr>'jigs</abbr> med</rs> kyi dpe'o

4_114_02.xml,4_114_02,,ex114022024-11-2212-06-00,reviewed,1b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""1b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex114022024-11-2212-06-00"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">mchan yig 'bebs tshul
column2: zhus dag gi byed tshul
column3: mchan yig 'dri tshul rnams <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4097"">dpang lo</rs>'i gsungs bzhin bkod
column5: shu b+haM

column1: ra dza <!--in dbu can-->
<note type=""gloss"">1 zhus</note>
<note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6856"">rgyal sras <abbr>'jigs</abbr> med</rs> kyi dpe'o
column2: </note></seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-05-1313-33-59,finalized,1a1 - 1a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-05-1313-33-59"" status=""finalized""> <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Cover page""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4478""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3727"">byang chub seMs dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa</rs>'i Ti ka</rs></seg></TEI>"

1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex6012024-09-1112-55-38,unreviewed,2b4 - 2b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-55-38"" status=""unreviewed"">
column2: 'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:6137"">'grel pa 'khan</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:6137"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">shes rab blo gros</rs></note> na re
column3: spangs pa chos <lb n=""2b5""/> gsum dang ldan pa de gang zag brgyad las khyad par du byas pa ste
column4: so so'i skye bo dang
column5: bsam brtan dang po nas srid rtse'i bar kyi   phyi rol pa'i 'dod chags dang bral ba dang
column6: 'phags pa rgyun du zhugs pa dang
column7: lan cig phyir 'ong pa dang
column11: rang rgyal ba rnams las so
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex602024-09-1112-54-04,unreviewed,5a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex602024-09-1112-54-04"" status=""unreviewed"">gsung par rigs pas
column2: <note type=""gloss"">gzhung 'og ma ma sbyar kyang logs su thob byed pas skyon .... tha dad de bsaM pa phun suM tshogs pa ni thar pa'i  .... gyi dge rtsa bsod naMs bya pa 'dod pa'i  blo yin la ... dang 'bras bu dkon mchog dang bden pa la ...  pa yin no zhes slob dpon .....</note> gzhung 'og ma nas ni phan yon ston par
column3: 'grel par 'chad pa ltar nyid legs par sems ste
column4: mod sde <note type=""gloss"">du ma</note> nas kyang dal 'byor snyid dka' ba ni chos mang po la 'chad pa'i phyir ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-05-1313-39-42,finalized,10a2 - 10a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""10a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-05-1313-39-42"" status=""finalized"">rigs pa <choice><sic>'thed</sic><corr>'thad</corr></choice> pa las smon pa phan yon dang ldan pa'i 'dad pa sems can rnams kyi glad nad tsam zhes gsungs ste
column2: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:6966"">mo'u 'khan</rs> na re</note> sman pa lta bu' bla sngan la ma bltos par sems can gyi glad nad gsal lo zhes bsams na 'ang bsod nams dpag med pa dang ldan na zhes 'gel pas 'chad mod kyi

column1: <lb n=""10a3""/> dge' slong dag sngon 'das pa'i dus na khrong × khyer ba ra na se na ded pon 'dza 'o zhes bya' ba phyug cing nor mang ba cig yod pas
column2: rang dang rigs mthun pa'i chung ma brlangs pa las bu skyes pa thams cad shi bas
column3: de bu btsas na bu mo 'i ming du thogs shig 'tsho' bar 'gyur ro zhes gzhan las thos pa dang
column4: bu zhig gtsang pa'i tshe btsas ston chen po byas nas bu mo 'dza' mo zhes

column1: <lb n=""10a4""/> ming bstags so

1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-05-1312-42-05,finalized,15b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-05-1312-42-05"" status=""finalized"">sems bskyed kyi sngon du song pa'i <note type=""gloss"">rgyu</note> kyabs 'gro' khyad par can de nyid kyang sems skyed <note type=""gloss"">dang 1</note> yin pa<note type=""gloss"">s</note> de <note type=""gloss"">seMs skyed</note>'i sngon du <note type=""gloss"">skyabs 'gro</note> khyad par can ma <choice><reg>song bas</reg><orig>song {°} bas</orig></choice>
column2: de nyid ma skyes pa'i phyir rgyu' skyabs 'gro med pas <note type=""gloss"">'bras bu</note> sems bstan mi skye bar 'gyur ro
column4: ¦ </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-05-0515-06-29,finalized,15b2 - 15b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-05-0515-06-29"" status=""finalized"">    <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:6968"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6968"">mar lo</rs></note> na re <lg><l>sems bskyed <lb n=""15b3""/> pa ni gzhan don phyir
column5: </l></lg> ces <note type=""gloss"">seMs skyed ni</note> gzhan kho na'i don du byang chub du 'dod pa yin la
column6: skyabs 'gro ni rang gzhan gnyi' ga'i don du 'dod pa yin no zhes pa ni

column1: mi rigs ste
column2: de yang snying brtse' las rig bya'o zhes skyabs 'gro' yang gzhan don du bshad pa'i phyir ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-05-1312-42-06,finalized,15b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-05-1312-42-06"" status=""finalized"">rang gi don du dmigs pa yang snying rjes <lb n=""15b4""/> <note type=""gloss"">skye ba</note> yin na nyan thos kyang snying rje can du gyur pas
column2: <note type=""gloss"">°°°...°°°</note> <note type=""gloss"">'dod par mi nus te</note> theg pa chen <choice><reg>po snying</reg><orig>po {°} snying</orig></choice> rjes khyad par du ji ltar <choice><reg>'byed</reg><orig>‹'›byed</orig></choice>
column3: gzhan yang mod ste rgyan du sems bskyed pa'i skabs su don che yang dag bsgrub pa'i <note type=""gloss"">bya ba</note> byed ces rang dang gzhan gyi don chen po bsgrub par bshad pas
column4: <note type=""gloss"">seMs kyed yang</note> gzhan kho'i ched ma yin par  <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">ja</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">""ja"" in dbu can</note> <note type=""gloss"">zhes pa'o</note>
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-04-2515-33-51,finalized,16b2 - 16b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-04-2515-33-51"" status=""finalized""><quote>skyabs su 'gro' ba ni ngag gis 'khor lo yin no
column3: </quote> zhes <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:5633"">mdo</rs> 'ga' nas 'byung la ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re dper na skyel ma zhu <lb n=""16b3""/> bar 'dod pa'i mi la ngag gi brda' ma sprad na zhu' bar 'dod pa'i bsam pas tsam gyis zhus pa'i go mi tshad pa bzhin <choice><reg>du brjod</reg><orig>du {°°} brjod</orig></choice> pas khyab po zhes <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs></note> zer ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex6012024-09-1112-56-20,finalized,16b3 - 16b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-56-20"" status=""finalized""> de ltar mchod pa dang skyabs su 'gro ba byas nas sdig pa bshags pa ni
column2: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7338"">'phags pa chos <choice><reg>bzhi pa'i</reg><orig>bzhi'{i} pa'i</orig></choice> mdo</rs> las 'byung pa bzhin stobs rnam pa bzhi' ste

column1: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rngog lo</rs><note type=""editorial"">The reading ""rngog lo"" is uncertain; no ""o"" is visible; the gloss could also read ""rtag lo"" </note> 'i zhal nas rgyud gcig °°° gnyen po dge ba'i stobs rgyud la skyed pas °°° yin pas stobs bsuM po gnyen no ¦...°°°...°°°</note> sun 'byin pa dang
column2: sten dang ¦

column1: <lb n=""16b4""/> gnyen po dang
column2: sor chud pa'i stobs so
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex6012024-09-1112-56-41,finalized,18b8 - 19a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""18b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-56-41"" status=""finalized"">
column2: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3944"">zangs kar</rs></note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3944"">kha cig</rs> na re rang bzhin <note type=""gloss"">°°°</note> dang bcas pa'i ltung pa tshan tshan du bsdebs te
column3: dpe chung du byas nas rtogs par sla'o <pb n=""19a""/><lb n=""19a1""/> zhes zer ba ni

column1: mi 'thad de
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-05-1312-57-36,finalized,19a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""19a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-05-1312-57-36"" status=""finalized"">'pham pa lasogs pa thams cad ni bcas pa yin la
column2: rtswa gcod pa las bsogs pa yang nyon mongs pa dang 'brel na rang bzhin yang yin pa'i phyir ro

column1: de ltar na rang bzhin 'ba zhig pa 'ang yod de
column2: <note type=""gloss"">°°°°°°</note> bslab pa ma slangs pa rnams kyis nyon <note type=""gloss"">°°°°°°</note> mongs pas nyes spyod la zhugs pa bzhin no
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-05-1312-21-17,finalized,20a1 - 20a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-05-1312-21-17"" status=""finalized""><lb n=""20a1""/> zhes pa man chad degs gzhi'i bsam pa yin te
column2: ched du bya ba sems can gyi don du smon par 'di thams cad don mthun pa'i phyir ro

column1: sbyor ba'i tshe ngag ni sngar bshad pa brgyad de
column2: mchod pa dang
column4: phyag brtsal ba dang
column5: skyabs su 'gro ba dang
column6: sdig pa bshags pa dang
column7: rjes su yi rang pa dang
column9: gsol ba 'o zhes <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">nga</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">""nga"" in dbu can</note> gsung yang
column10: bsngo' ba med na sbyor ba ma tshang par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang
column11: <quote source=""db:3727"" n=""7a"">lus dang de bzhin long spyod dang
column13: </quote> ces pa man chad ni bsam pa 'di ltar bskyed par bya' <note type=""gloss"">zhes</note> dngos gzhi'o bsam pa'i khyad par <note type=""gloss"">du</note> snang la
column14: <quote source=""db:3727"" n=""7a"">mdun du nye bar gnas gyur cig</quote> zhes pa yan chad ni 'di ltar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo ba nyid du snang pa'i phyir
column15: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex6012024-09-1112-57-05,finalized,20a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-57-05"" status=""finalized""><lb n=""20a3""/> sbyor ba dang dngos gzhi sa 'tshams <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3786"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">lo tsa</rs>s</note>mdzad pa ltar legs par sems <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">sa</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">""sa"" in dbu can</note> so
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-05-1312-21-18,finalized,20a3 - 20a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""20a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-05-1312-21-18"" status=""finalized""><note type=""gloss"">gzhan yang °°°'tshal la gnyen kur kyi mchod par °°°°°° <abbr>med</abbr> pa'i phyir gsung pa la</note>
bstod pa dang phyag btsal ba yang bkur ti'i mchod pa zhes ming du brtags pa la nyes pa med de
column2: gzhung gi glad du mchod brjod brjod pa bzhin no
column4: des na dge ba'i lha dang su ma ti lasogs pa <note type=""gloss"">'gro ba dang stod °u sogs pa</note> thams cad dngos gzhir 'chad pa 'aM
column5: 'grel chen mkhan <choice><reg>kyis</reg><orig>kyi‹s›</orig></choice> dam bca' ba

column1: <lb n=""20a4""/> <abbr>tshigs su</abbr> brjod pa la thug pa thams cad bsngo' bar byas ste sbyor bar 'chad pa ni ma legs par sems so

1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex01062025-05-1313-03-48,reviewed,21a3 - 21a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""21a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex01062025-05-1313-03-48"" status=""reviewed""><note type=""gloss""/>
'dir <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> ni re
column2: las dang po bas sems bskyed pa mi bya' ste
column4: <choice><corr>skyes</corr><sic>kyes</sic></choice> kyang nyams par

column1: <lb n=""21a4""/> 'gyur bas
column2: slar nyes pa che pa'i phyir ro
column4: zhes zer ba ni mi 'thad de
column5: snying rje can byang chub sems dpa'i rigs can yang yod la
column6: dge' bshes la brten pa 'am
column7: thos bsam lasogs pas bsam pa khyad par can du gyur pa yod pa la <note type=""gloss"">mi skye ba'i <sic>tan</sic> tshigs ma grub te</note> ci 'i phyir mi skye
column8: <note type=""gloss"">nyams °° <sic>tan</sic> tshigs yang ma grub ste</note> bshes gnyen rten pa lasogs pa rkyen bzang po dang 'brel pas mi nyams par 'gyur ba'i phyir dang
column9: <note type=""gloss"">°°°°°</note> <lb n=""21a5""/> nyams kyang sdeig pa sbyangs zhes yang gsos btab pa'i sgo nas gnyen po goms nas bstan par 'gyur ba'i 'ang phyir dang
column10: byed pa rgyu' mthun skye ba gzhan du 'phen pa'i phyir
column11: sems bskyed pa don yod pa kho na'o
column13: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex01062025-05-1313-03-482,finalized,22a5 - 22a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""22a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex01062025-05-1313-03-482"" status=""finalized"">       <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> na re dal 'byor yang khyad par can te
column2: so sor thar pa'i rten du rung pa kho na ste
column3: so sor tha pa myed na sems bskyed pa nyid mi 'chags pa'i phyir ro zhes zer ro
column5: de ni mi rigs ste
column6: pham pa byung <lb n=""22a6""/> pa 'am 'tshams med pa dang 'brel pa lasogs pa la <note type=""gloss"">so sor 'thar pa med kyang °</note> yang sems skye ba'i phyir dang
column7: so sor thar pa ni ji srid 'tsho' ba yin pas tshe 'das pa na gtong yang de tsam kyi bya sems mi gtong pa'i phyir ro

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex01062025-05-1313-20-46,finalized,23a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex01062025-05-1313-20-46"" status=""finalized"">gzhan yang bsgrub bya tshan gsum bsrung pas sdom pa gsum ldan gyi tha snyad du mdzad pa yang mi rigs ste
<note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">dge bshes rgya</rs>'i lugs la bzhi las dang po gzhan gyi lugs gi spyad pa ni</note>

dge slong mas rgyal po'i chang <pb n=""23a""/><lb n=""23a1""/> ba bcad pa'i mi nges par 'tsho' bar 'gyur ba sdug bsngal drag po can 'gyur byed kyi lan tsha brlud pas myur du gsod pa ni snying rjes ma bzod pa'i spyod pa yin kyang pham pa byung pa mod nas bshad pa'i phyir dge' slong lasogs pas so sor thar pa'i sdom pa <note type=""gloss"">°</note> ni snying rje chen pos kyang de lta bu bkag la
column2: byang chub sems dpa ni bsgrub pa yin pa'i phyir <note type=""gloss"">slab bya</note> 'gal ba kho na'o

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex6012024-09-1112-54-362,finalized,23b4 - 23b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""23b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-54-362"" status=""finalized""><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7354"">ber 'gon</rs></note> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:7354"">kha cig</rs> na re skar ma'i spyod pa lta bu byed na so sor thar pa dbul <lb n=""23b5""/> zhing
column2: tshong pa g.yon can gsod pa lasogs pa'i skabs su dbul mi dgos so zhes zer ba ni

column1: lung dang rigs pa med pa'i phyir dang
column2: so sor thar pa'i pham pa'i yan lag tshang par mtshungs pa'i phyir tsam par 'gyur bas mnyam du dbul dgos pa kho na'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex6012024-09-1112-54-36,finalized,23b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex6012024-09-1112-54-36"" status=""finalized"">
<note type=""gloss"">bzhi pa gzhan lugs dgag pa ni</note>
column2: <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3805"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">zhang tshes</rs> na re</note> so sor thar pa'i sdom pa'i ngo bo bzhan la gnod ba bzhi' dang bcas pa las ldog pa <lb n=""23b6""/> tsam snyen gnas yan chad <note type=""gloss"">gcig</note> rten du yang dgos shing
column3: theg pa gang dang yang mi 'gal ba de ni thun mong pa spyi yin la
column4: so so 'i khyad par <note type=""gloss"">byang seMs kyi so sor thar pa</note> ni rgyun chags pa dang
column5: gzhan rjes su bsrung pa dang
column6: slar gso' bar rung pa <note type=""gloss"">yin pa</note> dang
column7: de dag las ldog <note type=""gloss"">nyan thos kyi so sor thar pa yin</note> pa'i sgo nas tha dad pa'i phyir ro

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-05-1313-25-18,unreviewed,33b2 - 33b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""33b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-05-1313-25-18"" status=""unreviewed"">bkag pa rnams kyang ri gzig   pas
column2: thugs rje ldan pa de la gnang zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon shan ti ba</rs>s 'don no skad do
column4: 'di la byang chub sems dpa'

column1: <lb n=""33b3""/> khyim pa la rtsa ba ba hi' char dang rab du byung pa la mi tshegs par spyod pa ma rtogs pa thams cad gnang ngo zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs> zer ba ni mi 'thad de
column2: dge' slong lasogs pa 'i rtsa ba bzhi' thams cad du gnas pa'i skabs med par bcas pa'i phyir
column3: bcas pa'i pham pa bzhi' char la 'gyur bas sdom pa nyams su 'gyur ba'i phyir
column4: sdom pa phul la 'jug par bya'o
column6: des na bram

column1: <lb n=""33b4""/>ze'i khye' bu skar ma lo khe' stong du tshangs par spyod pa spyad nas
column2: gzhan kho na'i don du tshangs spyod gtuang yang tshangs pa'i 'jig rten du skyes pa dang
column4: de yon gyi tshong pa g.yon can bsad kyang ngan 'gror ma skyes pa lasogs pa thabs la mkhas pa'i mod lasogs pa nas gsungs so
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_01_rGya_BCA_commentary 20210902.xml,1_006_01,,ex06012025-05-1313-27-37,finalized,83b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""83b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex06012025-05-1313-27-37"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone n=""Colophon"" unit=""section""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4478""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3727"">byang chub sems pa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa</rs>'i tshig dang don gsal par bshad pa</rs> ×× <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">shag skya'i <choice><corr>dge</corr><orig>‹d›ged</orig></choice> slong byang chub grags</rs> kyis sbyar pa
column5: × rdzogs so
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column2: <quote source=""db:4214"" n=""v. 8"">rim gyis <!--SP 8 D: rim las; SPĀ D: rim gyis--></quote> zhes pas snga phyi gnyis gcig la gnas pa'i 'brel ba 'gog ste

<quote source=""db:5569"" n=""D22a5-6"">'brel pa bkag pas bdag med gnyis bsgrubs par bshad de 'brel pa med na byed pa po'i bdag dang bzung 'dzin med <lb n=""4a4""/> pas chos kyi bdag med bshad</quote><!--not a literal citation of SPA. D reads: de'i phyir 'brel pa med pa na gang zag gi bdag med pa sgrub po//de bzhin du rang gi bdag nyid tsam la gnas pa gzhan gyi dbang nyid dang gzhan dang sbyor ba dang / ltos pa nyid la sogs pa med pa na gzung ba dang 'dzin pa'i dngos po med pa ni chos kyi bdag med pa yin no//--> ces zer ro

<rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6853"">ka ma'i dgon pa</rs>r sku bzhugs nas
column3: bla ma rnams kyis gnang ba yi
column5: man ngag thugs la skyes pa 'di
column7: kun gyi brdzi <abbr>med</abbr> g.nya na'i mtshan
column9: thugs rje'i mnga' bdag<lb n=""113b5""/>b+ho de'i mtshan
column11: bdag ci bla ma 'gro ba'i 'gon
column13: sa stengs grags pa nyid la bshad
column15: de'i nyams myong gdams ngag 'di
column17: brjed dogs <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4105"">bdag</rs> gis bris pa la
column19: lhag <lb n=""113b6""/>°°° mdzod
column21: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4105"">bdag</rs> gis 'di mnyan bris pa'i
column23: bsod naMs grub pa yin des
column25: kun gyis bzang po thob par shog

column5: </note> rdzogs s+ho

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3743"">zhi ba'i lha</rs> la gsungs

des <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6840"">bla ma gser gling pa</rs> <note type=""gloss"">chos kyi grags pa</note> la
des <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3745"">ti pang ka shri snya na</rs> la
des <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6340"">nag tsho tshul khriMs rgyal ba</rs> <anchor xml:id=""a2""/> la

column2: thal rang gnyis nyi+la? zla ltar grags pa yin gyis
column3: rang stong dang gzhan stong gsal bar ma grags
column4: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">bod</rs> 'dir yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3868"">pa tshab nyi ma grags</rs> ma byon bar du
column5: rang rgyud pa 'ba zhig dar ba yin

1_029_03",,ex64082023-09-261,unreviewed,22b1 - 22b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""22b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex64082023-09-261"" status=""unreviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n="" [Colophon (22b1-22b2) (418:1-2)] p. 418""/>
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5131"">mtha' bral dbu ma'i rnam bzhag gsal byed sgron me</rs> 'dis
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7024"">chos smra ba'i gshes bsnyen shes ldan gzu bor gnas pa'i don gnyer ba bstan 'dzin</rs> zhes pas nan gyi[s] bskul ba la brten nas
column3: sde snod gsum dang <lb n=""22b2""/> rgyud sde <abbr>bzhi</abbr> [la]
column4: dgongs 'grel dang bcas pa la blo'i snang ba cung zad thob pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4674"">rat+na kir+ti</rs> zhes bya bas
column5: rang lo brgyad bcu lon pa <hi rendition=""#Time"">me mo lugs</hi> gi lo <hi rendition=""#Time"">smin drug zla ba'i dkar phyogs </hi><?oxy_comment_start comment=""Kārttika śukla pakṣa""?><?oxy_comment_end?> la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5699"">dpal glang ri thang gi gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs so
column7: shu b+haM

column1: 1_007_07_Phya pa_mdo sde rgyan lus rnam bzhag_etext.xml,1_007_07,,ex7072024-10-0912-02-41,finalized,16b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex7072024-10-0912-02-41"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (16b5)""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4497""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3746"">theg pa chen po mdo' <choice><orig>s°</orig><reg>    sde</reg></choice> rgyan</rs> gyi lus rnam gzhag</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s sbyar ba
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-42-55,finalized,27'b2 - 27'b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""27'b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-42-55""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""211.321.3 grangs nyung pa dgag pa""/>

grangs nyung pa dgag pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4207"">blo chung ngur gyur kyang mchog du rlom pa kha cig</rs> <note type=""editorial"">The author of this view is identified as Me dig pa (ID:4207) in (ID:5507).</note> mi srid pa ni mtshon bya la ye med pa dang ma khyab pa phyogs cig la med pa dang khyab ches gzhan la'ang zhugs pa yin pas de gsum du nges te
column2: <lb n=""27'b3""/> mtshan nyid yin pa la de gsum dang bral dgos pa dang de gsum dang ma bral na mtshan nyid ma yin pa'i phyir ro
column3: de gsum dang bral ba tsam gyis mtshan nyid du 'gyur ba ma nges so zhes zer ba

column1: de'i ltar na mtshan nyid kyi skyon mi srid pa dang khyab ches pa gnyis su nges te mtshan nyid yin pa la de gnyis dang bral dgos pa'i phyir dang de gnyis dang ma bral na mtshan nyid <lb n=""27'b4""/>  ma yin pa'i phyir ro
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-39-07,finalized,41b7 - 41b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""41b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-39-07""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""231.11.B Blo ldan bzang po""/>

yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786""><!--=rNgog blo ldan shes rab-->blo ldan bzang po</rs>s gzung yul dang 'jug yul gang gis <lb n=""41b8""/> kyang khyad par du ma byas pa'i yul bden pa dang ldan pa dang rtog pa dang bral ba mngon sum gyi mtshan nyid du 'dod do
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-40-09,finalized,44a8 - 44a9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""44a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-40-09""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">blo ldan bzang po</rs>s <!--=rNgog Blo ldan shes rab--> the tsom dang ldan pa'i gzhi la shes 'dod 'jug rung du brjod pa'ang phyir rgol bsgrub bya'i chos la log rtogs dang ldan pa dang yid dpyod kyi nges pa dang blo kha ma phyogs pa'i gzhi la ma khyab pa dang
column2: bsgrub bya'i chos la log <lb n=""44a9""/> rtogs med na thal ba'i rtags ma grub la log rtogs yod na rang rgyud la shes 'dod med par 'gyur bas bsgrub pa'i thal 'gyur rgyun chad par yang 'gyur ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-2416-41-11,unreviewed,50b2 - 50b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""50b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-2416-41-11"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag cag gi bla ma <lb n=""50b3""/> dag</rs> dpe la yod pa tsam la mi rtag pas khyab pa nges pa'i shugs la mnyan bya'i yod pa la 'ang mi rtag pas ma khyab pa'i dogs pa mtshan nyid nges pa'i tshul gyis chod pas rjes 'gro dang gzhi la bkag pa'i ldog pa gnyi ga bsgrub bya ma grub pa'i snga rol du nges su rung par gsung mod kyi
column2: 'dir gzhi la bkag pa'i ldog khyab nges par sgrub pa dang
column3: rjes 'gro nges pa dgag pa gnyis kyis <lb n=""50b4""/> nges par bya'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-2416-41-36,unreviewed,51a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""51a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-2416-41-36"" status=""unreviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""242.221.222.2A (=bdag cag gi bla ma kha cig)""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag cag gi bla ma kha cig</rs> yod pa tsam la mi rtag pas khyab pa nges pas sgra'i yod pa la mi rtag pas khyab pa shugs la grub par smra te
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-2416-42-31,unreviewed,72b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""72b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-2416-42-31"" status=""unreviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""243.11 phyogs snga ma dgod pa""/>
dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag cag gi bla ma dag</rs> bsgrub bya ni gnyis te
column2: rtags kyi nus pa'i yul gyi bsgrub bya dang
column3: skyon yon bsam pa'i bsgrub bya'o
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-41-02,finalized,80b8 - 80b9,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""80b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-41-02"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""C rNgog Blo ldan shes rab""/>

yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">blo ldan bzang po</rs>s rlom yul gyi bsgrub bya ba lang gi brda'i <lb n=""80b9""/> rgyu mtshan zhes bya ba yin la nog dang lkog shal la rlom yul gyi bsgrub byas khyab pa'ang 'dod pas spyod pa'i brda' lan cig zhugs pas nges pa yin no
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-35-29,finalized,96a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""96a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-35-29"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone n=""Colophon"" unit=""section""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4503"">tshad ma yid kyi mun pa sel pa</rs> zhes bya ba blo gsal zhing rigs par smra bas rtog ge ngan pa'i gzhung 'jig pa brtul zhugs mchog la legs par gnas pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s nye bar sbyar ba
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_008_03_Phya pa_mun sel.xml,1_008_03,,ex8032023-07-1011-35-30,finalized,96a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" status=""finalized"" xml:id=""ex8032023-07-1011-35-30"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone n=""Scribe colophon"" unit=""section""/><lb n=""96a4""/><lg><l>mkhas pa'i 'byung gnas bsod nams dpal gyis brjid
column3: </l> <l>legs gsungs dgongs 'grel chos kyi rin chen mdzod
column5: </l> <l>dam pa'i 'phreng mdzes dge legs gang chen mtsho'
column7: </l> <l><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusm:named_reference"" ref=""db:4362"">bri'u las gtsug lag khang</rs> du <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bdag</rs> gis bris
column11: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_056_09_I_R_M_sKyo_mi g_yo bai dmigs pa skor gsum 20210927.xml,2_056_09,,ex56092024-09-307-22-36,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex56092024-09-307-22-36"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">bla ma snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs> des <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6458"">btsun pa chos kyi rgyal mtshan</rs> la gnang ste bris shing zhus dag_go
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""[Post-Colophon (1b10)]""/>
‹snar thang du zhus <abbr>bris_so</abbr>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_066_02_from transkribus.xml,3_066_02,,ex66022025-04-0215-55-39,reviewed,72a3 - 72a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""72a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex66022025-04-0215-55-39"" status=""reviewed"">   <milestone n=""Colophon (72a3-4)"" unit=""section""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5145""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3727"">byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug pa</rs> rnam par bshad pa</rs> 'di <lb n=""72a4""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">slob dpon dam pa mkhas grub brnyes pa'i skyes bu chen po yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen smon lam kyi mtshan can snar thang pa brgyad par byon pa</rs>'i zhabs kyi rdul spyi bos reg pa'i <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4096"">btsun pa sangs rgyas yon tan dpal bzang po</rs>s sbyar ba'o
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-50,finalized,8b6 - 8b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-50"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs> na re rgan rgon 'chi ka ma'i rig pa lasogs chos can
column2: rig tsam phyi ma skyed nus te
column4: da ltar rig pa 'di bzhin no
column6: zhes pa'i rjes <lb n=""8b7""/>dpag gis 'grub po zer ba la
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-12,finalized,8b7 - 9a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-12"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">gtsang nag pa</rs> na re
column2: des la khyab pa nges byed kyi tshad mas rig tsam la rig pa phyi ma skyed nus te rig pa phyi ma thug med skyes nus kyis khyab pa × grub paM skad cig tsam
column3: dang po ltar na bsgrub bya grub zin pas rtags don med la

column1: gnyis pa ltar na de brgya <pb n=""9a""/><lb n=""9a1""/> 'thud kyang skad cig brgya las med pas des de brtan par mi 'grub po
column3: 'di ni rang rig mngon sum gyis thug pa mngon sum gyis thug pa dngos su khegs pas thug med du shugs la <note type=""gloss"">'</note>grub zer ro

column1: de dang 'thun par <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">dmyal pa</rs>s kyang ngo

3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-16,finalized,9a1 - 9a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-16"" status=""finalized"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4025""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> gtsang drug</rs> na re ¦ rig tsam la rig pa <lb n=""9a2""/> phyi ma skyed nus mthong tsam gyi de de'i rang bzhin can du 'grub na ¦ byas yod la 'jig pa mthong tsam gyis kyang de de'i de can du 'grub par thal lo
column3: 'dod na ltos med don med du 'gyur ro
column5: skye 'jig tshul mtshungs pas 'dir yang ¦ rig pa la mthong pa'i rig pa phyi ma bskyed nus chos can ¦ <lb n=""9a3""/> rig tsam dang rang chas rjes su 'brel pa'i rang bzhin yin te ¦ rig tsam phyi ma skyed de rig tsam gyi rgyu las rgyu gzhan la ltos pa med pa'i phyir ro
column7: ces pa ltos med kyi rtags la bsten pa'i rjes dpag gis bdag cig pa'i 'brel pa nges so gsung ngo

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022025-04-2416-46-10,finalized,9a5 - 9a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022025-04-2416-46-10"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">phya</rs>'i la'ang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3839"">gtsang nag</rs> gi de bzlog bsla ste
column2: du ba la me ldan sgrub pa'ang la'i me 'am ¦ la ma yin gyi me zhes brtags na me tsam mo zhes smra dgos pa ltar ¦ 'dir yang rig pa bskyed nus tsam gyis khyab pa grub po zhes smras pas chog go

column1: 'di ni lung khas len pa la lung <lb n=""9a6""/> gis grub po zhes bya'o

3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022025-05-0511-33-00,finalized,12a3 - 12a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""12a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022025-05-0511-33-00"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">gnyal pa</rs> na re
column2: dgos med kyi bstan bcos la
column3: 'dod bya ma yin pa dang 'brel med dgos pa la
column4: bsgrub mi nus gang zag bstan bcos brjod bya gsum ka la 'gog zer ba la
column5: phyi ma gnyis mi 'thad de
column6: de 'gog gi

column1: <lb n=""12a4""/> ngag gnyis chos can dgag mi nus par thal
column2: bstan bcos 'dis dgos pa de bsgrub mi nus sam
column3: dgos pa 'di bstan bcos 'di dang ma 'brel lam zhes gnyis ka la zhugs pa la
column4: khyed bsgrub mi nus gang zag bstan bcos brjod bya gsum ka la 'gog cing 'brel med kyi log rtogs

column1: <lb n=""12a5""/> dgos pa nyid kyi steng du 'gog pa'i phyir ro

3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022025-05-0510-59-31,finalized,13b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""13b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022025-05-0510-59-31"" status=""finalized""> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4025""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> gtsang drug</rs> na re
column2: brtsod pa'i rtags dang po ma grub
column3: gnyis pa ni snod bcas brdzun pa'i yul can yin pa'i phyir gyis rtags ma grub
column4: brdzun pa la rdzun par shes pa'i phyir
column5: 'khrul par thal ba ma nges so
column7: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-21,finalized,21a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""21a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-21"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> na re dngos kyi dmigs pa byang chub dang ched du bya ba'i dmigs pa gzhan don de ni shes par bya'o
gong ltar na mdo bzhin du'o
column3: mdo las ji skad bshad na bsdus dang rgyas pa'i sgo nas brjod ces zer
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-212,unreviewed,24a2 - 47a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""24a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-212"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4025""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr>drug po</rs><!--gtsang drug pa rdo rje 'od zer?--> na re
column2: 'du byed ni 'bad rtsol <lb n=""47a3""/>yin pas 'du byed med pa'i sgra mi 'jug go

column1: 'di ni dbang po rdul yang sngon goms pa'i stobs kyis 'bad rtsol nas chung pa la byo' gsung ngo
gnas tsaM dus mi 'pho ba la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4025""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> drug po</rs><!--gtsang drug pa rdo rje 'od zer?--> na re
column2: sngar gyi de ltar song na bsam gtan sel ma gsum yel du bsgom pa de 'bras bu che man chad

column1: <lb n=""47a4""/> skye bar 'gyur bsam gtan se la ma sgom pa'i phyir ro

3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022025-05-0511-22-56,finalized,28a6 - 28b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022025-05-0511-22-56"" status=""finalized"">dang po la btsad pa ni brjod par rigs tshul 'dra ba la
column2: brjod tshul la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> <abbr>la sogs</abbr> pa rnams na re dmigs pa dang po ma gtogs <lb n=""28a7""/> pas chos 'ba' zhig brjod pas
column3: dmigs pa bcu gcig skyon can gzhan skyon med do zer ro

column1: gnal pa de las bzlog nas nyer gsum po la can zhes pas gzhung la chad par 'dod do
column3: lugs gsum dgag cing 'thad don brjod
column5: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs> na re sgra mi rtag ces sam <pb n=""28b""/><lb n=""28b1""/> sgra'i mi rtag ces pa ni chos brjod dang khyad par gzhan spong gi sgra yin te
column6: chos can sgras khyad par du byas nas chos mi rtag pa brjod pa'i phyir ro

column1: khyab pa'ang sbyor ba skor cig la ltos nas chos la chos can rten par 'gal ba'i phyir ro
mi rtag pa'i sgra byas na chos can brjod pa dang
column2: <lb n=""28b2""/> khyad par gzhan mi spong pa'i sgra yin te chos des khyad par byas nas chos can sgra brjod pa'i phyir ro

column1: khyab pa'ang sbyor ba skor cig la chos can chos can la chos rten par mi 'gal ba'i phyir ro
gang ltar yang sgra dang mi rtag pa'i tshogs don rtogs pa la khyad med do
<lb n=""28b3""/> sogs 'du 'god med byas na chos brjod kyi sgra
column2: 'du 'god med pa'i gzugs sogs byas na chos can brjod pa'i sgra yin te
column3: de gnyis ka ltar na yang de gnyis kyi tshogs don rtogs pa la khyad med do zer ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-27,finalized,28b3 - 28b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-27"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">gnyal pa</rs> na re sgra mi rtag byas na chos can brjod pa dang khyad par gzhan mi <lb n=""28b4""/> spong pa'i sgra yin te
column2: rang gi brjod bya mi rtag pa dang chos du ma'i rten sgra gnyis tha dad du brjod pa'i phyir ro

column1: sgra'i mi rtag byas na cig shos te
column2: de dang de tha dad du brjod pa'i phyir ro
column4: tshogs don rtogs pa la khyad yed 'dra'o

column1: de bzhin du gzugs sogs 'du 'god med zhes dang
column2: gzugs <lb n=""28b5""/> sogs kyi 'du 'god med ces pa'ang rim bzhin te tshogs don rtogs pa la khyad med zer ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022025-11-08-14-27,finalized,28b5 - 29a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""28b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022025-11-08-14-27"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4025""><abbr>slob dpon</abbr> gtsang drug</rs> na re de gnyis chos du ma'i rten yin min bye brag med do
column3: 'di ni sgra mi rtag byas na chos can brjod pa'i sgra mi ldan rnams × gcod kyi sgra yin te
column4: sgra la rtag pa rnam

column1: <lb n=""28b6""/> par bcad pa tsam yin gyi sgra las gzhan mi rtag pa yin pa bsal ba med pa'i phyir ro
column3: sgra'i mi rtag byas na chos brjod pa'i sgra gzhan ldan rnam gcod kyi ngag yin te sgra las gzhi gzhan gyi mi rtag pa bcad nas
column4: sgra kho rang mi rtag pa go byed du byung pa'i phyir ro
column6: de bzhin du

column1: <lb n=""28b7""/> don la sbyor de ma thag pa dang 'dra ste
column2: mi ldan × rnam gcod dang gzhan ldan rnam gcod gnyis ka ltar na yang de gnyis kyi tshogs don rtogs pa la khyad med do gsung ngo
column4: 'di la tshogs don rtogs pa khyad med spyir dgag
column5: so sor dgag go
column7: dang po ni chos brjod pa dang chos can

column1: <lb n=""29a1""/> brjod pa gang gis kyang tshogs don rtogs pa la khyad med pa'i phyir ro
column3: rkyang pa brjod na ma tshogs pa'i ya gyal go ba med par thal lo
column5: 'dod na des tshogs don rtogs pa'ang med par thal
column6: ya gyal brjod nas go ba khegs pa'i phyir ro
column8: ma nges na mi tsam med kyang

column1: <lb n=""29a2""/> btsun pa yod ces bya'o

3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022025-05-05,finalized,29a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""29a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022025-05-05"" status=""finalized"">so sor dgag pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs>'i de la chos brjod pa dang chon brjod pa'i khyad par med par thal
column2: brjod pa'i tshe gnyis ka brjod la brjod bya tshogs don rtogs pa la khyad par med pa'i phyir ro
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-31,finalized,33b3 - 33b4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""33b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-31"" status=""finalized"">
de yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog lo ts+tsha ba</rs> na re
column2: bka' <lb n=""33b4""/> <abbr>thams cad</abbr> dgongs pa dang
column3: ldem dgongs gnyis su 'dus zer ba 'thad do

column1: rigs kyi dbye ba la brtsod yang 'dir ni rigs tha dad bcu gsum gyi dbye ba rung pa ma yin zhes pa'i brtsod lan du 'thad do
byang se kho na theg chen gyi rigs can ma yin par 'thad pa ni 'dod do

3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022025-05-0511-26-04,finalized,37b6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""37b6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022025-05-0511-26-04"" status=""finalized"">'di ni kun 'byung gi go ba la ma mthun pa yin te
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs>
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-35,finalized,40a3 - 40a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""40a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-35"" status=""finalized"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6949"">a du la</rs> na re
column2: byang se'i nyon mongs kyi nus pa bzhi las
column3: 'khor bar skye ba'i nus pa dang
column4: rigs 'dra bskyed pa'i nus pa gnyis mi yong
column5: sdug bsngal bskyed pa'i dang
column6: gnyen po <abbr>ye shes</abbr> skye ba'i gags byed pa gnyis <lb n=""40a4""/> yong zer ro

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022025-05-0511-17-26,finalized,54b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022025-05-0511-17-26"" status=""finalized""> thugs chos nyid la mnyam par ma bzhag pa med pa yin gyi gzhan la bzhengs bzhugs yod par 'dod do
column3: med na de mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par mi 'jug

column1: <lb n=""54b1""/> par thal te
column2: 'dod na <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5633"">myang 'das kyi mdo</rs> dang 'gal lo
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3720"">klu grub</rs> kyi <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">rtsa bshe</rs> las
column5: <quote><lg><l>'khor ba dang ni mya ngan 'das
column7: </l> <l>gnyis ni yod pa ma yin te
column9: </l> <l>'khor ba yongs su shes pa la
column11: </l> <l>mya ngan 'das shes rab tu brjod
column13: </l></lg> </quote> ces so
column15: rtogs pa la thobs pa zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">rngog lo</rs> gsung lo
column17: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022024-11-08-14-41,unreviewed,57a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""57a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022024-11-08-14-41"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs><!--""kha"" is not visible--> na re 'di la mchod pa cig bya'o

3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022025-05-0511-36-05,finalized,61a6 - 61a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""61a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022025-05-0511-36-05"" status=""finalized""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">gnyal pa</rs> na re srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi sbyor ba rnaM kun kho na'i bye brag tu 'dod cing
column2: srid zhi mnyam nyid kyi sbyor ba tsam cig <lb n=""61a7""/> sa bcu rgyun tha na yod par 'dod pa mi 'thad de
column3: 'o na rnam sbyor yang sa bcu rgyun tha na yod par thal
column4: srid zhi'i de de na yod pa'i phyir ro
column6: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022023-10-25-141025,finalized,68b4 - 68b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""68b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022023-10-25-141025"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (68b4-68b7)""/>
<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5314"">legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4314"">shAkya'i dge slong <choice><reg>dbus bu ston</reg><orig>d°°°(ston)</orig></choice> <anchor xml:id=""a1""/> <choice><reg>seng ge'i</reg><orig>°°°°°°</orig></choice> 'od<anchor xml:id=""a2""/></rs> kyis <lb n=""68b5""/> bkod pa'o
column4: dge legs kyi dpag bsam phyogs bcu <abbr>thams cad</abbr> du rgyas par gyur cig
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_089_02 legs spyad nyi ma'i 'od zer mtshon cha'i rgyal po.xml,3_089_02,,ex89022023-10-25-141421,unreviewed,68b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""68b5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex89022023-10-25-141421"" status=""unreviewed""><note type=""gloss"">zhus dag go</note>
column4: lhu bzhin bris so</note>
column7: bkrashispardugyurcig

column1: 3_081_01 mngon pa kun las btus pa'i rgyan ces bya.xml,3_081_01,,ex81012023-09-131,finalized,208a5 - 208a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""208a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex81012023-09-131"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""> <milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (208a5-208a6)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5268"">chos mngon pa kun <choice><reg>las</reg><orig>la</orig></choice> btus pa'i rgyan</rs> ces bya ba × <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">mkhan po</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">bla ma</rs>'i gsung gi lhag ma dang ¦ x <lb n=""208a6""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">blo gsal 'ga</rs>s bskul pa dang ¦ rang gzhan gyi don du <hi rendition=""#Time"">shing pho rta'i lo</hi> la ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5865"">btsun <note type=""gloss"">pa</note> 'khon ston</rs> gyis ¦ <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4352"">dpal e'i gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar ba rdzogs s+hyo
column3: <!--This “Ornament of the Abhidharmasamuccaya” was composed by the Venerable 'Khon ston in the monastery of Shri-E, in 1174/1234/1294/1354/1414/1474/1534, for himself and others, having been asked by some Clear-minded person, ***the rest of the teaching of the instructor and the bla ma.--></seg></TEI>"

column1: 3_081_01 mngon pa kun las btus pa'i rgyan ces bya.xml,3_081_01,,ex81012023-09-13-143,finalized,208a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""208a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex81012023-09-13-143"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4352"">dpal e'i chos gra chen po</rs>r <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5269"">blo dman dbul po byang chub mgon</rs> gyis bris
column3: bris pa'i dge bas <abbr>sangs rgyas</abbr> thob par shog
column5: dge'o
column7: <!-- It was written in the great seminary of Shri-E by the Feeble-minded Poor Byang chub mgon. Thanks to the merit of writing, may one obtain Buddhahood!--></seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_058_07_thogs_med_rten_brel_khrid_yig_W1PD89084-I1KG13427-1-390.xml,2_058_07,,ex58072024-11-0513-56-30,unreviewed,N002 - N003,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N002""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex58072024-11-0513-56-30"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">  <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5051"">2el snying po bla ma rgyud pa la gsol ba 'debs pa'i tshigsu bcad pa</rs> 'di
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4066"">btsun pa thogs med</rs> kyis

column1: <lb n=""N003""/><rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5692"">dul chu'i chos steng</rs> du sbyar pa
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_03_D_Phya_bden gnyis don bsdus.xml,1_006_03,,ex603_11102023-05-062,finalized,34a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""34a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex603_11102023-05-062"" status=""finalized""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Body of the text (34a1–37a4)""/><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3730"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">slob dpon ye shes snying po</rs>s mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:3729"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">dbu ma bden pa gnyis rnam par 'byed pa</rs> la don lnga ste
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_006_03_D_Phya_bden gnyis don bsdus.xml,1_006_03,,ex603_11332023-05-06,finalized,37a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""37a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex603_11332023-05-06"" status=""finalized"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (37a4)""/><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4480""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3729"">dbu ma bden pa</rs> gnyis kyi don bsdus pa</rs> <rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3831"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rigs par smra ba'i dge slong chos kyi seng ge</rs>s sbyar pa
column5: rdzogs s+hO

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022023-10-11-105324,reviewed,1a2 - 1a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022023-10-11-105324"" status=""reviewed"">phyi<lb n=""1a2""/> tsha<lb n=""1a3""/> 103<lb n=""1a4""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4575""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711"">mngon rtogs rgyan</rs> gyi 'grel bshad 'thad pa'i <lb n=""1a5""/>'od 'bar</rs></seg></TEI>"

1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022025-03-31-25,reviewed,24b2 - 24b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""24b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022025-03-31-25"" status=""reviewed""> gzhi shes kyi <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> la gsum las ¦
rtog pas btags pa dgag pa ni
column2: nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang gnyen po gzhi shes kyi <abbr>mtshan nyid</abbr> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3886"">se</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">""Se"" is understood to refer to be the author's teacher dge bshes Se dmar ba (ID:3886), but it could also be Jo bo Se btsun (ID:6763). ""'Bre"" is understodd to refer to 'Bre shes rab 'bar (ID:3807) but could also refer to gTsang pa 'bre sgur (ID:3872)</note> gzhi <abbr>thams cad</abbr> gang zag gi bdag med dang
column3: gang zag gi bdag dang gzung ba rang bzhin med <lb n=""24b3""/> pa tsam dang bdag mtha' dag skye ba med par mngon sum du rtogs pa'o zhes so
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-15-34,finalized,24b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""24b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-15-34"" status=""finalized"">

'di la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3805"">gnyal</rs></note> nyan rang la chos kyi bdag med rtogs pa yod pas de mi rigs so zhes so

1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-15-39,unreviewed,25b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""25b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-15-39"" status=""unreviewed"">
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3820"">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3820"">'dul</rs></note> skye med gsum bsdus nas sgom pa la rtogs pa lhun grub thob nas dkar chos rim can du sgom pa zhes pa ni rnam kun bkag pa de nyid kyis khegs so

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022025-03-316,unreviewed,26a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022025-03-316"" status=""unreviewed"">skad cig ma'i mtshan nyid la gsum <lb n=""26a2""/> las
column2: rtog pas btags pa dgag pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre</rs></note> brtan pa thob pa'i sgom pa'o zhes so

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022025-03-315,unreviewed,26a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""26a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022025-03-315"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3872"">kha cig</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3872"">rtsang 'bre</rs> chos sku thob pa'i don du brtan pa thob pa'i sgom pa'o zhes grag go
de mi 'thad de sa 'og ma dag na dran pa nyer bzhag la brtan pa thob pa yod pas de yod par thal lo

1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-22-18-40,unreviewed,29a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""29a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-22-18-40"" status=""unreviewed"">
so sor phye ba dang bsdus pa yin zhes <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5611"">'bum pa</rs> gsung lo
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-16-31,unreviewed,44a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""44a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-16-31"" status=""unreviewed"">

column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-16-10,unreviewed,46a4 - 46a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-16-10"" status=""unreviewed"">
gsuM pa rtogs pa'i rtogs tshul gyis dbye ba la gsuM <lb n=""46a4""/> las
column2: rtog pas btags pa dgag pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""4235""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""3827"">kha 1</rs></rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4235"">khu</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'brom</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">""Khu"" is understood to refer to Khu ston brTson 'grus g.yung drung (ID:4235), but could also be Khu mDo sde 'bar (ID:3873)'.</note> chos bzod dang chos shes ma dag pa dang dag pa rtogs par bzhag ste ma dag pa chos mchog man chad las khad nye ba dang ring bas zhes so

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""3834""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""3837"">kha 1</rs></rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3837"">gnyan</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">The identification of ""gnyan"" as g.Yor gnyan (ID:3837) is tentative.</note>  mthong lam dang mthong spang skye 'gag byed bzhin pa dang des <lb n=""46a5""/> dben pas so zhes smra'o

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3820"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3820"">kar</rs></note><note type=""editorial"">The identification of ""kar"" as 'Dul 'dzin dkar mo (ID:3820) is tentative.</note> rgyud sgom spang dang mthong spang gis ma dag pa dang dag pas so zhes grag go
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-22-15-34,unreviewed,47b8 - 48a1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-22-15-34"" status=""unreviewed"">

dang po ni <lb n=""47b8""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4235"">kha 1 </rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4235"">khu</rs></note> chos bzod chos shes <abbr>gnyis</abbr> ni mthong spang rgyun gcod pa dang thag sring pa'i bar chad med pa dang rnam grol gyi lam gnyis su skye la
column2: rjes bzod rjes shes ni gnyis kar 'du ste

column1: 'di ltar chos bzod kyis chos nyid ma dag pa mthong ba na de 'jal gyi <abbr>ye shes</abbr> de nyid kyi gzhan <lb n=""48a1""/> rig gi chos nyid rtogs pa dang
column2: rang rig gi cha'i chos nyid rtogs pa la rjes bzod rjes shes su 'jog go

column1: chos shes kyis chos nyid dag pa mthong ba na ye shes de nyid kyis gzhan rig dang rang rig gi cha'i chos nyid rtogs pa'i cha nas rjes bzod rjes shes su 'jog go
column2: de ltar yang bzod pa dang shes pa thams cad kyang mtshan ma med pas gnas pa'i rnal 'byor can du rig par bya'o zhes chos nyid kyi yul can kho nar bshad pas shes so zhes grag go

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-16-27,unreviewed,48b4 - 48b5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""48b4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-16-27"" status=""unreviewed"">
dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4243"">'ban</rs> mnyam gzhag skad cig gcig tu skye ste
column2: bsdu ba las 'bras bu'i mngon par rtogs pa skad cig ma yin la zhes pa dang
column3: don dam pa so so rang gis rig pa'i ye shes kyi dbang <lb n=""48b5""/>du bya ste skad cig ma gcig yin la zhes bshad pas so

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-22-17-59,unreviewed,61a4 - 61a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""61a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-22-17-59"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">su ka ta</rs> na re sa brgyad pa la'o
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3827"">'brom</rs> na re sa bcu pa sangs rgyas kyi sa yin <lb n=""61a5""/> pas dgu pa la'o

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4294"">khyung po</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">dha</rs> na re sa bcu pa'i dkyil stod la yin te byang chub sems dpa'i mngon rtogs yin pa'i phyir ro
</seg></TEI>"

1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-14-12,unreviewed,8b3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-14-12"" status=""unreviewed"">

'dus tshul dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3872"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3872"">rtsang 'bre</rs></note> mkhyen gsuM gyi spyi la bstod la der mtshan nyid pa'i gsuM lasogs pa brgyad 'du bas so zhes so
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-14-19,unreviewed,8b7 - 8b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""8b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-14-19"" status=""unreviewed"">

gnyis pa <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">kir ti'i</rs></note><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3807"">'bre shes rab</rs></note>ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs><lb n=""8b8""/>mkhyen gsuM rgyu'i dus na sbyor bzhi 'bras bu'i dus na chos sku rgyu 'bras kyis khyad par du ma byas pa rang bzhin yin la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsa ba</rs> rgya che shos mkhyen gsuM du sbyor bzhi 'du bar 'dod kyis nga ni sbyor ba'i chos sku bsdoms par yang mkhyen gsum 'dus so zhes smra'o

1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-14-42,unreviewed,9a3 - 9a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-14-42"" status=""unreviewed"">

gsum pa ni <lb n=""9a3""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3786"">lo tsha ba</rs></note> mkhyen pa gsuM ni dus gsuM car dang 'brel ba rang gzhan thaMd kyi rgyud la thun mong ba 'phags pa'i gang zag thaMd kyi rgyud pa skye ba thos bsam gyi gtan la dbab pa'i yul shes bya rgya mtsho lta bu yin la sbyor bzhi chos sku ni bdag nyid dang 'brel ba'i rgyu<lb n=""9a4""/> 'bras kyi gnas skabs mngon rtogs nyung zas skra rtse'i chu tshod tsam yin pas der ci ste mi 'du zhes gsung ngo
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022025-03-31,unreviewed,9a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022025-03-31"" status=""unreviewed"">dang po btags pa dgag pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">kha cig</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">ar</rs> mkhyen gsum gyi rtogs pa gang rung skyed byed mtshan nyid du bkod pas kyang sangs rgyas skyed byed du mtshon nus so zhes gsung pa mi 'thad de mtshan nyid la ldog pa gsum byung pas mtshon bya la'ang tha dad pas gcig skyed byed mtshan nyid du bzhag pan gnyis po'i mtshon bya la ma khyab pa'i phyir dang nyan rang gi sbyor ba la'ang gzhi shes kyi rtogs pa skyed byed yod pa'i phyir sangs rgyas skyed byed yod par thal lo

1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-14-48,unreviewed,9a5 - 9a6,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""9a5""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-14-48"" status=""unreviewed"">

bzhi pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">kha cig</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3816"">ar</rs></note> mkhyen gsuM mtshon byed kyi chos sum bcu la mkhyen <lb n=""9a6""/>gsuM zhes bya la des sbyor ba'i chos sku bsdus so zhes grags so

1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-22-17-51,unreviewed,152a8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""152a8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-22-17-51"" status=""unreviewed"">
mdo gnyis la rmi ka sla'i khyad yod do <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3820"">'dul 'dzin</rs> zer ro
column2: </seg></TEI>"

2 pa ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3842"">kha 1</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3842"">rma bya</rs></note> snang ba la bden par zhen pa dgag bya'i chos yin <lb n=""11b2""/> te
column2: 'dir ni sdug bsngal rgyur gyur pa'i
column4: bden par rtog pa bzlog bya yin zhes gsungs pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr> zhes zer ro
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-15-13,unreviewed,15b2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""15b2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-15-13"" status=""unreviewed"">

column2: dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">kha 1</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3810"">gangs pa</rs></note> du ma la gcig yod par 'brel la du ma de gcig yin par 'gal bas skyon 2 ka med do zhes grag go

column1: </seg></TEI>"

1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-15-16,unreviewed,16b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-15-16"" status=""unreviewed"">

2 pa phyogs chos mi 'thad pa ni rten brtan pa ni rig pa thug med yin la de yang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">kha cig</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3834"">rgya ma</rs></note> 'chi ba'i shes pa chon shes pa phyi ma skyed nges te shes pa tsam yin pa'i <abbr>phyir ro</abbr> da ltar gyi shes pa'i rtags la brten pa'i rjes dpag gis grub ces zer ro

1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex14022024-10-21-15-24,unreviewed,19b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""19b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex14022024-10-21-15-24"" status=""unreviewed"">

column2: dang po ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">kha 1</rs> <note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">ku ma ra</rs></note> tshig las don la tshad ma'i nges pa skyed nas 'jug par 'dod pa ni mi 'thad de
column3: tshig dang don la 'brel ba med pa'i phyir dang
column4: the tshom kho na skyed nas 'jug ces mtshungs pas so
column5: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_014_02 Jam gsar_mngon rtogs rgyan gyi 'grel.xml,1_014_02,,ex1142-10502023-08-22,reviewed,19b8 - 185a4,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""19b8""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1142-10502023-08-22"" status=""reviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (184a1-185a4)""/>

<rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4575""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3711"">shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i man ngag gi bstan bcos mngon par rtogs pa'i rgyan</rs> ces <lb n=""185a3""/>bya ba'i 'grel bshad 'thad pa'i 'od 'bar</rs> zhes bya ba
column2: shes bya'i nam mkha' la blo gros kyi dkyil 'khor rgyas shing
column3: legs smra'i 'od kyis phas rgol mun pa'i smag rum sel bar byed pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3884"">shAkya'i dge slong rigs par <lb n=""185a4""/>smra ba shes rab 'od zer</rs> gyis sbyar ba rdzogs so
column7: dag cing snyoms pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4576"">shes rab 'bum</rs> gyis bris
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_053_03 ral gri chos mngon pa mdzod kyi bsdus don BUDA OCR.xml,2_053_03,,ex53032024-10-2515-58-57,unreviewed,5a2 - 5a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a2""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex53032024-10-2515-58-57"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon""> <milestone n=""Colophon"" unit=""section""/>
chos mngon shes bya kun mkhyen ni
thob par 'dod nas <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5913""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3761"">chos mngon</rs> <lb n=""5a3""/> gyi
bsdus don</rs> <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4411"">dpal ldan thang chen</rs> du
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4006"">bcom ldan ral gri</rs>s bkod pa yin
column2: sa mA ptaḥ</seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_050_11 nyin zhag re'i bsags sbyangs kyi rim pa.xml,$,,ex50112025-03-2814-13-40,reviewed,2a4 - 2a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50112025-03-2814-13-40"" status=""reviewed""><milestone unit=""section"" n=""Colophon (2a4-5)""/>
sde snod kun gyi bcud bsdus man ngag rnams kyi snying po
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:7318"">yi ge pa grags pa seng ge</rs>s bskul ba'i ngor
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">shAkya'i btsun pa smon lam tshul <lb n=""2a5""/> khrims</rs> kyis cung zad bris pa'o

column1: 1_009_04_Phya pa_dge tshul rnam bshad_etext.xml,1_009_04,,ex9042024-09-1712-48-21,unreviewed,2a4 - 2a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex9042024-09-1712-48-21"" status=""unreviewed"">
<milestone unit=""section"" n=""212.3 bsgyur (2a4–2a5)""/>
bsgyur ba ni shan sbyar ba las ‹'›thob ste
column2: <foreign xml:lang=""sa-Latn-x-wylie"">a rya</foreign> na 'phags pa'o
column4: <foreign xml:lang=""sa-Latn-x-wylie"">(s)a rba</foreign> na <abbr>thams cad</abbr> do
column6: <foreign xml:lang=""sa-Latn-x-wylie"">shra ma Ne ra</foreign> na dge tshul <lb n=""2a5""/> lo

column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3720"">slob dpon bdag nyid chen po 'phags pa klu sgrub</rs> kyis mdzad pa <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5137""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">dbu ma rtsa ba</rs>'i <lb n=""155a4""/> bstan 'chos kyi 'grel pa 'thad pa'i rgyan</rs> ces bya ba
column3: bde bar gshegs pa'i bstan pa lnga brgya bdun pa la <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5559"">gangs ri'i khrod</rs> du byung ba
column4: rang dang gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' rgya mtsho'i pha rol tu son pa
