column1: 4_107_01_I_kun dga rgyal mtshan_BPP.xml,4_107_01,,ex107012023-10-06-103914,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex107012023-10-06-103914"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5421"">byang chub lam gyi sgron ma'i rnam thar bshad pa phul byung dgongs pa'i rgyan bzhugs s+ho</rs>

4_107_01_I_kun dga rgyal mtshan_BPP.xml,4_107_01,,ex107012023-10-06-110204,unreviewed,,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex107012023-10-06-110204"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"" status=""unreviewed"">shing rta chen po dpal mar me mdzad ye shes kyi thugs kyi bcud phyung ba <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5421"">byang chub lam gyi sgron ma'i rnam par bshad pa phul byung dgongs pa'i rgyan</rs> zhes bya ba 'di ni
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">jo bo chen po</rs> <rs type=""place"">bod yul</rs> du phyags phab nas <hi rendition=""#Time"">lo bzhi brgya dang nga brgyad</hi> 'das pa na
column3: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">bla ma dam pa rnams</rs> kyi bka' drin gyis 'tsho ba <rs type=""person"" ana="""">dge slong kun mtshan</rs> gyis <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4593"">dge ba'i bshes gnyen</rs> gong ma dag gi gsung la gces spras su dang nan tan du byas te rang bzo dang bral bar
column4: dpal <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5765"">rtses thang gi chos gra chen po</rs>r legs par bsdebs pa'o

column1: 'dis kyang rgyal ba'i bstan pa rin po che dar zhing rgyas la yun ring du gnas par byed nus par gyur cig
column2: drag po zhes bya lcags spre'u  dbyar 'bring gi
column4: rgyal bas chos 'khor skor ba'i dus chen la
column6: shing  rta'i lam <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5421"">chen byang chub lam sgron gyi
column8: rnam bshad phul byung dgongs pa'i rgyan</rs> 'di grub
column12: </seg></TEI>"

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana="""">spang ston grub pa shes rab</rs> <?oxy_comment_start comment=""P1302 14th abbot of Snar thang""?><?oxy_comment_end?>

yang <rs type=""person"" ana="""">bla ma rin po che 'gos lo tsA ba{</rs>P318<rs type=""person"" ana="""">}</rs>
<rs type=""person"" ana="""">spyan snga rin po che chos kyi brags pa ye shes dpal bzang po {</rs>P317<rs type=""person"" ana="""">}</rs>

yang na <rs type=""person"" ana="""">jo bo chen po</rs>
<rs type=""person"" ana="""">dge bshes ston pa</rs>

column3: mkhas pa'i rjes su  <lb n=""74a7""/> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4712""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3727"">byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'jug pa</rs>'i tshig gi don zhib tu rnam par 'byed pa dga' ba rgya mtsho</rs> zhes bya ba <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3880"">shag kya'i dge slong <lb n=""74a8""/>a rmi ta kir ti</rs>s bkrol zin to

des ngas 'di skyong ba yin pa la srog gi bar chad du gyur pa 'am tshe'i 'du byed gtong bas <lb n=""2a3""/>khyod la 'di bcol lo byas nas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref="""">bla ma gzhan zhig</rs> la gtod pa <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3827"">dge bshes ston pa</rs> 'da' ba'i dus na gsung ba bzhin du yin pa las
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_05_W1PD89051-v19_img339-374.xml,1_019_05,,ex190522024-11-19-14-35,unreviewed,2a6 - 2a7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""2a6""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex190522024-11-19-14-35"" status=""unreviewed"">
<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""3443"">pu to ba</rs>s de na 'dug pa kun la
column2: glang bu bdag pos 'ded 'phro lam du bzhag nas don gnyer du seng na
column3: glang bu de nyid du bslad na bdag po log nas 'ded pa yang srid khyim tshes lasogs pas ngo shes nas 'ded pa yang srid rang gi khyim du phyin te yong
column4: lam las 'khyogs na <lb n=""2a7""/>rkun mas khyer nas bsha' ba yin
column5: </seg></TEI>"

dmyigs pa la cu zad <lb n=""13b6""/>gtad bzod na la mar toms kyis langs na rtab 'chos pa dang
column2: snad pa byung ba yang yod la nad lasogs pa lus sems la gnod pa mang du 'byung ba'i nyin yod pas <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:6689"">dgon pa ba</rs> dang <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3829"">pu to ba</rs> kun mdzad pa bzhin du

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">dge' bshes gzhon 'byung</rs> <rs type=""place"">ra sgreng</rs> du byon pa'i dus na de la tshe 'di nyid  la phyag rgya chen po'i dngos grub 'thob pa'i man ngag yod zer mi kun yang yod du re nas 'dug pa la
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref="""">pu to bas</rs> tshe 'di nyid la phyag rgya chen po'i <lb n=""14a6""/>dngos grub 'thob pa'i skal ba can 1 rang bag gi kha dog 'di 'dra bar mi skye
column3: skye pa rang yang yul dbus kyi grong khyer chen po bzo' bo bye brag bcwo brgyad dang rigs pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas pa lasogs pa yod pa'i sar skye ba yin byas gsung ba ste
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 1_019_07_Shes rab 'bum_dbu ma rtsa ba'i bshad pa 'thad pa rnam par nges pa.xml,$,,ex1972023-09-06_1041,reviewed,58a4 - 58a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""58a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex1972023-09-06_1041"" status=""reviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3720"">slob dpon 'phags pa klu sgrub</rs> kyis<lb n=""58a5""/> mdzad pa'i <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4607""><rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3715"">dbu ma rtsa ba</rs>'i bshad pa 'thad pa rnam par nges pa</rs> zhes bya ba ¦ <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4608"">lung dang rigs par smra ba'i dge slong shes rab 'buM</rs> gyis rnam grangs kyi bshad pa rnaMs re shig bzhag ste
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3725"">slob dpon zla ba</rs>'i gzhung bzhin du
column4: <rs type=""place"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5572"">dpal brag ram gyi gtsug lag khang</rs> du sbyar ba 'di re shig rdzogs s+ho

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-30,unreviewed,3b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""3b1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-30"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5554"">lha</rs> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5549"">shag</rs>
column3: <rs type=""work"" ref=""db:5588"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"">rgyan</rs> gi dgongs pa <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> las ¦ <quote source=""db:5564"" n=""VIII.40b""><l>mi slu ma shes don gsal 2
column5: </l> <l>rnam grangs pa'nag * smra
column7: </l></quote> <!--RT VIII.40b, gzhan gyis brtag pa dgag na-->

column1: zhes gsung shing
column2: de dgag pa yang ¦ <quote source=""db:5564"" n=""VIII.41ab""><l>mtshan nyid 2 kyis 'jog * ni
column4: </l> <l>mtshon byed de yang 2 su 'gyur
column6: </l></quote> <!--VIII.41ab, agaisnt Lha dbang blo-->

column1: <quote source=""db:5564"" n=""VIII.41cd""><l>mtshon bya gnyis su 'dod na yang
column5: </l></quote> <!--RT VIII.41cd, against rGyan mdzad pa-->

column1: <quote source=""db:5564"" n=""VIII.42ab?""><l>tha snyad pa dang don dam pa
column5: </l></quote> <note type=""editorial"">Different from VIII 42ab against Chos mchog, which reads: ma khyab gcod tshul 'dir mi 'thad
column7: gnyis su 'byed pa dgongs pa min </note> ces dang

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5552"">bram ze</rs>'i bzhed pa la yang
<quote source=""db:5564"" n=""VIII.42cd""><l>mi dgos ma khyab mi srid 3
column5: </l></quote> <!--RT VIII.42cd, against Bram ze-->

column1: ces so

2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-3010,unreviewed,4a3,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""4a3""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-3010"" status=""unreviewed"">mi slu ba'i don ni: <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> las
<quote source=""db:5564"" n=""RTRG ad VIII.44ab"">
<l xml:space=""preserve"">gang gis gang la ji ltar mi slu </l>
</quote>
zhes pa 3 bshad cing
don bsdus na ¦ don ji ltar gnas pa ltar yod pa la yod par shes med pa la med par shes pa'o

2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-09-2410-28-16,unreviewed,4b5 - 4b7,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-09-2410-28-16"" status=""unreviewed"">2 pa tshad mas sgro 'dogs ji ltar gcod pa'i tshul ni ¦ <lb n=""4b5""/> <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s ¦<quote source=""db:6664"" n=""VIII.46ab""> <l>tshad ma'i stobs kyis nges pa 'dren
<l>nges pa'i 'gal zla sgro 'dogs yin
zhes bya ba ltar
column2: kun du tha snyad pa'i tshad ma'i stobs kyis 'jug ldog byed pa na nges shes 'dren dgos te

column1: <quote> <l>yod med nges pa'i 'bras can min
column5: </l></quote>(PV I.200ab) zhes bya bas so
column7: <note type=""editorial"">=RTRG ad RT VIII.46ab</note>

column1: de ltar tshad ma'i grangs pa'i nges shes des <lb n=""4b6""/> sgro 'dogs gcod pa yin te
<quote n=""PV I.49""><l>nges pa dang ni sgro 'dogs yid
<l>gnod bya gnod byed ngo bo'i phyir
<l>'di ni sgro 'dogs dben pa la
<l>'jug ces bya bar shes pa yin
zhes bya bas so
des na mngon sum gyis sgro 'dogs gcod ces brjod kyang mngon sum min gyi, rjes kyi nges pa gcod pa yin te, ku sha lag pas bzung nas zor bas gcod pa bzhin no

<lb n=""4b7""/> 'di dag gi don nges par bya ba la gcad bya sgro 'dogs kyi rang bzhin ¦ gcod byed nges pa'i rang bzhin ni: des ji ltar sgro 'dogs gcod pa'i tshul 3 gyis nges par byed par gsung kyang, rtogs sla zhing
column2: 'og nas rtog pa'i rab dbye'i skabs su yang 'chad pas na 'dir ma spros so
column4: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22,unreviewed,5a4 - 5a5,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""5a4""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22"" status=""unreviewed"">de ni <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje pa</rs>s (tshid) (bcadu) bsdebs pa ni ¦ <quote source=""db:6664"" n=""VIII.64""><l>don rig 2 dang rang rig dang
<l>rjes su dpag pa rang las nges
<l>dang po pa dang yid ma gtad
<l>'khrul rgyu can rnams gzhan las nges
zhes gsungs shing
de nges byed kyi tshad ma yang
<quote source=""db:6664"" n=""VIII.65ab""><l>don byed pa dang goms pa <lb n=""5a5""/> can
<l>rjes su dpag pas nges par byed
ces bya'o </seg></TEI>"

2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-13-45,unreviewed,6a1 - 6a2,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""6a1""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-13-45"" status=""unreviewed"">gzhan yang de ltar 'dod pa de dpyod pa pa'i phyogs su brlan par rigs pas sun phyin gyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3831"">mkhas pa chen po cha pa</rs> swo <note type=""editorial"">for ""la sogs pa""</note> kyis kyang dpyod pa ba'i phyogs su <lb n=""6a2""/> bslan nas dgag pa mdzad pa yin no

2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-18-35,unreviewed,16b7 - 16b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""16b7""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-18-35"" status=""unreviewed""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">gangs can mkhas pa'i gtsug rgyan chos rjes paNDi ta chen po</rs>s kyang snang yul dang
column2: gzung yul 1 du mdzad nas dgag pa mdzad pa'i rgyun yang de 'di <lb n=""16b8""/> yin no

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-3011,unreviewed,N004 - N006,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N004""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-3011"" status=""unreviewed"">des na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos <lb n=""N005""/>kyi rje</rs>s mngon ng po mdo'i lung
column2: byeg pa 3 rnam rig nyis
column3: zhes pa ltar legs par mngon yang ba mi bla mas ni bang ni skad pa dang don pi rnam bzhagnyis las dang po'i dbang du byas nas <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> nyid las kyang bag chag brtan dang mi brtan las
column4: bden dang sdun pi rnaM bzhag byed
column5: cesungs pas mngon dang po 2 kyang

column1: <lb n=""N006""/>bzhed la phyi ma'i dpang du byas nas seMs tsam gyi tshul la rnor mngon dang dang rim mngon 3 ngo na yin pas byeg pa 3 rnam rig nyis
column2: zhesungs pa yino

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-281,unreviewed,N003,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N003""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-281"" status=""unreviewed"">  'gig dbos la yul gyi rnaMs 'char ba phyil gyi don la los mi los 2 su byed <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>'i dongs par mngon
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-3012,unreviewed,N003 - N004,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N003""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-3012"" status=""unreviewed"">yang <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs gter</rs> gyi dongs pa yid mngon yin na 'das pa yin pas khyab cing 'das pa las 'das pa li skye ba'i phyir na yid mngon la rgyun med ces 'dod pa'i
<lb n=""N004""/>khyor su bshad nas dgag pa yin du mang pa mdzad pa ni lung de la skyon rjod pa dbyes pa tsam du zad kyi yung de la ni chunga kyang mi bgod
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-282,unreviewed,N006 - N008,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N006""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-282"" status=""unreviewed"">
gan yang dpyad na shes pas yul 'dzin pa gtan migr ba tshungs
column2: de lta na
column3: don sa bas kyang chos thaMd rangin gyis stod pi stong pa nyid rtogs pa la <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>gi tshad 'bras ni la me'i tshogs don

column1: <lb n=""N007""/>gzhalya du ba'i tang las de rtog pi rjegi tha skad 'brus
column2: du ba'i rtag las la mo'i don tshang gyi rnal pa shar nas de la gsang du mu ni shes pa tshad ma zhes yang na phyil gyi don bzhalya don gyi rnaM pa shar nas don la bsar du mu bi shes pa tshad pa don rtog tshad ma 'brus
column3: zhes pa des ba na rigi rjeg

column1: <lb n=""N008""/>pang mtshan nus gsung
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-283,unreviewed,N007 - N001,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N007""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-283"" status=""unreviewed"">de ltar <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje thaMd mkhyen pa</rs>'i  zhal               <lb n=""N008""/>mnga' nas kyang de ltar grub mtha' 4 las slo+on phyil gyi don slon pi tshe med pa ltar mdzad la bye nang la 'jug pa na rnam zhal gyis bzhes zhesungs ci ste 'dir yang
column3: gang gis dngos rnam dpyad na
column4: zhes 1 dang du bral gyi gyi ba sungs mino zhe na gsungs mod kyi des ni dngos mtha' dag rangin mes

column1: <lb n=""N001""/>gtan la 'bebs pa ma yino
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-284,unreviewed,N003,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-284"" status=""unreviewed"">deg ni bzhung gi dongs
<lb n=""N003""/>pa sgrib par gyur pa tsam zhig du zod des na <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje thaMd mkhyen pa</rs>s sa gsungs ltar
column2: blo das 1 gis gang rung 1 rtong na 1 shos kyang rtogs pas khyab pa ni ldig dmigs kyi don to

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-285,unreviewed,N005 - N007,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-285"" status=""unreviewed"">2 pa ltar na de 2 la 'brel pa med pas ldig migs nges mid la
column2: 'brel pa yod kyang bo rdzas 1 gi pa dmigs pi rag mub pa yino
column4: snang zugs 2 po rdzas tha dad yine
column5: nye+en tha dad las skyes pir
column6: 'on kyang seMn kyi blo la ltos nas

column1: <lb n=""N005""/>dmyings pa yin pir
column2: snang bas sreg chang gi gi rgya mthong ba'i gags sbyed yir
column3: dper na snang 1 mtshan rgyu dang
column5: de las bdan pa'i dbangos dan
column6: zugs mthong ba dang yi thun dang

column1: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs> sgrib pa med pa'i spyan dang ldan pas
column2: zugs dang snang ba ni

column1: <lb n=""N006""/>rugs dmigs pa snang pa la logs pa'i srob chang la las dmigs pa na rdzas tha dad ma yin
column2: lcags bsreg pa 4n
column3: snang ba la mos pa byi ba log pa la ldig dmigs med
column4: snang ba med kyang zugs dang
column5: rgyas med kyang snang ba dmigs pir
column6: lags dang me tha dad par dmigs pa 4n
column7: zhesung ngos ngos byun pi rnaM bzhan dang

column1: <lb n=""N007""/>rdzas 1 dang rdzas tha dad ni sngar dpyad pa las shes
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-286,unreviewed,N001 - N002,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-286"" status=""unreviewed"">'di'i lan la mtha' rnams bska ba ga sungs nas 'chos gzhi dang ni
column2: gzhan dang ni tshon gyi chos zhes spyod pa la brtens bsgrub bya'i chen kho na pa mi yod te dpe'i chon 3 po la dang po yir te shon gyi sa bon pa yis de des pa dang

column1: <lb n=""N001""/>rjes pa dpag byas pa yod ces brjod pa la brtens kyang cho rjes su pag bya kha na la mi po ste <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s dud pa ba dang shad don rjes su pa bya lang po pir rjes su pa bya'i sa byang b kyi zhe na dang rjes su dang bya la yod ces brjod pa la bsten pa nyes pa dpa' bo de chon kho na la gog pa yin gyi
<lb n=""N002""/>sgras byag mo ba'i rgyun gnas skabs kyi nges pa yod pir phyogs kyi 'brel pa gtan la 'babs pa'i gnas skabsu phogs kyi sgro de bsgrub ba'i chon kho na la 'jug pir
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-287,unreviewed,N007 - 73b8,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-287"" status=""unreviewed"">gle chon gyi chos zhes brjod pa 'khrul gzhi yod la
column2: phyos zhes brjod na bskas ming du 'gro bas 2 ka ltar mi rjod phod gyi chos zhes dang ming gis rjod na go bde mod khar zan

column1: <lb n=""N007""/>'jug pa la lab pa bskyor ci dogs snyam na
column2: dngos ming de ltar rjod na lrub pa ci yang med mod kyi don kyang shed chon gyi <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs>s 'gro ldog pa zhes tshul 3 brjod pa yige mnyaM pas rjer mi bde ba dang
column5: zhes bya ba lasog pa'i tshog le'ur byas pa mi 'grib pas mkhas

column1: <lb n=""N008""/>pa rnams kyis bad pa mtshad yang star kyi de 'jug thos pa bzhugs kyi don go na stod pang nas pa yon pa yang ba'i yang hyir zhes dang gyi thin pa la zhus kyis den togs pang nyes pa brgyad pa ma yin mnyam pas bsgus kyang pa yong du spangs pa yino
column2: des na kyi skyed ni rtog kyang ba pa dang nas

column1: <lb n=""73b8""/>…<rs type=""work"">gtan tshigs thigs pa</rs> las : * kyis don go yang nye bar b* pa * yi ge mnyam pas bsgrub dka' ba yongs su spangs pa yin no
column2: </seg></TEI>"

column1: 2_045_04_anonymous summary_rnam grel rnam byed.xml,2_045_04,,ex45042024-08-2914-22-289,unreviewed,N003,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""N003""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex45042024-08-2914-22-289"" status=""unreviewed"">da la na yan b pa ni phyir
column2: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"" ref=""db:3892"">chos rje</rs> nyid kyi <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:5564"">rigs pa'i gter</rs> las

column1: la la par dang tha skad kyi
grang pa 2 su 'byed pa yod
ba skad 'di yi skabs don min
mtshid de 'dra sar bkag zin
dngos dang zhen pi rjod rung pi sa
bra'i grangs pa'ang 2 zhes zer

column3: <lb n=""1a4""/><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">mkhan po chen po snar thang pa'i</rs><note type=""gloss""><rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">skyo pa</rs></note> <rs type=""work"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4863""> gsan yig</rs>gzhugs s+hyo

column4: bskyor ba'i man ngag dang
column5: lung bshags 'don thabs dang
column6: skar ma rab rib dang
column7: rgyun gtor dang

column1: 2_050_12 skyo ston smon lam tshul khrims kyi gsan yig.xml,2_050_12,,ex50122024-09-1712-56-13,unreviewed,[14a7] - 14b1,"<TEI xmlns='http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0'><lb xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" n=""[14a7]""/><seg xmlns=""http://www.tei-c.org/ns/1.0"" type=""excerpt"" xml:id=""ex50122024-09-1712-56-13"" status=""unreviewed"" ana=""corpusmd:colophon"">

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:unnamed_reference"">bla ma rnams</rs> kyi bka' drin las <lb n=""14a8""/> cung zad thob pa dang thos pa rnams
column2: dran par bya zhing bskul ba'i bsam pa rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir yi ger bris pa'o
column4: <rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4052"">shAkya'i btsun pa smon lam <pb n=""14b""/><lb n=""14b1""/>tshul khrims</rs> kyis thos yig go

<rs type=""person"" ana=""corpusmd:named_reference"" ref=""db:4864"">shAkya'i btsun pa rtsed pa bsod nams blo gros</rs> kyi dpe'o
